item.text: @#/ /phal chen a bzhugs so/ /
@##/ /sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po dang po/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor dge slong blta na sdug pa de'i gdams
ngag rjes su slos shing spel ba dang / bsdud pa dang rab tu dbye ba dang / bshad pa dang / so sor rnam par bsgom pa dang brjod pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa dang / rjes su bsam pa
dang / mngon par 'jug par bya ba dang / bkur ba dang khong du chud par bya ba dang / yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang / yang dang yang bslas pa dang / shin tu rtogs par bya ba dang / rab

tu bstan pa dang / snang bar bya ba dang / rjes su rnam par lta ba dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i 'khor dang bcas pa de mthar gyis yul dge sbyong gi dkyil 'khor gyi grong khyer sgo bzang
po gang na ba der phyin te/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug yongs su tshol tshol ba las de'i steng gi bar snang las lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis bos pa/ rigs kyi bu

khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug ni/ chu klung gi chu 'dus pa nye ba zhig na/ byis pa stong phrag bcu tsam gyis bskor te/ bye ma la rtse bas rtse zhing 'dug go zhes nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor grong khyer sgo bzang po dang / nye ba'i chu klung

gi chu 'dus gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / des khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug byis pa stong phrag bcu tsam gyis bskor cing bye ma la rtse bas rtse ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gang na ba der song ste/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang

phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags

pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba ma 'tshal ta/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa'

rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras

pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yi ge dang / grangs dang / brda dang / /rtsis kyi tshul bslabs te/ bzo thams cad mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi sgor bcug go /de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos ni 'jig

rten na yi ge dang / gi rnam pa dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / brda dang / shod thabs shes par bya ba dang / bzo sna tshogs shes par bya ba dang / khams kyi cho ga dang / dug gso ba'i thabs dang / skem pa dang / brjed byed dang / 'byung po'i gdon gyis btab pa gso ba dang /

grong dang / grong khyer dang / tshong dus dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / gnas rnam par dgod pa shes par bya ba dang / ra ba dang / khang pa dang / skar khung dang / khang pa brtsegs pa'i tshad shes par bya ba dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / shing rta sbyar ba'i

tshul sna tshogs shes par bya ba dang / dge mi dge dang / 'jigs mi 'jigs kyi ltas dang / mtshan ma shes par bya ba dang / rmos dang / tshong dang / rnam par spyad pa sbyar ba'i cho ga shes par bya ba dang / sems can gyi yan lag dang / nying lag gi mtshan gyi rgyud dang / rgyus dang / rnam

par dpyad pa shes par bya ba dang / bde 'gro dang ngan song gi las kyi lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i tshul shes par bya ba dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dang / tshogs mchod pa shes par bya ba dang / bde 'gro dang ngan song gi tshogs shes par bya ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang

sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshogs shes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i tshogs shes par bya ba dang / rgyu dang byed pa dang / sbyor ba'i rgyud shes par bya ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad shes te/ de dag la sems can yongs su gzud pa byed do/ /rab tu dgod pa byed do/ /

yongs su gzhog pa byed do/ /slob tu 'dzud do/ /sbyong du 'dzud do/ /brtan par byed do/ /lhur len par byed do/ /rdzogs par byed do/ /yongs su sgrub par byed do/ /yongs su spyod par byed do/ /gsal bar bstan par byed do/ /rnam par 'phel bar byed do/ /mtshan

mar byed do/ /mthar phyin par byed do/ /rnam par sbyong bar byed do/ /dri ma med par byed do/ /shin tu dag par byed do/ /'od gsal zhing dang bar byed do/ /shin tu yangs par byed do/ /de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsis kyi tshul shes pa de

gang zhe na/ /brgya stong phrag brgya na bye ba'o/ /bye ba bye ba na khod khod do/ /khod khod khod khod na tha dgu'o/ /tha dgu tha dgu na khrig khrig go /khrig khrig khrig khrig na thams thams so/ /thams thams thams thams na myang myid do/ /myad myid myad myid na

gang ya'o/ /gang ya gang ya na ban bun no/ /ban bun ban bun na phyar phyur ro/ /phyar phyur phyar phyur na lcag lcig go /lcag lcig lcag lcig na byang bying ngo / /byang bying byang bying na chem chem mo/ /chem chem chem chem na phyal phyol lo/ /phyal phyol phyal phyol na khyud khyud do/ /khyud khyud

khyud khyud na zar zer ro/ /zar zer zar zer na khrib khrib bo/ /khrib khrib khrib khrib na ya gangs so/ /ya gangs ya gangs na cho ma'o/ /cho ma cho ma na khram khrim mo/ /khram khrim khram khrim na nab nub bo/ /nab nub nab nub na sang sang ngo / /sang sang sang sang na brgyud yas so/ /brgyud

yas brgyud yas na btang yas so/ /btang yas btang yas na bkra yar ro/ /bkra yar bkra yar na gsa' yas so/ /gsa' yas gsa' yas na mtshungs med do/ /mtshungs med mtshungs med na lam lum mo/ /lam lum lam lum na yal yol lo/ /yal yol yal yol

na khral khrul lo/ /khral khrul khral khrul na thud thud do/ /thung thung thung thung na bsam phyod do/ /bsam phyod bsam phyod na brang breng ngo / /brang breng brang bred na bgrod yas so/ /bgrod yas bgrod yas na bsngo yas so/ /bsngo yas bsngo yas na zang yag go /zang yag zang

yag na 'phro ba kye'o/ /'phro bkye 'phro bkye na rtse 'phyo'o/ /rtse 'phyo rtse 'phyo na yong tan no/ /yong tan yong tan na brug g.yos so/ /brug g.yos brug g.yos na sang yal lo/ /sang yal sang yal na 'thing yug go /'thing yug 'thing yug na yid 'phyo'o/ /yid 'phyo yid

'phyo na nab neb bo/ /nab neb nab neb na khrig thams so/ /khrig thams khrig thams na yal yal lo/ /yal yal yal yal na bgrad yas so/ /bgrang yas bgrang yas na thug yal lo/ /thug yal thug yal na shang shang ngo / /shang shang shang shang na yag yag go /

yag yag yag yag na tham thim mo/ /tham thim tham thim na rlom bsnyal lo/ /rlom bsnyal rlom bsnyal na gzhal 'phyos so/ /gzhal 'phyos gzhal 'phyos na gzhal yal lo/ /gzhal yal gzhal yal na gzhal med do/ /gzhal med gzhal med na gzhal 'khor to/ /

gzhal 'khor gzhal 'khor na gzhal thim mo/ /gzhal thim gzhal thim na gar gzhal lo/ /gar gzhal gar gzhal na gzhal sangs so/ /gzhal sangs gzhal sangs na gzhal thag go /gzhal thag gzhal thag na gzhal phul lo/ /gzhal phul gzhal phul na gzhal

zhi'o/ /gzhal zhi gzhal zhi na 'phyo 'gyur ro/ /'phyo 'gyur 'phyo 'gyur na nyar nyer ro/ /nyar nyer nyar nyer na phyag phyig go /phyag phyig phyag phyig na zal zul lo/ /zal zul zal zul na sal sal lo/ /sal sal sal sal na g.yo ldeg go /g.yo ldeg g.yo ldeg na phan phun no/ /phan phun

phan phun na brnang ya'o/ /brnang ya brnang ya na rem 'drol lo/ /rem 'drol rem 'drol na rdzi ngad do/ /rdzi ngad rdzi ngad na rdzi rdul lo/ /rdzi rdul rdzi rdul na phun yol lo/ /phun yol phun yol na ngad ngad do/ /ngad ngad ngad ngad na bgrang brtsi'o/ /bgrang brtsi bgrang brtsi na zab bgrang ngo / /

zab bgrang zab bgrang na dga' rkyang ngo / /dga' rkyang dga' rkyang na gzhung 'dal to/ /gzhung 'dal gzhung 'dal na khrug phyad do/ /khrug phyad khrug phyad na 'ol phyod do/ /'ol phyod 'ol phyod na gdab yas so/ /gdab yas gdab yas na gcal yas so/ /gcal yas

gcal yas na bgrang yas so/ /bgrang yas bgrang yas na byim 'phyo'o/ /byim 'phyo byim 'phyo na yam me'o/ /yam me yam me na bsnyal yas so/ /bsnyal yas bsnyal yas na ldab ldeb bo/ /ldab ldeb ldab ldeb na 'phan chad do/ /'phan chad 'phan chad na phang phung ngo / /phang phung phang

phung na khe'u tshang ngo / /khe'u tshang khe'u tshang na zhung zung ngo / /zhung zung zhung zung na mchog yal lo/ /mchog yal mchog yal na mtha' rtul to/ /mtha' rtul mtha' rtul na yun 'gyangs so/ /yun 'gyangs yun 'gyangs na bun lob bo/ /bun lob bun lob na lam

lom mo/ /lam lom lam lom na bsnyad yas so/ /bsnyad yas bsnyad yas na lang ling ngo / /lang ling lang ling na ljab ljib bo/ /ljab ljeb ljab ljib na brtsal to/ /brtsal brtsal na 'byam yas so/ /'byam yas 'byam yas na nga 'grang ngo /

nga 'grang nga 'grang na smos yal lo/ /smos yal smos yal na bkra chal lo/ /bkra chal bkra chal na lo rgyas so/ /lo rgyas lo rgyas na 'bum rdib bo/ /'bum rdib 'bum rdib na gang gum mo/ /gang gum gang gum na la lo'o/ /la lo la lo na bgrang 'phyos so/ /bgrang 'phyos bgrang

'phyos na bgrong 'phyos la bsgres ba'o/ /bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa bgrang 'phyos la bsgres na dpag yas so/ /dpag yas dpag yas na dpag yas la bsgres pa'o/ /dpag yas la bsgres pa dpag yas la bsgres na yal phyod do/ /yal phyod yal phyod na

yal phyod la bsgres pa'o/ /yal phyod la bsgres pa yal phyod la bsgres na mu yal to/ /mu yal mu yal na mu yal la bsgres pa'o/ /mu yal la bsgres ba mu yal la bsgres pa na bgrang yol lo/ /bgrang yol bgrang yol na bgrang yol la bsgres pa'o/ /bgrang yol la

bsgres pa bgrang yol la bsgres na mjal to/ /mjal mjal na mi mjal la bsgres pa'o/ /mi mjal la bsgres ba mjal la bsgres na bsam phyod do/ /bsam phyod bsam phyod na bsam phyod la bsgres pa'o/ /bsam phyod la

bsgres pa bsam phyod la bsgres na mtha' 'byam mo/ /mtha' 'byam mtha' 'byam na dpag thag go/ /dpag thag dpag thag na dpag thag la bsgres pa'o/ /dpag thag la bsgres pa dpag thag la bsgres na brjod du pa'o/ /brjod du med pa

brjod du pa na brjod du med pa la bsgres pa'o/ /brjod du med pa la bsgres pa brjod du med pa la bsgres na brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa shin tu bstan pa'o/ /de'i mdun na bye ma'i phung po chen po dpag tshad du ma'i

tshad dang ldan pa zhig 'dug 'dug pa las/ /'di la bye ma'i 'bru 'di snyed cig yod do zhes bya ba nas/ bye ma'i 'bru brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa la 'di snyed cig yod do zhes rab tu phye nas bgrang brtsis te grangs su bcad do/ /des bye ma'i phung po de brtsis kyi

brdar bstan pas/ shin tu bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa kun na'ang yod de/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis shar phyogs kyi

'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag kyang bgrang zhing rtsi'o/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams dang / /'og

dang steng gi phyogs su yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas ba dag kyang bgrang zhing rtsi'o/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di ni/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi du bya ba gcig nas

gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa thams cad na'ang yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bgrang zhing rtsi'o/ /ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa

bstan du yod pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i bskal pa'i gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang / chos kyi gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang / sems can gyi gcig

nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang / las kyi gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa kun la'ang 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di nyid ni/ phyogs bcu na du bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du rung ba ji snyed pa

thams cad la'ang 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrad ba'i tshul 'dis phyogs bcu na gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ji snyed yod pa thams cad kyang bgrang zhing rtsi'o/ /de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang

ba chos thams cad shes par bya ba'i bzo mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa 'di shes bar zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ chos kyi tshul thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ dus gsum gyi grangs la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad

kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ chos kyi phung po thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ /chos thams cad kyi ming gi 'khor lo la dbang bsgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes ba'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ spyod

yul smos pa'am/ /yul brjod pa'am/ stobs bsngags pa'am/ bsam pa brtan pa'am/ tshogs yongs su brjod pa'am/ smon lam bshad par bya ba 'am/ spyod pa yongs su bstan pa'am/ pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa mngon par brjod pa'am/ yang

dag par bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa'am/ yang dag par bstan pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par smos pa'am/ ye shes snang ba khong du chud par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer rgya mtsho brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge bsnyen ma

phul du byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig thos nas spu g.yos te/ dga'

ba chen po'i shugs skyes nas/ rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur ba ngo mtshar gyi bsam pa/ rin po che rab tu dkon pa thob pa/ 'gro ba mang po la phan pa'i sems dang bsam pas byung ba sangs rgyas skyes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par 'gro ba la dbang bsgyur ba/

chos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i blo gros la rten pa/ thams cad du rjes su song pa'i rig pa rnam par phye bas 'byung ba bstan pa la brtson pa/ dus gsum gyi dbyings su ma 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul dang ldan pa/ bsod nams mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho las byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/

ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la dbang bsgyur ba/ khams gsum gyi khyim du sdud pa'i sgo shin tu gcod pa des/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang

yang bltas te/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi sprin gyi char yongs su 'dzin pa byed cing / gang chen mtsho ltar sprin chen po'i char gyis ngoms shes pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi nyi

ma'i ye shes kyi 'od gzer gyis dge ba yongs su smin par byas pa'i sa gzhi las dbang po'i myu gu 'thon cing skyes ba/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa'i gdams ngag gi 'od gzer gyi dra bas lus dang / sems shin tu tshim par byas ba/ /dpyid kyi nyi ma'i

'od kyis gdungs pa'i kyi tshogs gsal zhing bsil ba'i gangs chu la 'thung bar 'dod pa ltar/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi chu la 'thung bar 'dod pa/ bung ba mang po 'khor zhing lding bas rgyas par gyur pa'i pad mo dang ldan pa'i pad+mo'i mtsho ltar dge ba'i bshes

gnyen gyi gdams ngag gis sems kyi me tog bun da ri ka kha phye ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su rgyas pa'i rin po che'i gling ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag rin po che 'phel ba'i snang bas sems shin tu snang bar byas ba/ 'dzam bu'i shing chen po'i me tog dang /

'bras bu'i tshogs chen po dang ldan pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs su gyur pa/ /phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ klu'i dbang po chen po rtsed mo dam pas rtse ba las byung ba'i nam mkha'i sprin chen po ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi

gdams ngag thos pa'i tshogs su gyur pa'i rnang shin tu che ba/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i 'jig rten gyi brgyan pa'i sna tshogs kyi spo ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag las byung ba'i chos dri ma pa sna tshogs brtsegs pa'i spor gyur pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs

kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i brgya byin lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i tshogs rab tu 'joms pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag las byung ba'i yon tan dri ma pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing zil gyis gnon la gzhan la zil gyis gnon pa de/ mthar gyis grong khyer rgya mtsho

brtan pa gang na ba der phyin te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba yongs su tshol tshol ba las de la skye bo mang pos bstan te/ rigs kyi bu dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba de grong khyer gyi dbus kyi rang gi khyim na 'dug go zhes nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i

gnas gang na ba der song ste/ thal mo sbyar nas sgo gang na sdong sdod pa dang / des dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i khyim de shin tu rgya che la yangs shing rin po che'i ra bas yongs su bskor ba phyogs bzhi nas sgo shin tu mdzes pa rnam par phye ba/ rin po che tshad grangs pa'i rgyan gyis

brgyan pa/ bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa mthong nas/ de khyim der song ste/ kun tu bltas na dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba na chung shin tu gzhon pa thog ma dar la bab pa/ gzugs mngon zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa kha dog dam pa/ pri yab

shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ skra phye mar bzhag pa/ lus la rgyan pa/ gos dang smad g.yogs dkar po bgos pa/ rin po che'i khri la 'dug pa mthong ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par de'i lus sam/ sems kyi dbang ngam/

gzi brjid dang / kha dog gis zil gyis ma non pa'i sems can ni khyim de na gang yang de/ lha'am mi'ang rung ste/ sems can gang gis dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la ston pa'i 'du

shes su bsam pa zhig /rin po che'i khri la 'dug pa mthong ngo / /gzhan yang khyim de na stan lha rdzas dang / rdzas las shin tu 'phags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su grub pa bye ba stong phrag bcu bting ba dang / mdun du phru ba gcig cig

bzhag pa las kha zas dang skom gyi bag gam/ gos dang rgyan gyi longs spyod kyi bag gzhan ci yang snang ngo / /bud stong phrag bcu tsam zhig mdun du 'dug par mthong na'ang de dag thams cad kyang lha'i bu mo'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i gzugs dang ldan pa/

lha'i bu mo'i tshul dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i spyod pa dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i longs spyod dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i tshul du shis pa dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi gos yid bzhin du gyon pa/ lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyis shin tu klubs pa/ lha'i bu mo'i skad lta bu'i

dbyangs snyan pa dang ldan pa lha'i bu mo'i chu zheng mdzes pa dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de'i 'khor gyi bud kyang des ci bsgo ba bzhin du byed cing mdun na 'khod do/ /rim gro byed do/ /bkur sti byed do/ /gdong du lta'o/ /ci bsgo ba nyan cing gnas so/ /rje sar 'khod do/

yongs su lta'o/ rnam par lta'o/ /'dud do/ /rab tu 'dud do/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gi lus las spos kyi ngad ldang bas ni/ grong khyer de'i 'khor thams cad du dri zhim pos khyab par 'dug ste/ sems can gang gis dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad

kyang gnod sems pa'i sems dang / shar gnyer ba pa'i sems dang / 'tshe ba pa'i sems dang / phrag dog dang / 'jungs pa dang bral ba'i sems dang / sgyu dang g.yo pa'i sems dang / chags pa dang / khong khro ba pa'i sems dang /

zhum pa dang / gzengs mthong ba pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / sdom pa la gnas pa'i sems dang / gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la re ba pa'i sems su gyur te/ gang gis de dag gi skad thos pa de dag

thams cad kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / dul ba'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis de dag mthong bar gyur pa de dag kyang / 'dod chags dang bral ba tsam du rang rang gis shes par 'gyur ro/ de ltar mthong nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor dge

bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma bdag gis bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/

ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang

chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ bsod nams kyi mdzod zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba

thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni phru ba gcig po 'di las mos pa sna tshogs can rnams kha zas ci la dga' ba bzhin du tshod ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs kyis tshim par byed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni phru ba

gcig po 'di las ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis sems can brgya 'ang yongs su tshim par byed do/ /sems can stong dang sems can brgya phrag stong dang / sems can bye ba dang / sems can bye ba phrag brgya dang / sems can bye ba phrag stong dang / sems can bye ba brgya phrag

stong dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas/ sems can brjod du pa'i yang brjod du pa mos pa sna tshogs can rnams kyang ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /yongs su stobs par byed do/ /yongs su dga' bar byed do/

yongs su mgu bar byed do/ /yongs su spro bar byed do/ /shin tu tshim par byed do/ /yid bde bar byed do/ /'on kyang phru ba 'di las 'gong bar 'gyur ba med do/ /'grib de dma' bar 'gyur ro/ /zad par 'gyur ro/ 'bri bar 'gyur ro/ /sa mtshams yod par 'gyur

ro/ /mthar thug par 'gyur ro/ /mur thug par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu gzhung de dang 'dra bar sems can 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / de bzhin du gling ba zhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul

shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas sems can mos pa sna tshogs can sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i yang brjod du pa'i rdul shin

tu phra ba snyed cig 'ongs kyang / ci la dga' ba'i kha zas tshod ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /yongs su dga' bar byed do/ /nyams bde bar byed do/ /shin tu tshim par byed do/ yid shin tu

bde bar byed do/ /'on kyang phru ba 'di las 'gong bar 'gyur ba do/ /'grib pa do/ /dma' bar 'gyur ro/ /zad par 'gyur ro/ /sa mtshams yod par 'gyur ro/ /mthar thug par 'gyur ro/ /mur thug par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu gal te

phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can mos pa sna tshogs can dang / bsam pa sna tshogs can thams cad 'ongs par gyur na yang / de dag thams cad ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed pa nas/ yid bde

bar bya ba'i bar du byed do/ /kha zas sna tshogs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ro rnam pa sna tshogs dang / stan sna tshogs dang / mal cha sna tshogs dang / bzhon pa sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / phreng ba sna

tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / phye ma sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs dang / gdugs sna tshogs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang / lha'i ba dan sna

tshogs dang / yo byad kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byed pa nas/ yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byed do/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas sku'i tha ma 'dzin pa gang ji snyed cig

bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi 'bras bu brnyes par mdzad do/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams

stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya

phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul

shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i yang brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas

sku'i tha ma 'dzin pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu brnyes par mdzad do/ /shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang /

byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs na ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams

gcig na sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / snying po byang chub tu bzhugs nas bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon

par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams

bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi

rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / /stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs

rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i yang brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol zhing snying po byang chub la bzhugs nas/

bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad do/ /bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar

lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji snyed cig

bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing snying po byang chub tu bzhugs te/ bdud sde dang bcas pa rab tu pham par mdzad nas/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na

bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong dang / 'jig rten

gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi

khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ rigs kyi bu steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod

du pa'i yang brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / snying po byang chub tu bzhugs nas bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kho mo'i 'khor bud stong phrag bcu po 'di dag mthong ngam/ smras pa 'phags ma bdag gis mthong ngo / /smras pa rigs kyi bu bud 'di dag la ba brgya stong grangs

pa phrag bcu kho mo dang skal ba mnyam par spyod pa/ smon lam gcig pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig pa/ 'byung ba'i rgyan gcig pa/ mos pa'i lam rnam par dag pa gcig pa/ kho mo dang skal ba mnyam par dran pa rnam par dag pa/ skal ba mnyam par blo rnam par dag pa/ skal

ba mnyam par blo tshad par gyur pa/ skal ba mnyam par dbang po rab tu thob pa/ skal ba mnyam par sems kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ skal ba mnyam par spyod yul gyi yul dang ldan pa/ skal ba mnyam par chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa/ skal ba mnyam par don nges

par rtogs pa/ skal ba mnyam par chos kyi don ston pa/ skal ba mnyam par gzugs rnam par dag pa/ skal ba mnyam par stobs tshad med pa/ skal ba mnyam par brtan pa gzhan gyis thub pa/ skal ba mnyam par chos kyi sgra sgrog pa/ skal ba

mnyam par dbyangs rnam par dag pa/ tshad pa'i yon tan brjod du yod pas rnam par spyod pa thams cad la skal pa mnyam par yon tan rnam par dag pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la kha na ma tho ba cing rnam par dag pas/ skal ba mnyam par las kyi rnam par smin

pa rnam par dag pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pas/ skal ba mnyam par byams pa chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par byed pas/ skyo ba'i phyir skal ba mnyam par snying rje chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa/ bsam

pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i lus yongs su ston pas/ skal ba mnyam par lus kyi las rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi nges pa'i tshig gi tha snyad la skal ba mnyam par dag gi las rnam par dag pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du skal pa mnyam par 'dod pa/ sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skal ba mnyam par rgyu ba/ chos thams cad kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba la skal ba mnyam par mngon sum

du gyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad thob par bya ba la skal ba mnyam par spyod pa/ rnam par dag pa sha stag cig kyang yod de/ rigs kyi bu bud med stong phrag bcu po 'di dag kyang skad cig

gcig tu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams la zhal zas yongs su 'bul ba'i phyir phyogs bcur rgyas par 'dong ngo / /phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing / srid pa'i tha ma pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa

rnams la bsod snyoms 'bul ba'i phyir phyogs bcur rgyas par 'dong ngo / /phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste kyi tshogs thams cad kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni phru ba 'di nyid

nas lha rnams ni lha'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /klu rnams ni klu'i kha zas kyis/ gnod sbyin rnams ni gnod sbyin gyi kha zas kyis/ dri za rnams ni dri za'i kha zas kyis/ lha ma yin rnams ni lha ma yin gyi kha zas kyis/ nam mkha' lding

rnams ni na ma mkha' lding gi kha zas kyis/ 'am ci rnams ni 'am ci'i kha zas kyis/ lto 'phye chen po rnams ni lto 'phye chen po'i kha zas kyis/ rnams ni kha zas kyis/ ma yin pa rnams ni ma yin pa'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par

byed do/ /rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdod dang de'u re mngon du 'gyur ro/ /dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba des tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i mod la 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung bas/ sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas sems can grangs pa zhig shar phyogs kyi

sgo nas nang du 'ongs par gyur to/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas/ sems can grangs pa zhig /lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs par gyur te/ de ltar 'ongs pa de

dag dge bsnyen ma phul du byung bas/ /stan de dag la bkod de/ so so nas ci dga' ba'i kha zas tshod ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang ldan pas yongs su tshim par byas so/ /yongs su bstabs par byas so/ /yongs su

dga' ba byas so/ /yongs su mgu bar byas so/ /yongs su spro bar byas so/ /shin tu tshim par byas so/ /yid bde bar byas so/ /kha zas sna tshogs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ro rnam pa sna tshogs dang / stan sna tshogs dang / mal

cha sna tshogs dang / bzhon ba sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / phreng ba sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / phye ma sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang /

rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs dang / gdugs sna tshogs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang / lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang / yo byad kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byas pa nas/ yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas so/ /lha rnams ni lha'i kha zas

kyis yongs su tshim par byas so/ /klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dang ma yin pa rnams kyang ma yin pa'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byas pa nas/ yid bde bar 'gyur ba'i

bar du byas so/ /'on kyang phru ba de las 'gong bar gyur ba / 'grib pa / dmas pa / zad par gyur pa / sa mtshams su gyur pa / mthar thug pa / mur thug pa do/ /de nas dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba des/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor

la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams chen po'i rgya mtsho mi zad pas/ zad pa'i bsod

nams dang ldan pa bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po shin tu bstsags pas/ nam mkha' lta bur gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po lta bu/ 'gro ba

thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsrung bas/ bsod nams chen po'i 'khor yug dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du rin po che snyim pa nas char ltar 'thor bas bsod nams chen po'i sprin du gyur ba/ chos kyi grong khyer gyi sgo 'byed pas/ bsod

nams chen po'i mdzod la mngon sum du lta ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi phongs pa'i mun pa sel bas bsod nams chen po'i sgron mar gyur pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ /yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di

nyid na grong khyer 'byung ba chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khyim bdag mkhas pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dris shig /

de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ dge bsnyen ma phul

du byung ba'i drung nas blta bas mi ngoms bzhin du song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bsod nams kyi mdzod zad pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa de/ bsod nams rgya mtsho de la ni rjes su sems/ bsod nams

nam mkha' de la ni kun tu blta/ bsod nams kyi phung po de ni yongs su 'dzin/ bsod nams kyi ri bo de la ni mngon par 'dzeg /bsod nams kyi tshogs de ni yang dag par sdud/ bsod nams kyi chu bo de la ni yongs su 'bog /bsod nams kyi

mu stegs de las ni rab tu 'bab/ bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor de ni yongs su sbyong / bsod nams kyi gter de la ni yang dag par blta/ bsod nams kyi tshul de ni rjes su dran par byed/ bsod nams kyi chos de ni yongs su 'dzin/ bsod nams kyi rgyud de ni

yongs su sbyong ba byed cing / mthar gyis grong khyer 'byung ba chen po gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'dod cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen lta bas bsgos pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i bsam pa dang / dge

ba'i bshes gnyen la thogs pa med pa'i sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya bas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par gyur pa'i bsod

nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rnam par spel ba'i thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa dang / rnam par 'phel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang /

rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / yang dag par 'phel ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po dang / yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / yang dag par 'phel ba'i smon lam chen po mngon par

bsgrub pa dang / shin tu yangs par 'gyur ba'i snying rje chen pos bdag nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur par yang dag par mthong nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad las byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas chos kyi snang ba yang dag par blang ba

dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu snang ba rnam par 'phel bar byed cing khyim bdag mkhas pa yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer gyi dbus lam gyi bzhi mdo zhig na rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu zhig la/ rin po che grangs med pa las byas pa'i

khri nor bu rin po che'i rkang pa rdo rje dang / in dra nI la sna tshogs kyis spras pa bkye ba/ gser gyi lcag phod kyi dra bas legs par blas pa/ nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i snying po can rin po che lnga brgya tsam gyis gzugs legs par brgyan pa/ lha

rdzas kyi stan sna tshogs bting ba/ gam yo nas lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang po bsgreng ba/ rin po che du ma'i dra bas kun nas yog pa rin po che'i bla re chen po bres pa/ bla nas gser dang rin po che'i me tog gi lda ldi mang po bkye ba zhig la 'dug cing /

'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi gdugs yu ba dri ma med pa baiDUr+ya las byas pa ni drung na bsgreng zhing bzung / rin po che'i g.yag rnga dri ma med pa'i rdul yab ngang pa'i rgyal po lta bus ni legs par g.yab spos kyi rim gro'i yo byad sna tshogs kyis ni bdugs shing bsangs/ rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol

ba lha rdzas kyi dbyangs las 'das par sgra 'byin pa lnga brgya tsam ni g.yas g.yon nas brdungs shing dkrol/ grong khyer 'byung ba chen po na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams shin tu dga' bar bya ba'i don du lha rdzas kyi tog gi sprin gyi char ni kun nas 'bab par

gyur/ g.yog srog chags stong phrag bcu tsam sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba skal ba mnyam par spyod spyod pa dag nyan cing ci dga' bar byed pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su grub pa/ lha dang mi'i

gzugs las shin tu 'das pa sha stag gis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor khyim bdag mkhas pa gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas khyim bdag mkhas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ khyim bdag

mkhas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ 'phags pa bdag ni 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad

shin tu bde ba la dgod pa dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho nas mngon par gdon pa dang / sems can thams cad chos rin po che'i gling du yang dag par bskyal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sred pa'i brlan shin tu bskam pa dang / sems can

thams cad kyi snying rje'i brlan yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / sred pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad

'khor ba'i dgon pa las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang chos la dga' zhing mos pa yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad khams gsum gyi grong rdal nas gdon pa dang / sems can thams

cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du gzud par sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs kyis kyang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du

bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar bslab na

byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag mkhas pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen

blta bas ngoms pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro bas skyo ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya bas sgyid lug pa med pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bas yid bde ba skyed pa dang / dge ba'i

bshes gnyen btsal ba las phyir ldog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mos shing dang ba'i yid las rnam par ldog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi ngor blta ba las phyir ldog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi tshul la zhum pa

pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya bas skyo ba de lta bu ni shin tu dkon no/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kho bo'i 'khor 'di dag mthong ngam/ smras pa 'phags pa mthong ngo / smras pa rigs kyi bu 'di dag kun kyang kho bos bla na pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag ste/ 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bskyed pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos pha rol tu phyin pas bsdus te gsol pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos chos dkar po thams cad kyis bskyed pa'o/ /'di dag

ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rnam par bskyed pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi rigs las gyen du bskyod pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bkod pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi lam gyi 'khor lo las

bzlog pa'o/ 'di dag ni kho bos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la btsud pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos ngan song gsum gyi rgyud du ltung ba las yongs su bzung ba'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos chos nyid khong da chud par bya ba la bkod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems

dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams mang po thob pa ste/ de'i mthus kho bo ni zas 'dod pa rnams la kha zas kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /btang ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba dang /

ro'i dam pa 'dod pa rnams la ro'i dam pa dang / bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza' ba dang / bca' ba 'dod pa rnams la bca' ba dang / bldag pa 'dod pa rnams la bldag pa dang / mur pa 'dod pa rnams la mur pa dang / gos 'dod pa rnams la gos dang / me tog

'dod pa rnams la me tog dang / phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba dang / spos 'dod pa rnams la spos dang / bdug pa 'dod pa rnams la bdug pa dang / byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang / phye ma 'dod pa rnams la phye ma dang / rgyan dang lhab lhub 'dod pa rnams la

rgyan dang lhab lhub dang / rin po che 'dod pa rnams la rin po che dang / gser 'dod pa rnams la gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la dngul dang / mu tig 'dod pa rnams la mu tig dang / rten 'dod pa rnams la rten dang / stan 'dod pa rnams la bstan dang / mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha dang /

na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad 'dod pa rnams la na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad dang / bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa dang / dga' ba 'dod pa rnams la dga' ba dang / glang po dang rta dang / shing rta dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang ma he dang /

ra lug 'dod pa rnams la glang po dang / rta dang shing rta dang ba lang dang / bong bu dang ma he dang / ra lug dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / ba dan 'dod pa rnams la rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang ba dan dang / bran pho dang bran mo 'dod pa rnams la

bran pho dang bran mo dang 'khor gyi byis pa 'dod pa rnams la 'khor gyi byis pa dang / bud med 'dod pa rnams la bud dang / bu mo gzhon nu 'dod pa rnams la bu mo gzhon nu dang / cod pan dang gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la cod pan dang gtsug gi rin

po che dang / thor pag dang bcas pa'i gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la thor pag dang bcas pa'i gtsug gi rin po che dang / skra mthon ting dri ma pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa rnams la skra mthon ting dri ma pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin pa byed

pa nas/ yo byad sna tshogs thams cad 'dod pa rnams la yang yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdod dang / de'u re mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ de skad du khyim bdag mkhas pas/

tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i mod la sems can grangs med pa zhig khyim bdag mkhas pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas/ phyogs tha dad pa dang / yul tha dad pa dang / gnas tha dad pa dang / grong khyer tha dad pa dang / grong rdal tha dad pa dang / tshong

'dus tha dad pa dang / ljongs tha dad pa dang / 'khor gyi grong tha dad pa dang / khyim tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi ris tha dad pa dang / sems can rnam pa mthun pa tha dad pa dang / lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / gnas kyi rnam pa dang / du bya

ba tha dad pa nas/ sems can skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ kha zas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba kha zas sna tshogs 'dod pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa bza' ba dang btung ba/ gtsang ma 'dod pa dang / sha 'dod pa dang / kha zas rnam pa tha dad pa

sna tshogs don du gnyer ba/ lam gyi rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par du skyes pa'i skye mched la gnas pa 'di lta ste/ mi'i nang nas 'bras chan dang / sran chan dang / khur ba dang / skyo ma dang / nya dang / sha la sogs pa kham gyis bza' ba'i kha zas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba

dang / mi'i nang nas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad na rnam par spyod pa dag las kyang / kha zas dang btung ba sna tshogs don du gnyer ba dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa thogs pa par gtong ba'i rnga'i sgra dang /

byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas kun kyang 'ongs bar gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang khyim bdag mkhas pa la slongs mo 'debs so/ /gdong du lta'o/ /sdod de/ gsol ba 'debs so/ de nas khyim bdag mkhas pas slong ba de dag kun nas 'dus

par shes nas/ yud tsam du bsams te nam mkha' la bltas pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nas/ kha zas dang btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ dri sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang po 'thon te/ lag mthil du 'ongs par gyur to/

des de dag yongs su blangs shing de ltar kun nas 'dus pa'i slongs mo ba mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ de dag ci 'dod pa'i zas dang / btung ba'i rnam pa dang / yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad kyis yongs su tshim par byas so/ /ci 'dod pa yongs su byin no/ /rab tu

dga' bar byas so/ shin tu tshim par byas so/ dga' ba shin tu skye bar byas so/ /nyams shin tu bde bar byas so/ /yid rab tu dga' bar byas so/ /de ltar de dag shin tu tshim par byas nas/ des kyang ma chog ste/ de'i 'og tu chos bstan pa 'di lta ste/ ye shes

kyi tshogs rgya chen po bstsags pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod de chos bstan to/ /phongs pa thams cad 'byung ba mi srid pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / skyid pa chen po yongs su 'grub par 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / chos kyi ye shes kyi tshul 'thob ba 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs

su brjod pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po bstsags pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / dga' ba bza' ba'i zas rab tu 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa'i lus 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /

thub pa pa'i stobs rnam par dag par 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / bla na pa'i kha zas yongs su shes pa 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs zad pa rab tu 'thob pa 'byung

ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa byas te chos ston to/ /des kha zas don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la nam mkha'i dbyings nas kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs blangs shing tshim par byas te/ de dag la tshe dang / mdog dang / stobs dang / bde ba dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa/

'thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /des btung ba don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la btung ba mang po zhim pa kha na ma tho ba med pa/ yid shin tu dga' bar byed pa dag gis tshim par byas nas/ de dag la 'khor bas skom zhing 'khor ba la dga'

ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir chos bstan to/ des ro'i mchog don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la ro'i mchog sna tshogs dang rab dang / skyur ba dang / lan tsha dang / tsha ba dang / kha ba

dang / /bska ba rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su tshim par byas te/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /des bzhon pa don du gnyer cing phyogs kyi rgyud sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa rnams la bzhon pa sna tshogs kyi sbyin

pas yongs su bsdud de/ de dag theg pa chen po la gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /des gos don du gnyer cing phyogs sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa kun nas 'dus par shes nas/ yud tsam du bsams te/ nam mkha'i dbyings la bltas pa dang / nam

mkha'i dbyings las gos sna tshogs dang / sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa kha dog sna tshogs can kha dog du mar rnam par dag pa dag 'thon cing lag pa'i mthil du 'ongs pas/ des de dag gis

slongs mo ba de dag la yongs su bsdud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa bla na pa dang / mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob par 'gyur ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /de bzhin du yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyis

ji ltar 'ongs pa'i slongs mo ba rnams la sdud pa byas nas/ ci rigs su chos bstan to/ /de ltar khyim bdag mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul bstan pa byas nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor la 'di skad

ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams kyi rnam par thar pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' yo byad la dbang thob pa rin po che'i lag pa thob par gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad lag pas yongs su

khebs par byas shing / sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rin po che kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa de bzhin du rgyan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / cod pan kha dog sna tshogs

kyi sprin dang / khang pa brtsegs pa kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / na bza' kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba dang / glu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / me tog kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / spos kha dog

sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang chos gos dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang / rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i sprin gyi char dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil

'khor thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi gnas su sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba'i phyir yo byad thams cad kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa

'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ rnam par 'phrul ba bstan pa nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer seng ge'i gzugs shes bya ba yod de/ de na chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji

ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas khyim bdag mkhas pa la

chos kyi rim gros slob ma'i tshul bstan te/ de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par 'gyur bar yongs su blta zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de la rang lus par blta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dben par

sems pa rgyun 'chad par bstan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' shin tu nyan pa'i sems dang ldan par bstan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du 'gyur ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag dang / tshig

mnyan par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'i dad pa'i dbang po la bsam pa byed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis btam ste btang bas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen cig bkur ba dang / /rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i sems kyis/ khyim bdag

mkhas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bsod

nams kyi chu bo de la ni yid ches par sems/ bsod nams kyi zhing de la ni yang dag par blta/ bsod nams kyi ri bo de ni yongs su sbyong / bsod nams kyi mu stegs de la ni yang dag par 'dzeg /bsod nams kyi mdzod de ni rnam par 'byed/ bsod nams

gyi gter de la ni shin tu lta/ bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor de ni yongs su sbyong / bsod nams kyi phung po de ni yang dag par len/ bsod nams kyi stobs de ni yongs su bskyed/ bsod nams kyi shugs de ni rnam par 'phel bar byed cing / mthar gyis grong

khyer seng ge'i gzugs gang na ba der phyin te/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ tshong 'dus kyi srang zhig na 'dug pa mthong nas/ des de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ g.yas phyogs su bskor ba

byas nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gis bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji

ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal na/ 'phags pa lam gang gis bdag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi ma na ngag legs par stsal tam/ de nas chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud kyis tshong

dpon gyi bu nor lag pa nas bzung ste/ rang gi khyim gang na ba der khrid de khyim de bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo'i khyim la ltos shig ces nas/ des bltas na khyim de dag cing 'od gsal ba 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser

las byas pa ste/ yangs shing mtho la dngul gyi ra bas bskor ba/ shel gyi rtsig pas shin tu legs par brtsigs te/ mdzes par byas ba/ bai DUr+ya'i phung po brgya phrag stong gis rab tu brgyan pa/ mus rag la pa'i ka ba bkye ba/ mu tig dmar po

las byas pa'i seng ge'i khri shin tu bshams pa/ nor bu rin po che rang bzhin snang ba'i seng ge'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/ nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i bla re bres pa/ gser gyi dra ba yid bzhin gyi nor bus brgyan pas kun nas yog pa/ nor bu rin po

che sna tshogs grangs pas rab tu brgyan pa/ a sma gar b+ha las brtsigs pa'i rdzing bu chu bsil bas gang ba dang ldan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gis bskor ba/ rgya che zhing yangs pa rim pa bcur brtsegs pa/ shin tu mtho ba/

sgo brgyad dang ldan par 'dug pa mthong nas/ des khyim de'i nang du phyin te/ kun tu bltas na rim khang tha ma'i nang na bza' ba dang btung ba'i rnam pa yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo / rim khang gnyis pa'i nang na gos kyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su

gtong ba mthong ngo / /rim khang gsum pa'i nang na rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan dang / lhab lhub yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo / rim khang bzhi pa'i nang na btsun mo'i 'khor dga' ba'i yo byad du bya ba bud med rin po ches chen po'i steng na gzung du bya

ba yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo / /rim khang lnga pa'i nang nas lnga pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chos yang dag par bgro ba'i dga' ba la mos pa/ 'jig rten la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa/ gtsug lag thams cad mngon

par bsgrub pa gzungs kyi tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin las rnam par ldang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin la rnam par dpyad pa dang / ye shes kyi snang ba mngon par sgrub pa 'dus shing 'khod par mthong ngo / /rim khang drug pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa'

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa shes rab shin tu zab pa/ rab tu zhi ba'i chos thams cad mngon par shes pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / snying po mang pos sgo kun nas byung pa/ bsgribs pa pa'i spyod yul can

gnyis pa la yang dag par spyod pa/ chos yang dag par bgro ba la rnam par 'phrul ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang zhing rnam par dbye ba dang / rab tu gsal bar byed pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mang po yang dag par bgro ba

byed pa rnams kun nas 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad du ye shes rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i

sgo g.yo ba'i klong zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rdul dang bral ba'i 'od ces bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad mos par byed cing

rjes su 'brang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo kun tu lta ba'i

btang snyoms thob pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i rjes su

song ba zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thogs pa pa'i spobs pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos kyi sprin la pas rim pas pa'i gnas shes bya ba dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo de dag la pa shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa grangs pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang bar yang dag par bgro ba byed cing / rgyan brjod du pa shin tu rnam par phye ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa mthong bar gyur to/ /rim khang bdun pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa

rab tu thob pa thabs dang ye shes rnam par gdon mi za ba la shin tu byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'dzin pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo / /rim khang brgyad pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' ma nyams par 'gro ba'i

mngon par shes pa rab tu thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus shin tu rnam par phye ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

zhabs kyi drung nas gud du mi 'phags pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku la yang dag par gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du sngon du brjod pa'i gtam gyi skyes bur gyur pa sha stag kun nas 'dus shing 'khod pa

mthong ngo / /rim khang dgu ba'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo / rim khang bcu pa'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thog ma byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa dang / spyod pa

dang / 'byung ba dang / smon lam rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i yul dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa dang bcas pa dang / sems can 'dul ba mdzad pa'i

byin gyis rlabs dang bcas par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa khyod la 'di lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa mnga' na/ phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam pa de ci lta bu zhig tu sbyang ba mdzad mdzad/

dge ba'i rtsa ba ni su zhig la yongs su bskrun bskrun/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bos dran te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i yang pha rol cig na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor lo sna tshogs zhes

bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings 'od gzer mtha' yas pas yongs su brgyan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo

sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ye shes rnam par snang ba la pa nyan thos bye ba phrag brgyad dang / ye shes nyi ma'i gzi brjid la pa/ byang chub

sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / thabs gcig tu rgyal po chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal pos spyan drangs nas/ bza' shang gi ra ba chen po rin po che rgyal mtshan rgyan gyis mdzes pa zhes bya bar gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de

grong khyer du gshegs nas/ tshong 'dus kyi srang nas tshur bzhud pa'i tshe/ kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra zhig kyang phyung / spos kyi ri lu

gcig cig kyang bsregs te/ bdug spos kyis bsangs so/ /spos kyi ri lu gcig po de/ de ltar bsregs pas zhag bdun du 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyang spos kyi na bun gyi sprin kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongs su khebs

par gyur to/ /spos kyi na bun gyi sprin de dag las kyang sgra 'di skad du brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ dus gsum du drim pa'i ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ sgrib pa thams cad mnga' ba'o/ nyon

mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad yongs su sbyangs pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba thams cad kyang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i don chen po tshad pa bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ro zhes/

de skad du kho bo'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba la shugs yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/ spos kyi na bun gyi sprin de las/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis sgra'i rnam pa de lta bu byung ngo / rigs kyi bu

de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis/ bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang kho bos gnas gsum du yongs su bsngos te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ltar phongs pa thams cad shin tu rgyun gcad pa dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan pa

dang 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong ba/ yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngos so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba smon lam gyi dkyil

'khor thogs pa pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che tshad pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku rgya mtsho dang / tha dad pa la zhugs pa/ tha dad pa'i

chos kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par 'dzin pa/ tha dad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dra ba rnam par rgyas par gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa'i yul la zhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad tha dad pas dge ba'i rtsa ba

rgyun gcig tu gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang tha dad cing rnam par rtog par spyod pa/ dus gsum tha dad pas mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa/ bskal pa thams cad tha dad par yongs su gnas pas skyo ba/ kun tu lta ba tha dad pa'i yul

gyi sa la gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul sba'i rtsa ba zhes ba ba yod de/ de'i grong khyer kun nas sgo zhes bya ba na/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba 'dug

gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag

'tshal te/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud kyi drung nas song ngo // //sangs rgyas rmad gcad

ces bya ba shin tu rgyas chen po'i mdo/ /bam po gnyis pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i

lam mtha' yas pa'i tshul gyis snang bar gyur ba/ chos kyi tshul mtha' yas pas mngon par brlan pas shin tu rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa mtha' yas pa'i lam gyis rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po

mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa mtha' yas pa'i stobs la gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas ba'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mtha' yas pa'i stobs

yongs su skyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis thub pa pa/ mtha' yas ba'i rgyal mtshan can/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa de

mthar gyis yul sba'i rtsa ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer kun nas sgo yongs su tshol zhing phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / yul phyogs nyen kor kun dang / sgang dang gshong dang / mnyam pa dang mnyam pa thams cad du yongs su skyo ba pa'i

bsam pa dang / 'jigs pa pa'i sems dang / ldog pa pa'i brtson 'grus dang / thub pa pa'i sems kyis/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag ma brjed pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi spyod pa ma nor bas sems rab tu

bsgos pa dang / sgo kun nas rnam par pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa dang / bag pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / dang rna ba g.yeng ba par kun tu tshol tshol nas yul spa'i rtsa ba'i dbus shig na/ grong khyer kun nas sgo tshong 'dus kyi rdal

stong phrag bcu'i gnas su gyur pa/ de shin tu bzang por grub pa/ rab brtan pas bskor ba/ shin tu mtho ba bzhi mdo brgyad kyis brgyan pa 'dug par mthong ste/ de'i nang na spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba yang spos 'tshong gi khyams shig na 'dug pa mthong

nas/ spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba gang na ba der phyin te/ spos 'tshong kun du lta ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gis bla na pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma mtshal to/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sems can thams cad kyi nad shes te/ rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / cha mnyam par 'khrugs pa dang / gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa dang /

mi ma yin pa las gyur pa dang / dug 'thungs pa dang / sngags dang / mtshon dang / ro langs pa'i sbyor ba sna tshogs dang / me las gyur pa dang / chus bskyod pa las gyur pa dang / sngangs pa dang 'jigs pa sna tshogs las gyur pa thams cad kyang shes so/ nad

de dag thams cad zhi bar bya ba yang shes te/ 'di ltar snum par bya ba yang rab tu shes so/ /skyug par bya ba dang / bkru ba dang / brta ba dang / gtar ba dang / sna'i cho ga dang / nya ra dang / dugs dang / lums dang / byug pa dang / dug gso ba dang / 'byung po'i gdon par

bya ba dang / bcud dang / khrus dang / bzhag pa dang / bskyed pa dang / kha dog sbyang ba dang / nyam bstod pa'ang rab tu shes te/ rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu nas sems can gang ji snyed cig kho bo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyi nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi

bar byed de/ nad sos nas kyang legs par bkru ba dang lus la byug pas byug pa byas nas/ ci tshul gyi rgyan gyis yan lag shin tu brgyan te/ ci rigs pa'i gos lus la bskon nas/ kha zas bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par

byas te/ nor dpag tu med pas kyang phun sum tshogs par byed do/ /de'i 'og tu yang de dag la mi gtsang ba bstan cing / /'dod chags spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ byams pa chen po yongs su bsngags shing zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /chos rnam par dbye ba'i

bye brag bstan cing gti mug spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ khyad par khong du chud pa'i tshul gyi sgo yang dag par bstan cing cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa dang / nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam thams cad yongs su brjod

cing byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshad gzung du pa yongs su bstan cing / snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bstsags pa yang dag par bsngags shing

yon tan tshad med pa 'thob pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba yongs su bstan cing theg pa chen po'i smon lam 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad

dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas par bya ba'i spyod pa'i dra ba shin tu rgyas par bshad cing byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa 'thob pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngags shing mtshan dang dpe

byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su dag pa thams cad du 'gro ba 'thob pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /

bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang / sku mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku

thub par dka' ba yongs su ston to/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zil gyis gnon la/ zil gyis gnon pa rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs

su brjod cing chos kyi sku yongs su dag pa yongs su ston to/ /thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i sku gtsang zhing rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing bskal

pa thams cad kyi dus su 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang 'grogs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par 'byung ba'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /ye shes kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing 'gro ba thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par mdzad pa'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /dge ba'i chos thams cad las rnam par ldog pa yongs su brjod cing blta na phul du bzang ba'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su

ston to/ /de ltar de dag chos kyi sbyin pas yongs su bsdus te/ nor dang rin po che mtha' yas pa'i tshogs kyis nye bar brtan pa byas shing so sor 'gyed do/ /yang rigs kyi bu kho bo ni spos dang / bdug spos dang / bsgo ba dang / bsku ba sbyor shes te/ 'di

ltar spos kyi rgyal po gzhal du med pa la pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po sin+du ba ra la pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po mi pham pa la pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po rnam par gsal byed la pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po nyi ma yod pa la

pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po dus dang 'thun pa la pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po sbrul gyi snying po'i tsan dan la pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po sprin gyi a ga ru la pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po dbang po mi 'khrug pa la pa/ spos sbyar ba thams cad

kyang rab tu shes so/ /yang rigs kyi bu kho bo ni sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs shes te/ rigs kyi bu/ sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par

byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs 'dis kho bo'i bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ de'i mthus kho bo sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i rgyan gyi sprin byin gyis rlob pa

byed de 'di ltar spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi rgyan nas rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i rgyan gyi sprin gyi bar du byin gyis rlob pa byed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo na ni ma de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe/

kho bos sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs 'di las spos kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin tshad gzung du pa bton cing / phyogs

bcu'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi dbyings thams cad du spos thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi rgyan byin gyis rlob pa byed do/ /chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams

cad yongs su sbyong ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi khang pa'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi ra ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi ba gam gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi rta babs kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi skar khung gi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi pu shu'i sprin gyi rgyan

dang / spos kyi zla gam gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi gdugs kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi lha'i ba dan gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi bla bre'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi gzugs kyi dra ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi

'od kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi snang ba dri ma pa'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan byin gyis rlob ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams

cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs kyi chos kyi sgo 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po lta bur gyur pa/ blta na don yod pa/ 'grogs na don yod pa/ rjes su dran na don yod pa/ brtul

zhugs rjes su byas na don yod pa/ thos na don yod pa/ mthong pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams ngan song gi rgyud las ldog par 'gyur ba/ mthong pa tsam gyis sems can thams

cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la skabs phye ba thob par gyur pa/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba mthong tsam gyis sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang / 'khor ba'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang

bral bar 'gyur ba mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyogs la rten par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams rga shi'i grog po dang g.yang sar mi ltung ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems

can rnams chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer ta la'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod

de/ de na rgyal po me zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor / tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun

tu blta ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu blta ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu blta ba'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor dge

ba'i bshes gnyen gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag rjes su dran par byed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi sgo de dag rjes su dran par bya ba dang / bdag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ngo / /zhes rang gi sems yongs su tshim par bya ba dang /

bdag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bsrungs pas/ nga ni bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par yang 'gyur ro/ /snyam du rnam par sems shing / sems dga' ba ni rab tu thob/ sems dang ba dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang /

sems rangs pa dang / sems mgu ba dang / sems mos pa dang / sems kyi shugs dang / sems rnam par zhi ba dang / sems rgya chen po dang / sems kyi rgyan dang / sems la thogs pa pa dang sems la sgrib pa pa dang / sems rnam par phye ba dang / sems

yang dag par gzhol ba dang / sems kyi dbang dang / sems dbang sgyur ba dang / sems kyi chos khong du chud pa dang / sems kyis zhing rgyas bar dgang ba dang / sems sangs rgyas mthong bas brgyan pa dang / sems stobs bcu'i yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'ang

thob nas/ de mthar kyis ljongs nas ljongs dang / grong nas grong dang / yul nas yul du tshol zhing grong khyer ta la'i rgyal mtshan gang na ba der phyin te/ rgyal po me gang na bzhugs zhes dris na/ de la 'gro ba gzhan dag gis 'di skad du bstan te/ rigs kyi bu 'de re rgyal

po me ni rgyal po'i don bsgrub pa'i phyir seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs shing / rgyal po'i phrin las mdzad do/ /khams rab tu skyong ngo / /chad pas gcad par 'os pa ni chad pas gcod do/ bya dgas sdud par 'os pa ni bya dgas sdud do/ g.yon yod pa rnams

la ni gyod rmed do/ /rtsod pa rnams kyi zhal ce ni yongs su gcod do/ /dma' ba rnams ni dbugs 'byin to/ /dregs pa rnams ni 'dul ba mdzad do/ /srog gcod pa las ni rnam par zlog go /ma byin par len pa dang ni rnam par 'byed pa mdzad do/ /gzhan

gyis yongs su bzung ba la mngon par zhen pa ni rnam par zhi bar mdzad do/ /du smra ba las ni phyir zlog pa mdzad do/ /phra ma'i tshig dang ni rnam par 'bral bar mdzad do/ /zhe gcod pa'i ngag ni rgyun gcod pa mdzad do/ /tshig kyal pa las ni yongs su glon no/ /chags sems

dang ni 'dre ba mdzad do/ /gnod sems dang ni rgyang sring ngo / /log par lta ba dang ni 'dre ba par mdzad do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor rgyal po me gang na ba der phyin na/ des mthong ba/ rgyal po me de ni rin po che'i seng ge'i khri chen po rdo rje mthu bo che'i nor bu sna tshogs

kyis smras pa/ rin po che 'od gsal ba rnam pa sna tshogs grangs pa las byas pa'i rkang pa bkye ba/ rin po che gcig ma yin pas legs par spras shing brgyan pas yid du 'ong ba'i lhun dang ldan pa/ gser gyi lcag pod kyi dra bas legs par blas shing chub par

btags pa/ nor bu rin po che du ma'i sgron mes shin tu snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po cha dbang gi rgyal po las byas pa'i pad mo'i snying po can/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan rim pa du mar bting ba/ gam yo nas lha rdzas kyi spos sna tshogs kyi bdug spos kyis shin tu bdugs

pa/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/ brgya phrag stong gis mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i ba dan brgya phrag stong rnam par bres pas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i me tog gi chun po sna tshogs kyi lda ldi rab tu bkye bas shin tu mdzes par byas pa/ steng nas lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i bla re sna

tshogs bres pa zhig la 'dug cing / de ni gzhon zhing dar la bab pa/ gzugs mdzes shing blta na yid du 'ong ba/ skra mthon ting g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa gtsug tor gyi spyi bo can/ 'phral ba yangs pa/ dkar

nag 'byes shing ring la/ rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma ltar 'dug pa/ sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzang la ran par mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ mchu mtshal ltar mdog bzang zhing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa/ so mnyam zhing thags bzang la shin tu dkar ba bzhi bcu tshang ba dang ldan pa/

'gram pa'i lha nga seng ge'i 'gram pa ltar 'dug pa khur ba shas rgyas pa/ smin tshugs gzhu ltar 'dug cing ring la shin tu mdzes pa/ mdzod spu zla ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i thig le can/ rna ba'i shal ring zhing lhod par 'phyang ba/ zla ba nya ba ltar bzhin mdangs

dang ldan zhing shin tu bzang ba/ mgul zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes pa/ snying ka dpal gyi be 'us brgyan pa/ ro stod seng ge'i ro stod ltar 'dug pa/ thal gong shin tu rgyas la/ dpung mgo'i lhun legs shing zlum pa/ lag pa ring ba dra bar 'brel ba'i sor mo

can/ rkang lag 'khor los brgyan pa/ rkang lag 'jam zhing gzhon la shas rgyas pa/ bdun shin tu mtho ba/ rked pa rdo rje ltar 'dug pa/ lus che zhing drang ba/ brla zlum pa/ pho mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa/ byin pa e ne ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug

pa/ sor mo ring ba/ rkang pa'i rting ba yangs pa/ 'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan pa mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa/ ba spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su gyen du 'khyil ba/ shing n+ya gro da'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa/ lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos shin tu
