brjod pas don byed do/ /sems can la la ni 'di lta ste/ tshur zil gyis gnon la phar zil gyis mi gnon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po yongs su brjod cing don byed do/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan

yang kho bo ni grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa 'di'i bzhi mdo'i phongs thams cad dang / srang thams cad dang / lam gyi sum mdo thams cad dang / grong mtshams thams cad dang / khyim thams cad dang / mthun par 'dus pa'i rdal thams cad dang grong thams cad dang / grong gi rgyud

thams cad du rnam pa ji ltar tshogs shing 'dus pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang khye'u dang bu mo rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / sbyor ba ji lta ba dang / mthu ji lta ba dang / rnam par spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag dang / mthun pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs mngon

par bsgrubs shing / chos ston kyang / sems can de dag gis de sus bstan pa dang / de ga las 'ongs pa mi shes te/ gzhan du na thos nas ma nor bar nan tan du byed pa ni med pa'ang ma yin no/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na/ zhags pa

'thub pa lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa/ dgu bcu rtsa drug 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyi nang du yang sems can lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la chags pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thams cad dang mthun par gnas te/ rigs kyi bu ci ltar kho bo grong khyer dga' ba

'dzin pa 'di na sems can gyi don byed cing 'dug pa de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling gi grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i phong brang 'khor thams cad na yang sems can gyi don byed do/ /'dzam bu'i gling na ji lta ba de bzhin du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams

thams cad dang / de bzhin du stong dang stong gnyis pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sems can gyi rten du bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi gnas su bya ba thams cad dang / sems

can gyi gzhir bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi khams su bya ba'i ming du gtogs pa thams cad dang / sems can yongs su rgyu ba thams cad dang / sems can yongs su 'du ba thams cad dang / sems can rgya mtsho na gnas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi rgyud

gnas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi phyogs su bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi phyogs mtshams su bya ba thams cad dang / sems can spyod pa'i gnas thams cad du 'ang / thabs sna tshogs dang / tshul sna tshogs dang / sgo sna tshogs dang / rigs pa

sna tshogs dang / 'phrad pa sna tshogs dang / thabs kyi tshul sna tshogs dang / bya ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed do/ /gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs yongs su bstan cing mos par bya ba dang / tshig gi lam sna tshogs brjod pas kyang sems can rnams kyi

don byed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su song ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad dang / mnyam pa'i lus dang ldan pa bdag dang / sems can gyi lus su tha mi dad pa'i ting nge 'dzin

thob pa/ 'phrul ba'i 'khor lo rgya chen pos srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du khyab pa/ 'jig rten gyi skye ba thams cad rang gi lus la rjes su spyod pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis lta na dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo la brtson pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rigs dang

rgyud dang tsher skye ba rab tu ston pa/ bskal pa thams cad du gnas pa la thogs pa med pa'i smon lam gyi 'khor lo dang ldan pa/ mig 'phrul lta bu'i spyod pa rnam par phye ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don byed kyang / gos pa med par gnas pa la brtson pa/ dus

gsum gyi 'gro ba'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa/ ye shes kyi dbyings bdag med pa dang ldan pas/ snang bar byas pa'i snying rje chen po mtha' yas pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskyed pa la mngon par brtson pa/ de dag gi spyod

pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul khams chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod uta pa la zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub

sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas

nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor lus dang srog la ni mi lta/ srid pa'i longs spyod dang yongs sa zin pa dang / nye bar blangs pa la mngon par chags pa'i gnas thams cad la ni mi lta

sems can gyi yul gyi dga' ba thams cad la ni mi lta/ gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang / bro dang / reg bya thams cad la ni mi lta/ g.yog 'khor dang longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa thams cad la ni mi lta ste/ rgyal srid dang dbang phyug gi dbang gi bde ba thams cad la ni mi lta la

sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med par yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrubs pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba dang yongs su dag par bya ba la lta ba/ mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba dang / rim gro bya bas mi ngoms pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad la lta ba dang / rang bzhin med pa yongs su shes pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad la blta ba yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad kyi don du nan tan bya ba las nyam pa med par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la blta ba dang / bskal

pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam chen po la lta ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du'ajug par bya ba la lta ba/ ting nge

'dzin gyi sgo re rer byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa thams cad gzung ba la rnam par 'phrul par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la lta ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par

bzung bas mi ngoms par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi ye shes snang ba'i 'khor lo thams cad la lta ba/ de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di dag dang / gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen las 'byung ba ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni de dag

thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ma yin par yang dag par lta zhing mthar gyis yul khams chen po gang na ba der phyin nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las mthong nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod

ud pa la gang na ba der phyin te/ drung du song nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon

longs spyod ud pa la'i mdun du 'dug te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ye shes 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar yang dga'/

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yongs su grub par bgyi bar yang dga'/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub

sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar bgyid par yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su brten par yang dga'/ sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par gtor bar yang dga'/ zhing gi

dkyil 'khor thams cad du rnam par rgyu bar yang 'tshal nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na byang chub

sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur bar ma 'tshal to/ /smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni spos thams cad shes te/ spos sbyar

ba thams cad dang / bdug spos thams cad dang / bdug spos sbyar ba thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / byug pa sbyar ba thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / phye ma sbyar ba thams cad dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma'i rnam pa thams cad kyang shes

te/ lha'i spos kyang shes so/ /klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i spos kyang shes so/ /nad gso ba'i spos dang / yid mi bde ba bstsal ba'i spos dang / 'jig

rten gyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / nyon mongs pa 'bar bar bya ba'i spos dang / nyon mongs pa zhi bar ba ba'i spos dang / 'dus byas kyi dga' ba dang / bde ba sna tshogs yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / 'dus byas thams cad las skyo ba yongs su bskyed pa'i spos

dang / bag bya ba'i gnas thams cad sel ba'i spos dang / sangs rgyas yid la bya ba'i rgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i spos dang / chos kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba'i spos dang / 'phags pas spyad pa'i spos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spos rnam pa tha dad pa

dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rnam par dgod pa'i spos kyang shes te/ /kho bos sposade dag thams cad rnam pa ji lta bu'ang rab tu shes so/ /'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / 'grub pa dang / yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su spang ba

dang / rab tu sbyar ba dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / yul dang mthu dang las dang rgyu yang rab tu shes so/ /rigs kyi bu mi'i 'jig rten na spos glang po'i snying po zhes bya ba/ klu yongs su 'khrug par byed pa yod de/ de'i ri lu til gyi 'bru tsam gyis kyang yul khams chen

po thams cad spos kyi sprin gyi dra ba shin tu stug pas kun nas khebs par gyur te/ zhag bdun du spos chu'i rgyun shin tu phra ba'i char mngon par 'bab bo/ /de'i tshe sems can su'i lus sam gos la spos chu'i rgyun de dag gis bab par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang me

tog gser gyi kha dog du 'dug pas rnam par brgyan pa'i gos dang lus su 'gyur ro/ /khang pa dang gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa gang du bab par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang me tog gser gyi kha dog lta bur rnam par brgyan par gnas so/ /sems

can khyim gyi nang na gnas pa gang gis spos kyi sprin gyi dra ba de la rlung gis ma dad pa'i dri tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang zhag bdun du dga' ba dang / mos pa chen pos yongs su rgyas par 'gyur te/ lus dang sems la bde ba dang dga' ba sna tshogs kyang rab tu myong bar 'gyur ro/ /

de dag gi las la yang khams 'khrug pa la sa gyur pa'am/ gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba las gyur pa'i nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med do/ /sems kyi sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba yang mi 'byung ngo / /'jigs pa'am/ sdang ba'am bag tsha ba'am/ yid 'khrug pa

'am/ gnod sems kyang mi rgyu ste/ de dag thams cad zhag bdun du dga' ba dang bde ba skyes te/ gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems su 'gyur ro/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de dag de ltar dga' ba dang / nyams bde ba skyes pa rnams la bsam pa dag par bya ba'i phyir ci

nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu ri ma la ya las 'byung ba'i tsan dan sa steng sa dam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de lus la bskus na me'i 'obs su mchongs kyang tshig pa med do/

rigs kyi bu rgya mtsho'i mtha' nas 'byung ba'i spos gzhan gyis thub pa med pa zhes ba yod de/ de rnga'am dung la bskus na de'i sgras gzhan gyi 'khor thams cad pham par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu mtsho ma dros pa'i ngogs nas 'byung ba'i a ga ru nag po pad mo'i

snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i ri lu til gyi 'bru tsam gcig gi dris kyang 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad rgyas par gang bar 'gyur te/ sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang sdig pa la smod cing sdom pa'i sems rab tu thob bar 'gyur ro/ /

rigs kyi bu ri'i rgyal po kha ba can las 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i dri tshor na sems can de dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su 'gyur te/ kho bo ni de dag la ci nas kyang rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu srin po'i 'jig rten nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba yod do/ /de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i longs spyod kyi don du 'byung ste/ des bdugs ma thag tu 'khor los sgyur

ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa yang nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu lha'i 'khor chos bzang po nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam par rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des bdugs ma thag tu lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi dri zhim po dran par 'gyur ro/ /

rigs kyi bu lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i gnas na spos kyi rnam pa dag pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yod de/ des bdug ma thag tu mtshe ma'i lha'i bu thams cad lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i drung du 'dong ngo / /de dag der phyin nas kyang lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe mas chos kyi gtam bya'o/ /

rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi gnas na/ spos kyi rnam pa sin du bar zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i spos kyi dud pa byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa chos kyi stan la 'dug pa'i mdun du phyung na/ spos kyi sprin chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par gang zhing /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sprin chen po'i char rab tu 'bab bo/ /rigs kyi bu lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas na/ spos kyi rnam pa yid 'phrog pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des lha'i

rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas su bdugs na/ zhag bdun du chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni spos sbyar ba de shes su zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' skyon gyi dri ma med pa 'dod pa'i 'jig

rten thams cad nas gyen du 'phags pa/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyi zhags pa dang bral ba/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pa dang / gzugs kyis rnam par spyod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis gos pa med

pa/ chags pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ sgrib pa med par ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / yul du ldan pa/ kun gyi gzhi'i gnas thams cad la mi gnas par/ srid pa'i kun gzhi dang gnas thams cad du rgyu ba rnams

kyi spyod pa che shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ tshul khrims kyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo yongs su smos pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i spyod pa brjod pa'am/ gnod par spyod pa med pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyud bstan par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs

kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na mnyan pa dpa' bo zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i drung du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong

dpon gyi bu nor / spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod uta pa la la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/

spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod uta pa la'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor grong khyer khang pa brtsegs par 'gro ba'i lam du 'jug pa'i tshe/ lam gyi gyen thur dang / lam mnyam pa dang / lam gyi thag thug dang / lam rdul yod pa

dang / lam rdul med pa dang / lam bde ba dang / lam mi bde ba dang / lam dog pa dang / lam bgegs med pa dang / lam 'khyug pa dang / lam 'khyug pa med pa la rnam par dpyad de bltas nas 'di snyam du bsams so/ /'di ltar bdag dge ba'i bshes gnyen de'i

drung du 'gro ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /sems can la phan gdags pa'i lam gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad byams sdang dang / mthon dman du gyur

ba'i g.yang sa las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad mi mnyam pa'i nan tan las bsgyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs kyi sdong dum

dang / tsher ma dang / gyo mo dang gseg ma bstsal ba dang / chos kyi dbyings bsgribs pa med pa la gzhol par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du thogs pa med par bskyal ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni dge ba'i chos

thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rag lus so zhes de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pas spyod pa thub par dka' ba de mthar gyis grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa der phyin nas mnyan pa dpa' bo yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol

ba las grong khyer chen po zhig gi sgo rgya mtsho chen po'i ngogs na/ mnyan pa dpa' bo de tshong pa brgya phrag stong tsam dang / srog chags brgya stong du ma gtam sna tshogs mnyan par 'dod pa sha stag gis kun nas bskor cing / rgya mtsho'i gtam yongs su brjod pas/

sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho sems can rnams la ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang mnyan pa dpa' bo gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas

phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems

dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub

sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ ye shes chen po 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu 'dri ba dang / 'khor ba'i

sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi rgyud 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gling gi gnas su 'gro ba 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / dbyer med pa'i theg pa chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bas 'jigs pa dang 'bral bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi

nan tan 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / rgyud sna tshogs khong du chud par bya ba'i ye shes kyi lam 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad du 'gro bas rnam par spyod pa'i smon lam gyi shing rta'i 'khor lo thogs pa med pa'i

lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gzi brjid kyi dba' rlabs kyis rnam par brgyan pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / tshul gyi lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / chos kyi phyogs dang /

sgo thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mtha'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'di 'dri ba legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni rgya

mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan yongs su sbyong zhing gnas te/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can phongs pa rnams mthong nas/ de dag gi don du dka' ba spyod de/

de dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi zang zing gis yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/ /chos kyi longs spyod kyis de dag yongs su tshim par bya'o/ /de dag la bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi lam man ngag du bstan par bya'o/ /ye shes kyi tshogs

rnam par spel bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs yongs su spel bar bya'o/ /byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya'o/ /snying rje chen po'i stobs nye bar brtan par bya'o/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam

par zhi bar bya'o/ /'khor ba'i spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba'i stobs shin tu brtan par bya'o/ /sems can rgya mtsho bsdu ba la 'di dag sbyar bar bya'o/ /yon tan rgya mtsho'i nan tan gyi sgo la dgod par bya'o/ /'di dag la chos rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrub par bya'o/ /

sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad kyang 'di dag gis mngon par mthong bar bya'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho la yang 'di dag gzud par bya'o zhes de lta bu'i bsam pa dang / yid la bya ba la brtson par kho bos rgya mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na

gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de ltar 'gro ba la phan pa dang / bde bar brtson pas rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che'i gling thams cad kyang shes so/ /rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang / /rin po che'i rigs thams cad dang / rin po che'i gtos thams cad kyang rab tu

shes so/ /klu'i gnas thams cad dang / klu'i 'khrug pa thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang / gnod sbyin 'khrug pa thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad dang / srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po'i gnas

thams cad dang / 'byung po'i bar chad thams cad rnam par zhi bar bya ba yang rab tu shes te/ glong yod pa thams cad glong thams cad bkol ba dang dba' rlabs chen po yongs su spang ba dang / chu'i kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'ang rab tu shes so/ /gnyi zla dang gza'

skar gyi tshogs yongs su 'khor ba dang / nyin zhag dang skad cig dang / yud tsam dang thag cig kyang rab tu shes so/ /phan tshun du 'gro ba'i shol 'dums dang / bde mi bde dang / gru'i 'khrul 'khor brtan par bya ba dang / gru bzur ba dang / gru phul ba dang /

rlung brngo ba dang rlung bskyed pa dang / gru bsgyur zhing bzlog pa dang / gru brtod pa dang / gru btang ba yang rab tu shes so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pas rtag tu sems can gyi don dang dgos pa byed de/ tshong pa'i tshogs gru brtan pos lam bde zhing nye zhor mi 'gyur la mi

'jigs pa nas/ chos kyi gtam gyis dga' ba dang / spro ba bskyed cing bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rin po che'i gling du phyin par byas nas/ de dag rin po che thams cad kyis tshogs te/ phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang / phyir yang 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gyed 'gyed kyang

rigs kyi bu kho bo'i gru ni nam yang bub pa'am/ nye zhor gyur ma myong ste/ sems can gang gis kho bo mthong bar gyur pa dang / sems can gang gis kho bo'i chos bstan pa thos pa de dag kyang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du nye zhor 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar

'gyur ro/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /sred pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i don du'ang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te/ dus gsum rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba'ang rab tu thob bo/ /sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal

rgya mtsho zad par bya ba'i phyir yang mngon par mos par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho'i rnyog pa dang bar bya ba'i phyir yang rab tu brtson par 'gyur ro/ /zhing rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yang brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs

rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par gang ba las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho tha dad pa'ang khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho'i rjes su'ang 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba'i bsam pa rgya mtsho

ji lta ba bzhin du yang gzugs brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba mthong ba dang / thos pa dang 'grogs pa dang / rjes su dran pa'i chu klung gi dbyangs shes bya ba thob par zad na kho bos byang chub sems

dpa' 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par spyod pa nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/ lta ba'i rnam pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyi chags pa'i chu srin gyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba/ chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang /

gzhi las rnam par rgyu ba/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs su sdud pa'i rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho dang 'grogs pa/ sems can gyi mngon par chags pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bsrub pa/ dus rgya mtsho thams

cad dang / tha mi dad par rnam par spyod pa/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i dmigs pa shes pa/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i dbres las mi 'da' bar de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu

lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas

tshong dpon gyi bu nor mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas nas gdong mchi mas bkang ste/ ngu zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen

blta bas ma ngoms bzhin du mnyan pa dpa' bo'i drung nas song ngo // //sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po bzhi ba/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor byams pa chen pos sems can gyi khams tshad

med par rgyas ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ snying rje chen po'i rlan gyis mngon par brlan pa'i rgyud can/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po'i rgyan shin tu bstsags pa nyon mongs pa'i rdul dang mun pa dang dri ma dang 'dam thams cad dang bral ba/ chos mnyam pa nyid khong du chud

pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyen thur med pa la zhugs pa/ dge ba'i chos tshad med pa la 'jug pa'i sgor zhugs pa/ mi dge ba thams cad kyis mi shigs pa'i brtson 'grus brtan pa'i mthu sngon du 'dor ba dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis

mi khyab pa rab tu byang ba/ rgya chen po'i bde ba rab tu thob pa/ shes rab kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer snang bas/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ma lus pa bsal ba/ thabs kyi ser bu bde zhing bsil bas blags pa'i ye shes kyi me tog gis rgyas pa/ smon lam chen po'i rgya mtshor 'byung ba'i ye

shes kyi tshul dang mthun pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa med par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang du thogs pa med par 'gro ba la mngon du gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la mngon par mos pa de/ grong

khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba gang na ba der phyin te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba'i shar phyogs logs kyi 'dab cig na/ shing a sho ka'i nags tshal rgyal mtshan sna tshogs zhes bya ba 'dug pa de'i

nang na khyim bdag stong phrag du ma zhig gis bskor te/ grong khyer gyi bya ba sna tshogs yongs su 'gro zhing de las brten te/ bdag tu bya ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang / dngos por 'dzin pa thams cad rab

tu spang ba dang / mngon par zhen pa thams cad shin tu gzhig pa dang / sred pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gcad par bya ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi sgo glegs gcag pa dang / the tsom dang yid gnyis dang / nem nur gyi rab rib thams cad rnam par bsal ba dang /

g.yo sgyu'i rnyog pa shin tu gdang ba dang / phrag dog dang ser sna'i dri ma yongs su sbyang ba dang / sems kyi mtsho shin tu gsal bar bya ba dang / sems rnyog pa med pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / dad pa rnyog pa med pa'i stobs bskyed de/ sangs rgyas blta

bar mos pa bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bsngags shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par blang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa smos te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs yongs su bskyed pa dang / byang chub

sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs yang dag par ston cing / byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa'i mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi gtam byed cing 'di lta ste/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la mngon par mos par bya ba'i phyir chos ston cing 'dug

pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor gtam de'i rjes chad chad du bsdad nas tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ ring mo zhig tu btud nas chos la shin tu gus pa'i bsam pas tshig 'di skad du brjod do/ /'phags pa bdag ni

nor nor shes bgyi ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol na ci nas kyang bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob par 'gyur ba dang / bslabs nas kyang ci nas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / gdul ba'i don la mngon du mos par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi zhal blta ba las mi 'phang ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thos par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul la nan tan du bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams

cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su btsal bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par mnod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs rnams la snang ba thob par 'gyur ba de ltar 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ /de nas tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor la

'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'di lta ste/ dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i mthus/

byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba yongs su sbyong ste/ de ltar kho bo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba 'di la gnas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sum cu rtsa gsum gyi

lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mtshe ma'i lha'i gnas thams cad dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad

dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i ris su gtogs pa thams cad dang / lha'i gnas thams cad dang / klu'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / klu'i gnas thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang / srin

po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad dang / grul bum gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / grul bum gyi gnas thams cad dang / kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / kyi gnas thams cad dang / dri za'i 'jig rten

thams cad dang / dri za'i gnas thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jig rten thams cad dang / nam mkha' lding gi gnas thams cad dang / mi'am ci'i 'jig rten thams

cad dang / mi'am ci'i gnas thams cad dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad dang / mi'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mi'i gnas thams cad dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang /

khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can gyi rgyud thams cad du chos ni ston to/ /chos ma yin pa ni bzlog go /rtsod pa ni zhi bar byed do/ /'thab pa ni rnam par bzlog go /'khrug pa ni nye bar zhi bar byed do/ /

g.yul du lhags pa ni rnam par bzlog go /shags 'gyed pa ni zhi bar byed do/ /mdud par 'dzin pa ni rab tu sel to/ bcings pa thams cad ni yongs su gcod do/ /btson ra thams cad ni mngon par 'dral lo/ /'jigs pa ni rnam par bzlog go /mi dge ba'i las kyi 'du

byed ni rgyun gcod do/ /srog gcod pa las ni sems can rnams rnam par zlog go /ma byin par len pa dang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / du smra ba dang phra ma dang zhe gcod pa dang / tshig kyal pa dang chags sems dang / gnod sems dang log par lta ba las ni sems

can rnam par zlog go /mi bya ba thams cad ni byed du mi 'dzud do/ /dge ba'i chos bya ba thams cad ni byed du 'dzud do/ /sems can thams cad ni bzo thams cad la slob tu 'dzud de/ 'jig rten rnams rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par

bya ba dang / zhags pa 'thub pa thams cad la gong ma'i ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa brjod pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad brjod cing bstan pa'i phyir 'jig rten la phan par

'gyur ba'i gtsug lag thams cad kyang ston to/ /rnam par 'god do/ /rab tu gsal bar byed do/ /brjod do/ /de bzhin du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du gzugs kyi khams kyi lha thams cad zil gyis mnan te chos ston to/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig

rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcur yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag tu chos ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i

chos dang nyan thos kyi chos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ston to/ sems can dmyal ba yang ston to/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i lam dang / sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can gyi mi bde ba'ang ston to/ /byol song gi skye gnas kyang ston to/ /byol song gi skye gnas kyi

lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam du 'gro ba'i lam dang / byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa'i sdug bsngal yang ston to/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten yang ston to/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi

sdug bsngal yang ston to/ /mtho ris kyi 'jig rten yang ston to/ /mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang / mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi dga' ba spyod pa dang / longs spyod kyang ston to/ /mi'i 'jig rten yang ston to/ /'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du 'gro ba'i lam dang

mi'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang / sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba sna tshogs kyang ston te/ de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'jig rten gyi chos kyang ston to/ /'jig rten kun 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten nub par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi kha na ma tho ba dang / 'jig rten nas

'byung pa yang ston to/ /de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'khor ba'i skyon rnam par bzlog pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan yang dag par brjod pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du mgo 'khor ba dang sdug bsngal

du gyur pa yang dag par ston pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i chos nyid brjod pa dang / 'jig rten rgyu'i bya ba yongs su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba dang / ldog pa'i bde ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad smos pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas kyi ming du

bya ba rnam par bsgom pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gnas pa med pa mngon par bstan pa dang / las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba shin tu brjod pa'i phyir chos

ston to/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na kho bos byang chub sems dpa' thams

cad mngon par shes pa zhing gi dbyings thams cad du sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes kyi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa kun tu lta ba'i ye shes kyis rab tu thob pa tshig gi lam dang / sgra thams cad rnam par pa la shin tu gzhol ba'i rna ba dang ldan pa/ dus gsum rgyas par 'gengs

pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba la dbang rab tu thob pa/ chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes la dbang gis dbang sgyur ba'i skyes bu dpa' bo sems can tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par par bya ba lam 'dres pa'i

dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i lce yangs shing srab la yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa'i sems can rgya mtsho'i yid du 'ong ba'i kha dog dang / dbyibs su ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus sgyu ma lta bu dang ldan pa/ de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mi gnyis pa'i spyod lam gyis/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus la gzhol ba/ dus gsum thams cad du rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa nam mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad med pa'i spyod yul dpag tu med pa'i yul dang ldan pa

de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul shu ma phyi ma'i mtha' na/ grong khyer ka ling ga'i nags tshal zhes bya ba yod te/ de na dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings ba zhes bya ba 'dug

gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag

'tshal te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor mthar gyi yul shu ma phyi ma'i mtha'i grong khyer ka ling ga'i nags tshal gang

na ba der song ste phyin nas/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa yongs su tshol zhing sems can kun la rmed pa'i tshe/ gang nas gang du song ba de dang der rogs pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bu mo brgya phrag du ma zhig srang dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / lam gyi sum mdo dag na tshogs te/

rjes su 'brang ngo / /skyes pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bud med brgya phrag du ma zhig gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'di re dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa ni/ grong khyer ka ling ga'i nags tshal 'di nyid kyi bza' shing gi ra ba chen po rgyal ba'i 'od kyis byin pa nyi ma'i mdog na sems

can tshad med pa'i don du chos ston cing 'dug go zhes bstan to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der phyin nas kun tu btsal te/ bltas na bza' shing gi ra ba de na/ shing zla ba shar ba zhes bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug

pa/ 'od sna tshogs kyi kha dog can 'od kyi mdog dang ldan pa/ 'khor kun tu dpag tshad kyi khyon tsam du 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa mang po dang / lo ma'i shing yongs su 'gengs pa zhes bya ba gdugs kyi rnam pa dang dbyibs su 'dug pa'i 'dab mas kun nas

khebs pa/ baiDUr+ya sngon po'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i sprin gyi mdog dang ldan pa mang po dang me tog gi shing me tog gi mdzod ces bya ba/ ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar mdangs dga' ba'i dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa kha dog sna tshogs kyi me tog mi zad pa'i char rab tu 'bebs pa/ sum

cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i pho brang gi rgyan gyi kun nas 'du ba dang / sus kyang mi shigs pa lta bu mang po dang / shing tog gi shing rtag tu smin pa'i ro dpe med pa'i 'bras bu'i tshogs shes bya ba gser gyi ri bo'i lhun ltar 'dug pa/ rtag tu shing tog phun sum tshogs

par gnas pa mang po dang / rin po che'i rgyal po'i shing rnam par snang ba'i mdzod ces bya ba rin po che'i rgyal po dpe med pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i phreng ba dang / se mo do dang / rgyan rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mdzod nas byung ba

ltar phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i kha dog grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa mang po dang / gos kyi shing dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che'i kha dog sna tshogs kyi tshogs rab tu 'gyed cing 'phyang bas shin tu brgyan pa mang po dang / rol

mo'i shing dga' bskyed pa zhes bya ba lha rdzas las kyang lhag pa'i rol mo yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin pa mang po dang / spos kyi shing kun tu zhim pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba phyogs thams cad du thogs pa med par rnam pa thams cad du yid du 'ong ba'i spos kyi ngad 'byung ba mang

po dag kyang yod par mthong / mtshe'u dang lu ma dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing bu rin po che bdun gyi pha gus mtha' brtsigs pa/ phyogs bzhi nas rin po che'i them skas btsugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khri 'phang dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi dri zhim pos bskus pas

kun nas bskor ba/ gzhi rin po che'i rgyal po baiDUr+ya sngon po las legs par blangs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu lha rdzas kyi dri yid du 'ong ba can gyis yongs su gang ba/ rin po che'i pad mo dang / ut+pa la dang /

ku mu ta dang / me tog pun da ri ka kha dog sna tshogs lha rdzas kyi bsung dang ldan pas/ chu kun nas yog pa/ bya bran sna tshogs kyi khyu lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i gzugs yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ sgra snyan pa 'byin cing brjod pas gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi

rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi phreng ba legs par bkye bas yongs su bskor cing brgyan pa dang ldan pa shing sna tshogs de dag gi drung thams cad du'ang rin po che'i seng ge'i khri sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab

pa du mas brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi stan rin po che sna tshogs 'bel bar bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos dang / bdug spos kyi rnam pa thams cad kyis bdugs pa/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i dar rin pa che mngon par spyangs ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re bkye ba/ rin po che sna tshogs

dang 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dra ba sna tshogs kun nas bres pa/ rin po che'i dril gyi dra ba yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ mang pos brgyan pa/ 'khor du lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan brgya phrag du ma bting zhing bshams pa mthong ngo / /rin po che'i shing drung la lar ni seng

ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo'i snying po can bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che'i spos kyi rgyal po'i pad mo'i snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po klu'i rgyan gyi pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong

ngo / /la lar ni seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge'i bya la'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i

rgyal po phyogs rnam par snang ba'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po dbang po'i rdo rje'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i pad+mos

snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /rin po che'i shing drung la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po mdog dkar po'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /bza' shing gi ra ba de'i gzhi thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang zhing rgya mtsho chen po ltar

rin po che'i gling gis yongs su gang ba mthong ngo / /baiDUr+ya sngon po'i dam pas spras te/ rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sa phyogs ka tsa lin da ltar reg na bde zhing 'jam pa/ gom pa bor zhing bteg pa'i tshe mtho dman med pa/ rdo rje rin po che mchog gi

pad+mo'i dri yid du 'ong bar zhim zhing reg na bde ba'i sil ma kun tu bkram pa/ nga ngur dang / rma bya dang / khrung khrung dang / ku na la dang / ka la ping ka dang / ko ki la dang / dzi ban dzi ba ka sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro 'byin pa mang pos gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po

che'i tsan dan gyi shing mang po'i nags tshal shin tu legs par 'grigs pas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad+mo'i sprin gyi char dang / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs mi zad pa'i char rgyun tu 'bab pa/ 'dres pa'i nags tshal las kyang khyad par du 'phags pa/ rin po che sna

tshogs kyi khang bu brtsegs ma brgyan par bkod pa'i nang nas/ spos kyi rgyal po'i bdug spos rin thang med pa rtag tu 'thul zhing zhim pa lha'i mdun sa chos bzang po'i rgyan las kyang lhag par brgyan pa/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis

kun nas bres pa/ mu tig rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba dang / lda ldi kun nas bres pas rab tu brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dril bu rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par bkye ba'i gser gyi dra ba 'bar bas/ kun nas dkrigs pa/ rol mo'i shing dang / rin po che'i ta la

las dril bu'i dra ba rlung gis legs par bskyod pas yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ dbang bsgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po'i lha mo dpe tshul shin tu bzang ba rnams kyis glu snyan pa'i sgra rab tu yid du 'ong ba len ma/ lha rdzas kyi yid bzhin gyi

gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas rnam par mdzes pa/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar kha dog dang / mdog sna tshogs su ldan pas blta na gtang bra ba/ khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa brgya stong grangs pas rab tu brgyan pa/

sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i pho brang ltar blta na bzang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam par phye bas rnam pa thams cad du brgyan pa'i gdugs shin tu legs pa/ rnam par bsgreng zhing bkram pas kun nas blta na mdzes pa/ dbang po chen po'i 'jig rten ltar

shin tu mdzes pa'i de'u sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i 'od snang ba chen po rtag par 'byung ba/ tshangs pa chen po'i gzhal khang ltar nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyis 'bar ba ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po nyi ma'i mdog ces bya ba

de/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu stobs dang / byin gyi rlabs che zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs shing tshad med de/ rgya chen po dang ldan pa mthong

ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor de ltar yon tan tshad / bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshogs pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba'i rgyan byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su grub pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po

las skyes pa/ sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim gror byas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa bsam gyis khyab pa las byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma lus pas 'phrogs pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bus grub pa/ dge ba'i

bsod nams dri ma pa rgya chen pos grub cing byung ba/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa bzang po legs par byas pa dang / rgyu 'thun pa'i stobs dang / shugs kyis byung ba nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ma yin

pa/ mu stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa/ bdud kyi lam yongs su rgyu ba thams cad kyis tshugs pa/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis bltar med pa mthong ste/ shing sna tshogs de dag gi drung gi seng ge'i khri chen po de dag la

'ang dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa/ lus shin tu mdzes pa/ spyod lam zhi ba/ yid zhi ba/ shin tu dben pa/ dbang po thul ba/ glang po ltar shin tu dul ba/ mtsho ltar dang zhing gsal la rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po

yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar 'dod pa thams cad sgrub pa/ pad mo la chus mi chags pa ltar 'jig rten gyi chos kyis ma gos pa/ seng ge ltar 'jigs pa dang / skyi g.ya' ba pa/ mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas/ ri'i dbang po chen po ltar sgul

ba/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pas yid du 'ong ba'i spos kyi rgyal po ltar 'gro ba'i sems tshim par byed pa/ kha ba'i tsan dan ltar nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sman gyi rgyal po blta na bzang ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar byed pa/

chu'i lha'i zhags pa ltar blta na don yod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ltar lus dang sems kyi bag yangs bde ba bskyed pa/ tshangs pa chen po ltar 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po nor bu chu

'dang ltar nyon mongs pas rnyog pa can du gyur pa'i sems can gyi sems rab tu dang bar byed pa/ zhing gshin pa ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'dug par mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan de dag la'ang 'khor sna tshogs 'khod par mthong ste/ 'khor

gyi stan la la la ni lha'i bu dbang po chen po la pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas kyi rigs su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo rnam par thar pa zad pa yang dag par 'byed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par

bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la ni tshangs pa yid du 'ong ba la pa/ tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ gzhi kun

nas 'byed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la ni lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dag 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos

kyi sgo byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang gis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' la pa 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing /

dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo thams cad dge bas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan la pa/ dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor

dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo rang gi sems kyi mdzod kyi glong zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma la pa lha'i bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams

'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo rgyan mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po brgya byin la pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu lha'i

bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnam 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo skyo ba'i sgo zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni klu'i rgyal po gang chen mtsho la pa klu'i rgyal po 'od brgya pa dang / dga' bo

dang bsnyen dga' bo dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / shugs ldan dang / ma dros pa la pa klu'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa klu'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi rdzu

'phrul dang / yul gyi 'od kyi brgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni rgyal po chen po ngal bso po la pa gnod sbyin gyi dbang po gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang / gnod sbyin gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing /

dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni dri za'i rgyal po gnas srung po la pa dri za mang po dri za'i bu mo dang / dri za'i byis pa'i

'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo dga' ba mi zad pa char rab tu 'beb pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la pa lha ma yin rnams

lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang / lha ma yin gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo chos kyi dbyings shes pa'i tshul gyi shugs kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la

la la ni nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs 'dzin chen po la pa nam mkha' lding gi dbang po nam mkha' lding gi bu mo dang / nam mkha' lding gi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo

srid pa'i rgya mtshos 'jigs pa'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la pa/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po mi'am ci'i bu mo dang / mi'am ci'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod

cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po khro gnyer gdong la pa/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo dang / lto 'phye

chen po'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas la dga' ba skye ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni skyes pa dang / bud dang / khye'u dang bu mo

brgya stong mang po 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni srin po'i dbang po rtag tu mdangs 'phrog pa sdong po'i rgyal po la pa srin po'i dbang po srin po'i

bu mo dang srin po'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo snying rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge

slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa'i mthu zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni sems can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam

par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya chen po'i 'od ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni sems can theg pa chen po la mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge

'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba'i sgo kun tu sgo zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems bskyed pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi phung po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rdul dang bral ba'i

dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa gsum pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu zhi ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yang

dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bzhi pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad mkhyen pa'i shugs kyi

yul 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa lnga pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sems kyi rgyud me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba yang

dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la

ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bdun pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sa kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa la gnas pa rnams

'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo chos kyi dbyings su lus shin tu rnam par phye ba'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa dgu pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge

slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings bas/ chos kyi sgo mi dmigs pa'i stobs kyi gnas kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par

bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sgrib pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos

kyi sgo ye shes rdo rje mthu bo che'i rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /de ltar skye ba'i skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi sems can du gdags pa dang / sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud ji snyed pa de dag gi sems can yongs su smin pa rnam par 'dul ba/ snod du gyur

ba ji snyed cig bza' shing gi ra ba der 'ongs shing / 'khor gyi stan la so sor 'khod pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa mos pa mi mtshungs pa/ bsam pa shin tu gzhol bar gyur ba/ dad pa'i ro rngams chen po dang ldan pa rnams la/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ci nas kyang

thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba/ de lta de ltar chos bstan pa mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa des kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa la pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams

cad shin tu bstan pa la pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha dad pa la pa dang / sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba la pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems yang dag par 'byung ba la pa dang / khyad par

yod pa'i rgyan la pa dang / chags pa med pa'i tshul gyi snying po la pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la pa dang / sems kyi mdzod la pa dang / kun tu mos pa mngon par sgrub pa'i snying po la pa shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa'i sgo brgya stong grangs med pa non pa'i phyir te/ bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sems can gzhan ji snyed cig dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa la lta ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong ba de dag thams

cad kyang sngon/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ dge ba'i chos yang dag par blang ba la shin tu bkod pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i bar du byas pa sha stag go /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor

kyis/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / nags tshal phun sum tshogs pa dang / gtsug lag khang phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'chag sa phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs su spyod phun sum tshogs pa

dang / mal cha phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbang chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbyangs kyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa de lta bu mthong ste/ chos kyi tshul

bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang thos nas/ chos kyi sprin gyi char chen pos sems mngon par brlan pa de'i yid la dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ bsam pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par byas kyis da ni g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgya stong

du ma zhig tu bya'o snyam pa dang / de'i mod la dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ bza' shing gi ra ba dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bcas pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /de ltar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bya'o/ /snyam du

bsams nas bskor ba byed pa'i tshe/ 'khor thams cad na'ang dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'dug pa mthong nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/ /zhes bdag

gis thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems

thams cad yongs su bcom pa zhes ba ba thob pa'o/ /smras pa/ 'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de ni ye shes snang ba ste/ dus gsum du byung ba'i

rgyan sems skad cig gi cha shas la rnam par dmigs pa'i rang bzhin no/ /smras pa/ 'phags ma ye shes snang ba de'i yul yang ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ye shes snang ba 'di la sgrub pa dang yongs su sgrub pa'i tshe chos thams cad

rab tu 'thad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs

pa/ thams cad re re la yang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod pa rnam pa tha dad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro ste/ 'di ltar lha'i lus dang klu dang

gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i dbang po'i lus me tog gi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / spos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / bdug spos kyi sprin yongs su

'dzin pa dang / phreng ba'i sprin yongs sa 'dzin pa dang / byug pa'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / phye ma'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / na bza'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gdugs kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin yongs

su 'dzin pa dang / ba dan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i lhab lhub kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gnam yol gyi rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i rgyan

rnam par phye ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i sgron ma'i rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gdan gyi rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa mang pos mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro'o/ /dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i byang chub

sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ ji ltar 'gro ba de bzhin du yum gyi skur gshegs pa dang / bltam pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang /

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas shing snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin du lha'i gnas na bzhugs pa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /

dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas na bzhugs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa yongs su tshim par mdzad nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar de

dag thams cad la'ang yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus rnam pa de lta bu dag gis rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro'o/ sems can gang gis kho mos sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / rim gro byed pa'i las 'di shes

par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad la'ang kho mo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa 'di nyid

ston te/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ye shes kyi mig gis sems can thams cad la lta yang / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed la/ rlom sems kyang mi byed de/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho yang nyan te/ tshig gi lam thams cad la mngon par

zhen pa med pas/ rlom sems su byed pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mthong ste/ chos kyi lus yongs su shes pas rlom sems su byed pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin kyang / chos kyi rang bzhin

khong du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa med do/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs kyang / chos nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa do/ /rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par

thar ba rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pa/ chos thams cad la rlom sems med par gnas kyang skyil mo krung gcig gis chos kyi dbyings

thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus su 'dus par ston kyang / skad cig gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong ba/ lus la sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul thams cad la 'byung zhing rgyu ba/ sangs rgyas

kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa ba spu'i nyag ma gcig gis sbams shing mngon par 'phen pa/ rang gi ba spu'i bu gar 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'du ba dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa/ skad cig

gcig la bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par gnas pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'dzud pa/ skad cig gcig gis brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par 'khor ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod

par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul bgrod dka' ba na/ grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang

chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par

bsgyings pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor shes rab kyi snang ba chen po des sems snang bar gyur pa de thams cad

mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang ba de la ni sems/ chos nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi stobs snang ba de la ni yang dag par rjes su lta/ sems can thams cad kyi skad rnam par pa'i mdzod kyi gzungs kyi tshul de ni brtan par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul de ni shin tu rgya che bar byed/ snying rje chen po 'gro ba thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa'i stobs de ni nye bar ston/ chos thams cad kyi tshul snang ba'i sgo nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi

shugs de la ni rab tu rtog /chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs pa'i smon lam yongs su dag pa de'i rjes su ni 'brang / chos thams cad kyi phyogs snang bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi 'od de ni shin tu gsal bar byed/ chos thams cad

kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i stobs de ni mngon par sgrub/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang / dran pa thams cad nye bar blangs pas brtsams pa mthar dbyung ba'i smon lam de ni yongs su

rdzogs par byed cing / mthar gyis yul bgrod dka' ba'i grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma yongs su tshol tshol ba dang / de la bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan mngon par mi shes la ye shes kyi

spyod yul gyi tshul la mi mkhas pa'i mi ji snyed pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ mi 'di de ltar zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang po dang ldan la de ltar shes bzhin dang ldan te/ de ltar 'khrul pa med cing de ltar yid 'khrug pa med la de ltar gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ste/ de ltar gnod

pas mi tshugs shing de ltar mtshan mar mi 'dzin la/ gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad la g.yeng ba med pa'i mig dang ldan te/ yid la brel ba med cing / bsam pa zab la mngon par mdzes te/ rgya mtsho ltar 'dug cing sems mi nyams mi 'khrug pa de la bcom

pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen mas ko ci zhig bya/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod chags la dga' ba med de/ sems phyin ci log dang ldan yang mi srid do/ /'di lta bu dag ni sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes yongs su rgyu ba med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pas 'khol kyang mi

srid do/ /'di lta bu dag ni bud med kyi dbang du 'gyur ba med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi spyod yul la spyod kyang mi srid do/ /'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi spyod yul la chags pa med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba yang mi srid do/ /'di lta bu

dag ni bdud kyi zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ba med de/ mi dgos pa byed kyang mi srid do snyam mo/ /gang yang bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i yon tan gyi khyad par mngon par shes shing / ye shes kyi spyod yul mngon du gyur pa de dag ni 'di skad ces

'dzer te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma la yongs su dri bar sems pa ni khyod kyang thob par bya ba legs par thob pa ste/ legs so legs so/ /khyod ni nges par sangs rgyas su smon pa'o/ /khyod ni bdag nges par sems

can thams cad kyi gnas su bsgyur bar 'dod pa'o/ /khyod ni nges par sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags kyi zug rngu dbyung bar 'dod pa'o/ /khyod ni nges par sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam par gtor bar 'dod pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'de re bcom pa

ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma ni grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i byang phyogs logs shig na rang gi khyim na 'dug go /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor tshig de thos nas dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba

skyes nas/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i khyim gang na ba der phyin nas/ de'i khyim che zhing yangs la rin po che'i ra ba rim pa bcus bskor ba/ rin po che ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba/ 'obs spos chus gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i

pad mo dang / uta pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / me tog pun da ri kas chu yongs su khebs pa yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/ gzhi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ spos yid du 'ong ba dang / 'dres pa'i chudri zhim pas gang ba/ rin po che

sil ma mang pos shin tu brgyan pa/ rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pas rnam par dgrigs shing ba gam dang rta babs dang / skar khung gi shar bu dang / zla gam

seng ge'i shing tags dang / snang ba'i rgyal mtshan la pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyis 'bar ba rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dag baiDUR+Yas sbas pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi spos

zhim po thams cad kyis 'khor thams cad nas bdugs shing bsangs pa/ a ka ru nag po mchog gi bdug spos kyis dri zhim par bdug pa/ spos kyi byug pas 'khor kun nas byugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi lan kan gyis rtsig ngos kun tu bres pa/

steng 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dra ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu spras pas kun nas bkab pa/ gser gyi dril gyi dra ba brgya stong rlung gis bskyod cing 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa 'byung ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi sprin sil ma

kun tu bkram pas/ rin po che'i me tog gi rgyan dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas sgo shin tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dra ba snang ba/ mu med par brjod du yod pa/ rin po che byu ru'i sdong po dang / rdo rje dang / man shel

la pa'i gter brgya stong kun gyis shes pa/ phun sum tshogs pas mdzod mi zad pa dang ldan pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po bcus brgyan pa mthong ste/ de nas bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma gzugs mdzes shing bzang la blta na sdug pa/ gya nom pa'i kha

dog dam pa rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i mdog can skra mthon ting du 'dug pa/ lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag tshul dang 'dra bar rnam par grub pa/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang mi thams cad las 'phags pa'i kha dog dang

gzugs dang dbyibs mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ tshangs pa las kyang 'das pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad kyi tshul la mkhas pa/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs can rnam par thar pa yi ge'i 'khor lo'i

rgyan la mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ bzo dang gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par byung ba/ chos kyi ye shes sgyu ma la mkhas par bslabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang tshul rnam pa thams cad du thob pa/ rin po che'i lhab lhub sna tshogs

kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i lus yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i dra ba 'od shin tu gsal bas lus rab tu brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang / lhab lhub grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pas/ lus shin tu

'bar ba/ nor bu rin po che dam pa yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan thogs pa/ rin po che bai DUr+ya'i phreng ba mdo zungs rdo rje rin po che sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che seng ge mdzes pa sna tshogs bkye ba mgul na thogs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba spyad pa

la skal ba 'thun pa dang / smon lam gcig pa'i 'khor mang po gzhan gyis mi phyed cing yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa 'dug pa mthong ste/ des khyim de dag

thams cad dang / rin po che'i gnas dang / gzhal med khang gi rgyan de dag thams cad kyang rang gi lus las byung ba'i 'od dga' bar byed pa/ lus bde ba dang sim pa skyed pa/ sems khong nas dga' bar byed pas gsal zhing snang bar byas pa mthong ngo / /

de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag

gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags mas bdag la bstan du gsol/ /des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar

pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba thob ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni lha rnams la lha mo'i gzugs dang kha dog dang / dbyibs dang chu zheng las kyang lhag par kha dog gsal ba dang / rnam par dag pas ci la mos pa bzhin du snang

bar byed do/ /de bzhin du klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams la yang bud med kyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang dbyibs dang / chu zheng lhag par

'od gsal zhing rnam par dag pas ci la mos pa bzhin du snang bar byed do/ /sems can gang 'dod chags kyis kun nas 'khor ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag /kho mo'i drung du 'ong na'ang de dag thams cad la kho mo ni 'dod chags dang 'bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir chos

ston te/ de dag gis chos de thos nas kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa med pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/ /la la ni kho mo mthong ma thag tu 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur te/

byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dga' ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/ /la la ni gtam byas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa med pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba

yang rab tu 'thob bo/ /la la ni lag nas bzung ba tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rjes su 'gro zhing gnas pa zhes bya ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo/ /la la ni

gcig tu 'grogs pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bral bas snang ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/ /la la ni bltas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/

byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par brgyan ces bya ba yang rab tu thob bo/ /la la ni glel ba tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phas kyi rgol ba rnam par 'thor

pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/ /la la ni btsums pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul snang ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/ /la la ni pang du 'khyud

pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sdur cing gtong ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/ /la la ni 'o byas pa tsam gyis 'dod

chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad bsod nams kyi mdzod la reg par byed pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/ /de ltar kho mo ni sems can gang ji snyed cig kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams

cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa chags pa med pa la mngon du gyur pa 'di nyid la rab tu 'god do/ /smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod de lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa de khyod

kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba ni gang du bskyed/ phrin las ni ji lta bu zhig bstsags/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mos dran na 'das pa'i dus shig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/

bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa zhes ba ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu

mtho bar gshegs pa de sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i sku don tu rgyal po'i gnas sgo bzang po zhes bya bar gshegs nas sgo'i them pa la zhabs kyis gnon pa'i tshe/ grong khyer de thams cad kyang / rab tu g.yos nas yangs shing rgya che la rin

po che du ma las byas par yongs su grub par gyur te/ steng gi bar snang yang rin po che mang po'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra rab tu 'byung ba dang / lha'i lus kyi

sprin tshad med pa rgya che bas khebs par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo yang de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi chung ma zhig tu gyur te/ blo gros bzang mo zhes bya'o/ /de nas kho mo cho 'phrul gyis yang dag par bskul nas khyim thab dang lhan cig tu dong dong ste/ de bzhin

gshegs pa grong bar gyi srang du gshegs pa la dad pa rgya chen po skyes te/ kho mos ni rin po che'i dril bu gcig cig phul lo/ /de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa'i zham 'bring

na 'dug te/ des kho mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i

thabs dang ye shes mtha' yas pa la gnas pa/ bsod nams rgya che zhing yangs pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi yul la thub pa med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud

'di nyid na grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes ba ba yod de/ de na khyim bdag nan khugs shes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten tsan dan gyi khri 'phang can la mchod pa byed pa zhig 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub

sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom pa ma lha'i

bshes gnyen ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin par

khyim bdag nan khugs kyi khyim ga la ba der phyin nas/ khyim bdag nan khugs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan

pa mdzad do/ /zhes bdag gis thos nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub

sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba yongs su mi zad pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bo'i sems kyi rgyud las ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas kyang / sems can 'dul ba'i dbang du mdzad pa ma gtogs par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas

kyang shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med do/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med do/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i

mchod rten tsan dan gyi khri 'phang gi sgo 'byed pa ste/ kho bo mchod rten gyi sgo 'byed 'byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba thob bo/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid la sems kyi skad cig skad cig tu mnyam

par gzhog ste/ sems kyi skad cig thams cad la'ang khyad par gyi rnam pa du ma rab tu 'thob bo/ /smras pa/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe/ 'jig

rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud po bsod skyabs la pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gser thub dang / log par dad sel dang / thams cad mnga' ba dang / gtsug tor can dang / rnam par gzigs dang / rgyal dang /

rdzogs mdzad dang / grags mchog dang / pad mo'i bla la pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba'i mtshams 'brel pas/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul gyis mngon sum du mthong ste/
