sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas brgya yang mthong ngo / /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ngo / /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong yang mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sangs rgyas bye ba dang / sangs rgyas bye ba

phrag brgya dang / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang / sangs rgyas bye ba dung phyur dang / sangs rgyas bye ba thams cad dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang / de'i 'og ma'i sems

kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang mthong ngo / /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo / /de'i 'og ma'i sems

kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go

thugs dang po bskyed pas 'thob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la'ang 'jug go /smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa mngon par bsgrubs pa rnam par dag pa la 'ang 'jug go /spyod pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go /pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par

mdzad pa la'ang 'jug go /byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su bsgrubs pa la 'ang 'jug go /bzod pa brnyes pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go /bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par 'thor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung

ba la'ang 'jug go /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan la'ang 'jug go /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par mdzad pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go /sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug

go /'khor kun nas 'dus pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go /'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba la'ang 'jug go /sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa

dang / cho 'phrul la'ang 'jug go /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa yang shin tu rnam par gsal ba dang / ma 'dres par dran te/ yang dag par 'dzin to/ /dran pas yongs su bcangs so/ /rig pas rab tu shes par byed

do/ /blo gros kyis shin tu rnam par 'byed do/ /blos rtogs par byed do/ /shes rab kyis snang bar byed do/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i byams pa la pa dag kyang mthong zhing shes te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig

la sangs rgyas brgya yang mthong ngo / /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ba nas/ de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang

mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa yang shin tu gsal ba dang / ma 'dres par rjes su dran

te yang dag par 'dzin to/ /dran pas yongs su bcangs so/ /rig pas rab tu shes par byed do/ /blo gros kyis rnam par 'byed do/ /blos rtogs par byed do/ /shes rab kyis snang bar byed do/ /ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di sngon gyi

mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mthong zhing shes pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snyed kyi

de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyang shes shing mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go /sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud

pa de la'ang rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / mi zad pa dang / dad pas shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus dang / zho non pas khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa

dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / de'i yul la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa shes shing khong du chud par byed do/ /rnam par snang mdzad la

pa da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyang mthong zhing shes te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas brgya yang mthong zhing shes so/ /de'i

'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ba nas/ de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar du yang mthong ste/ nam de bzhin gshegs pa

gang gi zhal blta bar dga' ba de'i tshe 'ang de bzhin du mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bstan pa dang / bstan pa mdzad pa dang / bstan par 'gyur ba de dag kyang thos so/ /thos nas kyang 'dzin to/ /dran

pas yongs su bcangs so/ /rig pas rab tu shes par byed do/ /blo gros kyis rnam par 'byed do/ /blos rtogs par byed do/ /shes rab kyis snang bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i mthar phyin pa 'di

shes bar zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum skad cig gcig tu shes pa rab tu thob pa/ skad cig gcig gi cha shas la ting nge 'dzin rnam par phye ba la spyad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma las byung ba rtog pa dang / rnam par

rtog pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs pa/ bdag dang sems can dang / sangs rgyas mi gnyis par spyod pa/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i chos kyi rgyan gyi dkyil

'khor dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi 'khrul 'khor kyis 'jig rten gyi dra ba 'gengs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad dang / mi 'gal bar rnam par spyod pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rnam par rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi yul

dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos bstan pa rnam par rig par byed pa'i ye shes kyi yul can de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na ri gru 'dzin ces bya

ba yod de/ de na byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dris shig ces

nas de'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis smras so/ /song shig nor dpal gyi chu rgyal dpung zhig na/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis ri rgyal gru 'dzin mdzes pa yod/ /rin chen rgyus byas shing dang nags tshal me tog mang / /bza' shing ra ba rdzing dang chu bran

'bab par ldan/ /ri mchog de la brtan par spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i don du rnam par spyod/ /de'i gan song dang nor khyod la mgon po yis/ /yon tan rgya chen tshul la 'jug pa ston par byed/ /de nas

tshong dpon gyi bu nor khyim bdag nan khugs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ khyim bdag nan khugs la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas nas khyim bdag nan khugs kyi

drung nas song ngo // //sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// bam po lnga pa/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor khyim bdag nan khugs kyi gdams ngag rjes su sems shing / byang chub

sems dpa'i mos pa'i mdzod de ni shes par byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su dran pa'i stobs de ni rjes su dran par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i stobs ni yang dag par 'dzin/ sangs rgyas gcig nas

gcig tu brgyud pa'i mtshams ni khong du chud par byed/ rnas thos pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag gi rjes su ni 'brang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa'i tshul de dang ni 'thun par byed/ sangs rgyas kyis yang dag par bsgrub pa'i rgyan de ni khong du chud

par byed/ sangs rgyas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de la ni yid ches par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa de ni mngon du byed cing / mthar gyis ri gru 'dzin gang na ba der

song nas/ ri gru 'dzin gyi steng du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/ nub phyogs logs kyi ri'i sman ljongs mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang 'bab chus mdzes par gyur pa/ baiDUr+ya

sngon po'i dkyil 'khor ltar sngo zhing 'jam la gzhon pa'i spang / nags tshal chen po'i mthongs na 'dug pa zhig na/ rin po che'i rdo rje'i rdo stegasashig la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug cing / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rdo stegs la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems

dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med pas/ kun nas bskor cing chos ston te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i yul byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i sgo gsal bar ston pa zhes ba ba yang dag par ston cing 'dug pa mthong

ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas dga' bas rgyas zhing mi 'dzum pa'i mig gis thal mo sbyar nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la dad pa'i shugs dang ldan pas sems mi 'khrug pa/ dge

ba'i bshes gnyen mthong na/ sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'dzin pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'i chos kyi sprin thams cad yang dag par gzung ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang nan tan thams cad dge ba'i bshes

gnyen la rag lus pa'i 'du shes can/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa shin tu dka' bar sems pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen las stobs bcu'i ye shes rin pa che 'byung zhing thob par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes

gnyen las snang ba mi zad pa 'byung ba'i 'du shes can/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rten gyi bsod nams kyi rgyud rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo yang dag par ston pa'i

'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen po la 'jug pa'i yongs su ston par 'du shes pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par 'dus pa/ yongs su bskyed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa de/

byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang na ba der phyin to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos tshong dpon gyi bu nor ring zhig nas tshur 'ong ba mthong nas/ smras pa/ tshur shog dpe med pa'i theg pa chen po

yangs shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa/ skye ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses shing skyabs med par gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa/

'jig rten thams cad las 'das te dpe med tshad med pa la mngon par mos pa/ snying rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pas/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs sa bskyab pa'i blo gros can/ blta na kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la mngon du bltas pa/ smon lam chen po'i

dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung bar mos pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsags pas ngoms mi shes pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la yang dag par

zhugs pa/ 'jam dpal gyi ye shes rgya mtsho las byung ba'i yon tan gyi 'byung gnas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs thob par bya ba la mngon du bltas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba dang shugs rab tu thob pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yang

dag par gzung ba la mngon par mos pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba dang / mos pa'i shugs kyis yid rab tu bde bar gyur pa/ legs par spyod pa tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i shugs kyis mngon par brlan

pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ yon tan la nan tan du bya ba'i shugs kyis rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi mdzod bdag la mngon du gyur pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam gyi shugs gzhan la yongs

su bstan pa'i bsam pa can/ snying rje chen po'i shugs ma nyams pa'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i shugs yang dag par gzung ba'i blo gros can khyod 'ongs pa legs so legs so/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor byang chub

sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gdan pa der song nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la lan brgya stong du mar

g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub

sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang

chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos mdog 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa

'od kyi dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med pa 'phro ba'i rgyan gyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po las byung ba'i 'od gzer sna tshogs dri ma med pa/ lus dang sems kyi bde ba tshad med pa rab tu skyed

pa'i tshogs kyis shin tu rgyas pa'i lag pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor spyi bo la bzhag ste/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu nga

ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba shes te/ rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad la dbye ba med par sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la

zhugs pa sgo kun nas thos shing rnam par rig par 'gyur bas/ sems can yongs su bsdu ba dang / gdul ba la nye bar gnas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa la gnas pas/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sems can thams cad kyi dgos pa la'ang sta gon du gnas te/ sbyin pas kyang sems can yongs su sdud do/ /ngag snyan pa dang don bya ba dang / don 'thun pas kyang sems can yongs

su bsdud do/ /gzugs kyi lus rnam par bstan pas kyang / sems can yongs su smyin par byed do/ /kha dog dang dbyibs dang gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan te/ rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang / 'od gzer kyi dra ba dgye bas kyang

sems can rab tu tshim par byed cing yongs su smyin par byed do/ /bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbyangs brjod pa dang / ci la dga' ba'i spyod lam yongs su bstan pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang / tshul 'thun par chos bstan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul

dang rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / dge ba'i chos bstsags par bag byed pa'i sems can gyi sems yongs su bskul ba dang / bsam pa dang 'thun par sprul pa sna tshogs tshad med pa yongs su bstan pa dang / rigs sna tshogs su skyes pa'i

sems can rnams dang skal ba 'thun pa'i gzug yongs su bstan pa dang / gnas gcig tu 'grogs pas kyang sems can yongs su bsdus shing yongs su smyin par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje

chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di yongs su sbyangs pas/ 'gro ba thams cad rab tu rten pa'i smon lam bskyed de/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi rgyud kyi 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can

thams cad kyi mgo rmongs pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bcings pa'i 'jigs pa yongs su gcad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi srog la bab par mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams

cad kyi yo byad kyis phongs pa'i 'jig pa bsal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi grags pa med pa'i 'jig rten pa las yongs su bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i

'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor du bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las rnam par bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi 'jigs pa rnam par

bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lam mun pas nyam nga ba phyir mi ldog pa'i snang bas gsal bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad skal ba mi mnyam pa dang 'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa shin tu bsal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug pa

dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa dgag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi sdug pa dang / 'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad lus la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad sems la mi bde

ba'i 'jigs pa las dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrugs pa las yongs su bzla ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad rab tu rten pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa 'di byas so/ /sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa rnam

par zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang 'jig rten du rjes su dran pa'i sgo byin gyis brlabs so/ /sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi 'khor lo yang 'jig rten du rnam par dmigs par byas so/ /dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro bas rnam par

par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi rnam pa'i bye brag mtha' yas pa dang mnyam par nga'i lus kyang byin gyis brlabs so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni thabs 'dis sems can thams cad 'jigs pa las yongs su bkrol cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams

cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing phyir mi ldog par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di thob par zad na/ des byang chub sems

dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa khong du chud par rtogs pa/ dge ba'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba rgyun mi gcod pa'i rgyud dang ldan

pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyud la rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa/ bskal pa thams cad du gnas shing spyod pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ dus gsum thams cad kyi tshul rjes su rtogs pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/

'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi klong yongs su 'khyil ba'i rgyud la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i sems rnam par zhi bar byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems yongs su 'phel ba'i rgyud dang ldan pa/

sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i rgyud las phyir mi ldog par byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas te gus par bkur bstod nas/ /

nor shin tu dul ba lho phyogs rgyud du song / /spyan ras gzigs dbang drang srong snying rje rnam spyod pa/ /rin chen ri'i sul na gnas par des kyang mthong / /rin chen sna tshogs rdo rje'i ri yi sman ljongs na/ /pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la brtan par 'dug

lha dang lha min klu dang srin po mi'am ci/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis bskor cing de la chos kyang ston/ /mthong nas nor dga' ba tshad med skyes par gyur/ /bsnyen te yon tan rgya mtsho'i rkang la phyag 'tshal nas/ /ci nas bzang po'i spyod pa bdag gis thob

'gyur bar/ /'phags pas thugs rje bskyed de gdams shing bslab par gsol/ /bsod nams brgya pas brgyan pa'i dri med lag brkyang ste/ /'od sprin dra ba rgya chen bzang po rab bton nas/ /nor spyi bor bzhag ste sems can rnam

dag pa/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mkhas pas tshig 'di smras/ /sangs rgyas sras bo nga ni rnam thar gcig sgo shes/ /ye shes snying po rgyal ba kun gyi thugs rje sdug /'gro ba thams cad bskyab cing yongs su bsdu phyir byung / /kun

tu bdag nyid rang la byams pa bzhin du rgyu/ /'gro ba mang po thams cad sdug bsngal kun las skyob/ /gang rnams dam du bcings shing dgra lag phyin pa dang / /lus la gzer cing de bzhin btson rar btsud pa yang / /nga yi ming thos bcings

shing bzung ba thar bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po dag la nyes pa'i g.yon byas gsad spangs pa/ /de tshe de dag nga yi ming yang dran gyur na/ /mda' 'phangs de yi lus la phog par mi 'gyur te/ /mtshon rnon btab kyang de dag mi 'dzug sgal bar 'gyur/ /

dbang po'i 'khor du phyin kyang gang rnams rtsod gyur pa/ /dgra rnams kun las rgyal 'gyur grags pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /grags dang grogs dang rigs dang nor rnams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /nga yi ming dran de dag thub pa med par 'gyur/ /gang gis nga yi ming ni rjes su dran

byas pa/ /de dag rkun pos 'jigs dogs dgras 'jigs nags phyin te/ /seng ge dom gzig gcan zan g.yag rgod sbrul gang yang / /dgra rnams kun las rgyal zhing 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /gang rnams la las nga yi ming zhig dran byas na/ /sdang ba'i

sems kyis rin chen ltongasasu bor gyur tam/ /sol mdag lci me rab tu 'bar bar bor gyur kyang / /me rnams pad mos gang ba'i chu yi gter du 'gyur/ /nga yi ming ni skad 'ga' yud tsam rjes dran na/ /rgya mtsho'i chur bor de yi nang du 'chi mi 'gyur/ /chu bos mi

'khyer me yi dbus su tshig mi 'gyur/ /don med kun tu mi 'gyur don rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /shing sgrog dbyig chings lcags sgrog de bzhin ltung rnams dang / /brnyas shing khyad bsad de bzhin brid cing bslus pa dang / /spyos shing bsdigs te gshe dang sma phab rnam pa

las/ /nga yi ming tsam dran par byas na thar pa thob/ /gang rnams shar gnyer sna tshogs glags lta ji snyed dang / /gang rnams rtag tu zhe sdang mi snyan brjod pa'i rnams/ /nga yi ming thos dran byas snyan par brjod par 'gyur/ /mthong ba tsam gis mod la byams pa'i sems kyang

skye/ /nga yi ming tsam la la gang gis dran byas nas/ /gnod pa'i don du ro langs sngags dang byad byed pa'i/ /dgra rnams rtag tu de yi zil gyis non par 'gyur/ /ma lus dug gis de yi lus la mi tshugs so/ /la la gang gis nga yi ming tsam dran byas na/ /

klu dbang srin tshogs mkha' lding sha za thams cad dang / /grul bum srul po 'tshe byed gtum po'i sems dang ldan/ /mdangs 'phrog 'jigs byed rmi lam 'ong ba'ang zhi bar 'gyur/ /nga yi ming ni skad cig yud tsam dran byas kyang / /pha dang ma dang gnyen bshes

mdza' ba kun dang yang / /'bral bar mi 'gyur sdang dang 'grogs par de bzhin min/ /nor zad mi 'gyur phongs pa'i dngos su mi 'gyur ro/ /nga yi ming gi rjes su la la dran byed na/ /'di nas shi 'phos mnar med sems dmyal mi 'gro ste/ /byol song skye

gnas mi khom gnas su min/ /sems can dag la lha dang mi yi gnas su skye/ /nga yi ming ni la la gang gis dran byas na/ /dmus long zhar ba 'on pa zha bor mi 'gyur te/ /'theng po long bar mi 'gyur gsal smra blta sdug 'gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por dbang por

kun ldan 'gyur/ /la la gang gis nga yi ni rjes dran na/ /sems can dag pa 'di nas shi 'phos phyogs bcu yi/ /'jig rten khams su sangs rgyas mngon sum skye bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mthong 'gyur de dag chos kyang thos par 'gyur/ /'di dang de bzhin

gzhan dag thabs mang ji snyed kyis/ /'gro bar sems can nga 'dul gzhal dang zad mi nus/ /sangs rgyas sras po ngas ni rnam thar gcig bsgoms te/ /yon tan can gyi yon tan thams cad ngas mi shes/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba

zhes bya ba shar phyogs nas nam mkha'i dbyings las 'ongs te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor yug gi rtse mor 'dug go /byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro bas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor yug gi rtse mo la rkang pa gnyis

bor ma thag du/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ rin po che du ma'i rang bzhin du kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du 'gro ba des/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od thams cad zil gyis non pa dang / lha dang

klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / me dang rin po che dang / glog dang / skar ma'i 'od kyang zil gyis non pa de lta bu'i 'od lus las

bkye ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag kyang snang bar byas/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thibs po thams cad kyang snang bar byas te/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyang de ma thag tu zhi'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi nyon

mongs pa yang nyams su mi gnod par gyur to/ /mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyang rtse zil bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad du 'ang rin po che'i sprin gyi char phab ste/ me tog dang spos dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza'

dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo / /de'i lus de'i gzugs brnyan ni sems can thams cad gnas su snang ba ste bsam

pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par byed pa la mngon par gzhol bas/ ri gru 'dzin de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung du yang phyin par snang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos tshong dpon gyi bu nor

la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir phyin pa mthong ngam/ smras pa 'phags pa mthong ngo / /smras pa rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i gan du

song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag

'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi

bu nor byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i ye shes kyi gting ma rnyed pa'i sems kyis spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po blta bas kyang ma ngoms bzhin du bsgo ba dang / mi 'gal bar byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba gang na

ba der song ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub

sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub

sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ /des smras pa rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba sgo kun tu 'gro ba thob pa'o/ /smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyis de bzhin

gshegs pa gang gi zhabs kyi drung nas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'di brnyes/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'di nas ji srid cig na mchis/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas bzhud nas ni ji srid cig lags/ smras pa rigs kyi bu gnas

'di ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus kyang shes par dka' ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus mi ldog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mi

'phrogs pa'i yul te/ de ni rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa/ sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bstsags pa/ bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po ma thob pa/ shes rab kyi mig dang mi

ldan pa rnams kyis thos ba 'am/ yongs su gzung ba'am/ yid ches pa'am/ khong du chud par bya bar mi nus so/ /smras pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gzungs kyis dad pa dang / mos par bgyi na 'phags pas bdag la bka' mi stsal tam/

des smras pa rigs kyi bu nga ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'ongs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i zhabs kyi drung

nas ngas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba 'di thob bo/ /rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po dang ldan pa de nas nga song nas ni bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig

'das te/ sems bskyed pa re re zhing yang gom pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bor ro/ /gom pa re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin

gshegs pa dang ldan par shes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la 'ang de bzhi gshegs pa'i mchod pa bla na med pa yid kyis rang bzhin chos nyid mngon par 'du ba ba med pa'i rgyas btab pa de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i

dga' ba yongs su bskyed pas mchod pa byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ste/ de dag thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho yang khong du chud do/ /de dag thams cad kyi dbang po'i 'khor lo yang

yongs su shes shing bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongs su bstan to/ /chos kyi dbyangs rab tu bsgrags so/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su bkye'o/ /yo byad sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pas kyang nye bar bsdud do/ rang gi lus kyang de dag

la byin gyis brlabs te/ de ni yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro/ /shar phyogs nas ji ltar 'ongs pa de bzhin du lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar

lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs nas kyang de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ ngas byang chub

sems dpa' phyogs kun tu mngon par gzhol ba/ tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus rnam par bkod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthun par spyod pa/ zhing thams cad

lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ chos thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rjes su song ba/ dus gsum gyi rgyud mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ chos phyogs kyi rgyud dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du rnam par snang ba/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i rgyud thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa/ chags pa med pa'i rgyud thams cad khong du chud pa/ gnas med pa'i rgyud la rab tu gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer

sgo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na lha lha chen po zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor byang chub

sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i drung

nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi spyod yul 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can mngon par shes pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul la

yon tan gyi khyad par du lta ba/ brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha rab tu dga' ba'i khyad par thob pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba'i rjes su song ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa de byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi sa la ni nan tan du byed/ ting nge 'dzin

gyi sa la ni rnam par dpyod/ gzungs kyis la ni rab tu gnas par byed/ smon lam gyi sa la ni 'jug par byed/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i sa la ni rjes su slob/ stobs kyis la ni yongs su bsgrub cing mthar gyis grong khyer sgo dang ldan pa gang na ba der song ste/ lha lha

chen po kun du dris pa dang / de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa/ rigs kyi bu 'de re/ lha lha chen po grong khyer gyi lam gyi bzhi mdo na bdag nyid shin tu che bas sems can rnams la chos ston cing 'dug go /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor lha lha chen po gang na ba der song ste/

lha lha chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i

spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi

ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ /de nas lha lha chen pos lag pa bzhi phyogs bzhir brkyang ste/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las shin tu myur ba'i shugs kyis chu blangs te/ bdag gis gdong bkrus nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor

la gser gyi me tog gis gtor te 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mthong bar shin tu dka' ste/ thos par yang rab tu dka'o/ /skyes bu mchog gi me tog pun da ri ka ni 'jig rten gyi phul du bya ba

yin pas/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yin te/ 'jig rten gyi gnas su gyur pa'o/ /'gro ba'i rten du gyur pa'o/ /sems can rnams la snang ba chen po 'byin pa'o/ /lam rmongs pa rnams la lam bde ba ston pa'o/ /chos kyi tshul du gzung ba la mgon du gyur pa'o/ /

thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer du phyin par bya ba la ded dpon chen por gyur pa ste/ de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ming ni sems dri ma med pa rnams la rang gi lus kyi gzugs brnyan ston cing lus rnam par dag pa

rnams la mngon par snang ba dang / ngag gi nyes pa spangs pa rnams dbyangs kyi snang ba yongs su gdon par byed pa dang / bsam pa dag pa rnams la dus thams cad du mngon sum du gyur par gnas pas/ lta ba ngan pa 'joms pa yin par bsams so/ /

rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dra ba thob pa'o/ /smras pa 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba'i sprin gyi dra ba de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ de nas lha lha chen pos tshong dpon gyi bu nor

kyi mdun du ri chen po tsam gyi gser gyi phung po dang / dngul gyi phung po dang / bai DUr+ya'i phung po dang / shel gyi phung po dang / mu sa ra gal pa'i phung po dang / a sma gar b+ha'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che ngang gis snang ba'i phung po dang / nor bu

rin po che dri ma med pa'i snying po'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu mngon pa'i phung po dang / gtsug gi nor bu rin po che dang / cod pan gyi phung po dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyise mo do'i phung po

dang / dpung rgyan gyi phung po dang / rna cha'i rgyan gyi phung po dang / gdub bu'i phung po dang / ska rags kyi phung po dang / rkang gdub kyi phung po dang / mu tig dmar po'i dra ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi phung po dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad kyi rgyan gyi phung po dang / nor bu rin po che yid

bzhin gyi rgyal po'i phung po dang / me tog thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / bdug pa thams cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / gos thams cad dang / gdugs thams cad dang / rgyal mtshan thams cad dang /

lha'i ba dan thams cad dang / rol mo brdung ba thams cad dang / rol mo dkrol ba thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yul thams cad dang / bu mo bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa dag kyang nye bar bstan nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor

la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu 'di dag las khyer la/ sbyin pa mang po ni byin cig /bsod nams mang po ni gyis shig /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cig /sems can mang po ni sbyin pas bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs

su bsdus te/ gtong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la khod cig /'jig rten ni sbyin pa la slobs shig /gtang bar dga' ba yongs su gtang ba ni ston cig /rigs kyi bu khyod la kho bos ji ltar yo byad kyi rnam pas bsdud pa 'di bzhin du sbyin pa'i bsam pa dang / ma

bral ba'i sems can tshad med pa dag gi bsam pa'i rgyud kyang gtong bas yongs su bsgo ba byed do/ /sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing / bla na med pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byed do/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho bo ni sems can 'dod pa'i dga' bas myos pa/ yul gyi longs spyod la yongs su chags pa rnams la yul de dag mi sdug par byin gyis rlob bo//

khro bas non pa dang nga rgyal can dang / rgyags shing dregs pa dang / rlom pa tshar gcod pas/ gdul ba rnams la ni gtum zhing srin po ltar mi sdug la 'jigs pa'i lus sha za zhing khrag 'thung ba'i tshul dang ldan par bstan te/

rlom pa dang / snyems pas 'khrug pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byed do/ /le lo can brtson 'grus bor ba'i sems can rnams la ni me dang / chu dang / rgyal po dang rkun po dang / gnod pa'i 'jigs pa yongs su bstan cing skyo bar byas te/ brtson

'grus rtsom pa la 'god par byed do/ /de ltar thabs de dang de dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi phyogs dang mi mthun par rab tu gzhom pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi tshogs bstsags pa dang / sgrib pa'i ri'i g.yang sa'i lam thams cad las yang

dag par bzla ba dang / sgrib pa med pa'i chos la gzud pa'i phyir mi dge ba thams cad las rnam par bzlog ste/ dge ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par 'god pa byed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa

sprin gyi dra ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin rab tu 'joms pa/ chu ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi me'i phung po zhi bar byed pa/ me'i phung po ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sred pa'i

chu skems pa/ rlung ltar 'dzin pa'i mngon par chags pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba/ rdo rje ltar bdag gi 'du shes sra ba'i brag rab tu rnyil ba/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu 'dzam

bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga d+ha'i snying po byang chub na sa'i lha mo brtan ma zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /

de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor lha lha chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lha lha chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ lha lha chen po'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon

gyi bu nor mthar gyis yul ma gad+ha'i snying po byang chub tu sa'i lha mo brtan ma gang na ba der song ba dang de 'gro ba'i tshe sa'i lha mo brgya stong phrag bcu gcig la gcig 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas

tshur 'ong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs 'dra la bar 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo / /chos kyi rgyal po'i rigs su byung ba chags pa med cing dri ma med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i go 'phang dam

pa 'thob par 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo / /ye shes kyi mthu bo che rdo rje'i mtshon cha can dpa' bo phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo zhes nas/ de'i mod la lha mo brtan ma la pa/ sa'i lha

mo brgya stong phrag bcus sa chen po rab tu bskyod de/ 'brug sgra zab mo lta bu'i sgra chen po grag par byas nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'od chen pos snang bar byas te/ lus rin po che'i rgyan dang / lhab lhub thams cad

kyis shin tu brgyan nas/ glog gi phreng ba'i tshogs nam mkha'i dbyings las 'gyu zhing snang ba lta bu sha stag du byas te/ shing thams cad kyi myu gu ni skye bar byed/ me tog gi shing thams cad ni kha 'bu bar byed/ chu klung gi rgyun thams cad ni

'bab par byed/ mtsho dang mtshe'u dang lu ma thams cad ni rgyas par byed/ spos chu'i char pa ni rab tu 'bab par byed/ me tog gi sprin rab tu 'thor ba'i rlung chen po ni ldang bar byed/ sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni rab tu

sgra sgrog par byed/ lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dang rgyan gyi tshogs mang po ni rab tu 'khrol bar byed/ ba lang dang / khyu mchog dang / glang po dang / stag dang / kyi dbang po ni rab tu sgra 'byin par byed/ lha dang

lha ma yin dang / klu dang 'byung po'i dbang po rnams ni 'brug sgra 'byin par byed/ ri'i dbang po chen po rnams ni phan tshun thug par byed/ gter gyi tshogs bye ba brgya stong ni mngon du byung bar byed cing sa'i 'og nas 'thon to/ /de nas sa'i lha mo

brtan mas tshong dpon gyi bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod 'dir 'ongs pa legs so/ /sa'i phyogs 'di ni sngon khyod kyi gnas su gyur te/ kho mo'i mngon sum du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin na/ de'i rnam

par smyin pa'i phyogs 'ga' tsam blta bar 'dod dam/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/

sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma 'tshal lo/ /de nas sa'i lha mo brtan mas rkang pa'i mthil gyis sa chen po la brdabs te/ rin po che'i gter bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa rab tu brgyan

pa bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu rin po che'i gter bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di dag kyang khyod kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /khyod kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /khyod kyis ci dgar spyad pa'o/ /khyod kyi bsod nams kyi rnam par

smin pa las byung ba'o/ /khyod kyi bsod nams kyi stobs kyis bsrungs pa'o/ /'di las long ste/ khyod kyis ci dgos pa de dag gyis shig /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka'

ba'i snying po can thob pa ste/ de ltar kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'di dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad tshun chad du byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'brang zhing / rtag tu bsrung ba la zhugs pa ste/ de tshun chad

du rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi spyod pa la rnam par spyod do/ /ye shes kyi yul la 'jug go /smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor khong du chud par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa rjes su rtogs par byed

do/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi tshul gyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad dang / sems rgya chen pos rgyas par 'gengs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyis dbang

bsgyur ba dang / zhing gi dra ba thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa yang dag par mnod pa dang / dus thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa dang / chos kyi

'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul thams cad dang / mdo sde yang dag par brjod pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi tshul thams cad dang / chos snang ba chen pos snang bar bya ba'i tshul dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam

par 'phrul pa thams cad yang dag par bstan pa'i tshul yang rjes su rtogs par byed do/ /yang dag par 'dzin to/ /yang dag par nod do/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di yang bskal pa

ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol de'i yang pha rol cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar bskal pa snang bas rnam par brgyan pa la de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang po las thob ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo byang chub
sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di la yongs su dpyod dpyod/ rnam par dpyod dpyod/ shin du dpyod dpyod/ yang dag par 'phel bar byed byed de/ shin tu

rgyas par byed byed pas/ bskal pa bzang po la thug gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang ma bral lo/ /de srid kyi bar gyis kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du

med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bsnyen bkur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang mthong ste/ kho mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon sum

du mthong ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zham ring du 'brang ba/

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug par dka' ba la rab tu zhugs pa/ sems kyi skad cig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i shugs dang ldan

pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa dri ma med pa'i snying por gyur pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad rtag tu mngon par bsgrubs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las

tha mi dad pa'i pho nyar gyur pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga d+ha zhes bya ba na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan

pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma

la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i gdams ngag rjes su dran par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying

po can de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa de rab tu goms par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi tshul de'i rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba de la rnam par dpyad pa dang / byang chub

sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba de la rnam par blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes tha dad pa de la yid ches par bya ba dang / byang chub sems

dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes shin tu sbyang ba de rjes su rtogs par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho de la 'bab par bya ba byed cing / grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas gang na ba der phyin te/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas la g.yas phyogs su

bskor nas/ shar phyogs logs kyi grong khyer gyi sgo nas song ste/ nyi ma nub nas ring po ma lon pa zhig tu grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i dbus shig na/ byang chub sems dpa'i gdams ngag mthun par len pa de mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang

ldan pa mthong bar 'dod cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yod na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur bar nges pa'i blo gros dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi mig kun tu lta ba'i yul gyi rang bzhin gyi byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa/ phyogs thams cad du mngon par

gzhol zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la blta ba'i sems kyis mos pa dang / ye shes chen po'i snying por gyur pa'i 'du shes kyi sems dang ldan pa/ dmigs pa thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi mig dang

ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad du ye shes rgya mtsho 'byam klas pas rgyas par 'gengs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mig gis phyogs thams cad du shes bya'i rgya mtsho la rnam par lta ba/ ye shes chen po'i mig 'thob par bya ba la rab tu gzhol zhing bsam

pa rtse gcig tu bzhag nas 'dug pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa de grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings las nor bu rin po che sna tshogs dpe med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhig na/ rin po che'i seng ge'i khri chen po spos

zhim po thams cad kyi pad+mo'i snying po can zhig la lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa/ skra 'jam zhing mang la mthon ting du 'dug pa/ mig dkar nag 'byes pa/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ lus rgyan dang lhab lhub

thams cad kyis klubs shing brgyan pa/ kha dog bsgyur ba'i gos bgos pa tshangs pa'i gtsug tor gyi cod pan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa thogs pa lus la rgyu skar dang / gza' dang skar chen dang / skar ma'i tshogs thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan snang

bar gyur ba 'dug pa mthong ngo / /des sems can gyi khams yangs par mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba nas sems can ji snyed cig yongs su bgrol ba de dag thams cad kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo / /

ji snyed cig mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du bkod pa dang / ji snyed cig nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smyin par byas pa/ de dag thams cad kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo / /lus mngon par bsgrub pa dang /

gzugs mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kha dog mngon par bsgrub pa'i thabs sna tshogs kyis ji snyed cig yongs su smyin par byas pa de dag kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo / /nga ro mngon par bsgrub pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag mngon par

bsgrub pa dang / skad kyi tshul sna tshogs yongs su sbyar ba ji snyed cig gis yongs su smyin par byas pa de dag kyang / de'i ba spu'i sgo nas rjes su brjod pa thos so/ /dus mngon par bsgrub pa dang / bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can kyi rjes su 'brang

bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / byang chub sems

dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyes bu seng ge chen po'i rnam par bsgyings pa dang /

byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas/ rnam par rtse ba ji snyed cig gis des sems can yongs su smyin par byas pa de dag kyang / de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo / /des thabs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho de dag

mthong zhing thos nas dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa de la lus thams cad kyis phab nas phyag 'tshal te/ langs nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas

phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mo bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de de ltar bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis
sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad 'byung bar yang dag par mthong pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi phyag tu bdag nyid bor ba lags na/ lha mo shul gang la brten na/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu'i sar

'byung bar 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i shul bdag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod dge ba'i

bshes gnyen kyi sbyin gyis non te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen kyi tshig mnyan par 'dod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams dag la nan tan du byed pa'i legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen

gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byed pas/ gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel

ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo thob pa ste/ bsam pa mi mnyam pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /mi dge ba'i las kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /dge

ba'i las kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /sems mnyam par dang mi mnyam par ldan pa'i sems can rnams la mi gnyis pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /kun nas nyon mongs ba rnams la rnam par byang

ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /dma' ba la mos pa rnams la yangs pa la mos pa yongs su bskyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /dbang po zhum pa rnams la brtson

'grus chen po'i shugs rnam par spel ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /'khor ba la mngon par mos pa rnams la 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo las rnam par bzlog pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la

mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la dgod pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo de lta bu'i sems dang yid la bya bar ldan la/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems

can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di dang yang ldan pas sems can gang ji snyed cig mun nag smag tu gyur pa'i nam la mi ni nyal bar gyur/ 'byung po'i tshogs ni rgyu bar

gyur/ rkun chom mang pos ni rgyas par gyur/ sems can mi bsrun pa'i tshul can ni phyogs su rgyu bar gyur/ sprin stug po nag pos ni kun nas khebs par gyur/ dud pa dang rdul gyi tshogs kyis ni kun nas 'grigs par gyur/ rdzi char mi bzad

pas ni rab tu gtags par gyur/ zla skar gyi tshogs ni mi snang bar gyur/ mig gis bya ba'i mthu ni med par gyur pa'i mun pa la sems can gang ji snyed cig rgya mtsho la spyod dam/ thang la spyod dam/ ri la spyod dam/ nags tshal gzhan na spyod

dam/ yul gzhan na spyod dam/ grong gzhan na spyod dam/ phyogs gzhan na spyod dam/ phyogs mtshams gzhan na spyod dam/ lam gzhan na spyod kyang rung ste/ rgya mtsho la spyod spyod pa las gru bub par gyur pa'am/ thang la spyod spyod pa las nyam nyes pa

'am/ ri la spyod spyod pa las g.yang sa chen por lhung bar gyur pa'am/ 'brog dgon pa la spyod spyod pa las kha zas kyis 'phongs par gyur pa 'am/ nags tshal thibs por sba'i zad zing la thogs sam/ tshul ma yin pa'i nyam nyes

shig tu gyur tam/ yul gzhan na spyod spyod pa las chom pos bcom pa'am/ grong gzhan na spyod spyod pa las mi bsrun pa'i tshul can gyis gtses pa'am/ phyogs gzhan na spyod spyod pa las 'brog rmis pa'am/ phyogs

mtshams gzhan na spyod spyod pa las mgo rmongs pa'am/ lam gzhan na spyod spyod pa las nye zhor gyur kyang rung ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can de dag la thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas skyabs su gyur par byed pa ste/ 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po la spyod

pa rnams kyi rlung sprin nag po gtor ba dang / chu'i rnyog pa gdang ba dang / rlung mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor bzlog pa dang / rlabs kyi shugs chen po zhi bar bya ba dang / glog gi 'jigs pa las thar bar bya ba dang / phyogs bstan pa dang / chu'i

lam legs par dmigs pa dang / 'gram bstan pa dang / rin po che'i gling du phyin par bya ba'i phyir lam yongs su bstan te/ yongs su sdud pa'i gzugs dang / ded dpon gyi gzugs dang / rta'i rgyal po rngog chen gyi gzugs

dang / glang po'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang / ru sbal gyi rgyal po'i gzugs dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po'i gzugs dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i gzugs dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang / lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po'i

gzugs dang / rgya mtsho'i lha'i gzugs dang / mnyan pa'i gzugs kyis skyabs su gyur par byed do/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang 'di ltar sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad las yongs su bzlog pa'i phyir skyabs su gyur par

shog shig ces yongs su bsngo'o/ /thang la spyod pa'i sems can mun pa chen po shin tu gnas pa'i nam la/ sa gzhi 'od mdang / tsher ma dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mos gang ba/ sbrul gdug pa gtum po shin tu mang ba/ thag thug dang / mi bde ba'i lam

can rdul dang phyar dar shin tu 'thul pa/ rdzi char drag pos gtags pa/ tsha ba dang / grang ba'i sdug bsngal yod pa/ sbrul dang gcan zan gyis bag tsha ba yod pa/ thong mi dang / chom po rgyu bar gyur pa zhig na/ mgo 'khor bar gyur

pa'i sems can rnams la/ nyi ma'i gzugs dang / zla ba'i gzugs dang / skya reng 'char ba'i gzugs dang / skar mda' chen po'i gzugs dang / glog gi phreng ba 'byung ba'i gzugs dang / rin po che'i 'od kyi gzugs dang /

gza'i 'khor gyi gzugs dang / rgyu skar dang skar ma'i tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gi 'od kyi gzugs dang / lha'i gzugs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis skyabs su gyur par byed do/ /sems kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis

nyon mongs pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par bsal ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su shog shig par bskyed do/ /ri'i g.yang sa la spyod cing 'chi bas 'jigs skrag pa rnams srog dbyung ba dang / grags pa 'dod pa'i

dbang du gyur pa dang / snyan pa dang / sgra'i rgyal mtshan 'dod pa dang / longs spyod tshol ba dang / 'dod pa'i zil gyis non pa dang / yo byad yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa dang / 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa 'dod cing brtson pa dang / bu dang

chung ma gtong mi phod pas thogs par gyur ba dang / lta ba'i thibs por 'khyams pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams la yang thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas skyabs su gyur bar byed de/ 'di ltar ri'i

phug dang / bya skyibs mngon par bsgrub pa dang / shing thog dang / rtsa ba bzar rung ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang / chu'i lam dang / chu mig mngon par bsgrub pa dang / tsha ba dang / grang ba'i gnyen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang /

yang dag pa'i lam bstan pa dang / ka la ping ka'i sgra skad bsgrag pa dang / rma bya'i rgyal po'i skad 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang / sman 'bar bas snang ba'i gzugs dang / ri'i lha'i 'od kyi gzugs dang / ri'i phug dang sul dang /

ltongs su rlag ste/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa'i sems can rnams kyi mun pa'i rab rib rnam par bsal ba dang / sa'i gzhi mnyam par mngon par bsgrub pas skyabs su gyur par byed de/ sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can

ri la spyod pa 'di dag yongs su bskyabs pa de bzhin du 'khor ba'i ri'i lam rgyud g.yang sa la gnas shing rga shi'i gdon gyis zin pa de dag gi skyabs su'ang bdag 'gyur bar shog shig par bskyed do/ /nags tshal thibs po'i dra bas thogs pa'i

sems can mtshan mo mun pa'i mun nag gis chod de/ shing dang / shing 'phran 'dzings pa'i gseb shin tu nyam nga ba dang / chu dang / rtswa dang / spong po dang / 'khri shing gis lam chod pa dang / shing dang shing phran sna tshogs kyi nags tshal thibs pa'i nang du phyin

te/ stag gi sgra thos pas skrag pa'i snying can don ma grub pas/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa dang / 'jigs pa dang 'tshe ba dang / mi dga' ba sna tshogs kyis nyams mi bde ba nags tshal stug pa nas 'byung ba'i phyogs mi shes pa rnams la/

kho mo ni bde bar 'gro ba'i lam yongs su ston pa byed de/ sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can lta ba'i thibs po sna tshogs la gnas pa/ sred pa'i dra bas 'khris par gyur pa/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses

pa rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su 'grel bar shog shig par bskyed do/ /'brog dgon pa la spyod pa'i sems can mun pa'i nang na 'thoms pa rnams kyang thabs kyi sgo sna tshogs kyis bde ba yongs su bskyed cing lam bstan te/ de dag

'jigs pa med pa dang / bde ba la rab tu bkod nas/ sems kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa na 'thoms pa ngan song thams cad kyi lam du zhugs pa rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su bkrol te shin tu

phun sum tshogs pas/ bde ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la rab tu dgod par bya bar shog shig par bskyed de/ rigs kyi bu yul dang ljongs la chags pa'i sems can mngon par chags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur pa

rnams la'ang kho mo ni skyo bar bya ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyis yul la mngon par chags pa de las gyen du bskyod par byed de sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad phung po la mngon par chags pa las gyen du bskyod de/

gnas med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod par bya bar shog shig par bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ni grong na spyod pa'i sems can khyim dang gnas kyi 'ching bas glags pa rnams mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pas chod pa'i nang na khyim

gyi don sna tshogs nyams su gnod pas/ sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams kyang skyo bar 'gyur ba'i sgo sna tshogs kyis skyo bar byas te/ chags pa med pa'i sems yongs su bskyed nas/ chos kyi sbyin pas yongs su bzung ste/ tshim par

byas nas rten pa med pa'i chos la bkod de/ sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can skye mched drug gi grong la gnas pa rnams 'khor ba'i lam gyi rgyud kyi spyod yul las gyen du bskyod de/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye

shes kyi spyod yul la dgod par bya bar shog shig par bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu gang yang mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pa'i nang na/ shar phyogs la sogs pa'i phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams re rer phyogs bslad par gyur pa/

sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la mi mnyam pa'i g.yang sar 'du shes pa dang / sgang bu la gshong du 'du shes par gyur te/ phyogs kyi lam dang sa tshod la mgo 'khor bar gyur pa de dag la'ang kho mo ni thabs sna tshogs

kyis snang bar byas te/ phyir 'byung ba rnams la ni sgo yongs su stonato/ /grol bar 'dod par rnams la ni mu stegs yongs su ston to/ /rgyal par 'dod pa rnams la ni gru yongs su ston to/ /khyim du 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim yongs su ston to/ /

rnam par blta bar 'dod pa rnams la ni phyogs yongs su ston to/ /sa gzhi mtho ba dang / dma' ba yang yongs su ston to/ /sa'i phyogs mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang / gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyang yongs su ston to/ /lam

gyis dub pa rnams la grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor kyang yongs su ston to/ /tsha ba dang skom pas mnar ba rnams la yang mtsho dang mtshe'u dang / lu ma dang rdzing dang rdzing bu dang chu klung dang / nags tshal

dang bza' shing gi ra ba dang / kun dga' yid du 'ong ba yongs su ston to/ /sdug pa dang bral zhing phrad par 'dod pa rnams la pha dang ma dang bu dang chung ma dang / mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / gnyen bshes dang yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs

yongs su ston to/ /sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gis chod pa/ mig rab rib kyis nyams pa/ phyogs bslad pa/ lam 'khor ba rnams la gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir/

snang ba bskyed de/ 'od byas pa de bzhin du bdag gis yun ring po nas 'khor ba'i mun pa na gnas pa'i sems can yang dag pa nyid kyi phyogs la bslad pa ma rig pa'i mun par 'thoms pa ye shes kyi mig mi shes pa'i ling tog gis chod pa/ 'du shes

dang / sems dang lta bas byin ci log tu gyur pa/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa/ sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa/ bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa/ mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa/ bdag dang sems can dang /

srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dam po la gnas pa/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched la gnas pa/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la mgo 'khor ba/ mi dge ba'i las kyi lam gyi phyogs su zhugs pa/ srog gcod pa/ ma byin par len pa/

'dod pas log par g.yem pa/ du smra ba/ phra ma zer ba/ ngag rtsub po 'byin pa/ tshig kyal ba smra ba/ chags sems dang ldan pa/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa/ log par lta ba can/ phar mi shes pa/ mar mi shes pa/ dge sbyong dang /

bram zer mi shes pa/ dbang po mi shes pa/ skyes bu dam par mi shes pa/ chos ma yin pa la chags shing zhen pa/ mi tshul ba'i 'dod pas zil gyis non pa/ log pa'i chos kyis yongs su 'khris pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba 'debs pa/ chos

kyi 'khor lo nub par bya ba la zhugs pa/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' la gnod par byed pa/ theg pa chen po la zhe sdang ba/ byang chub kyi sems la mos pa spong bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' la mi snyan du rjod pa/

snod ma skams par snying ring ba/ gnod pa ma byas par dgrar len pa/ 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa/ skyes bu dam pa ma yin pas/ spyod pa'i chos kyi spyod yul can/ mchod rten dang / dge 'dun gyi dngos po la 'khu ba/ pha ma la log par sems pa/ mtshams

med pa'i las byed pa/ g.yang sa chen po la mngon par ltas pa'i sems can rnams kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa shes rab kyi snang ba chen pos bsal te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul nas/ theg pa chen po kun tu bzang pos stobs

bcu'i ye shes kyi sa'i lam yongs su ston par gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul dang /

sangs rgyas kyi yul dang / stobs bcu yongs su grub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzungs kyi stobs dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mchog tu gyur pa yongs su ston par shog shig /yongs su bstan nas kyang / sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas la rab tu dgod par shog shig par bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can yun ring po nas na zhing nad kyis yongs su skyo ba/ lus nyam chung ba dang / rgas pa/ rga ba'i zil gyis non pa dang / mgon med

pa dang / phongs shing dbul ba dang / log par ltung ba dang / yul gzhan du phyin pa dang / phyogs log par zhugs pa dang / btson ra na 'dug pa dang / chad pas bcad pa dang / nyes pa byung ste/ rgyal pos gsad par bkri ba rnams kyang srog dang

bral gyi 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad thams cad ni thabs thams cad kyis gso ba nan tan du byed do/ /rgas pa dang rga ba'i zil gyis non pa rnams la ni bsnyen

bkur ba dang / rim gro dang / yo byad kyis mi phongs par yongs su bsdud pa byed do/ /mgon med pa'i sems can rnams la mgon byed do/ /phongs shing dbul ba rnams la ni nor dang / gser gyi phung pos yongs su sdud do/ /log par
ltung ba rnams ni don 'thun pas yongs su sdud do/ /yul gzhan du phyin pa rnams ni/ rang gi yul du phyin par byed do/ /phyogs log par zhugs pa rnams ni/ phyogs ma nor bar 'dzud do/ /

brtson ra na 'dug pa rnams ni brtson ra nas thar bar byed do/ /chad pas gcad pa ni chad pa'i sdug bsngal las grol bar byed do/ /nyes pa byung ste/ rgyal pos gsad par bkri ba rnams ni srog gi dbugs phyin pa thob par byed do/ /sems kyang

bdag ji ltar sems can 'di dag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa sna tshogs las yongs su skyob cing / mgon byed pa de bzhin du bdag gis 'di rnams bla na med pa'i chos kyi yongs su bsdu bas yongs su bsdus te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs

su dgrol bar bya'o/ /skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang / 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yang dag par bzla bar bya'o/ /ngan song dang log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa

thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gzungs la rab tu dgod par bya'o/ /chos rin po che sbyin pa'i yongs su bsdu bas yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/ /kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las la rab tu dgod par bya'o/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag la yang dag par bskul bar bya'o/ /rga shi yongs su med pa'i dbyings shin tu rtogs pa la rab tu dgod par bya bar bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can log pa'i lam la zhugs pa/ lta ba'i rnam pa thibs po sna tshogs la mngon

par zhen pa/ log par lta ba'i spyod yul can lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las nyam nga bar 'gyur ba la yongs su spyod pa/ brtul zhugs dang dka' thub sna tshogs la gnas pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin yang / yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa/ lus gdung ba dang / yongs su gdung ba la rab tu brtson pa/ mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / lu ma dang / rdzing bu dang / chu klung dang / ri'i gzar dang / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba mos pa/ sdig pa'i

grogs po'i dbang du gyur brnams la yang thabs sna tshogs kyis mgon du gyur par byed de/ de dag sdig pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa dang / ngan song thams cad kyi g.yang sar ltung ba'i lam las rnam par bzlog go /'jig rten

pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la rab tu bkod cing / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa la'ang yongs su 'god do/ /sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can 'di dag nyam nga ba'i nan tan dang / sdug bsngal las yongs su bkrol ba de bzhin du bdag gis

sems can thams cad kyang / 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam la bkod de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byas la kun tu bzang po'i smon lam chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /

sems can gyi khams thams cad ma dul gyi bar du byang chub sems dpa'i sa las kyang mi g.yo bar bya bar bskyed do/ /de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i phyogs sems can thams cad

kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di brnan te/ bstan par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor la tshigs su bcad pa 'di

dag smras so/ /gti mug ma rig mun nag bstsal don du/ /sems can phan phyir kho mo chos bstan te/ /dus la bsdad cing 'gro ba bde bar byas/ /'di ni rnam thar tshul mchog zhi ba yin/ /kho mos byams yangs shin tu spyad pa byas/ /

bskal pa mtha' yas sngon cad shin tu bsgoms/ /des ni 'jig rten rgyas bkang snang bar byas/ /nor brtan pas tshul 'di shes par gyis/ /kho mo'i snying rje rgya mtsho tshad med de/ /'di las dus gsum rgyal ba 'jig rten 'byung / /

des ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byed/ /nor brtan pas tshul 'di shes par gyis/ 'jig rten bde ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang / /ma byas 'phags pa'i bde ba mngon bsgrub cing / /des ni kho mo dga' mgu rangs par byed/ /rgyal sras khyod

kyis tshul 'di shes bar gyis/ /sangs rgyas stobs rnams yongs su sbyong byed cing / /nyan thos ye shes rnam thar 'bras bu dang / /'dus byas skyon las rtag tu phyir phyogs kyis/ /rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis/ /kho mo'i mig ni rgya che yongs su dag

des ni phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mang po mthong / /zhing dbyings de dag kun gyi rang byung rnams/ /byang chub shing dbang drung na bzhugs pa mthong / /sangs rgyas sku ni mtshan gyis yongs brgyan cing / /'od bzang rnam pa sna tshogs kun 'gyed de/ /ba spu kun

nas 'od gzer mang 'gyed pa'i/ /sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa kho mos mthong / /zhing dbyings de dag kun gyi sems can rnams/ /shi 'pho skye ba'i sgor yang kun mthong ste/ /byis pa de dag 'gro rgyud rgya mtsho na/ /'khor zhing rang rang las kyang

myong par byed/ /kho mo'i rna ba rgya mtsho rnam dag ste/ /der ni sgra rnams ma lus yongs su 'du/ /'gro ba kun kyi sgra skad rgya mtsho dag /kun kyang thos nas dran pas yongs su 'dzin/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra skad thams cad kyis/ /dpe zla med pa'i

gsung ni rab brgyan te/ /des ni rgyal ba 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de dag kho mos thos shing dran pas 'dzin/ /kho mo'i sna yi mthu yang rnam dag ste/ /chos tshul rgya mtsho dag la thogs pa med/ /rnam thar gnas rnams kun tu rab 'jug pa'i/ /tshul

'di rgyal sras khyod kyis shes par gyis/ /kho mo'i lce ni rgya che rab tu yangs/ /srab cing mdog dmar rin chen 'od du dag /sems can bsam pa ji bzhin de shes byed/ /rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis/ /kho mo'i chos lus shin tu
rnam dag ste/ /dus gsum kun tu 'od gsal rab tu gnas/ /gzugs lus sems can bsam pa ji bzhin te/ /de dag kun gyi dad pa'i dbang du mthong / /kho mo'i sems ni chags med zag pa med/ /sgra

dbyangs sprin gyi nga ro ji bzhin te/ /de yi khongs su mi mchog kun chud kyang / /de la kho mo rnam par rtog pa med/ /zhing gi dbyings kyi sems can bsam mi khyab/ /de dag sems kyi rgya mtsho kho mos shes/ /de dag dbang po bsam pa rab shes kyang / /

de la kho mo rnam par rtog pa med/ /kho mo'i rdzu 'phrul rab yangs shin tu grub/ /des ni bsam yas zhing yang rab tu bskyod/ /lus kyi 'od dang mthu yang de bzhin te/ /des ni sems can gdul dka' shin tu 'dul/ /kho mo'i bsod nams rnam yangs yongs su dag /

kun tu rgyan byed zad pa med pa'i mdzod/ /des ni rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa byed/ /'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'ang yin/ /kho mo'i shes rab rnam yangs shin tu dag /des ni chos mang rgya mtsho rab tu shes/ /'gro ba kun gyi the tshom yongs su gcod/ /rgyal

sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis/ /dus gsum kun la kho mo zhugs gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho kun kyang mthong zhing shes/ /de dag smon lam la yang rab tu zhugs/ /tshul 'di dpag yas rab tu rdzogs pa yin/ /rdul mang kun la zhing rnams

rgya mtsho mthong / /de dag dus gsum 'jug pa de bzhin te/ /de dag kun gyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong / /'di ni kun tu gnas pa'i tshul gyis/ /rnam par snang mdzad byang chub sangs rgyas te/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing rnams yongs bkang zhing / /rdul

sbubs kun gyi byang chub shing drung na/ /zhi ba'i chos rnams gsung du sgrog pa ltos/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas/

ji srid cig lags/ de ltar khyod tshul 'di lta bus sems can gyi don bgyi ba la sta gon du zhugs pa'i rnam par thar pa de ni khyod kyis brnyes nas ji srid cig lags/ de skad ces smras pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor la

'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa'i yang / pha rol cig tu bskal ba rab tu zhi ba'i 'od ces bya ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga brgya skyes pa byung ste/ de'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni rin chen

dpal 'byung zhes bya bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de'i gling bzhi pa 'bring po rin chen zla ba sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba de na/ rgyal po'i gnas pad mo'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ rgyal po'i gnas der rgyal po chos rab mu stegs zhes bya ba chos dang mthun pa'i

rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba gling bzhi la dbang ba rin po che bdun dang ldan pa byung ste/ des sa chen po de yang ri dang rgya mtshor bcas pa'i mthas gtugs par chos kyis rgyas par byas nas/ bde bar gnas par byas so/ /rgyal po chos rab mu stegs de'i btsun mo

chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ de srod la 'dod pas myos shing dga' bar rtse rtse bas dub nas nam gyi gung la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi gnas su phyin te nyal lo/ /de nas rgyal po'i gnas pad mo'i 'od de'i shar phyogs kyi nags tshal chen po zhi ba'i dpal 'byung ba zhes bya bar rin

po che'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa'i lhun can/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba'i byang chub kyi shing chen po'i drung du/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ de'i mthus 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dpal 'byung ba thams cad 'od chen po kha dog tu ma can gyis rgyas shing sang bar gyur to/ /rgyal po'i gnas pad mo'i 'od ces bya ba de na mtshan mo'i lha mo zla ba shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya

ba 'dug 'dug ste/ des rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba'i gan du song nas/ rgyan bkrol ba'i sgras sad par byas te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di ltar rgyal po'i btsun mo shes par gyis shig /nags tshal chen po zhi ba'i dpal

'byung bar de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so/ /de nas des rgyal po'i btsun mo de'i mdun du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang /

sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam rgya cher bshad do/ /rigs kyi bu rgyal po'i btsun mo de 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur te/ bsam pa thag pas bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ des de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun du bcas pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro cher byas so/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/

de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni/ de ltar mi blta ste/ kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni mos

ba'i sems bskyed pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed tshun chad du nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar ma skyes te/ sems can dmyal bar ma yin no/ /byol song gi skye

gnas su ma yin/ su ma yin no/ /nam yang rigs dma' bar ma skyes so/ /nam yang dbang po dang mi ldan par ma gyur to/ /nam yang sdug bsngal bar ma gyur te/ de ltar kho mos rtag par lha'i nang du lha'i bdag nyid che ba nyid thob/

mi'i nang du ni/ mi'i bdag nyid che ba nyid thob ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang ma bral lo/ /dus ngan par yang ma skyes so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu dge

ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu lam bde zhing mnyam pa nas nye zho med par phyin kyang de tsam gyis kho mo'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yongs su grub par ma gyur te/ ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa de dag ni

'das/ bskal pa bzang po 'di'i snga rol gyi ni bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu'i thog ma la bab pa de'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid rdul gyi dri ma pa zhes bya bar/ bskal pa mya ngan med cing / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ rigs kyi bu

'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid rdul gyi dri ma med pa'i dpal de ni/ kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag par gyur te/ der sangs rgyas lnga brgya byung ngo / /sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag gi thog ma la de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/

'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi'i ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab rgyal mtshan spyan yangs shing zhi ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe kho mo yang tshong dpon

snyan pa rnam par grags pa'i bu mo shes rab snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba/ gzugs mdzes shing bzang la blta na sdug pa kha dog shin tu mdzes shing rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhig tu gyur te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo zla ba shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od

ces bya ba de yang / smon lam gyi dbang gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal po'i gnas rgyal mtshan sna tshogs su mtshan mo'i lha mo mig rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ des kho mo mtshan mo mi nyal tsam zhig na/ pha ma nyal

bar gyur pa dang / khyim de yang yongs su bskyod de 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas rang gi gzugs bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa brjod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas nas/

zhag bdun lon te/ snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa de bstanato/ /de nas kho mo pha ma dang gnyen bshes kyi tshogs chen po dang 'grogs te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo shin tu rnam par dag pa'i zla ba'i 'od sngon du bdar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar

phyin to/ /de nas kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal mthong ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba 'dul zhing sangs rgyas mthong bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi dbyings ye

shes kyis snang ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang thob par gyur to/ /de thob pas kyang kho mos bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag kyang rjes su dran par gyur to/ /kho mo'i byang chub kyi sems de yang mngon du gyur te/ de ltar kho mos

de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa thos te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di yang thob par gyur to/ /de thob pas kyang 'jig rten

gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang zhing / bdag nyid kyang de dag thams cad kyi

zhabs kyi drung na 'dug par shes so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu sems can ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/ de dag gi sgra skad rnam pa tha dad pa'i brda yang rab tu shes so/ /sems dang bsam pa dang / dbang po dang mos pa yang rab

tu shes so/ /sngon gyi mtha'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi drung du yongs su smin par gyur pa'ang rab tu shes so/ /de dag la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par 'gyur ba'i lus kyang yongs su ston to/ /kho mo'i rnam par thar pa de yang sems kyi

skad cig re re la rnam par 'phel te/ rnam par thar pa'i sems de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/ /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi

zhing 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/ /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/ /de

bzhin du sems kyi skad cig re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar dag kyang lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig

bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/ bdag nyid kyang de dag gi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug par shes so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang len to/ /'dzin to/ /yongs

su 'dzin to/ /nye bar 'dzin to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho dang / smon lam rgya mtsho la yang 'jug go /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa de dag thams cad kyang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
