nan tan du bya ba'i phyir kha 'og tu lus khrus pa'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam dang / mi 'gal bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad la sku bslu ba med pa'i sems dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par sems can thams cad

yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam chen po 'debs pa'i sems dang / de dag la pa byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag gi tshogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yongs

su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba gnyis pa/ byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'o/ /

rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba gsum pa chos kyi tshul la nges par gzhag pa'i sbyor ba'i tshul mngon du gyur pa 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos

thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho yod do cog nges par rtogs pas mngon du bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam gyi rnam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bas mngon du bya bar gcig tu sems pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ kha na ma tho ba med

pa'i las la yang dag par spyad par sems pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba mngon du bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la nan tan du bya bas

yongs su grub par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rgyan thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du pa'i tshogs rgya chen po yongs su bsgrub pa bskal pa'i 'bar bas kyang / rgyun

mi gcad par brtson par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la rab tu zhugs pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ yongs su spyod pa'i tshul thams cad la rab tu

zhugs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la dngos po thams cad rnam par bsgom pas dngos po pa'i tshul la zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba gsum pa chos kyi tshul la nges

par rtogs pas gzhag pa'i sbyor ba'i tshul mngon du gyur ba 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bzhi pa dus gsum snang bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la

byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i dbyings la gya nom par yongs su dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la snang ba rab tu thob pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa yin/ bsam pa brtan pa rdo rje'i khams lta bus

yongs su zin pa'i sems dang ldan pas shin tu brtan pa yin/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du skye ba las phyin phyogs su phyogs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su grub par bya ba la mngon du gyur pa yin/ byang chub sems

dpa'i dbang po rnam par spel ba la khyad par du 'bogs pa rab tu thob pa yin/ lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu 'od gsal bar bya ba'i phyir sems shin tu dge ba yin/ smon lam brtan zhing rgya che ba rnam par 'phel bar bya ba la g.yo ba yin/ sgrib pa thams cad

kyi ri rnam par gtor ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par dgongs pa yin/ 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas mgon du gyur ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bzhi pa

dus gsum snang bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba lnga pa kun nas snang ba'i 'od kyi snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub

sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la rab tu zhugs pas sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa yin/ sbyin pa lhug par gtong bas dngos po'i 'du shes thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa yin/ tshul khrims mtha' yas pas

mtha' las rgal bar rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bzod pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la gnas pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yangs par 'byung ba la

zhugs pas brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa yin/ sgo kun tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pas bsam gtan la rab tu brtson pa yin/ chos snang ba thams cad rab tu thob pas shes rab kyi mthu'i 'od dang ldan pa yin/

sangs rgyas blta ba rgya mtsho rnam par par bya ba la zhugs pas thogs pa med pa'i mig dang ldan pa yin/ 'jig rten thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pas/ chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la dbang bsgyur bas smos pa yin/ chos kyi tshul

yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du thob par bya ba la rab tu brtson pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba lnga ba kun nas snang ba'i 'od kyi snying po zhes bya ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub

sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba drug pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rgyud du 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i rgyud du skyes pa yin/ tshul gyi sgo thams cad la shin tu grub pa yin/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi smon lam chen po rnam par dag pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba

la rang bzhin gcig pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang lus gcig tu gyur pa yin/ chos dkar pos 'jig rten gzhan du 'gro ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs yongs su bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bdag

nyid che ba'i chos kyis rnam par spyod pa yin/ dus la ji ltar bab pa bzhin du sems can rnam par dag par bya ba'i chos la zhugs pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dris pa la spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems

dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba drug pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rgyud du 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bdun pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs

kyi 'od snang ba'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug pa'i snang bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba las phyir ldog go /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho las phyir mi

'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya ba la gnas pas yongs su yi 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten thams cad rmi lam lta bur rab tu rtogs par byed do/ /gzugs su rnam par pa'i gnas thams

cad gzugs brnyan lta bur mngon par sgrub bo/ /mngon par shes pas rnam par 'phrul pa sprul pa lta bu la dbang rab tu thob par byed do/ /srid pa thams cad du skye ba grib ma lta bur gdong rab tu ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgra brnyan

lta bur rab tu shes so/ /thabs kyi tshul don sna tshogs dang ldan pa la rab tu brtson pas chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rab tu bstan pa la pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa thob pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bdun pa de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi 'od snang ba'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba brgyad pa ye shes kyi sgo kun nas rnam par dpyad pas yongs su 'grub pa 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba

gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur cing byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa la rnam par gnas pa yin te/ de la gnas nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul la rnam par dpyod de/ ye shes kyi tshul gyi sgo re re la yang

byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul tshad pa yongs su ston pas bskal pa tshad med pa zad par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la'ang pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pas dbang du 'gyur te/ sems kyi skad cig re re zhing sems kyi

skad cig thams cad la yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa dag na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi drung du skyes te/ pa tha mi dad pas tha mi dad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go /tha mi dad pa'i chos

rnams la tha dad pa'i ye shes kyi dbang yongs su ston to/ /pa brjod du pa dag kyang sgrib pa pa'i dbyings su non par byed do/ /dmigs pa chung ngus kyang mtha' yas par bstan pa'i sa la yongs su 'jug go /chos nyid tshad

pa yang chung ba'am/ che bar khong du chud par byed do/ /'jig rten thams cad kyang rnam par pa dang mnyam par rab tu rtogs par byed do/ /chos kyi pa thams cad dang / rnam par shes pa'i rgyud thams cad kyang bsgoms pas khong du chud par byed

do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba brgyad pa ye shes kyi sgo kun nas rnam par dpyad pas yongs su 'grub pa 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub

sems dpa'i skye ba dgu ba chos kyi dbyings sprul pas brgyan par byed pa'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi skad cig thams cad la rgyan sna tshogs dang / rgyan du mar ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis rlob

ste/ sprul pa thams cad la mi 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa thob pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa thams cad la shin tu mkhas par gyur pa yin/ chos kyi sprul pa la 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings dam pa chags pa med pa'i

spyod yul dang ldan pa yin/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi lus rnam par par bya ba'i byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pa yin/ sems can gdul ba la mkhas pa bsam gyis khyab pa dang ldan pa yin/ spyod pa sna tshogs kyi mngon par

'tshang rgya ba yongs su ston pa yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sgrib pa pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin/ de'i rgyud kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la mkhas pa yongs su ston pa yin/ sems can mtha' dang dbus med pa gdul ba'i

thabs mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes dbyig tu bya ba'i mdzod dang ldan pas sems can gdul ba'i dus la bab na rtag tu sta gon du gnas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems

dpa'i skye ba dgu pa chos kyi dbyings sprul pas brgyan pa byed pa'i snying po zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bcu pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i shugs drag po'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di

la byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rang bzhin gcig pa'i yul la dbang bskur ba yin te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dab chags pa'i yul la rab tu 'jug pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi

mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i shi 'pho dang / skye ba'i sems rgyud chags par 'byung ba yang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes 'dab chags pa'i yul yang rab tu shes so/ /'das pa dang ma byon pa dang de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'dab chags pa yang rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad kyi rgyud 'dab chags pa la mkhas par bya ba yang rab tu shes so/ /bskal pa 'jig pa dang 'du ba thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i

mtha' dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyang dang bcas/ sa tshigs dang bcas par 'dab chags par rab tu shes so/ /sems can tshul ji lta bur yongs su smyin par byas pa dang / dus la gang du bab pa rnams la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i

rgyan dang / rnam par 'tshang rgya bas gdul bar bya ba yongs su bstan pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes kyang mngon par sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i drung du nye bar 'gro zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la mkhas

pa'i tshul 'dab chags pa yang / sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa gdul ba'i thabs mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pas yongs su ston te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bcu

ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i shugs drag po'i snying po zhes bya ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bcu rnams te/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams skye bar 'gyur ba'o/ /

'byung bar 'gyur ba'o/ /yang dag par sgrub par byed pa'o/ /yang dag par 'phel bar byed pa'o/ /rab tu rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /yongs su grub par byed pa'o/ /zhing ma lus pa thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir rgyan gcig gi lhab lhub la rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyud rnam pa sna

tshogs kyi byin gyis rlob pa'o/ /sems can gyi khams gdul ba rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par byin gyi rlabs kyis rgyun 'chad pa par byed pa'o/ /chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi pa sna tshogs dang / shin

tu bstan pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa sna tshogs du ma rnam pa tha dad pa dang / chos mtha' yas pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rgyun mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa chos kyi dbyings kyis

klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa yongs su ston pa'o/ /sems can tshad med pa spyod pa rgya mtsho sna tshogs dang ldan pa yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul bas yongs su 'dul ba rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yongs

su bstan pa'o/ /sems can gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mi 'bral bar byin gyis rlob pa'o/ /chos thams cad kyi sprin dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho brjod du med pas rnam par dag pa pa thams cad las rab tu 'byung

ba rnam par par byed pa'o/ /tshad med par rnam par spyod pa la bsgribs pa med par rtogs pas khong du chud pa rnams chos yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bsam pa dang / mos pa gang dang ldan pa'i

tshul bzhin du sems can rnams la yongs su ston pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba rnams 'jig rten thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i don du chos kyi mdzod mtha' dang dbus med pa rab tu ston pa'o/ /de nas lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha

mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyis/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi don 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor la

tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dri med rnyog pa med pa yis/ /gang rnams rgyal ba blta bas nam yang mi ngoms shing / /rgyal ba kun gyi phyi ma'i mtha' yi rgyan sprin la/ /smon pa'i mkhas pa de dag skye ba'i thog ma gnas/ /dus

gsum byung ba'i 'jig rten ma lus kun bkang ste/ /zhing dang sems can de bzhin chos dang sangs rgyas rnams/ /sems can dgrol phyir smon lam 'debs pas brgyan pa'i sems/ /de ni bsam gyis khyab rnams kyi skye ba gnyis/ /gang rnams

chos kyi sprin 'thung nam yang mi ngoms shing / /nges par rtogs pa'i yid kyis dus gsum chags med lus/ /mkha' dbyings dri med mnyam med sems kyi lus ldan pa/ /mtshungs pa med pa de ni de dag skye ba gsum/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa ri rab rdo rje mtshungs

bstan pas/ /thams cad mkhyen tshul rgya mtshor rnam par 'jug byed cing / /gang rnams snying rje chen po'i gang chen mtshor 'jug pa/ /de ni skyes bu khyu mchog rnams kyi skye ba bzhi/ /gang rnams byams pas phyogs bcu rgyas par yongs bkang zhing / /

pha rol phyin pa dri med rgya mtsho mngon bsgrubs te/ /chos kyi 'od 'gyed 'gro ba yongs su smyin byed pa/ /de ni skyes bu chen po de dag skye ba lnga/ /chos kyi rang bzhin rab tu rtogs pas chags med sems/ /dus gsum dpe zla med pa'i

sangs rgyas rigs byung zhing / /gang rnams chos dbyings rgya mtsho'i tshul la 'jug byed pa/ /'di ni mkhas pa de dag skye ba yangs pa drug /gang rnams chos lus yongs dag chags pa med pa'i sems/ /zhing rnams ma lus rang gi lus kyis dgang

byas shing / /sangs rgyas stobs rnams ma lus khong du chud rtogs pa/ /de ni mkhas pa rnams kyi skye ba bsam yas bdun/ /gang rnams ye shes rgya mtsho'i tshul la dbang ldan zhing / /thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo tshul rnam par dpyod byed la/ /ting

'dzin kun tshul gang chen mtsho la yongs 'jug pa/ /de ni de bzhin nyid rten rnams kyi skye ba brgyad/ /gang rnams zhing kun 'byam klas yongs su sbyor byed cing / /sems can thams cad yongs su smyin byed 'dul la rab brtson la/ /sangs rgyas

rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan rnams rnam ston pa/ /de ni grags pa chen po rnams kyi skye ba dgu/ /gang rnams rgyal ba'i stobs rnams ji bzhin rab zhugs te/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i shugs drag yangs pa rnam spel cing / gang rnams chos dbyings

gzhi tshul tha dad chags med pa/ /de ni rgyal sras rnams kyi skye ba bcu yin no/ /rigs kyi bu skye ba bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye'o/ /de ltar na 'jig rten thams cad la snang bar byed pa yin no/ /

rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba bskal pa tshad med par pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa thob pa'o/ /smras pa/ 'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba bskal

pa tshad med par pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi skye ba yongs su lta zhing / nye bar 'gro ba'i smon

lam yongs su grub pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi skye ba rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa la 'jug cing khong du chud pa ste/ 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba

khong du chud par byed cing / gling bzhi pa skul ba dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i gling de'i lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba yongs su blta ba'i don du sngon gyi smon lam gyis skyes te/ da ltar kho mo 'di na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i rjes

su dran pa sgom zhing rnam par spyod do/ /de ltar kho mo 'di na gnas gnas te/ de phan chad lo brgya na bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'pho bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/ lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir sngon gyi ltas bcu byung bar gyur te/ bcu

gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad mthon dman med la/ ngam grog dang / g.yang sa med cing mnyam par gnas par gyur ba 'di ni sngon gyi ltas dang po byung ba'o/ /yang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad gseg

ma dang / gyo mo med la sdom dum dang tsher ma dang bral te/ sa'i gzhi rdo rje las grub par gyur nas/ rin po che mang pos yongs su gang bar gnas par gyur pa 'di ni sngon gyi ltas gnyis pa byung ba'o/ /yang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams

cad rin po che thams cad kyi shing dang sA la dang / ta la'i phreng bas rnam par 'khrigs pas yongs su brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur pa 'di ni sngon gyi ltas gsum pa byung ba'o/ /yang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad lha rdzas las kyang

'das pa'i spos kyi myu gu kun nas 'thon pa dang / phye ma thams cad kyi mdzod kun nas 'thon pa dang / rgyal mtshan thams cad kyi sprin dang na bun yongs su byung ba dang / spos kyi rin po che'i gzugs kyi shing drung kun 'khor te/ rgyan yongs

su sbyangs par kun nas gnas par gyur pa 'di ni sngon gyi ltas bzhi pa byung ba'o/ /yang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / lhab lhub sna tshogs kyis mdzod rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rgyas pa dang ldan par kun nas

gnas par gyur pa 'di ni sngon gyi ltas lnga pa byung ba'o/ /yang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad kyi shing thams cad la nor bu rin po che dam pa'i mdzod mngon par grub par gyur ba 'di ni sngon gyi las drug pa byung ba'o/ /yang lum pi ni'i nags tshal 'di

thams cad kyi pad+mo'i tshal thams cad du cha las skyes pa'i me tog thams cad kyang kha 'bus te/ sa'i gzhi las 'thon nas/ chu las mngon par 'phags par gnas pa 'di ni sngon gyi ltas bdun pa byung ba'o/ /yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i

'dod pa la spyod pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po

dang / 'gro ba'i dbang po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di na thal mo sbyar cing 'khod par gyur te/ 'di ni sngon gyi ltas brgyad pa byung ba'o/ /yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha'i bu mo'am/ klu'i

bu mo'am/ gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod pa'i rnam pa thams cad lag na thogs shing blag

sha'i yal ga la mngon tu bltas te/ 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar 'khod par gyur ba 'di ni sngon gyi ltas dgu pa byung ba'o/ /yang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dag nas byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par

'phrul pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'od zer mang po 'thon te/ lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad snang bar byas nas gnas par gyur te/ 'od zer gyi sgo'i dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi skye bas rnam

par 'phrul pa gzugs brnyan du gyur par snang ba dang / thog ma bltam pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang bcas par byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyangs dang ldan par 'od zer gyi sgo'i dkyil 'khor de dag las

sgrar 'thon cing grags par gyur pa 'di ni sngon gyi ltas bcu pa byung ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/ sngon gyi ltas bcu po de dag byung bar gyur te/ de byung bas 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'

'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo sngon gyi ltas bcu po de dag mthong bas kyang dga' ba'i shugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu thob bo/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang lha mo sgyu ma grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas nas byung ba'i tshe/

lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir sngon gyi ltas snang ba chen po bcu byung bar gyur te/ de dag byung bas sems can tshad med pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi snang bas dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sa'i steng na

gnas pa'i rin po che'i khang ba brtsegs pa thams cad du snang ba rab tu byung ngo / /rin po che'i pad+mo kha ma bye ba kha 'bye bar gyur pa'i 'dab ma thams cad las snang ba rab tu byung ste/ bltam pa legs par bltam mo zhes bya ba'i sgra snyan pa yang de dag las byung bar

gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thog ma sems bskyed pa'i snang ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang / lum pi ni'i nags tshal 'dir snang bar byas te mngon par shar to/ /phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams

byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su gnon pa'i snang ba rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung ngo / /phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su sgrub cing / ye shes khong

du chud pa'i snang ba 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags

tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam rgya chen po mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams

sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul bar byed pa'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi ye shes

khong du chud pa'i snang ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / skye ba dang mngon par 'byung ba dang / byang chub tu rnam

bar 'tshang rgya ba dang / ye shes thugs su chud par mdzad pa'i snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to/ /sngon gyi ltas snang ba chen po bcu po de dag rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de dag gis sems can mtha'

dang dbus pa'i sems dang / bsam pa'i mun pa thibs po thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar byas so/ /rigs kyi bu de la lha mo sgyu ma shing blag sha'i nags su phyin pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po 'dus pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu lha'i bu'i

tshogs dang / lha'i bu mo 'khor dang bcas te 'dus pa thams cad dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i lha'i bu dri nga ba med pa thams cad dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'khor dang bcas te/

tshogs pa byang chub sems dpa' la mchod par brtson pa thams cad kyi lus dang / mchod pa'i tshogs thams cad kyang lha mo sgyu ma'i gzi brjid dang dpal dang kha dog dang gzugs kyis rab tu snang bar byas so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams

'di na 'od gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan to/ /lha mo sgyu ma'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas byung ba'i 'od dang snang ba dag ni 'od gzhan gyis nyams par gyur ba med/ bsgribs par gyur pa med/ chod par gyur

pa / thogs par gyur pa de/ des phyogs thams cad rgyas par bkang nas sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang / srid pa'i

lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byas te/ lhag ge lham me lhang nger gnas par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa/

lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba dang po'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe lha mo sgyu ma'i lus su stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di chud cing gzugs brnyan 'byung ba snang bar gyur pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi

khams kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya'i 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi rgyal po'i gnas ming sna tshogs dang ldan pa sha stag dang / nags tshal gyi ming sna tshogs dang ldan pa sha stag dang / shing drung rnam pa tha dad pa sha stag

tu'ang lha mo sgyu ma phyin cing / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis yongs su bskor te/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba la sta gon du sdod cing / byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam pa 'di bzhin du snang

bar gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba gnyis pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang lha mo sgyu ma'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re la yang sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod

pa mnga' ba'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur te/ rim gror mdzad pa dang / bsti stang dang bkur stir mdzad de mchod pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su snang bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos

ji snyed cig bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang ba spu'i bu ga de dag nas sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan lag dang ldan par ma lus par grags par gyur te/ dper na/ chu'i phor bu chung ngu 'am/ bser gyi rdul phra mo'am/ me long gi dkyil 'khor shin

tu gsal ba'am/ chu shin tu dang ba la nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor gnyi zla dang / gza' skar gyi tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa dang / sprin gyi tshogs 'brug sgra zab mo 'byin pa can yang gzugs brnyan du gyur par snang ngo / /rigs kyi bu de bzhin du lha mo sgyu

ma'i ba spu'i sgo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la'ang / sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams kyang yongs su snang / chos bstan pa'i sgra thams cad kyang grags par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par

'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba gsum pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang lha mo sgyu ma'i lus thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang zhing ji snyed cig dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ji snyed cig dang /

'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa ji snyed cig dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud ji snyed cig dang / 'jig rten khams kyi ming du bya ba ji snyed cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad de/ zhing gi gzhi ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par

gyur pa dang / dbyibs ni ci 'dra ba dang / rgyan ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur pa dang / lhun ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur pa dang / ri'i rgyan ni ji lta bu dag cig yod par gyur pa dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul dang / ljongs dang / grong rdal gyi rgyan

ni ji lta bu dag cig gnas gnas pa dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / mtsho dang / lu ma dang / rgya mtsho'i rgyan ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur pa dang / nam mkha' dang sprin gyi rgyan ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur pa dang / sems can gyi gnas ni ji lta bu zhig yod par gyur pa

dang / theg pa bstan pa ni gang dang yang ldan par gyur pa dang / bskal pa'i dang grangs ji snyed cig ces bya bar gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas skye ba ni ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa dang / rnam par dag pa ni gang du 'du bar gyur pa dang / sems can gyi tshe'i tshad ni ji tsam

zhig dang ldan par gyur pa dang / 'jig rten gyi skye gnas ni gang du skyes par gyur pa dang / sems can ji lta bu zhig dang 'grogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni ji lta bu zhig la brten brten pa dang / dge ba'i chos ni ji lta bu zhig la brtson par spyod

spyod pa dang / chos kyi nan tan ni ji lta bu zhig la brtson par byas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod spyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang yongs su snang bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyir ldog pa'i gnas brnyes nas/ sdon sku ni ji snyed

cig /rnam par spyod pa ji lta bu zhig /cha byad ni ji lta bu zhig /longs su spyod pa ni ci dang ldan/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni ji lta bu zhig sku nyams su bzhes/ sku tshe'i rgyud ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur te/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa

spyad par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas yongs su snang bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi skye gnas de dang / de dag tu lha mo sgyu ma byang chub sems dpa'i yum du gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sku de dag

thams cad kyang / lha mo sgyu ma'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan byung bar gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa/ lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba bzhi pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan

yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon sku ni ji snyed cig gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa dang / kha dog ni ji lta bu zhig dbyibs ni ci 'dra ba zhig /cha byad ni ji lta bu zhig /da rod ni ji lta bu zhig /longs spyod ni ci dang ldan/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni

ji lta bu zhig sku nyams su bzhes/ sku tshe'i rgyud ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang lha mo sgyu ma'i lus kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad las gzugs brnyan du snang bar gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam

par 'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba lnga pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ gtang bar dka' ba yongs su btang ste/ zhabs dang phyag yongs su btang ba'am/

snyan dang shangs yongs su btang ba'am/ ljags dang tshems yongs su btang ba'am/ spyan dang dbu yongs su btang ba'am/ sha dang khrag yongs su btang ba'am/ rus pa dang rkang yongs su btang ba'am/ mkhal ma dang thugs yongs su

btang ba'am/ pags pa dang phri yongs su btang ba'am/ phyi nang gi dngos po yongs su btang ba'am/ sras po dang sras mo dang btsun mo yongs su btang ba'am/ sku yongs su btang ba'am/ longs spyod rin po che yongs su btang ba'am/ grong dang grong khyer

dang ljongs dang / yul dang khams dang / rgyal po'i gnas yongs su btang ba'am/ nor dang 'bru dang mdzod dang bang ba yongs su btang ba'am/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / baiDUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul yongs su

btang ba'am/ rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs yongs su btang ba'am/ mal cha yongs su btang ba'am/ khang pa dang gzhal med khang yongs su btang ba'am/ yo byad yongs su btang ba'am/ de ltar gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs

dang / rnam pa ji lta bur yongs su btang bar gyur pa dang / len pa de dag kyang rnam pa ji ltu bus len par gyur pa dang / sbyin pa'i dngos po rnam pa ji lta bu dag yongs su btang bar gyur pa dang / yul gyi phyogs gang dag tu yongs su btang bar gyur

pa dang / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor du gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / lha mo sgyu ma'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad las gzugs brnyan du snang bar gyur to/ /slongs mo ba'i sgra de dag kyang grag par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems

dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba drug pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sngon gyi mtha'i rgyud du byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yum gyi sku nas bltams par gyur pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang /

lhab lhub ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa dang / sems can gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba dang / bza' shing gi rgyan rnam par phye ba dang / me tog dang bdug pa dang / spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang / na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /

ba dan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba dang / rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan rnam par phye ba dang / rol mo dang glu dang / bstod pa dang / sil snyan gyi sgra ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / lha mo sgyu ma lum bi

ni'i nags tshal du phyin pa'i tshe/ lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir yongs su byung bar gyur to/ /mngon par skyes so/ /'gro bas rnam par su yod par byung bar gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par

'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba bdun pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod lha'i dbang po thams cad kyi gnas kyi rgyan gyi longs spyod las yongs su 'das pa dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang /

nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi'i dbang po thams cad kyi gnas kyi rgyan gyi longs spyod las 'das pa 'di lte ste/ rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i longs spyod dam/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i

gzhal med khang gi longs spyod dam/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i dra ba'i longs spyod dam/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i 'bru'i longs spyod dam/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i gzugs kyi longs spyod dam/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi longs spyod dam/ spos kyi rgyal po thams cad kyi longs spyod dam/

pa thams cad bzang zhing 'thun pa'i longs spyod kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad lha mo sgyu ma'i rum nas ma 'dres par 'thon te/ lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di yongs su brgyan cing kun nas gnas par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub

sems dpa' skye ba rnam par 'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba brgyad pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang lha mo sgyu ma'i lus las byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed

bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / sku gzugs dang sku mdog dang / dbyibs 'dra ba mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan gyis 'dra bar brgyan pa dang / 'od 'dra ba dang / 'od zer 'dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa/ tshul dang 'gros stabs 'dra ba/ rtsal dang mthu

'dra ba/ rnam par snang ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba 'thun pa/ 'khor 'dra ba/ rgyan mtshungs pa mang po yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi legs pa rgya mtsho yongs su brjod cing 'thun par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par

'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba dgu ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bltam par gyur pa'i dus la bab pa dang / lha mo sgyu ma'i mdun du 'og gi rdo rje'i gzhi las sa chen po mngon par brtol te/ rin po che'i rgyal po

pad+mo chen po rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi dam pa zhes byang chub rin po che'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rdo rje chen po las grub pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i nang rim dang ldan pa/ ze ba'i rtse mo rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyis brgyan

pa/ 'dab ma'i phreng ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis brgyan cing shin tu rnam par phye ba/ lo ma'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyis byas pa/ snying po mdzes pa rin po che yid bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa dang

ldan pa/ ze ba'i phreng ba rnam par phye ba dang / rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po grangs med pa'i dra ba'i rgyan dang ldan pas yongs su yog pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje mthu bo ches mi shigs pas lhun

kun nas bkab pa/ lha'i ris thams cad kyis kun nas bskor ba/ klu'i dbang po thams cad kyis spos chu'i sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad kyis kun nas bskor cing lha rdzas kyi me tog snyim pa nas gtor ba/

dri za'i dbang po thams cad kyis sngon gyi sangs rgyas la rim gror byas pa'i glu'i dbyangs snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro dang sbyar te bstod pa'i sprin gyis mngon par bstod pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thams cad kyis nga rgyal dang rlom pa dang /

dregs pa thams cad btang zhing shin tu btud de phyag bya ba/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po thams cad kyis rin po che'i snam bu kun tu spyangs te/ nam mkha' kun nas brgyan par bya ba/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan

yongs su brjod cing rol mo dang glu'i dbyangs la brtson pa dang / nyams rab tu bde bas kun nas blta ba/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po thams cad kyis shin tu dga' ba dang / mos pa skyes pas yongs su blta zhing sgra snyan pa phyung ste/ rgyan gyi sprin

thams cad kyi char mngon par dbab pa byung bar gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba bcu pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa bcu po de dag

lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung bar gyur nas/ de'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' 'od tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga' ba/ blta na gtang bra ba zhig lha mo sgyu ma'i rum nas bltam ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings rum nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor

shar ba lta/ sprin gyi tshogs rum nas glog gi phreng ba 'gyu ba lta/ ri chen po'i spo rum nas nyi ma shar ka'i sprin ko lta/ mun pa stug rum nas sgron ma chen po byung ba lta ste/ mngon par bltam par gyur to/ /de ltar byang chub

sems dpa' lha mo sgyu ma'i lus las gzugs brnyan ltar bstan pa'i chos nyid dang / rmi lam ltar bstan pa'i chos nyid dang / sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i gzugs rnam par pa ltar bstan pa'i chos nyid dang / 'gro ba dang 'ong ba pa'i chos

nyid dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i 'od rnam par pa yongs su bstan pa'i chos nyid kyis mngon par 'byung ba yongs su bstan to/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni lum bu ni'i nags tshal 'di na gnas shing / bcom ldan

'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku tshe'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la lta zhing khong du chud par byed de/ rigs kyi bu kho mo gling bzhi pa skal ba dang ldan pa 'di la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku tshe'i rnam par 'phrul pa la lta zhing khong du

chud par bya bar gnas pa de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad kyi 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya thams cad na'ang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sku tshe'i rnam par

'phrul pa bye ba phrag brgya la lta zhing khong du chud par byed do/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dus pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rdul shin tu phra ba la 'jug

pa'i ye shes kyis khong du chud pa dag tu yang sems kyi skad cig re re la sems kyis khong du chud par bya ba re res bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku tshe'i rnam par 'phrul pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la ltazhing khong

du chud par byed do/ /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag las sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang de dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par

'phrul pa la lta zhing khong du chud par byed de/ tshul de lta bus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad la lta zhing /

khong du chud par byed kyang / rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi rdul re re la zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i mtha' rnyed par ma rung ngo / /zhing thams cad kyi zhing re rer byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa

yang mu rnyed par ma rung ngo / /ji ltar kho mo 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' skye ba rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad la lta zhing khong du chud par byed pa/ de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /

rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad la'ang sems kyi skad cig re re'i sems kyi khong du chud par bya ba re re la/ byin gyi rlabs rgyun mi chad pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad la lta zhing khong du chud par byed do/ /

de skad ces smras pa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba

bskal pa tshad par dmigs pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa 'di rnyed nas yun ji srid cig lags/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba'i rdul

shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol de'i yang pha snga zhig tu 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas rin po che zhes bya bar bskal pa mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu byung ba la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas rin po che zhes bya ba der gling bzhi ba dbu ma rgyan sna tshogs kyi 'od ces bya ba byung ste/ gling bzhi pa de'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su rgyal po'i gnas ri rab rnam

par dag pa'i rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byung ste/ rgyal po'i gnas der rgyal po rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i mig gi 'od ces bya ba byung ngo / /rgyal po rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i mig gi 'od de la btsun mo rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya

ba mnga'o/ /rigs kyi bu dper na/ gling bzhi pa skal ba dang ldan pa 'di'i 'dzam bu'i gling du lha mo sgyu ma bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi yum du gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe/ de'i dus na gling bzhi pa rgyan sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi 'dzam bu'i gling

du'ang rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi yum du gyur te/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu bskal pa'i dang po la

byung ste/ thog mar byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi yum du gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang bsgyur ba de byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i dus

la bab pa dang / bud med khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu dang lhan cig tu bza' shing gi ra ba chen po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gser gyi me tog ces bya ba der phyin te/ dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gzhon nu de yang byang chub

sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas de ltar bltam mo/ de'i tshe bza' shing gi ra ba chen po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gser gyi me tog ces bya ba de'i dbus su pho brang brtsegs pa rin po che sna tshogs bzang po las

brtsegs pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ pho brang brtsegs pa de'i nang du shing 'dod pa thams cad 'byin pa'i yal ga la 'ju ste/ lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang bsgyur ba las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug gi yon

tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan bltam mo/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bltam khar/ ma ma dri ma med pa skyed pa'i 'od ces bya ba sta gon du gnas gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de bltam par gyur ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi dbang po

rnams kyis spos dri shin tu zhim pa'i spos chu'i bum pa/ me tog dri zhim zhing yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs mngon par 'thor bas sku bsil te/ de la tshul dang mthun pa'i mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab la grangs med pa mchog tu bya bas mchod nas ma ma dri ma med

pa skyed pa'i 'od kyi pang du bzhag go /ma ma des byang chub sems dpa' pang du blangs ma thag tu/ de'i mod la ma ma de dga' ba dang mos pa'i shugs chen po thob par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yul kun tu lta ba zhes

bya ba thob par gyur to/ /de thob par gyur ma thag tu des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med

par pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa 'di la'ang shin tu phra ba'i tshul gyis zhugs par gyur te/ de ni dper na/ ma'i mngal du zhugs ma thag pa'i rnam par shes pa lta bu'o/ /rnam

par thar pa de thob par gyur pas kyang / des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa/ yang dag par blta ba'i smon lam chen po yang mngon par bsgrubs so/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na

byang chub sems dpa'i ma ma dri ma med pas bskyed pa'i 'od ces bya ba byung bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i ma ma dri ma med pa skyed pa'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to/ /

rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bud khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu byung bar gyur pa de dag gzhan dag cig yin pa tsam du sems na yang de ltar mi blta ste/ lha mo khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu po lum bi ni'i nags tshal na gnas

pa kho mo'i 'khor du gyur pa 'di dag yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gzhon nu'i yum rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig

yin pa tsam du sems na'ang de ltar mi blta ste/ lha mo sgyu ma 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i lha mor gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i

gi 'od ces bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na yang de ltar mi blta ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i gi 'od ces bya bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni de phyin cad du bcom ldan 'das

rnam par snang mdzad kyi byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la lta zhing khong du chud par byed pa dang / sems can rnam par 'dul ba'i khyu mchog gi mthus rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la lta zhing khong du chud par byed pa dang / skad

cig thams cad du bral bar ma gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ni mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rdul shin tu phra ba

thams cad na yod pa la sems kyi skad cig thams cad du rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad las yongs su 'dal ba'i ye shes kyi mig gis lta zhing khong du chud par byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba

rgya mtsho dag kyang lta zhing khong du chud par byed la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho chen po dag la yang lta zhing khong du chud par byed pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dang sems can rnam par gdul ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung bas/ rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho thams cad la'ang / sems kyi skad cig thams cad du lta zhing khong du chud par byed do/ /ji

ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rdul shin tu phra ba 'byam klas pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug pas byang chub sems dpa' skye ba ma nor bar mngon du gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la zhugs

par gyur pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'byam klas pa thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i zhing rgya mtsho thams cad

la'ang 'jug ste/ de dag tu'ang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa la 'jug go /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpar gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams kyang mngon du gyur par

lta'o/ /de bzhin gshegs par gyur nas kyang mchod pa byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las kyang chos bstan pa nyan to/ /chos la yang gnyer ba'i chos kyi nan tan du byed do/ /de nas lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid

kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyis de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med par pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa 'di gsal bar bstan pa'i

phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu'i rnam par bltas te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rim gro bskyed cing nga la gang 'dri ba/ /de dag bdag las rgyal ba'i sras nyon cig /rgyal ba'i spyod yul blta dka' zhi ba ste/ /

rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshul gyis rnam par bstan/ /zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran rab snyed kyi/ /sngon gyi bskal pa bsam gyis khyab dran/ /bskal pa'i ming ni snga phyi mnyam zhes bya/ /de la rgyal ba bye ba brgyad cu byung / /bskal ba'i dang por de bzhin

gshegs byung ba/ /dbang phyug yon tan mi thub rgyal mtshan no/ /nags tshal dam pa gser mdog me tog tu/ /mgon po de 'khrungs dag gis mthong bar gyur/ /du dri skyed pa'i 'od ces bya/ /de yi ma ma mkhas par bdag gyur te/ /

bltam ma thag tu gser mdog dam pa'i 'od/ /'jig rten dbang pos bdag gi pang du bzhag /gang zag dam pa pang du bzhag tshe yang / /de yi spyi gtsug blta bar mi nus te/ /bsam yas de la g.yas dang g.yon du yang / /bltas shing

mtha' rnyed mthong bar ma gyur to/ /mtshan rab bzang pos de ni yongs su brgyan/ /dri med de sku blta na rab sdug ste/ /rin chen gzugs 'dra bdag gis mthong gyur nas/ /dga' ba'i shugs drag mtshungs rnam par 'phel/ /de yi

yon tan dpag yas sems sems nas/ /kho mo'i bsod nams rgya mtsho dpag med 'phel/ /de yi rnam 'phrul rgya mtsho mthong gyur nas/ /rgya chen byang chub sems kyang skyes par gyur/ /rgyal ba'i legs pa rgya mtsho dga' smon nas/ /

smon lam rgya mtsho bdag gis rab tu bskyed/ /'byam klas zhing rnams thams cad rnam par sbyangs/ /ngan song lam rnams kun kyang rnam par bzlog /zhing rnams 'byam klas kun gyi bde gshegs rnams/ /ma byon

bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa dang / /sems can sdug bsngal rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir/ /smon lam rgya mtsho kho mos btab par gyur/ /mgon po de las bdag gis chos thos nas/ /rnam thar dam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di yang thob/ /bskal pa

zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul snyed du/ /spyad pa spyad de de yang rnam par sbyangs/ /de la mgon po ji snyed byung gyur pa/ /de dag ma lus bdag gis kun kyang mchod/ /rnam thar rgya mtsho 'di ni sbyong byed cing / /de dag bstan pa kho mos yongs su bzung / /zhing

rnams bye ba'i rdul phran rab snyed kyi/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba ji snyed 'das byung ba/ /de dag chos kyi 'khor lo kho mos bzung / /rnam thar dkyil 'khor 'di yang rab tu bsgoms/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul phran ji snyed pa/ /rdul rtse 'byam klas kun

la rnam par mthong / /rdul phran re re la yang rgya mtsho'i zhing / /sngon chad rgyal bas sbyangs pa rab tu mthong / /zhing rnams 'byam klas de dag kun tu yang / /mgon po thugs rgyud gcig la bsam yas pa'i/ /rnam 'phrul yangs pa yongs su ston

mdzad cing / /nags tshal mchog tu 'khrungs gyur bdag gis mthong / /rgyal ba la la zhing rnams la la na/ /byang chub dam par 'tshang rgya thugs dgongs shing / /dga' ldan 'jig rten nyid na bzhugs pa yang / /zhing rnams bye ba bsam

gyis mi khyab pa/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i dbyings su rnam 'phrul pa/ /shin tu yangs pa skye ba'ang bdag gis mthong / /na chung dam pa'i tshogs kyi dbus bzhugs shing / /mgon po chos rnams ston pa'angade bzhin mthong / /zhing rnams bye ba'i

rdul phran rab snyed kyi/ /dpa' bo sems kyi skad cig re re la/ /mngon par 'byung zhing shing rgyal drung gshegs dang / /sangs rgyas spyod yul yangs pa ston pa mthong / /zhing gcig rdul la bsam gyis mi khyab par/ /yul rnams gzhan dang gzhan

dag ston mdzad pas/ /'gro rgyud sems can sdug bsngal sgrol mdzad cing / /mi gtso rnam par 'tshang rgya bdag gis mthong / /rdul phran re re'i rtse la mi zad pa'i/ /rang 'byung 'khor lo rab tu bskor mdzad cing / /dbyangs rnams rgya mtsho mi zad

sgrog mdzad pa/ /chos sprin rgya chen char 'bebs mdzad pa mthong / /'gro ba kun la rnam pa du mar yang / /skad cig re rer mya ngan 'das ston pa/ /zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran rab snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas zhing gcig rdul las bdag gis

mthong / /rdul gcig bltas kyang zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang / /rgyal ba 'byung ba ji snyed kun kyang mthong / /tshe rabs kun tu lus mang khrag khrig gis/ /de dag mchod pa'i don du nye bar phyin/ /zhing tshul rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /

'gro rgyud mi zad ji snyed yod pa yi/ /'gro ba kun la mngon du kho mo ni/ /chos sprin yangs pa'i char yang rab tu 'bebs/ /rgyal sras kho mos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /rnam thar dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di shes kyi/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag

khrig bsam yas su/ /thams cad bstan pa kho mos nus re skan/ /rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med par pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul ba yongs su ston

pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi skad cig re re la bskal pa thams cad du zhugs pa'i mngal nas yongs su byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi tshul thams cad nges par rtogs pa'i skye ba rab tu ston pa/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i smon lam gyis bsam pa yongs su bskyed pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba la rab tu gzhol ba/ sems can thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud kyi lam yongs

su bstan pa la gzugs brnyan lta bur gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du pad+mo'i nang nas skye ba 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba'i dus la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad gdul ba la mngon par mos shing

tsher skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa/ zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin yongs su ston pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi lam gyi rgyud du skye ba dang / rigs su gzugs brnyan byung bar gyur pa de dag gi spyod pa shes

pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas 'di na shAkya'i bu mo go ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir/

'khor ba na 'khor bar bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyi rkang ba gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lum bi ni'i nags tshal

gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ /lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyi drung nas song ngo // //

sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po bcu bzhi ba/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyi drung nas song ste/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas

gang na ba der phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med par pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa de nyid bsgom pa dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / rgya cher bya ba dang /

nan tan du bya ba dang / shin tu sbyang ba dang / yongs su bsam pa dang / rnam par dbye ba byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'gro ba'i khang ba chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od gang na ba der song ngo / /der 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems

dpa' yongs su bgro ba'i khang pa'i lha mo mya ngan pa'i dpal zhes bya ba de la khyim gyi lha mo stong phrag bcu dang bcas bsu nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /skyes bu chen po shes rab dang / ye shes chen pos rnam

par gnon pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba bsam gyis khyab pa sgom pa la lhag par pa'i smon lam gyi sems dang ldan pa/ chos yangs pa'i gzhal med khang gi spyod yul la spyod pa/ chos kyi grong khyer du mngon par gzhol ba/

byang chub sems dpa'i thabs kyi tshul mtha' yas pas sems can 'dul ba la 'jug pa rgyun mi gcod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba rab tu thob pa/ 'gro ba thams cad rnam par gdul pa la rab tu snang ba'i spobs pa dang /

ye shes mngon du gyur ba sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa shes pa'i lus kyis 'gro zhing rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i spyod pa la mngon du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi dga' ba rgya mtsho'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i smon

lam dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba'i lam du zhugs pa/ khyod byon pa legs so/ /mig phyir glan pa pas spyod pa dang / spyod lam zab cing rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul can khyod la bltas na/

khyod ni ring po thogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa bla na pa rab tu thob ste/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rab tu brgyan pa'i lus dang stobs bcu'i ye shes snang bas

brgyan pa'i sems kyis 'jig rten du rnam par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyi brtson 'grus dang rnam par gnon pa la bltas na/ khyod ni ring po mi thogs par dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur bar mthong ba dang ldan zhing / de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos zhi ba dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang gi dga' ba myong ba dang / sangs

rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa zab mor chud par 'gyur ro/ /de yang de ltar khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / blta ba dang bsnyen bkur ba dang / gdams ngag ma nor bar blang ba dang / de'i yon tan la nan tan du bya ba'i tshul la brtson

par byed pas yongs su mi skyo/ phyir mi ldog /sgyid lug par mi 'gyur te/ khyod la bgegs sam/ bar du gcod pa'am/ sgrib pa gang gis kyang tshugs te/ bdud dam bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha rnams kyang mdun na gnas pa med pas

de'i phyir khyod ni ring por mi thogs par sems can thams cad dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'gro ba'i khang pa'i lha mo mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad

ces smras so/ /lha mo khyod kyis ji skad du smras pa de ltar 'gyur ro/ /lha mo kho bo ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rnam par zhi bas dga' bar 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi las nyam nga ba'i rnam par smyin pa'i phyir

ldog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bde ba 'grub pa dang / sems can thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las la nan tan tu byed pas dga' ba dam pa nyams su tshor bar 'gyur ro/ /nam sems can de dag las dang nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs

bde ba'i sbyor bas sems rnam par 'khrugs shing ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ba'am/ bde ba'i rgyud na gnas kyang lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal dang yid bde ba sna tshogs nyams su myong bar gyur cing / mi dga' bar gnas pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems

dpa' rnams kyang shin tu yid mi bde bar 'gyur ro/ /lha mo 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi shin tu ngang gis byams pa zhig la bu gcig pa sdug cing yid du 'ong ba zhig bdog par gyur la/ de'i yan lag dang nying lag bcad pa zhig mthong na shin tu ngang gis

byams pa'i phyir rab tu yid mi bde zhing dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /lha mo de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe 'ang sems can rnams las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis ngan song gsum gyi rgyud du lhung ba zhig

mthong na rab tu mi dga' la shin tu nyams mi bde bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe sems can rnams lus dang ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyad pa yang dag par len pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde ba'i rgyud mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur tam/

lha dang mi'i lam gyi rgyud du lus dang sems kyi bde ba nyams su myong ba zhig tu gyur na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' shin tu bde ba dang ldan zhing / nyams bde ba dang yid dga' ba dang / rab tu spro ba dang / dga' ba'i yid nyams su bde ba dang ldan

par 'gyur ro/ /lha mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag gi don gyi phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing don du gnyer ba ma yin te/ 'khor ba'i dga' ba dang / bde ba sna tshogs nyams su myong bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'dod pa'i

khams su gtogs pa'i dga' ba rnam pa tha dad par sna tshogs don du gnyer bas ma yin/ 'du shes dang sems dang lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur ba'i dbang gis ma yin/ kun tu sbyor ba dang / 'ching ba dang / bag la nyal ba

dang / kun nas 'khor ba'i dbang du gyur pas ma yin/ sred pa dang lta ba'i dbang du gyur pas ma yin/ sems can sna tshogs dang 'du zhing 'dzi ba'i dga' ba'i 'du shes kyis sems rnam par 'phel bas ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang

bde ba myong ba yongs su chags pas ma yin/ sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs shing 'khor ba'i rgyud na 'gro ldog pa ma yin gyi/ lha mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho na 'khod cing / sdug bsngal dpag tu

pas shin tu mnar ba rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed cing / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrubs te/ de dag snying rje chen pos smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i shugs kyis sems can yongs su

smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la brtson zhing 'khor ba na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par snang ngo / /de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i don du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrib pa med pa yongs

su tshol zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i smon lam mngon par sgrub bo/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas yongs su skyo ba

de/ de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i zhing mthong na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par sgrub bo/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa'i zhing yongs su sbyong

zhing sems can thams cad kyi skye mched sna tshogs mthong bar gyur pa'i tshe/ chos kyi sku tha dad pa med cing bla na pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir smon lam mngon par sgrub bo/ /sems can rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang sems kun nas nyon mongs pa

dang ldan par mthong na/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi rgyan yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir smon lam mngon par sgrub bo/ /sems can skye mched ma tshang ba dang / sems yongs su ma dag pa mthong na/ sems

can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa yongs su sbyong zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pas yongs su skyo ba med do/ /lha mo de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yongs su skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod

pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la spyod de/ de ltar spyod pa ni lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa yongs su bskyed pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan du gyur pa yin/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la rab tu 'god pa'i phyir pha dang mar gyur pa yin/

byang chub sems dpa'i lam du 'dzud pas ma ma lta bur gyur pa yin/ ngan song gi g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa las bsrung ba'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa'i lha rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba lta bur gyur pa yin/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i phyir mnyan pa chen po

lta bur gyur pa yin/ bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir skyabs su gyur pa yin/ shin tu bsil ba'i rang bzhin nye bar stobs pas gnas su gyur pa yin/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug par byed pas

mu stegs su gyur pa yin/ chos rin po che'i gling du skyel bas mgon byed par gyur pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi me tog gis sems yongs su rgyas par byed pas me tog tu gyur pa yin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'od yangs

pa rab tu 'gyed pas rgyan du gyur pa yin/ kun nas mdzes pas dga' ba dang bde ba dam pa byed pa yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las la nan tan tu byed pas phrad na legs pa yin/ yan lag dam pa rnam pa thams cad du yongs

su tshang ba'i lus dang ldan pas kun tu bzang ba yin/ blta na mthun pa pas gtang mi bra ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa yin/ ye shes kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i phyir 'od byed pa yin/ chos kyi sgron ma 'dzin pa'i phyir snang ba byed pa yin/ byang

chub kyi bsam pa yongs su dag par byed pa'i phyir gsal bar byed pa yin/ bdud kyi las rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir dmag dpon du gyur ba yin/ shes rab kyi 'od gzer gyi dra ba rab tu snang ba 'gyed pa'i phyir nyi mar gyur pa yin/ chos kyi nam

mkha' la blo'i zla ba 'char bar byed pas zla bar gyur pa yin/ 'gro ba thams cad du chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'babs pas sprin du gyur pa yin te/ lha mo de ltar nan tan du byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad

kyi yid du 'ong ba yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bgro ba'i khang pa'i lha mo mya ngan med pa'i dpal khyim gyi lha mo stong phrag bcu dang bcas pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor la lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i me tog dang /

phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / rin po che'i rgyan gyi char yid kyi rang bzhin mngon par phab ste/ kun nas bskor cing rjes su 'brangs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i khang par 'gro ba'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag

gis mngon par bstod do/ /byang chub rdzogs par thugs bskyed cing / /sems can kun la thugs brtse bas/ /rgyal ba ye shes nyi ma rnams/ /bar 'ga' zhig na 'jig rten 'byung / /bskal pa bye ba mang pos kyang / /khyod kyi zhal

mthong shin tu dka'/ /'jig rten ma rig mdongs pa la/ /khyod kyi ye shes gnyi chen yin/ /shes rab rib bsgribs pa yi/ /'jig rten phyin ci log gzigs nas/ /thugs rje chen po rab bskyed de/ /khyod ni rang byung nyid du zhugs/ /khyod kyi dgongs

pa rnam dag pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub don du brtson/ /dge bshes bsnyen bkur bsten mdzad cing / /lus srog phangs par mdzad mi mnga'/ /khyod ni 'jig rten rten mi mnga'/ /'du 'dzi mi mnga' gnas mi mnga'/ /'dres pa ma

mchis mi rten pas/ /dgongs pa thogs med nam mkha' bzhin/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod mdzad cing / /bsod nams dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bas/ /ye shes sgron ma rab 'gyed pa/ /'jig rten tshad med kun tu 'char/ /

'jig rten nas kyang 'phags mi mdzad/ /'jig rten chos kyis yong 'go/ /chags pa med par 'jig rten spyod/ /mkha' la ser bu ji bzhin no/ /bskal pa'i me 'bar me bzhin du/ /rtag tu 'bar bas rab tu brtson/ /me lta bu yi

brtson 'grus kyis/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod par mdzad/ /seng ge bzhin du shin tu dpa'/ /brtson 'grus rnam par gnon pa brtan/ /ye shes rnam par gnon dang ldan/ /gzhan gyis thub pa med par spyod/ /chos dbyings rgya mtsho 'di

dag na/ /rgya mtsho'i tshul rnams ji snyed pa/ /der yang dge bshes bsnyen bkur bas/ /dpa' bo khyod ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bgro ba'i khang pa'i lha mo mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ tshong

dpon gyi bu nor la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de/ de 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin chos 'dod pa'i don du 'brang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bgro ba'i khang pa chos

kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od du phyin te/ nang du song nas shAkya'i bu mo go ba mthong bar 'dod de kun tu bltas na shAkya'i bu mo go pa byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bgro ba'i khang pa chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od kyi

dbus na/ stan rin po che byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gnas snang bar byed pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi pad+mo'i snying po can zhig la bud med rgyal po'i rigs su byung ba/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i skal ba mnyam pa/

sngon sbyin pa'i yongs su bsdu bas shin tu bsdus pa/ tshig snyan cing 'jam par smra ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du/ don mngon du bya bas shin tu bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par

bsgrub pa la don mthun pas shin tu bzung ba/ snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas bu dang bu mo yongs su gzung ba'i tshul bcangs pa/ byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'i rang gi khyim thab kyi rjes su 'brang ba yongs su dag par byas pa/ sngon byang

chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa/ bsam gyis khyab pas yongs su smyin par byas pa/ stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /bud med stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag kyang bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ chags pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'khor

ba'i dga' ba thams cad kyis skyo ba'i yid dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul chags pa med pas yongs su dag pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon du bya ba'i sems kyi shugs dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa dang bar du gcod pa'i dra ba dang bral ba/ chags

pa'i lam thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ chos kyi sku la legs par sprul pas rnam par spyod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la mngon par phyogs pa/ bsod nams rgya mtsho dri ma med pas yongs su byung ba'i

sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis shin tu byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi shugs yangs pas ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis sems rab tu snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa sha

stag go /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor shAkya'i bu mo go pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ shAkya'i bu mo go pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ langs nas mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma

bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor ba na yongs su 'khor yang 'khor ba'i skyon gyis mi gos pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yang khong du chud la nyan

thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mi gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba yang rab tu thob la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rgyun mi gcod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la yang rab tu gnas la de bzhin gshegs pa'i

yul yang yongs su ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad las kyang yongs su 'das la/ 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad du yang nye bar spyod pa dang / chos kyi lus yongs su grub pa dang ldan yang / gzugs kyi

lus kha dog mtha' yas pa'ang mngon par sgrub pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i chos kyi sku la yang rab tu gzhol la 'gro ba thams cad kyi kha dog dang dbyibs kyi lus kyang yongs su ston pa dang / chos thams cad brjod du ma mchis par
yang rab tu rtogs la/ ngag gi lam dang nges pa'i tshig thams cad brjod pas kyang / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sems can thams cad sems can med par yang rab tu shes la/

sems can gyi khams gdul ba'i tshul las kyang ldog pa dang / chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags par yang khong du chud la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i sbyor ba las kyang phyir

ldog pa dang / chos thams cad la las dang rnam par smyin pa ma mchis par yang rtogs la/ dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba'i sbyor ba las kyang / phyir mi ldog pa ma 'tshal to/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / shAkya'i bu mo go pas

tshong dpon gyi bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i chos nyid rnam pa de lta bus dri bar sems pa legs so legs so/ /dri ba brjod pa de dag kyang kun tu bzang po'i

smon lam dang spyod pa la mngon du gyur pa'i tshig go /rigs kyi bu de bas na legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zung shig dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan par bya'o/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'

rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu mig 'phrul gyi gzhi'i dpe dang 'dra ba/ ye shes kyi 'od kun tu 'byung ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rlabs po che la brten pa dang /

mos pa rgya chen po rab tu thob pa dang / dge ba'i bsam pa rlabs po che rnam par dag pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes rgya mtsho yangs pas rab tu brtan pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas skye ba 'byung ba'i chos bstan pa chen po thos pa rab tu

thob pa dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa la mos pa'i sems kyis gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs rab tu

thob pa dang / rang bzhin gyis snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu gcad rab tu gcad pa'i sems kyi stobs shugs drag po dang ldan pa rab tu thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub

sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu mig 'phrul gyi gzhi'i dpe dang 'dra ba 'od kun tu 'byung ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu de la brtson 'grus phyir ldog pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos de dag thob

par gyur nas kyang mi zad pa'i tshul du mngon par sgrub cing / bsgom pa dang shin tu rgya che bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur cing rnam pa bcus mngon par dga' bar byed do/ /bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lus dang srog la phongs par

mi rtsi ba dang / 'khor ba'i yo byad don du mi gnyer ba dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam las phyir mi ldog pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad la rnam par lta ba dang /

srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i yid dang / gnas med pa'i chos kyi nam mkha' la mi gnas mi rten pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la bsgribs pa med pa dang / zhing rgya mtsho thams cad du rab tu 'dul ba

dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa med pa shin tu sbyangs ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur cing mngon par dga' bar byed do/ /de nas shAkya'i bu mo

go pas don de nyid yongs su bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis phyogs bcur bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rlabs chen dri med blo ldan gzhan gyi don zhugs shing / dge bshes dam pa

bsnyen brtson g.yo dang sgyu med pa/ /ston pa'i 'du shes thob cing skyo med brtson 'grus can/ /de dag spyod pa 'jig rten mig 'phrul 'dra 'di yin/ /gang rnams mos pa rlabs chen mkha' dang 'dra ldan zhing / /de'i khongs su dus gsum 'jig

rten chud pa dang / /zhing dang sems can chos dang sangs rgyas de bzhin pa/ /ye shes 'od byed spyod pa de dag 'di yin no/ /gang rnams bsam pa mkha' 'dra mtha' dang dbus med la/ /kun nas nyon mongs dri mas ma gos rab dag cing / /de

bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yon tan 'byung gyur pa/ /de dag spyod pa mig 'phrul gzhi yi rnam pa 'dra/ /kun mkhyen ye shes rnam yangs tshad med bsam yas dag /yon tan rgya mtshos yid gsal ldan pa nyer brtan pa/ /de dag bsod nams

rgya mtsho'i lus dang snying po ste/ /'jig rten spyod kyang 'jig rten dri mas gos mi 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i gsung gi yan lag sgra skad tshul kun gyis/ /chos kyi 'brug sgra nyan kyang gang rnams mi ngoms shing / /chos tshul rjes su snyegs pa'i shes rab

'od kyi sgron/ /de dag 'gro bar 'od gsal byed pa'i spyod 'di yin/ /gang rnams phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa/ /gzhan dang gzhan dag sems kyi skad cig kun sems shing / /bde gshegs rgya mtsho thams cad lta zhing shes

byed pa/ /sangs rgyas sems ldan de dag spyod yul 'di yin no/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi rnam par yangs pa'i 'khor mthong zhing / /de dag ting nge 'dzin tshul rgya mtsho mang po dang / /smon lam rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med tshul 'jug pa/ /mig

'phrul lta bu de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus kun gyis byin brlabs te/ /phyi mtha'i bskal bar spyod byed kun tu bzang po rnams/ /zhing rnams 'byam klas kun tu gzugs brnyan byung gyur ba/ /chos 'od byed pa de dag spyod pa 'di yin

no/ /gang rnams ye shes nyi ma'i snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can/ /'gro ba nyam nyes mthong zhing chos kyi 'od snang bas/ /'gro ba'i mun pa bstsal cing bstan pa 'char 'byung ba/ /nyi ma lta bur de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/ /skye dgu srid pa'i rgyud na 'gro ldog mthong

gyur nas/ /yid gsal 'khor ba'i rgyud rnams phyir zlog rab gnas shing / /chos kyi 'khor lo kun nas yongs su sgrub byed pa/ /spyod pa kun bzang dam pa'i blo can rab tu spyod/ /tshul 'dir bslabs pa de dag mtha' dang dbus pa'i/ /lus

rnams bsam pa ji bzhin 'gro bar nyer bstan te/ /gzugs brnyan mig yor 'dra ba'i rang lus tshad med pas/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho dag na 'gro mang yongs sbyin byed/ /byams tshul shin tu yangs pas 'gro mang rgyas bkang ste/ /mos pa sna

tshogs 'gro la rnam par spyod bstan nas/ /'gro bar bsam pa ji bzhin chos kyi char 'bebs shing / /brtan pa byang chub don du sems can khrag khrig 'dul/ /de nas shAkya'i bu mo go bas tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor

la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la rnam par blta ba'i yul thob pa'o/ /nor smras pa/ 'phags

ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul la rnam par lta ba'i yul de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba 'di la snyoms par

zhugs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong zhing khong du chud do/ /bskal pa de dag gi sems can lam gyi rgyud thams cad du gtogs pa ji

snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /sems can de dag gi shi 'pho dang skye ba'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /mngon par 'grub pa'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa dang / las mngon par 'du byed pa yongs su sgrub pa ji

snyed cig yod pa dang / las rnam par smyin pa sna tshogs ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /de dag gi las yongs su blangs pa dge ba yang rab tu shes so/ /mi dge ba dang 'byung ba dang mi 'byung ba dang / nges pa dang ma nges pa dang /

log par nges pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang bcas pa dang / bag la nyal ba med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgud par gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su zin pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su zin pa dang /

dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su zin pa dang / de dag gi dge ba'i chos yongs su 'das pa dang / sdig to'i chos yongs su 'dus pa'i las yongs su blangs pa yang rab tu shes so/ /bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba

snyed po de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig byung ba de dag gi mtshan rgya mtsho yang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du

zhugs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa yang rab tu shes so/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas byung ba rnams kyi drung du gshegs pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim

gror mdzad pa'i sbyor ba rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /'byung ba'i rgyan rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis

sems can yongs su smyin par mdzad pa dang / btul ba rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mdzad pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang rnam par 'phrul pa yang rab tu shes so/ /

sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang rab tu shes so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag na nyan thos ji snyed cig 'khod pa

de dag gi 'byung ba'i tshul yang rab tu shes so/ /sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang rab tu shes so/ /lam bsgoms pa sna tshogs kyang rab tu shes so/ /ye shes thob par bya ba phun sum tshogs shing rnam par dag pa'i bye brag kyang rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa de dag gis sems can ji snyed cig rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la bkod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas de dag gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas de dag gis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub

khong du chud pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas de dag gi zhi ba'i rnam par spyod pa la rnam par rtse ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas de dag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam
