par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas de dag gis sems can ji snyed cig yongs su smyin par byas pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas de dag gi chos bstan pa ji snyed cig brjod pa de dag kyang

rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas de dag gi ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyod cing rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par brtse ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de

dag gis thog ma dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /thog ma sems bskyed pa'i smon lam dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas 'byung ba'i rgyan thams cad

mngon par bsgrub pa rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu shes so/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi yan lag gi tshogs rnam par dag par bya ba rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lam la nan tan du bya ba'i rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa yang

rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i shugs drag po rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa

la bzem pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnod pas rnam par rtse ba dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon

pa'i rnam par spyod pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa bsgom pa'i rgyud kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su

sbyang ba'i tshul dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i mtshan ma dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i dbang dag kyang rab tu

shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa nas sar 'phar ba'i ye shes dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su bsdu ba'i ye shes dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su smyin par bya ba'i ye shes kyang rab tu shes

so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba yang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgya yang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rnam par brtse ba dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /

byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems kyi skad cig re re la ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho sna tshogs thob par

byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snang ba'i tshul thob par byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi glog gi snang ba'i sprin dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa thob pa'i tshul dag

kyang rab tu shes so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhing rgya mtshor rjes su bgrod par byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /chos rgya mtsho'i

tshul la 'jug pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /sems can rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dam par spyod pa'i tshul thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /

smon lam gyi tshul sna tshogs rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ji ltar mi mjed kyi

'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho la zhugs te/ khong du chud pa de bzhin du phyi ma'i mtha' gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de/ rgyun mi 'chad pa'i ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab

tu shes so/ /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab

tu shes so/ /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud

pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal ba rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams

cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi

khams phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gnas pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa

dag na gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal brgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gnas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya

mtsho rnams ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /phyogs kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi

khams kyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du phyogs kun tu 'od rnam par snang pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dag la

gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /phyogs kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gcig nas gcig tu brgyud

pa dag la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal ba rgya mtsho rnams rab tu shes pa de bzhin du gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'dir gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa

rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams tshul du bya ba rnams dang / de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor lo rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor rnams

dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bye brag rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chu klung rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi glong rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'khyil pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang / 'jig

rten gyi khams yongs su 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sdong po dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rta bgab dang / 'jig rten gyi du bya ba rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes

so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ 'di ji ltar shes par gyur pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i

mthas gtugs pa dag gi bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rjes su dran no/ /sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag la'ang shes shing / khong du chud do/ /sngon yongs su bsgrubs pa'i tshul rgya

mtsho dag la'ang shes shing khong du chud do/ /bskal pa mtha' dang dbus med par byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la yang dag par bzhugs pa mdzad pa dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /zhing yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong

du chud do/ /sems can yongs su smyin par mdzad pa'i thabs kyi tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur mdzad cing gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sngon gyi

de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gror mdzad pa'i sbyor ba'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis chos bstan pa yongs su bzung ba'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sngon byang chub sems dpa'

ting nge 'dzin rab tu brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /yo byad la dbang bsgyur ba rab tu brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la nan tan tu mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang

shes shing khong du chud do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong

du chud do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs drag po rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /bsam gtan gyi yan lag thams cad yongs

su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi skye gnas thams cad du sku'i

gzugs brnyan yongs su bstan pa mdzad pa'i thabs kyi tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor yongs sa dag par mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /zhing rgya mtsho

thams cad yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang / shes shing khong du chud do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad las ye shes snang bar gyur pa/ rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub yongs su gnas pa mdzad pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs te thugs su chud pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul

pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang rnam par rol ba'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud

do/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /thog ma'i smon lam gyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sems can yongs su smyin par byed pa

dang / gdul ba'i thabs kyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ sems can rgya mtsho yongs su smyin par mdzad pa de dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sems

can de dag gi sems kyi skad cig re re'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba'i thabs kyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rab tu thob pa'i

tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /spobs pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su gnon pa'i rnam par 'phrul

ba'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /spyod pa'i dra ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /mthar gyis yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyogs pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes

shing khong du chud do/ /de dag gi dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /

ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings thams cad du byung ba shes shing khong du chud de/ mngon par bsgrubs pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho dang / ye shes kyi sgyu ma'i dra ba mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gengs pa/ sgo mtha' yas pa nas shin tu bstan par bya ba/ phyi

ma'i mtha'i bskal par gnas pa la 'jig pas bstan par bya ba/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs par byung ba thams cad kyang ma 'dres par shes shing /

khong du chud de mngon par sgrub bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par blta ba'i yul gyi yul ni de lta bu ste/

de'i phyir de la snyoms par zhugs na sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa'i tshul rab tu shes so/ /sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i tshogs kyang rab tu shes so/ /sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa

dang / rnam par byang ba'i ye shes kyi tshul rnams kyang rab tu shes so/ /sems can thams cad kyi las sna tshogs kyang rab tu shes so/ /nyan thos thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang rab tu shes so/ /nyan thos thams cad

kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sa yang rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa zhi bas rnam par 'phrul pa yang shes shing khong du chud do/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul dag kyang rab

tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa yang rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa yang

rab tu shes so/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor shAkya'i bu mo go pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams

cad la rnam par lta ba'i yul 'di brnyes nas ji srid cig lags/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sngon 'das pa'i dus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa 'das pa'i pha rol cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams

mi 'jigs pa byed pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams/ de'i bskal pa 'gro ba'i mchog ces bya bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de'i dbus su/ gling bzhi pa bde ba yod pa zhes bya ba byung ste/

gling bzhi pa de'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su/ rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal zhes bya ba/ grong rdal stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i phul du bya ba byung ba ste/ rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal de dang /

grong rdal stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag kyang so so nas sa'i gzhi baiDUr+ya sngon po las grub pa la gnas pa/ rin po che bdun las byas pa'i ra bas kun nas bskor ba/ 'obs spos chus yongs su gang ba gzhi gser gyi bye ma bdal

ba/ ut+pal dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu ta dang / me tog pun+da ri ka shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam kha dog dang 'od kyi dra ba sna tshogs shing dri shin tu zhim pas kun nas khyab pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ rin po che las byas pa'i stegs

bu'i khri 'phang bdun las ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas dgrigs pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing gi nags tshal gyi phreng ba dgrigs pas kun nas bskor ba ste/ steng nas gser gyi dra ba bres pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam

par phye ba'i mig ris mdzes par rnam par bres pas sa'i gzhi shin tu spa bar gyur ba/ dngos grub can gyi tshogs rnam par rgyu ba/ bya btsun pa'i khyus sgra skad yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa phyung ba/ bza' shing

gi ra ba bye ba brgya phrag stong gis mdzes par byas pa shin tu skyid cing phun sum tshogs par gnas pa skyes pa dang / bud brgya stong rab tu dga' bas gang ba/ ser bu bde zhing yid du 'ong bas bskyed de/ me tog gi char mang po

rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'grul ba/ sa'i bdag po dam pa brgya phrag stong gi gnas su gyur pa dag ste/ grong rdal chen po de dag gi rin po che'i shing thams cad dang / gser gyi dra ba'i rgyan la pa rlung gis bskyod

de/ rol mo mang po'i sgra dang mnyam pa'i sgra skad byung ba dag las yid du 'ong ba'i tshig 'di skad dag 'byung ngo / /gsol cig mnobs shig chos la spyod cig /byang chub tu sems skyed cig /phyir ldog pa'i sa la mnga'

thob par mdzod cig /khyed rnams bde bar gyur cig ces zer ro/ /rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal der khams kyi rgyal po nor gyi bdag po zhes bya ba byung ste/ de la btsun mo'i 'khor bud med stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yod

do/ /blon po brgya phrag lnga yod par gyur te/ rgyal po nor gyi bdag po de la bu lnga brgya yod pa de thams cad kyang / dpa' bo rtul phod pa yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa shin tu mdzes pa/

blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po'i mchog shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa sha stag go /rgyal po nor gyi bdag po de'i btsun mo dam pa ni pad+mo'i dpal dam pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste/ bud med stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po

de dag gi nang nas gtso mor bya ba'o/ /de'i bu gzi brjid kyi dbang po zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba shin tu mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan pa zhig yod par gyur te/ de la mi

chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag yod par gyur to/ /de'ang 'di ltar rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de rkang pa'i mthil shin tu gnas pa dang ldan te/ sa chen po la rkang pa'i mthil 'dor na mnyam par 'dor la/

'deg na mnyam par 'deg ste/ gzhog na rkang pa'i mthil kun gyis sa chen po la mnyam par reg go /de'i rkang pa'i mthil gnyis la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/ lte ba dang bcas pa mu khyud dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams

cad du shin tu tshang ba shin tu mdzes pa blta na sdug pa dag kyang byung bar gyur to/ /de'i rkang pa'i bo la gnyis kyang shin tu rgyas par gyur to/ /rkang pa'i steng gi mdog shin tu gsal la/ shin tu mdzes te/ me tog dam pa

bas kyang lhag par mdog bzang zhing gsal bar gyur te/ de'i rkang lag gi sor mo dra bar 'brel par gyur te/ shin tu mdzes pa rnam par phye ba/ bu ga med pas zag pa med pa ni dper na ngang pa'i rgyal po gnas srung lta bur gyur to/ /de'i rkang

pa'i rting pa yangs pa shin tu dag la shin tu gsal ba rin po che thams cad kyi 'od rab tu 'gyed par grub pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /de'i sor mo rnams kyang ring zhing zlum la tshigs bar mnyam zhing yangs pa dang ldan par gyur te/ de dag mnyam par

sa la 'jog go /mnyam par sa las 'deg go /de'i rkang pa dang lag pa'i mthil yang ka tsa lin+di bas kyang lhag par reg na bde bar gyur te/ des skyes pa 'am bud med dam/ khye'u dang bu mo gang la reg kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad kyang

bde ba dang / yid dga' ba'i dam pas tshim zhing yid shin tu bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i byin ba a ne ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug par gyur te/ rim gyis gzhol ba dang / shin tu mdzes pa dang / legs par grub par gyur pas/

kyi rgyal po e ne ya ltar de la sus kyang bsnyegs pa 'am/ slebs par mi nus te/ 'gro bas ngal zhing dub par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi bajid kyi dbang po de bdun shin tu mtho ba dang ldan par gyur te/ de'i rkang pa

gnyis la shin tu mtho ba zlum la shin tu legs pa dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / tshigs mi snang ba dang / shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang / blta na sdug pa gnyis grub par gyur to/ /lag pa la gnyis/ thal gong gi lhun la gnyis/ ltag pa la gcig ste/

de ltar bdun no/ /de'i mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug par grub par gyur te/ de'i gsang ba'i gnas sbubs na 'dug pa shin tu mi mngon la nang du nub cing kun nas yog par 'dug pa ste/ dper na glang po cang shes sam/ rta cang shes ltar 'dug

pas de gos ma gyon par 'dug kyang bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ rgan pa 'am/ dar la bab pa 'am/ bla ma 'am/ bla mar bya ba rnams kyis kyang mi mthong ste/ gzhan du na bdag longs par spyod pa 'am/ ched du bstan par byas te/

'dod pas spyad pa ni ma gtogs so/ /rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de ro stod seng ge ltar 'dug pa dang ldan par gyur te/ lus rim pas rgyas la ro stod shin tu yangs shing rdzogs pas kyi rgyal po bas kyang mdzes par dbyibs shin tu legs

pa'i ro stod dang ldan par gyur to/ /de'i thal gong rgyas shing lus shin tu rgyas pa lus rnam par phye ba/ lus kyi cha thams cad rkyen du 'bab par mnyam pa/ lus la dma' ba med pa/ lus la mtho ba med pa/ lus la zhum pa med pa/ lus la

dgu ba med pa/ lus rin po che'i gtan pa shin tu phyis pa bas kyang lhag par gsal bar gyur to/ /de'i dpung mgo shin tu zlum zhing sha rgyas la shin tu mdzes par gang ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /des mi chen po'i mtshan lag pa shin tu ring ba thob par gyur pa des lus

ma btud de/ lus drang por 'dug kyang pus mo'i lha nga gnyis la nyug cing reg go /des mi chen po'i mtshan lus che zhing drang ba'ang thob par gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad du mchog tu gyur pa dang ldan la lus tshul dang 'dra bar mnyam pa dang / lus rab tu gnyen pa dang /

lus shin tu lji ba dang / lus rab tu gsal ba dang / lus shin tu sim par byed pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /des mi chen po'i mtshan mgul dung lta bu yang thob par gyur te/ mi dma' ba'i mgul dang / de'i mgul gyi 'khor thams cad dang / bzhin gyi 'khor thams

cad na rtsa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang shin tu mnyam par gyur te/ kun kyang rab tu tshang bar gyur to/ /mi chen po'i mtshan seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu yang thob par gyur te/ za 'gram shin tu 'khregs pa dang / bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rgyas pa dang / bzhin gyi

dkyil 'khor shin tu legs shing yongs su dag pa dang / kha'i sgo shin tu yangs pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /mi chen po'i mtshan so mnyam pa bzhi bcu dang yang ldan par gyur te/ so ma tshang ba med la zas shig zas yang lan gcig bldad pas chung ngu na 'bras chan gyi 'bru

'ga' yang ma zhib par za ba med do/ /so thags bzang zhing mnyam par rab tu thob ste/ mtshams chu sgo med pa dang / shin tu mnyam pa dang / rkyen rkyen tu shin tu mdzes pa ste/ de kha zas shig za na yang 'go ba dang / 'chags pa dang / zhen pa dang /

ljan ljin tu 'gyur ba'am/ thogs par 'gyur ba'am/ gseb 'gang bar 'gyur ba med do/ /mi chen po'i mtshan so mnyam pa rab tu thob par gyur te/ so mnyam zhing rda rdo med pa dang / so lhag med pa dang / so zhum pa med pa dang / so gyes pa med pa dang

so thog drung mnyam pa dang / so rdo ba med par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de'i mche ba shin tu dkar bar gyur te/ mche ba shin tu gsal ba/ mche ba shin tu dag pa/ mche ba shin tu brtan par gyur to/ /mi chen po'i mtshan lce shin tu yangs pa yang

rab tu thob par gyur te/ de'i lce ni shin tu yangs la srab cing mnyen te/ shin tu 'jam pa dang / las su rung ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang bsgyur na bde ba dang / gdong gi dkyil 'khor kun tu 'gebs pa dang / bden zhing phan par 'gyur ba'i don dang /

yi ge dang ngag dang nges pa'i tshig thogs pa med par brjod par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par gyur te/ dbyangs yid du 'ong ba dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / glu'i nga ro dang / sil snyan kyi dbyangs dang / sgra skad dang brjod cing

smra ba'i tshig gi las yid du 'ong ba brjod pas ngag gi las mngon par dga' ba skyed pa/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'dun par 'gyur bar tshangs pa las kyang lhag pa'i dbyangs kyi ngag rjod de/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor las kyang
gud du/ mi 'da' bar thams cad kyi yid dang / mthun par byed pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de ni/ mig dkar nag 'byes par gyur te/ mig shin tu dang ba dang / mig yongs su dag pa dang /

mig la 'od chags pa dang / mig rnam par gsal ba dang / mig mngon par mdzes pa dang / mig blta na sdug pa dang / mig yid du 'ong ba dang / mig 'dzum pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de ni rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang ldan par

gyur te/ mig gi skye mched rin po che pad+ma rA ga ltar shin tu dag pa/ mig gi sprin mnyam pa/ mig gi sprin mtshungs pa/ mig gi sprin legs pa/ mig gi sprin yangs pa/ mig gi sprin shin tu brtan par gyur to/ /de'i

smin mtshams su mdzod spu skyes par gyur te/ 'jam pa las su rung ba/ shin tu mnyen pa/ shing bal ltar reg na bde ba/ dang ba/ gsal ba 'od yod pa/ chab brom lta bu kha ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa/ 'od zer dkar po'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od rab

tu snang ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /de'i spyi bo la gtsug tor mngon par grub par gyur te/ shin tu legs pa/ kun nas zlum pa/ dbus su bab pa/ skra'i rgyan du gyur pa/ rin po che'i pad mo 'dab ma bye ba brgya phrag stong dang ldan pa ltar snang ba/ kun nas cha

mnyam par gnas pa/ rin thang gdab tu tshad med pas gces pa'i gtsug tu gyur pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de ni pags pa shin tu 'jam pa dang ldan par gyur te/ de'i lus la rdul lam/ dri ma'am/ rngul lam/ ser ga'am/ gnyer ma'am/

lhod pa'am/ 'khums pa'am/ 'phyang ba'am/ slod bag tu gnas pa med par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de ni mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi mdog lta bu dang ldan zhing 'od kun tu 'dom gang ba dang / gser

ltar gcig tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes par brgyan pa dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas dri zhim po'i 'od zer 'byung bas lus kyi rgyan rab rib med cing 'od gsal ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de ni ba spu re rer byung ba dang ldan par

gyur te/ ba spu'i bu ga re re nas ba spu re re skyes par gyur pa/ baiDUR+Ya sngon po'i kha dog lta bu g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba/ legs par skyes pa/ mthang la zha bar 'dug pa shin tu legs par gnas pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de'i spu yan lag gyen du

'khyil par gyur te/ phyir mi zlog pa'i spu dang / mi ldog pa'i spu dang / ma 'dres pa'i spu dang ldan par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de mi chen po'i mtshan skra mthon ting du 'dug pa thob par gyur te/ de'i skra nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i mdog ltar mthon ting du 'dug pa/

'jam pa snum pa/ legs par 'khyil pa/ g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba/ drung shin tu ran pa/ zad zed med pa/ 'jam 'jam ltar 'dug pa/ mi 'dzing ba/ dbyibs mnyam zhing mthun par gnas pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /rgyal bu gzhon nu de shing n+ya gro d+ha

ltar chu zheng gab pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan rab tu thob par gyur te/ kun nas gyen du ran pa dang / kun tu bzang ba dang / kun tu mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur te/ de ni mdun nas bltas na'ang ngoms mi shes shing blta na yid du 'ong ba rgyab dang g.yas g.yon dang / 'gro

ba dang 'dug pa dang / 'greng ba dang nyal ba dang / smra ba dang / mi smra bar 'dug pa la bltas na/ yang ngoms mi shes shing yid du 'ong la blta na sdug par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di

dag gis yongs su brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi blta na yid du mi 'ong ba'i bag med pa blta na bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ blta na sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su 'byung ba/ de lta bu

zhig skyes par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu de nas lan gcig cig rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de yab kyis gnang nas rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo dpal gyi bza' shing gi ra ba spos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo las 'od kyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba der sa bzang po

lta ba'i phyir bu mo stong phrag nyi shu dang lhan cig tu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid dang dpal gyi bskal pa bzang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan gyis byung nas skyes pa dang / bud kyi tshogs kyis kun nas dga' bar bya zhing / 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi shing rta

rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo chen po bzhi dang ldan pa/ rdo rje mthu bo che'i srog shing gi rtsa ba can tsan dan dam pa las bsgrubs pa'i yul bzang po dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po spos sna tshogs kyi shing thags rnam par bkye ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog sna tshogs

kyis rab tu mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ seng ge'i khri rin po che dam pa'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi snying po can dbus su bshams pa/ bu mo lnga brgyas rin po che'i srad bu'i lda ldi nas yongs su gzung ba/ nam mkha' la chags pa

med pa'i rlung ltar mgyogs pa'i rta cang shes stong dang bcas pa la zhon nas gdugs chen po rim gyis gzhol zhing blta na sdug pa/ steng yongs rin po che'i rgyal po'i baiDUR+Ya dkar po las byas pa/ 'od dri ma pa tshad med pa 'byung ba/ rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba sna tshogs

thams cad kyis spa bar spras te/ rnam pa thams cad du mdzes par brgyan pa/ yu ba rin po che'i rgyal po baiDUr+ya sngon po las bsgreng bas ni bskyabs/ srog chags brgya stong mang pos ni yongs su bskor/ rol mo brgya stong mang po lha rdzas kyi dbyangs yid du 'ong ba snyan pa dang ldan pa dag ni rab

tu blangs/ me tog gi char chen po ni mngon par 'bab/ lha rdzas kyi spos dri zhim pa'i bdug spos kyi snod bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis ni rab tu bdug cing 'gro bar gyur to/ /de de ltar 'gro ba'i tshe lam yang rgyud brgyad dang ldan par gyur te/ mthon dman pa dang / gseg

ma dang gyo mo pa dang / gser dngul dang rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyi khams kyis sa'i gzhi rab tu bsgrubs pa dang / gser gyi bye ma bkram pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog sil mas chal bar gang ba dang / g.yas g.yon nas rin po che'i shing gi phreng bas dgrigs

pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha ran bkye ba dang / steng nas rin po che'i dril bu'i dra ba bres pa dang / rin po che'i gnam yol sna tshogs kyis bkab pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / snam bu brgya stong rab tu brgyan pa du ma bsgreng zhing sbyangs

pas mdzes par brgyan pa dang / g.yas g.yon nas rin po che'i stegs bu'i phreng ba rnam par bkod pas rnam par brgyan pa ste/ rin po che'i stegs bu la la la ni slongs mo ba'i tshogs la yongs su bstabs pa'i don du rin po che'i snod sna tshogs/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang

ba bkod/ stegs bu la la la ni rgyan 'dod pa'i slongs mo ba rnams brgyan pa'i don du rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi rnam pa yongs su bkod/ stegs bu la la la ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkod/

stegs bu la la la ni su ci 'dod pa de dag la de sbyin pa'i don du kha zas dang btung ba dang / bro ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba'i snod mang po bkod/ stegs bu la la la ni rnam pa thams cad du mchog tu zhim pa'i ro dang / kha dog dang dri dang / bro dang / reg yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa'i

lha rdzas kyi kha zas kyi rnam pa bkod/ stegs bu la la la ni ro bro ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi shing tog sna tshogs thams cad spungs/ stegs bu la la la ni gos 'dod pa rnams yid bzhin du spyod du gzud pa'i phyir lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che kha dog sna tshogs

dang ldan pa mdog bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang ri mo sna tshogs shin tu spa bar rnam par phye ba shin tu btsun pa la 'os pa shin tu phra ba/ rab tu 'jam pa/ thags su ma btags pa/ bye ba brgya phrag stong snyed yongs su bkod par gyur to/ /stegs bu la la

la ni byug pa 'dod pa'i sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su spyod du gzung pa'i phyir/ /lha rdzas kyi spos kyi rnam pa kha dog dang / dri rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa dag kyang bkod par gyur to/ /stegs su bu la la la ni sems can

rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su spyod du gzud pa'i phyir yo byad thams cad kyi phung po dag kyang bkod par gyur to/ /stegs bu la la la ni na chung gzugs bzang ba rab tu mdzes pa shin tu sdug pa/ cha lugs sdug gu sna tshogs dang ldan

pa yid du 'ong ba'i gos sna tshogs gyon pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ byug pa sna tshogs kyis tshul sdug gur brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ bud kyi bzo dang sgyu dang / shes nyen gyi tshul la mkhas pa dag kyang bkod

par gyur to/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal de nyid na sprul 'tshong ma'i dam pa rgyal po'i longs spyod du 'os pa/ blta na mdzes pa zhes bya ba zhig yod pa/ de'i bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing shin tu mdzes

pa/ blta na sdug pa ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi thung / ha cang yang mi sbom/ ha cang yang mi phra/ ha cang yang mi dkar/ ha cang yang mi sngo ba/ skra mthon ting du 'dug pa/ dkar nag 'byes pa/ bzhin yid du 'ong ba/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang

ldan pa/ 'jam zhing snyan par smra ba/ shes rab dang ldan pa/ shes nyen gyi tshul thams cad la mkhas pa gtsug lag thams cad la shes pa/ brtson pa/ le lo pa/ rim 'gro yod pa/ mos pa dang ldan pa/ byams pa'i sems 'dogs pa/

khong khro ba mi mnga' ba/ blta na mi ngoms shing yid du 'ong ba/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug chung ba/ ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa/ drang zhing mnyen pa/ g.yo dang sgyu med pa zhig yod de/ de ma dang lhan cig tu bu mo du ma zhig gis yongs su bskor te/ rin

po che'i shing rta la zhon nas rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal nas byung ste/ rgyal pos bka' stsal nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i mdun nas/ phar rgyal bu gzhon nu de glu len zhing 'dong 'dong ba las/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po mthong nas/

'dod chags kyis sems shin tu mi bzang pa zhig g.yos te/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po shin tu yid du 'ong ches nas rjes su 'brang zhing sems la rang dbang med pas/ blta na sdug pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ma 'di ltar mkhyen par mdzod cig /gal te bdag rgyal bu gzhon

nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la ma btad na ni 'gum pa 'am/ srog la 'bab pa'i sdug bsngal gcig tu 'gyur ro/ des smras pa/ bu mo de lta bu'i sems ma skyed cig /gzhon nu 'di ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ de'i yab nor gyi bdag po

mi bzhugs par gyur na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la gnas par 'gyur ba'i gnas yod do/ /de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur bas/ de'i bud med rin po che nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/ bu mo bdag cag kyang / sbrul 'tshong

ma dag cig ste/ 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar byed pa yin gyi/ yu bus sems can 'ga' zhig la nam 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byar rung ba'ang de/ yu bu ni rgyal po nor gyi bdag po'i bkas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i rim

'gror 'dong 'dong bar zad kyis de lta bu'i sems brtan par ma byed cig /gnas de ni thob par yang shin tu dka'o/ /de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku nyi ma dam pa zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/

bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen par bla na pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i snying po byang chub chos kyi sprin shin tu sdug pa'i 'od ces bya ba yang bza' shing gi ra ba

spos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo las 'od kyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba de'i nang du byung ste/ der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa thog mar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ zhag bdun lon pa de bu mo de shing rta la zhon bzhin du yur zhing 'chog 'chog

pa'i rmi lam du mthong nas sad par gyur pa dang / sngon gnyen bshes su gyur pa'i lha mo zhig gis bstan pa/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nyi ma dam pa de ni snying bo byang chub chos kyi sprin shin tu sdug pa'i 'od ces bya ba na rnam par spyod cing thog ma mngon par rdzogs par sangs

rgyas nas zhag bdun lon te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og

gyi lha'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas shing bzhugs te/ der sa'i lha mo thams cad kyang kun nas 'dus/ chu'i lha mo dang / lha mo dang / rlung gi lha mo dang / rgya mtsho'i lha mo dang / chu klung gi lha mo dang / ri'i lha mo dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dang / skya rengs 'char ba'i lha mo

dang / nags tshal gyi lha mo dang / shing gi lha mo dang / sman gyi lha mo dang / lo thog gi lha mo dang / grong khyer gyi lha mo dang / rkang gis 'gro ba'i lha mo dang / snying po byang chub kyi lha mo dang / lus kyi 'od gzer gyi lha mo dang / sems can gyi ris kyi lha mo dang / nam mkha'i lha mo

dang / phyogs thams cad kyi lha mo dag kyang bcom ldan 'das sku nyi ma dam pa'i zhal blta ba'i phyir kun nas 'dus so zhes nas/ de ltar des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thos pas bag tsha pa thob par gyur te/ skabs su bab nas

rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i mdun du de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gzugs kyi mchog gis 'jig rten khyad par 'phags/ /yon tan rnams kyis thams cad phyogs su grags/ /shes rab stobs kyis bdag dang 'dra ma mchis/ /

sgyu rtsal dga' ba sgyu ma'i tshul kun 'tshal/ /srog chags mang po stong phrag du ma yis/ /'dod chags dbang gis bdag la rab bltas kyang / /gzhon nu bdag ni 'jig rten gang la yang / /glo ba chags par gyur pa gcig ma mchis/ /sems can gang la

yang zhen par gyur pa 'am/ /gang la'ang khong khror bdag gi sems ma gyur/ /gang la'ang dgra bgyid de zhe sdang / /bdag ni sems can sman par dga' ba lags/ /sku gzhan sku mchog yon tan rab mnga' khyod/ /gang tshe bdag gis gsal

bar mthong gyur pa/ /de tshe dbang po kun kyang nyams su bde/ /rgya che yangs par shin tu dga' bar gyur/ /khyod kyi dbu bzang lcang lor 'khril ba ni/ /rin chen rnam snang mdog tu mthon ting gsal/ /zhal gyi smin sdug 'phral ba shangs su mdzes/ /khyod kyi zhal sngar lus

'di bdag 'bul lo/ /mtshan gyi rab 'chang gzi brjid che mnga' ba/ /sku gzugs gser gyi ri bo bzang po 'dra/ /khyod kyi spyan sngar bdag lta mi mdzes te/ /zil du rlag pas snag tsha'i gzugs kyang 'dra/ /spyan gsal ring la dkar nag 'byes pas mdzes/ /

shin tu zhal rgyas seng ge'i za 'gram can/ /khyod kyi gsung ni thogs pa ma mchis na/ /gsung mchog mnga' bas bdag ni gzung du gsol/ /khyod kyi zhal na ljags yangs mnga' ba ni/ /mdog dmar yangs pa rin chen mchog gi 'od/ /tshangs dbyangs yan lag mchog gi

gsung mnga' bas/ /gsung zhing 'gro ba rab tu dga' ba mdzad/ /khyod kyi zhal na thags bzang tshems mnga' ba/ /dung ltar dri med shin tu rnam par gsal/ /'dzum zhing bzhad pa rnam par ston mdzad kyang / /skyes bu dpal khyod 'gro ba dga' bar mdzad/ /khyod kyi sku la

mtshan rab mdzes pa rnams/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis dag cing 'od kyang gsal/ /sku gzugs bzang po yongs su des brgyan pas/ /mi yi dbang po 'khor los sgyur ba byon/ /de nas rgyal bu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos/ bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs

pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo khyod su'i/ khyod la yongs su srung ba ni gang zhig yod/ bu mo nga la ni gzhan gyis yongs su gzung ba'i bud med bdag gir byar mi rung ngo zhes nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ /blta sdug gzugs kyi yon tan legs ldan

pa/ /mtshan bzang bsod nams rnam par dag pa'i lus/ /khyod la dri ba'i don 'di nga la smros/ /lus mchog khyod ni su yis yongs su gzung / /khyod la pha dang ma ni yod dam / /khyim thab dam khyod ni su zhig dbang / /gzugs mdzes khyod la sems

can gzhan nam gcig /bdag gi yin par 'du shes byed dam/ /khyod kyi yid ni gsod la dga' 'grang / /gzhan las ma byin phrogs par mi byed dam/ /'dod pas log par g.yem la dga' 'grang / /du brjod smrar yid ni mi

mos sam/ /khyod kyi blo gros mdza' 'byed mi 'jug gam/ /tshig brlang gzhan la gnod par smra 'grang / /gzhan gyi nor la chags par sems dam/ /'gro ba rnams la gnod par sems 'grang / /blta ba'i 'brog dgon lam du ma zhugs 'grang / /las kyi

rgyud la ye brdam sems dam/ /g.yo mdog sgyu yi dbang du mi 'gro'am/ /mi 'thad 'jig rten gnod par byed 'grang / /pha ma gnyen dang mdza' bshes bla ma la/ /sri zhu rim gror bya ba'i tshul 'chang ngam/ /phongs par gyur pa yongs su bsdu don du/ /khyed kyi

yid la byin par sems yod dam/ /chos dang mthun par dus su 'doms byed cing / /lus dang sems yid yongs su dag byed la/ /yang dag las su rung ba skyed byed pa'i/ /dge bshes rnams la dga' bar sems yod dam/ sangs rgyas rnams la rim gror

byed ldan nam/ /sangs rgyas sras la dga' mchog yod dam / gang las bde gshegs sras rnams skyer 'gyur ba'i/ /chos kyi dam pa de ni shes mi shes/ /chos yid mchog la gnas par khyod byed 'grang / /chos min spyad pa'i blo gros med 'grang ngo / /legs

pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho la/ /gus pa'i sri zhu dga' sems mchog yod ma/ /skye bo mgon med phongs par gyur pa yi/ /'dren pa rnams la byams pa'i yid yod dam/ /ngan song 'gro ba'i lam la zhugs pa yi/ /shin tu nyam thag snying rje sems

'grang ngo / /gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa mthong gyur na/ /khyod ni dga' ba mchog dang ldan 'gyur ram/ /skye bo nyon mongs rnams kyis 'khol gyur la/ /shes rab mthu bskyed btang snyoms byed mi byed/ /shes gnyid log skye bo mang mthong na/ /byang chub dam

par smon lam 'debs byed 'grong / /bskal pa mtha' yas spyad pa spyod byed na/ /smon lam dam pas skyo bar mi 'gyur 'grang / /de nas bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa'i ma sprul 'tshong ma'i gtso mo blta na sdug pas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag

po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu bdag gi bu mo 'di ni rdzus te byung ba/ pad mo'i nang nas skyes pa ste/ sngan chad khyim gyi nang nas phyi rol tu ma byung ngo zhes nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ces smras so/ /bu mo 'di la khyod kyis gang smras pa/ /de ni

bdag gis rim pas khyod la brjod/ /ji ltar bu mo 'di skyes bskyed bskyed pa/ /bdag gis khyod la gsol gyis gsan du gsol/ /gang tshe dgung sangs khyod ni bltam gyur pa/ /de tshe bdag gi bu mo 'di skyes te/ /rdzus te dri med pad ma'i sbubs nas byung / /

yan lag kun tshang yangs 'di yang skyes/ /dus kyi nang na sos ka dus mchog la/ /sman dang lo tog myu gu 'thon pa'i tshe/ /sA la'i ra ba bza' shing rab mchog tu/ /bdag ni rtse dga' de khrod mchi mchi ste/ /sna tshogs yal ga'i lo ma rgyas gyur

cing / /zhugs shing me tog sdug rgyas sprin gyi mdog /bya bran sna tshogs sgra snyan zhugs shing nang / /nags khrod mya ngam ma mchis dgar mchis mchis/ /rgyan dang ldan zhing shin tu yid 'ong la/ /rin chen rad pa sna tshogs 'tshal pa rnams/ /rol mo glu

la shin tu bslabs pa yi/ /bu mo brgya phrag brgyad dang bdag kyang ldan/ /spos mchog ldan pa'i bun da ri ka dang / /rdzing 'gram me tog sil mas bltams pa yi/ /sa phyogs de na bud mang po dang / /bdag cag de na dga' bar mchis mchis na/ /

chab dbus de nas rin chen pad mo'i mchog /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa byung bar gyur/ /lo ma rin chen yu ba baiDUR+Ya/ /snying po 'dzam bu chu klung gser las bgyis/ /spos mchog rin chen dam pa'i ze ba can/ /'od chen 'dzam bu'i rgyal

mtshan kun tu 'phro/ /de tshe dgung la gdugs shig shar tam zhes/ /skye bo kun kyang yid gnyis 'tshal bar gyur/ /dgung sangs gyur nas pad mo chen po de/ /gdugs kyi 'od kyis rab tu rgyas bgyis nas/ /snang ba de dang sgra snyan rab kyang bkye/ /

'di 'byung de ni sngon gyi ltas su byung / /bud rin chen 'di 'dra 'jig rten du/ /tshul khrims dam pa rnam par dag pas byung / /sug las bgyis pa chab 'tshal mi 'gyur bas/ /'di ni sngon cad legs par spyad pa'i 'bras/ /skra ni mthon ting

mig yangs ud pa la/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan kha dog rnam dag ldan/ /phreng ba rgyan mchog cha lugs dbyibs su shis/ /dpal ltar dri pad mo'i mchog las skyes/ /lus ni rnam dag yan lag rgyan du mnyam/ /lus kyi dbyibs legs yan lag

yongs su tshang / /gser gyi gzugs la nor bus phyis pa 'dra/ /phyogs kun 'od kyis rnam par gda' bar gsal/ /lus las tsan dan rgyal po'i spos kyi dri/ /phyogs su rgyas par 'di yi lus las 'byung / /sgra snyan lha rdzas yid du 'ong brjod tshe/ /kha nas

ud pa la yi ngad kyang ldang / /'di ni gang tshe 'dzum zhing rgod pa'i tshe/ /rol mo'i sgra snyan de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bud med rin chen 'jig rten 'dir byung ste/ /tha mal kun gyi dbang du 'gyur ma lags/ /khyod ma gtogs par mi yi 'jig rten na/ /'di yi

bdag po gzhan ni gcig ma mchis/ /mtshan rab brgyan pa'i sku gzugs mdzes mnga' ba/ /khyod kyi zhal sngar bu mo 'di bzhes gsol/ /'di ni ha cang mi ring mi thung ste/ /ha cang mi sbom ha cang phra ma lags/ /lto ni gzhu 'dra nu ma shas kyang rgyas/ /

yan lag skyon bral 'di ni khyod la 'os/ /grangs dang yi ge shes bgyi tshul rnams dang / /lag brda'i tshul dang gtsug lag tshul la mkhas/ /'jig rten kun na bzo rnams ji snyed pa/ /ma lus de la 'di ni pha rol phyin/ /mda' gzhu'i tshul la 'ang rnam

pa rgyus su mkhas/ /'phong gi cho ga rnam par nges par rtogs/ /dgra yid bzhong zhing dbab pa kun la yang / /'di ni mchog tu pha rol phyin par gyur/ /lus rnams kun la rin chen rnam dag pa'i/ /'od mchog 'khor gyis shin tu mdzes pa ste/ /sngon bgyis

legs pas shin tu sdug par brgyan/ /'di ni khyod kyi phyag rjed khyod la 'os/ /mi yi 'jig rten gnas rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag gso ba'i tshul gyi cho ga 'tshal/ /de dag ma lus thams cad zhir bgyi na'ang / /ma nor sman gyi cho gas gso la mkhas/ /'dzam

bu'i rgyal mtshan skad rnams thams cad dang / /skye bo'i nges tshig ma lus bye brag dang / /'jig rten tha snyad brjod pa'i mtshams sbyar ba/ /sna tshogs kun la'ang 'di ni pha rol phyin/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul/ /de dag bye brag tshul la'ang rab tu

zhugs/ /'jig rten glu gar rnam pa ji snyed pa/ /ma lus de rnams kun gyi tshul yang 'tshal/ /rol mo sil snyan dag gi thabs rnams dang / /bzhad gad rol mo'i tshul la rnam par mkhas/ /chags dang ma chags mi rnams mngon 'tshal kyang / /khong khro chags par

'gyur ba ma mchis so/ 'jig rten bud med sgra rnams ji snyed pa/ /khyad par nang du de la ma lus 'tshal/ /bud skye bo'i skyon du bgyi ba rnams/ /grangs med de dag 'di la gcig ma mchis/ /thil gyis blta dang zur gyis blta ba dang / /yan lag stabs dang

yan lag rnams bstan dang / /shes nyen kun la mkhas pa'i mthar phyin te/ /khyod kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid/ /'di ni phrag dog ser sna ma mchis te/ /'dod pa zhe dug mi ldang sdig mi bgyid/ /bzod cing drang la mnyen zhing des pa ste/ /

mi khro mi brlang shin tu mkhas pa lags/ /ldang ba'i ngang tshul yid du 'ong ba'i ngag /rtag tu bla ma'i thugs dang sbyor ba ste/ /sku nyams gar bde lta zhing srid zhu che/ /khyod kyi spyod mthun rjes snyegs tshul dang mthun/ /rgas shing gtugs dang nad dang ldan pa dang / /

phongs pa shin tu sdug bsngal gyur pa dang / /mig dang bral zhing mgon skyabs ma mchis la/ /'di ni snying brtse rtag tu bskyed pa lags/ /'di ni rtag tu gzhan don sems la brtson/ /bdag la sman pa sems par bgyid ma mchis/ /'jig rten

kun la sman par dga' ba ste/ /rlabs chen sems kyi yon tan kun gyis brgyan/ /mchis sam nyal la ma mchi'am 'greng yang rung / /smra'am mi smra 'dzum zhing rgod kyang rung / /rtag tu bag mchis dran pa shes bzhin te/ /'di ni 'jig rten kun gyis rtag tu bsngags/ /

bsod nams ldan pas kun tu rnam par snang / /'gro ba kun kyang rtag tu dga' ba ste/ /'di la lta bas 'jig rten ngoms 'gyur/ /'di ni gang la'ang chags par ma mchis lags/ /dge bshes rnams la sri zhu 'di che ste/ /de dag mthong bar rtag par rab tu dga'/ /rjes su ci 'byung

lta zhing skyon med tshul/ /sems bdag brtan pa ri rab ri dang 'dra/ /'di ni bsod nams mchog gis rtag tu brgyan/ /mi mdza' dgrar len 'di la yod ma mchis/ /'di'i shes 'dra bud gcig ma mchis/ /rgyal sras khyod la 'di ni tshul dang 'thun// //sangs rgyas rmad ga

cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po bco lnga ba/ de nas rgyal bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po bza' shing gi ra ba spos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo las 'od kyi sprin 'byung bar phyin te/ /bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa'i ma sprul 'tshong ma'i gtso mo blta na sdug

pa'i mdun du/ bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo nga ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa yin te/ de bas na ngas thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshogs ni tshad pa zhig bstsags par bya dgos

bskal pa mtha' dang dbus med pa zhig tu byang chub sems dpa'i sbyad pa spyod de/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad ni yongs su rdzogs par bya dgos/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod par bya dgos te/ sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa ni yongs su gzung bar bya/ sangs rgyas kyi zhig thams cad ni yongs su sbyang par bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs ni mi gcad par bya/ sems can gyi rgyud thams cad ni yongs su smyin par bya/ sems can thams cad kyi

'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ni rnam par bzlog par bya/ mtha' las rgal bar bde ba la ni sems can rab tu dgod par bya/ sems can thams cad kyi ye shes kyi ni yongs su dag par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsgrub pa la ni brtson par bya/

byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la ni gnas par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sa ni yongs su bsgrub par bya/ sems can gyi khams thams cad ni yongs su sbyang bar bya/ sems can thams cad kyi phongs pa yongs su

gtsang pa'i phyir bdag gi nor thams cad ni gtang bar bya/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin la spyod pa'i tshe/ kha zas dang / btung ba'i sbyin pas ni sems can yongs su tshim par bya/ yo byad kyi dngos po thams cad yongs su gtang bas ni

slong ba'i tshogs thams cad yongs su tshim par bya dgos te/ de ltar nga bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong pa la nan tan nyams su len pa'i tshe/ phyi nang gi dngos po gang ci rung ste/ yongs su mi gtang ba de lta bu med pas de ltar ngas bu dang bu mo

dang / chung ma yang sbyin par bya dgos/ dang mgo dang rka lag dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad kyang yongs su gtang dgos na/ /de'i tshe khyod gzhan byin na/ nga'i sbyin pa'i bgegs su 'gyur ro/ /bu yid du 'ong ba yongs su gtang na

yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /lus dang sems kyi sdug bsgal yang mang po zhig nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /nga la bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar byas na ser sna'i sems su 'gyur ro/ /nga'i yan lag dang nying lag gtubs shing slongs

mo pa rnams la gtong ba'i tshe/ yid mi dga' bar yang 'gyur ro/ /nam zhig na ngas khyod bor te de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dus kyang yod de/ de'i tshe'ang khyod yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes

nas rgyal bu gzi brjid kyi bdag bos de'i tshe/ bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ /ngas ni 'gro kun snying rje rab bskyed de/ /yun ring mchog nas byang chub rab zhugs pas/ /yang dag byang chub tshogs chen rgya

mtsho rnams/ /tshad med thams cad yongs su rdzogs bya dgos/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus par/ /mkha' ltar tshad smon lam rnam sbyangs shing / /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i sa yi rnams/ /bskal pa mtha'

yas yongs su sbyangs yang dgos/ /rgyal ba dus gsum 'byung ba thams cad kyi/ /pha rol phyin pa'i lam la ngas bslabs te/ /ye shes bla na med pa'i tshul chen gyis/ /byang chub lam mchog rnam par sbyangs yang dgos/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi

zhing rnams thams cad kyang / /kun nas nyon mongs rnam par sbyang bar bya/ /'jig rten kun gyi mi khom thams cad dang / /ngan song kun kyang rnam par bzlog dgos so/ /nyon mongs bsgribs shing gti mug mun 'thoms pa'i/ /sems can kun kyang

ma lus rnam sbyang dgos/ /sna tshogs thabs kyis yongs su sbyang byas te/ /thams cad mkhyen la tshul la dgod kyang dgos/ /chags med sa rnams kun kyang ngas sbyangs te/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor rgyal ba mchod par bya/ /'gro ba ma lus

kun la byams bskyed de/ /'jig rten dag tu ma lus sbyin gtang dgos/ /slong ba kun nas 'dus shing 'ongs mthong nas/ /thams cad gtang bar rtag tu brtson gyur na/ /de tshe khyod ni nga sems mi 'thun te/ /zhum zhing dma' la 'jungs par

mi 'gyur ram/ /nga'i mgo 'dod 'ongs pa ngas mthong ste/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod gyur na/ /de tshe khyod ni sdug bsngal ba gdungs gyur gyis/ /'di 'dra'i don thos rab tu bstan par gyis/ /nga'i rka lag gtubs pa mthong gyur na/ /khyod ni mi

dga' de tshe slong ba la/ /bud ngang gis tshig drag mi bzod smra/ /don 'di thosashing sems la yongs su soms/ /'phags pa'i dngos dag de bzhin bu rnams dang / /khyod kyang slong ba'i tshogs la sbyin dgos kyis/ /don 'di thos te mi dga'

na lta/ /khyod dga' thams cad de bzhin bya la rag/ de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas/ rgyal bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu ji skad gsungs pa de ltar bgyi'o/ /bdag ni

khyod ci dgyes pa dang / /ci bzhed par longs spyod pa dang / gang du dgyes par mchi ba dang / thams cad du yang slad nam las par rjes su 'brang ba dang / rtag tu zham ring slebs pa dang / don thams cad la brtson pa dang / thugs dang 'thun par spyad pa

dang / med par nyams su blang ba dang / /mi 'thun pa ma mchis bar nan tan tu bgyi ba'i tshul la spyad par bgyi'o/ /zhes nas bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas/ rgyal po'i sras gzi brjid kyi bdag po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/

bdag gi las 'di sems can dmyal ba yi/ /zhugs kyis yongs su gdungs zhu bar gyur kyang rung / /khyod spyod skal ba mnyam pa'i phyag rjed du/ /tshe rabs rgya mtshor bdag gi spro bar bgyi/ /tshe rabs mtha' yas skyes pa re re zhing / /bdag

gi las ni shin tu gtubs gshags kyang / /brtan dam sems kyis rab tu spro bar bgyis/ /dad dge khyod kyis bdag gi khyim thab mdzod/ /khor yug ri yis bskal pa mtha' yas su/ bdag gi mgo ni yongs su btags gyur kyang / /

sems la mi bde ma mchis dad par bgyid/ /khyod kyis rtag par bdag gi khyim thab mdzod/ /khyod kyis tshe rabs grangs med thams cad du/ /bdag la thugs brtan thugs kyis mnga' mdzad de/ /lan lag sha gtubs gzhan la

stsal bar mdzod/ /khyod kyi chos la bdag kyang brtan gzhag gsol/ /bdag gi las ni slad na ma las par/ /skyes bu lha yi sras po khyod la dbul/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ /skye bo slong ba rnams la dgyes par gsol/ /

sems can kun la thugs rje mtha' yas pa/ /bskyed de sems can rgya mcho bsdu slad du/ /byang chub dam pa mchog tu khyod bzhugs pas/ /de slad bdag kyang thugs rjes gzung ba mdzod/ /logs spyod don dang nor gyi don ma lags/ /'dod spyod dga' ba

bskyed pa'i don slad du/ /sems can mchog khyod khyor 'tshal ma lags kyi/ /khyod dang sbyong pa 'thun par spyad slad du'o/ /spyan gsal mdzes shing byams pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ /khyod ni 'jig rten gzigs pa ci tshul lags/ /thugs rje

che yi 'dod chags thugs mi mnga'/ de la thub dbang 'gyur ba gdon mi 'tshal/ /khyod kyi zhabs kyis bcags pa'i sa rnams kyang / /dri med rin chen 'od du gnas pa las/ /khams gsum kun tu 'khor los sgyur bar yang / /

mtshan rab yongs kyis brgyan byon gdon mi 'tshal/ /bdag gis g.yar lam mthong ba dgung zhig la/ /chos bzang sprin 'od byang chub snying po yi/ /shing dbang drung na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas sras mang du mas mdun

du bdar/ /rgyal pa'i dbang po sku mchog nyi ma de/ /'dzam bu chu klung rin chen 'tsher ba 'dra/ /g.yar lam mthong bar phyag gis bdag mgo byug /de nas sang nas glo ba rab tu dga'/ /dga' ba'i 'od ces bgyi ba rnam dag lus/ /

sngan chad gnyen bshes gyur pa'i lha mo yis/ /bdag la bstan pa bde gshegs de nyid ni/ /snying po yang dag byang chub yongs la zhugs/ /sngon yang gzhon nu gzi brjid khyod blta zhes/ /bdag gi sems bskyed de ltar bsam par gyur/ /mdang

sum dgung la lha mo dge ba yis/ /gzhon nu de ni mthong bar 'gyur zhes bstan/ /bdag gi bde gshegs g.yar lam pas mthong / /yongs su dag pa'i sems can khyod kyang mthong / /yid bzhin bsam grub khyod dang bdag bcas pas/ /

de ring rgyal ba de la mchod par bgyi/ /de nas rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i mtshan thos te/ sangs rgyas blta ba'i skabs byung nas dga' ba dang mos pa'i shugs chen po skyes te/ bu mo dga' ba'i 'od

kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la nor bu rin po che lnga brgyas mngon bar gtor nas/ gtsug gi rin po che dpal gyi 'od 'bar ba zhes bya ba yang de la byin no/ /mdog ltar 'dug pa'i nor bu rin po che dam pas brgyan pa'i gos rin po ches kyang de

bkab po/ /de de ltar rim gror byas kyang dga' bar gyur pa'am/ /nyams bde bar gyur pa lta bu'ang med la dga' ba dang mos par yang ma gyur gyi/ gzhan du na thal mo sbyar cing mi 'gebs par gzhon nu gzi brjid bdag gi gdong la blta zhing gnas

bar gyur to/ /de nas sbrul 'tshong ma'i gtso mo blta na sdug pas/ rgyal ba gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ /bu mo 'di ni khyod gsal bgyi snyam nas/ /yun ring snga nas bdag gis bsam bsam ste/ /gzugs

mdzes de yang de ring khyod la phul/ /bsod nams legs brgyan yon tan rab dang ldan/ /tshul khrims blo dang yon tan gzhan gyis kyang / /bu mo dam pa 'di dang 'dra ba ni/ /mi yi 'jig rten gang na'ang ma mchis te/ /'jig rten kun gyi bud

med nang na mchog /pad mo'i sbubs nas skyes pas rigs smos su/ /skyon gyi dri mas ma gos 'thad ma lags/ /ma lus skyon gyis ma gos sems dang ldan/ /rtag par khyod kyi spyod tshul mthun par 'gyur/ /reg na bde la kun nas

'phags pas na/ /'di yi lus ni shin tu 'jam pa ste/ /bro 'tshal nad pa gang la reg gyur kyang / /de'i mod la bro dang bral bar 'gyur/ /'di'i lus las spos kyi ngad 'byung ba/ /spos mchog gzhan rnams mngon par zil gyis gnon/ /de yi dri

zhim ma tshor na rnam dag pa'i/ /tshul khrims gnas par mi rnams kun kyang 'gyur/ /'di yi lus ni gser gyi mdog 'dra ste/ /pad mo'i mchog ltar rnam par rab tu gsal/ /khros pas bltas na byams pa'i sems ldan par/ sems can ma lus

kun kyang rab tu 'gyur/ /'di yi tshig snyan yid du 'ong ba ste/ /nyams su bde bas 'gro ba nyan par dga'/ /thos na de rgyus skyon gyi mun pa dang / /mi dge'i sug las bgyid par mos mi 'gyur/ /'di ni bsam dag yid la dri med de/ /'di la kun tu g.yo

dang sgyu ma mchis/ /ji smra de dag yid la'ang de bzhin te/ /tshig dbyangs des ni 'gro ba tshim par bgyid/ /sgyu yis sems can 'drid par mi 'gyid de/ /nor gyi don du 'gro ba yongs mi slu/ /yid bsdams khrel gyis 'dzem dang ldan pa ste/ /rgan nam

gzhon la'ang rtag tu srid zhus spyod/ /rigs rgyud gzugs kyis dregs pa ma mchis te/ /'di ni 'khor gyis dregs pa'ang yod ma mchis/ /nga rgyal rlom sems yongs dang bral ba ste/ /'gro ba rnams la rtag tu gus par 'dud/ /de nas rgyal po'i bu gzi

brjid kyi bdag po bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa dang / bu mo stong phrag nyi shu dang / 'khor thams cad dang bcas par bza' shing gi ra ba spos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo nas 'od kyi sprin 'byung ba de nas byung ste/ snying po byang chub chos kyis

'phags pa'i 'od gang na ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa gang na ba der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang bsten bkur bya ba'i phyir dong ste/ /de rta

babs sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas babs te rkang pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i drung du song ngo / /de nas rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos rgyang ring zhig nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu bzang ba blta na sdug pa dbang po zhi ba thugs zhi ba/ dbang po bsdams pa/ glang po ltar shin tu dul ba/ mtsho ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med la rnam par gsal ba mthong ngo / /de ltar mthong nas de'i sems mngon

bar mos par gyur te/ de ltar sems mngon par mos par gyur nas sangs rgyas mthong ba'i dga' ba dang / mos pa'i shugs chen po rnam par spel de dga' ba dang mos pa dang / spro pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das de la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas

bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la pa 'khor thams cad dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ rin po che dam pa'i pad mo stong phrag lnga brgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mngon par gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug

lag khang lnga brgya nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po spos sna tshogs las byas pa rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ lnga brgya brtsigs so/ /gtsug lag khang re re zhing yang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po stong phrag lnga brgyas rab tu brgyan to/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pas gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas mdo sde sgo kun tu lta ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan to/ /des de thos nas chos thams cad kyi tshul la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho phrag bcu thob par gyur

te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo/ /dus gsum snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du gyur

bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor rab tu thob po/ /sems can 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu snang bar bya ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob po/ /'jig rten thams cad du 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba la zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi

sgo rab tu thob po/ /sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la 'jug pa snang ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i ye shes kyi sprin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob po/ /'gro ba thams

cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la mngon du gyur pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra rnams par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob po/ /

kun tu bzang bo'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par byed pa'i smon lam gyi sprin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bcu po 'di dag la ba chos kyi tshul thams cad la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho phrag bcu rab tu

thob par gyur to/ /bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas kyang ye shes thub par dka' ba rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sems nges par gzhag pa rab tu thob par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi

ldog par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas

nas/ bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa dang / 'khor thams cad dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan snga nas dong ngo / /de nas rgyal po'i gnas sdong bo ri bo'i dpal gang na ba dang / rgyal po yab nor gyi bdag po gang na ba der dong ste/ drung

du phyin nas/ rgyal po yab nor gyi bdag po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ don 'di brjod do/ /lha'i zhal snga nas mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku nyi ma dam pa zhes

bgyi ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo bsgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ khyod kyi khams 'di nyid kyi snying po byang chub

chos kyi sprin shin tu sdug pa'i 'od na rnam par spyod de/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lags so/ /de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag pos/ gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu khyod la don 'di lha 'am mi 'am

su zhig gi sbran/ des smras pa/ bdag la bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas sbran to/ /de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag pos sangs rgyas byung bar thos nas/ sangs rgyas skye ba la ni gter rab tu thob tsam du sems/ sangs rgyas

rin po che dang phrad par ni dka' bar sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas ni ngan song gi g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyang rnam par ldog par sems/ nyon mongs pa'i nad chen po rab tu zhi bar bya ba la ni sman pa'i rgyal po chen po dang phrad pa tsam du

sems/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las ni yongs su 'grel ba yin par sems/ shin tu bde zhing ldan pa la ni rab tu gzhog par sems/ rab rib med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba ni yang dag par ston par sems/ ma rig pa'i mun pa bstsal

ba la ni sgron ma chen po byung ba tsam du sems/ 'jig rten mgon med pa las ni chos kyi tshul gyi mgon dang phrad par sems/ 'jig rten 'dren pa med pa las ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi theg pas 'dren pa skyes par sems shing sangs rgyas byung

bar thos pas mos pa dang / spro ba chen po skyes nas rgyal rigs dang bram ze dag ljongs kyi mi dang / yul gyi mi dang / blon po dang zham ring ba dang / gzhon nu dang rgyal phran dang / khams kyi bdag po dang / 'khor thams cad kyang kun nas bsdus nas/

sangs rgyas byung bar sgra snyan pa sgrog pa'i gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la rgyal po'i srid de yang chos kyi dgab bar byin no/ /de ltar gzhon nu de rgyal srid la dbang bskur nas/ srog chags stong phrag bcu dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku

nyi ma dam pa gang na ba der song ste/ spyan sngar phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar rang gi 'khor dang

bcas te 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pas/ rgyal po nor gyi bdag po dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la gzigs nas/ de'i tshe mdzod spu nas 'od gzer 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rab

tu bkye'o/ /des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad mngon sum du bkod nas/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can

rnams kyi bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par sbyangs nas/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi sku 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho thams

cad dang ldan pas/ gzungs kyi sgo chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i don gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba gzungs kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang bcas par yang dag par bstan to/ /de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag pos gzungs kyi sgo de thos nas chos thams cad la chas

kyi snang ba chen po skyes par gyur to/ /'khor de'i byang chub sems dpal 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kyang chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i don gyi sgron ma'i gzungs rab tu thob par gyur to/ /khrag khrig drug cus ni nye bar len pa med par zag pa las

sems can rnam par grol lo/ /srog chags stong phrag bcus ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med par rnam par dag par gyur to/ /sems can grangs med pa zhig gis ni sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yongs su bskyed do/ /

phyogs bcur yang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan pa des sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa theg pa gsum gyis dul bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag po chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ de'i yid la 'di

snyam ste/ khyim na gnas pas ni rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos kyang khong du chud par mi nus la ye shes rnam pa 'di lta bu yang bsgrubs par mi nus kyis bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas/ rgyal po nor gyi bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di

skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong gi tshul la mchis par ci gnang zhes nas/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de'i dus la dbab par shes na rung ngo / /

de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag po srog chags stong phrag bcu dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i zham ring du rab tu byung ngo / /de ltar rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon par gzungs kyi sgo chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i don gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba de 'khor dang

bcas par yongs su bsgrubs so/ /bsgoms so/ /shin tu bsgoms so/ /de snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo yang rab tu thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bcu yang rab tu thob bo/ /so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul rgya mtsho

la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'gro ba thogs pa med pa'i spyod yul zhes bya ba'i lus yongs su dag pa yang rab tu thob ste/ des bcom ldan 'das de'i chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par blangs so/ /yongs su bzung ngo / /

gtam gyi skyes bu yang byas so/ /chos smra ba chen po yang byas so/ /bstan pa yongs su gzung ba yang byas so/ /mngon par shes pa thob pa'i stobs kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams

la lus yongs su bstan nas/ sangs rgyas byung ba de rab tu brjod pa dang / sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bsgrub pa'i chos nyid mngon par brjod pa dang / sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa de dag yongs su brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul

pa'i mthu de dag yongs su brjod par bya bas bstan pa yongs su gzung ba byas so/ /rgyal po'i sras gzi brjid kyi bdag pos kyang de'i nyin par zla ba nya ste/ rgyas pa'i tshe rin po che bdun rab tu thob par gyur te/ de khang ba'i steng na bud med kyi tshogs kyis

bskor cing 'dug pa'i mdun du 'khor lo rin po che chen po shugs la thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba rtsibs stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las grub pa/ 'od kun tu 'byung ba rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan

ba byung bar gyur to/ /glang bo rin po che chen po rdo rje rin po che'i ri'i gzi brjid ces bya ba 'byung bar gyur to/ /rta rin po che ri sngo rlung gi shugs shes bya ba byung bar gyur to/ /nor bu rin po che chen po nyi ma'i snying po 'od sprin rgyal po zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to/ /bu mo dga'

ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa de yang bud med rin po cher byung bar gyur to/ /khyim bdag rin po che nor kyi phung po mang po zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to/ /blon po rin po che mig dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yang byung bar gyur to/ /de ltar bdun no de de ltar rin po che bdun dang ldan pa'i

rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba gling bzhi la dbang ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa yul gyi mthu dang brtson 'grus su ldan par gyur te/ de la bu dpa' la brtul phod cing yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms

pa stong yod par gyur te/ des sa chen po 'di skyon med pa dang / dgra med pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / skyid pa dang phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba dang lo legs pa dang / mdangs dga' ba dang / skye bo'i mi mang pos yongs su gang ba yang ri

dang rgya mtsho'i mthas klas par chos kyis mngon par brgyan te/ gnas par byas so/ /de sa 'dzam bu'i gling de'i rgyal po'i gnas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dag tu yang rgyal po'i gnas re rer gtsug lag khang lnga brgya byed du btsud de/ thams cad kyang rnam pa'i

mchog thams cad dang ldan pa sha stag go /longs spyod dang yo byad kyi rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa sha stag go /bza' shing gi ra ba dang / khang pa dang 'chag sa dang / dus thams cad du bde bar spyad pa'i nags tshal gyi phreng bas rnam par brgyan

pa sha stag go /gtsug lag khang re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten brtsigs pa ni lhun gyi rgya shin tu che bar byas pa ste/ nang rin po che rnam pa mang pos brgyan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyis rnam par spras pa sha stag ste/

rgyal po'i gnas de thams cad du'ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa 'khor dang bcas pa/ grong khyer du gshegs par bya ba'i phyir spyan drangs so/ /rgyal po'i gnas de dag kun tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa de la de bzhin

gshegs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa thams cad du bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchod de/ sangs rgyas grong khyer du gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pas sems can tshad med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir gshegs su

gsol to/ /der yang sems can ma dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ni dad pa thob par gyur to/ /dad pa dang ldan pa'i sems cad rnams ni sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to/ /dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel ba'i

sems can rnams ni byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa thob par gyur to/ /byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i sems can rnams ni snying rje chen po'i sems skyes par gyur to/ /sems can la phan par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos

thams cad yongs su btsal ba la brtson par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa la mkhas pa'i sems can rnams ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par gzhol bar gyur to/ /chos mnyam pa nyid la zhugs

pa'i sems can rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir/ sems mngon par gzhol bar gyur to/ /dus gsum gyi ye shes snang ba thob pa'i sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnam par par bya ba'i don du

ye shes snang ba la zhugs par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs rnam par par bya ba la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i don du sems can mngon par gzhol bar gyur to/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu

ba la brtson pa'i sems can rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir smon lam skyed par gyur to/ /lam gyi mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir

ye shes snang ba skyed par gyur to/ /chos rgya mtsho rnam par dbye ba la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams ni zhing gi dra ba thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par gang ba'i don du sems mngon par gzhol bar gyur to/ /zhing mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams ni

sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir smon lam 'debs par gyur to/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dpyad pa la brtson pa'i sems can rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir bsam

pa rnam par dag par gyur to/ /sems can rnam pa de lta bu dag gi don rnam pa de lta bu de dag 'grub par 'gyur ba mthong nas/ rgyal po gzi brjid kyi bdag pos sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pas sems

can de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i don du rgyal po'i gnas de dag thams cad du de bzhin gshegs sku nyi ma dam pa gshegs su gsol to/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po zhes bya

bar gyur pa de bzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la dbang ba de bzhin

gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa de yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po nor gyi bdag po gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i yab du gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni de ltar mi blta ste/ de bzhin

gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog gi 'od ces bya ba ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po nor gyi bdag po zhes bya bar gyur pa ste/ da ltar shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams

rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i gzugs brnyan gyi sprin ces bya ba na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dbu ma dus gsum rab tu snang ba'i rin po che'i rgyal po yongs su 'byung ba'i dbyings shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil

'khor dpal gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba na/ snying bo byang chub thams cad la dbang ba'i lus rab tu snang ba zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i

'khor gyis bskor cing chos ston to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od ces bya ba des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i gzugs brnyan du snang ba'i sprin yongs su

dag par mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho der de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa dang / 'byung ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog gi 'od des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa

mdzad pa'i tshe/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smyin par mdzad pa sha stag go /rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i btsun mo pad mo dpal gyi snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag

po'i yum du gyur pa bud med stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gtso mor gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni/ de ltar mi blta ste/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyi yum lha mo sgyu ma byang chub sems dpa' bskyed bskyed pa rnam par thar pa kun tu snang zhing sgrib pa

med pa la rab tu gnas pa/ sngon de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bsgrubs pa mngon du gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i tshul la mkhas pa 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po nor gyi bdag pa'i btsun mo dam pa pad mo dpal gyi snying

po 'byung ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sprul 'tshong ma'i gtso mo blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni de ltar mi blta ste/ shAkya lag na khar pa'i chung ma kho mo'i ma mig mdzes

shes bya ba 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na sprul 'tshong ma'i gtso mo blta na sdug pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa/ zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin ba tsam du sems na

ni de ltar mi blta ste/ kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ sprul 'tshong ma'i bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i 'khor du gyur pa de

rnams gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni/ rigs kyi bu de ni de ltar mi blta ste bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la dgod dgod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil

'khor 'di nyid na 'khod cing / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gzugs brnyan rab tu byung ba'i lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par spyod pa las mnyams pa'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhal

mngon du mthong bar rnam par pa'i mig dang de bzhin mig dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag gi sprin nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bsgrags pa'i dbyangs rnam par pa'i rna ba dang / chos thams cad la rnam par spyad par

dbang bsgyur ba'i dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rjes su grags pa'i ming gi sgra dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du nye bar 'gro ba rgyun mi gcod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang /

sems can thams cad la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par ston pa'i lus yongs su smyin bar bya ba dang / gdul ba la rjes su mthun pa mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam

yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / yang dag par bsgrubs pa phyogs kyi dra ba ma lus pa thams cad du 'dal te/ ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad pa dang ldan pa sha stag /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod

pa 'di dag yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa de ni 'khor los sgyur ba gzi brjid kyi bdag po dang / kho mos nam bzhugs kyi bar du na bza' dang bshos dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang yo byad kyis bsnyen

bkur to/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa sku shin tu dang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de yang kho mo cag gis bsnyen bkur to/

rim gror byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /phu dud du byas so/ /mchod do/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa sku thams cad la ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan gyi zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de yang kho mo cig gis lha'i dbang por gyur te/

bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu chu klung gi gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa sku mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa

'od gzer sna tshogs 'bar ba'i zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rnam par gzigs pa'i ye shes dpal zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen po'i 'od gzer shin tu yangs pa'i

rgyal po zhes bya ba bsten bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mthu bo che'o brtson 'grus zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i mthu zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin

gshegs pa kun tu rnam par gzigs pa'i ye shes shes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dri ma med pa phun sum tshogs pa'i sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i 'od

ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer 'bar ba'i gtsug phud ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od gzer rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye

shes nyi ma'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa sku rin po che'i pad mo shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/ /
