rnam par bsgoms pa rnams kyi gnas/ /gang rnams chos kun mi skye'i tshul la zhugs pa rnams/ /chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i dngos nyid rtogs mdzad la/ /ci la'ang gnas pa mi mdzad nam mkha'i bya bzhin te/ /mkhyen pas bsnyengs pa mi mnga' de dag gnas

'di yin/ /gang rnams 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rang bzhin dngos/ /rtog pa'i rgyus bskyed phyin ci log las byung mkhyen nas/ /'dod chags bral ba'ang rnam par rtog pa mi mdzad pa/ /zhi dang nye bar zhi ldan de dag gnas 'di yin/ /gang rnams rnam par

thar dang bden tshul 'phags lam dang / /phung po de bzhin khams dang skye mched rten pa'i dngos/ /yongs su rtogs mdzad mkhas pa zhi bar mi ltung ba/ /shes rab thabs la mkhas pa de dag gnas 'di yin/ gang rnams sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes phyogs

zhugs shing / /rgyal ba'i zhing la yongs rtog rnam rtog kun zhi la/ /chos rnams dngos po'i rang bzhin med par rtogs mdzad pa/ /zhi bar gzhol ba de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra'o/ /gang rnams chags med spyod pas chos dbyings 'di dag tu/ /dngos dang bral bar

rnam spyod mkha' yi rlung 'dra ba/ /dngos po kun dang bral zhing dngos med rnam spyod pa/ /mi gnas blo mnga' de dag gnas ni 'di yang 'dra/ /gang rnams ngan song rgyud du 'gro ba song gyur te/ /sdug bsngal nad pa mi bde nyams su myong gzigs shing / /byams

pa'i 'od kyis ngan song thams cad zhi mdzad pa/ /byams dang thugs rje'i thugs mnga' de dag gnas 'di yin/ /nyam nga'i 'khor na gnas shing 'phags lam gol gyur te/ /'dron pa dmus long dang bral bar 'gyur 'dra ba'i/ /'jig rten

gzigs shing thar lam rab la 'god mdzad pa/ /'dron po'i bsel rab 'dra ba de dag gnas 'di yin/ /gang rnams skye dang mya ngan rga shi dbang gyur pa'i/ /'gro ba bdud kyi zhags pas yongs su bcings gzigs shing / /rnam par bkrol nas mi 'jigs phyogs

bder 'don mdzad pa/ /dpa' bo de dag thub par dka' ba'i gnas 'di yin/ /nyon mongs nad pa'i 'gro mang gang gis gzigs gyur cing / /ye shes bdud rtsi sman chen yongs su bsdu mdzad nas/ /thugs rje chen po bskyed cing yongs su 'grel mdzad pa/ /sman

pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dra ba'i gnas 'di yin/ /gang gis 'gro mang sdug bsngal mgon med gyur pa rnams/ /nyon mongs gtos su lhung ste tsham gyi mtshor lhung ba/ /gzigs shing dge ba'i chos kyi gru chen yongs sbyar ste/ /sgrol mdzad mnyan pa'i bu 'dra

de dag gnas 'di yin/ /gang gis nyon mongs rgya mtsho spyod pa'i 'gro gzigs shing / /thams cad mkhyen thugs rin chen dgongs dag sems can mchog /srid pa'i rgya mtshor gshegs shing mngon par 'dren mdzad pa/ /mnyan pa'i bu ltar spyod pa de dag

gnas 'di yin/ /smon lam gnas na bzhugs shing thugs rje byams spyan gyis/ /gang rnams sems can gnas su rnam par gzigs mdzad cing / /srid pa'i rgya mtsho gnas pa'i 'gro mang mngon 'don pa/ /mkha' lding gzhon 'dra de dag gnas ni

'di 'dra'o/ /gang rnams chos dbyings mkha' la nyi zla 'dra tshul du/ /sems can gnas su 'od kyis khyab par rnam spyod pa/ /smon lam dkyil 'khor ye shes dri med bzang po'i 'od/ /'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa de dag gnas 'di yin/ /gang

rnams sems can gcig ni yongs su smin bya'i phyir/ /phyi mtha'i bskal pa bye ba zad du brtan gnas la/ /sems can gcig la ji bzhin de bzhin 'gro ba kun/ /'jig rten mgon du gyur pa de dag gnas 'di yin/ /gang rnams 'byam klas zhing gcig phyi mtha'i

bskal bar yang / /'gro don brtson 'grus skyo med spyod pa rnam spyod pa/ /zhing gcig ji bzhin de bzhin phyogs rnams kun tu ste/ /bsam pa rdo rje bzhin brtan de dag gnas 'di yin/ /gang rnams phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs rnams kyi

chos sprin la/ /stan gcig gnas bzhin rmongs pa med par 'thung byed kyang / /phyi mtha'i bskal pa khrag khrig 'grangs par mi ngoms sems/ /blo chen rgya mtsho lta bu'i gnas ni 'di 'dra'o/ /gang rnams zhing mang rgya mtsho brjod du med 'dong zhing / /

mgon po'i 'khor rnams rgya mtshor yongs su 'jug byed la/ /rgyal ba'i mchod pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho rab byed pa/ /chags med spyod yul mnga' ba de dag gnas 'di yin/ /brtan pa grangs rnams smon lam rgya mtshor 'jug byed cing / /spyod pa rgya mtshor

mtha' dang dbus med zhugs gyur te/ /'gro la phan phyir bskal pa rgya mtsho mang spyod pa/ /yon tan 'byung gnas de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra 'o/ /gang rnams skra rtse gcig tu zhing rnams thams cad dang / /sangs rgyas thams cad bskal pa mtha' dang dbus

med pa/ /'dzud cing de yi tshul la 'jug kyang rmongs pa/ /chags pa med pa'i mig can rnams kyi gnas 'di yin/ /gang rnams sems kyi skad cig gcig la rgya mtsho yi/ /bskal ba 'dzud byed zhing dang sangs rgyas 'gro ba rnams/ /de bzhin

'dzud byed bsgribs med ye shes dran gnas pa/ /yon tan mthar phyin de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra'o/ /gang rnams zhing mang thams cad rdul du bgrang byas shing / /chu bo ma lus thams cad thigs pas tshad bzung ste/ /de snyed grangs su smon lam mngon

par sgrub byed pa/ /chags med bgrang ba de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra'o/ /smon lam gzungs dang ting 'dzin sgo la 'jug bya ba/ /bsam gtan rnam thar smon lam sgo rnams de bzhin te/ /bskal pa mtha' yas mngon par sgrub cing rnam

spyod pa/ /bde gshegs sras po dgongs ldan de dag 'dir 'dong ngo / /'di na gnas pa rgyal sras rnam pa sna tshogs te/ /tshig dang don ldan gtsug lag mang po mngon par sgrub/ /'gro la bder 'gyur bzo yi gnas su bya ba dag /rjes su sems shing dam

pa'i gnas na rnam par spyod/ /'di na gnas pa mngon shes thabs dang ye shes kyis/ /phyogs bcu'i sems can 'gro rgyud sna tshogs ji snyed pa/ /kun tu skye zhing 'chi ba'i khyad par rnam par ston/ /rnam thar sgyu ma'i tshul gnas chags med spyod dang ldan/ /

'di na gnas pa thog mar sems bskyed nyer bzung zhing / /chos bzang mthar thug chos kyi spyod pa yongs su ston/ /sprul pa'i sprin gyis chos dbyings yongs su rgyas bkang zhing / /de bzhin rnam 'phrul brgya mang kun kyang nye bar ston/ /gang rnams

sems kyi cha gcig byang chub rnam sangs rgyas/ /ye shes blo gros mtha' dang dbus med las 'jug pa/ /thos te rnam par bsams na 'jig rten rmongs su rung / /thub par dka' ba de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra'o/ /'di ni chags med blo gros rnams/ /chos

dbyings bsgribs pa med pa'i rnam par spyod byed pa/ /pa med pa'i spyod yul can/ /dri med bsam pa'i blo gros gnas yin no/ gang rnams chags pa med spyod cing / /zhing rnams kun tu gnas pa med par rnam spyod pa/ /mi gnyis shes la spyod pa

yi/ /mnyam pa med pa de dag gnas 'di yin/ /gang rnams nam mkha'i rang bzhin dang / /mnyam pa'i chos rnams gnas med zhi ba rtogs gyur te/ /gang rnams mkha' yul rnam spyod pa/ /rdul dang bral ba de dag gnas 'di yin/ /'di na snying rje'i

sems ldan pa/ /gnas shing 'gro ba sdug bsngal gzir ba mthong gyur nas/ /'jig rten phan par bsam brtson te/ /snying rje chen po brnyes pa rnam par spyod/ /'di nas mi snang med gsal bar/ /sems can kun gyi gnas su thogs pa med par snang / /nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil
'khor bzhin/ /'khor ba'i zhags pa kun las rnam par grol/ /rgyal sras de dag 'di na gnas/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi zhabs drung thams cad kun na yang / /zhing rnams kun tu rab tu
snang / /mtha' yas bskal pa rnams kyang zad par mdzad/ /'di nas 'gro ba'i lus mnyam dang / /rgyal sras kun gyi lus dang grangs mang mnyam pa yi/ /sprul pa'i sprin gyis phyogs kyi rnams/ /ma lus thams
cad rgyas par 'gengs pa mdzad/ /'di na bzhugs pa'i dpa' bo rnams/ /rgyal ba'i spyod yul thams cad yongs su 'jal byed cing / /bskal pa bye bar rnam spyod kyang / /yongs su ngoms par 'gyur ba'i dus

med do/ /'dir ni ting 'dzin bye ba rnams/ /brjod du med pa skad cig re re rtogs byas shing / /ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas yul rnams rnam par ston pa mdzad/ /'dir ni skad cig brjod med pa'i/ /

bskal ba zhing rnams sangs rgyas mtshan la rab bzhugs te/ /shin tu yangs pa'i blo ldan pa/ /bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i mthar yang 'byin/ /'di na gnas shing tshad med pa'i/ /bskal par sems rgyud gcig gis rab tu 'jug

pa byed/ /yongs rtog 'du shes med bral yang / /'gro ba'i 'du shes dbang du ston pa byed/ /de dag ting 'dzin 'di gnas su/ /zhugs kyang dus gsum thams cad gsal bar mngon du mthong / /skad cig yud la gnas

brten cing / /rnam thar gnas la rnam par spyod pa mdzad/ /de dag rnam spyod gnas 'di na/ /ma g.yos lus kyis skyil mo krung du 'khod bzhin du/ /zhing rnams thams cad kun tu yang / /thams cad khyab par cig car yongs su snang / /khyu mchog

de dag 'di na gnas/ /bde gshegs rnams las chos kyi rgya mtsho yang dag 'thung / /ye shes rgya mtshor rab tu zhugs/ /mi zad yon tan rnams kyi pha rol phyin/ /'di na zhing rnams kun grangs dang / /bskal pa'i grangs dang de bzhin chos kyi grangs rnams dang / /rgyal

ba kun gyi mtshan gyi grangs/ /sgrib med sems dpa' rnam par dgongs pa mdzad/ /rgyal sras de dag 'di na gnas/ /dus gsum zhing mang 'grangs pa thams cad ma lus par/ /de dag skad cig gcig gis kyang / /yongs su 'byung dang 'jig pa rnam par 'byed/ /

rgyal sras de dag 'di na gnas/ /rgyal ba'i spyod pa smon lam 'gro ba'i dbang po rnams/ /gnas na rnam par spyod byed kyang / /rgyal sras blo la thogs pa med pas mthong / /rdul phran gcig la gang yod pa'i/ /'khor rnams rgya mtsho zhing mang sems can de

bzhin du/ /bskal pa rdul phran kun mnyam pa/ /sgrib pa med par mthong ba rnams kyis mthong / /rdul phran kun rtser de bzhin du/ /'khor dang zhing dang bskal pa thams cad ma lus par/ /kun kyang gzugs brnyan thabs tshul du/ /shin tu rnam phye

yongs su mthong ba yin/ /'di nas de dag chos rnams kyi/ /rang bzhin zhing rnams kun dang dus dang bskal pa dang / /yang dag sangs rgyas de bzhin te/ /rang bzhin dngos bral 'byung ba'i tshul gyis mkhyen/ /'di gnas sems can mnyam nyid dang / /chos

rnams mnyam pa nyid dang sangs rgyas mnyam nyid dang / /zhing dang smon lam mnyam pa nyid/ /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la'ang de bzhin 'jug /sems can khrag khrig rnam par 'dul/ /sangs rgyas khrag khrig rnams kyang de bzhin gzhan mchod byed/ /

gzhan rnams chos la rnam par rtog /'on kyang brtan pa gnas mchog 'di na 'khod/ /bskal pa khrag khrig mang pos kyang / /de dag smon lam ye shes yul blo'i rnam pa dag /bdag gis brjod par mi nus te/ /mtha' yas blo mnga' rnams kyi shin tu

yangs/ /de dag smad pa mi mnga' ba/ /bsgribs med spyod yul rab la shin tu dgyes pa yi/ /pho brang 'di la thal sbyar te/ /bdag kyang lus btud gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo ste/ /bsgribs med spyod pa mnga' ba 'phags

pa byams pa de/ /rnam dag blo mnga' dpe med la/ /de yi rjes su bsams te phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan kyis brgyan pa'i snying po na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams

la/ de dag dang byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa gzhan tshad med pa dag gis kyang / mngon par bstod de shin tu btud nas phyag 'tshal te/ rab tu gus par bltas nas rim gror byas te/ mngon du byas nas mchod de khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par

snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po'i sgo na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po byams pa la blta bar ni mos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang phrad par ni dga' zhing sdod sdod pa las des byang chub sems dpa'

byams pa khang pa brtsegs pa/ de'i phyi rol gyi phyogs gzhan zhig nas srog chags brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po du mas

mdun du byas te/ g.yas g.yon nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po rnams kyis phyag bya zhing yul de na gnas pa gnyen bshes su 'ong ba'i bram ze brgya stong mang pos bskor cing mdun du byas te/ khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par snang

mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po logs su 'ong ba mthong nas dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa gang na ba der logs su mngon du bltas te/ thag ring po nas byang chub sems

dpa' byams pa la lus thams cad kyis phab ste phyag byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor la bltas te/ 'khor kun la lag pa g.yas pas bstan nas yang dag pa'i yon tan gyis bsngags te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag

smras so/ /ltos shig bsam pa yongs su dag pa 'di/ /nor nor rnams rab tu brtan pa'i bu/ /byang chub spyod pa dam pa yongs tshol zhing / /mkhas pa nga'i drung du nye bar 'ongs/ /legs par 'ongs sam snying rje byams byung khyod/ /byams pa'i dkyil

'khor yangs pa legs 'ongs sam/ /legs par 'ongs sam blta na rab zhi ba/ /spyad pa spyod tshe dub par ma gyur tam/ /rnam dag bsam ldan tshur shog 'ongs pa legs/ /skyo med yid ldan tshur shog 'ongs pa legs/ /dbang po ma zhum tshur shog

'ongs pa legs/ /mkhas pa spyod tshe dub pa med grang ngo / /chos rnams thams cad rnam phye'i don byung ba/ /'gro ba thams cad rnam gdul rab brtson pa/ /bshes gnyen thams cad bsnyen bkur rab zhugs pa/ /brtul zhugs mi g.yo brtan pa

khyod 'ongs legs/ /dge ba'i lam gyis 'ongs pa bder 'ongs sam/ /yon tan lam la gnas pa bder 'ongs sam/ /rgyal ba'i lam la zhugs pa bder 'ongs sam/ /lam rnams gang du'ang ngal bar ma gyur tam/ /yon tan rang bzhin tshur shog bder

'ongs sam/ /dge bas mngon brlan tshur shog bder 'ongs sam/ /mtha' yas spyod yul legs par bder 'ongs sam/ /'gro ba kun na khyod mthong shin tu dkon/ /thob dang ma thob mnyam pa'i yid ldan pa/ /smad dang sdug bsngal ma grags rnam

par spangs/ /'jig rten chos la uta pal pad mo bzhin/ /yid la 'khrul med legs par bder 'ongs sam/ /g.yo dang sgyu bral bsam pa dge ldan pa/ /nga rgyal dregs med snod kyi dam pa po/ /khro dang 'tshig med khengs shing 'gying ba med/ /

blta na sdug pa khyod mthong legs pa yin/ /tshur shog phyogs kun spyod yul mngon gyur pa/ /tshur shog rgyal ba'i mdzod rnams sgrub byed pa/ /tshur shog rgyal ba'i mdzod rnams 'phel byed pa/ /yid la dub med legs par khyod 'ongs

sam/ /tshur shog dus gsum yul ldan 'ongs pa legs/ /chos kyi dbyings la mos pa'i dkyil 'khor ldan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan snying por byung / /mkhas pa legs par 'ongs sam ming la lam/ /tshur shog 'jam dpal ye shes pad mo'i mchog /tshur

shog sprin dpal char pas rnam spel ba/ /rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyis btang ba tshur/ /khyod la bsgribs pa med pa'i phyogs kyang bstan/ /ltos shig smon lam dra ba ci 'dra ba/ /chos dbyings rgyas 'gengs bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /byang chub sems dpa'i

spyod la lam bsgrubs pa/ /rgya che yangs byed nor 'dir 'ongs so/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i spyod yul tshol byed cing / /rdul dang bral ba'i spyod pa 'gro ba'i phyir/ /smon lam rlabs chen yongs su 'dri byed cing / /skyo ba'i yid med 'di ni 'dir

'ongs so/ /'das pa'i mgon pos gang la bslabs mdzad de/ /de bzhin ma byon rnams kyang slob 'gyur la/ /bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i spyod par bya ba rnams/ /yongs su dris phyir 'di ni 'dir 'ongs so/ /'di ni bdag gis dge bshes chos

smra ba/ /chos kun nan tan yongs su ston byed pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod lam yongs ston pa/ /yin zhes sems gcig bsam nas 'dir 'ongs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis blo bskyed pa/ /sangs rgyas sras po byang chub bskyed

byed pa/ /'di dag bdag bshes sangs rgyas bsngags pa zhes/ /de ltar dge ba'i sems kyis 'dir 'ongs so/ /'di dag bskyed pas bdag gis ma lta bu/ /yon tan 'o ma ldud pas ma ma 'dra/ /byang chub yan lag yongs su skyong ba yin/ /dge

bshes 'di dag gnod pa rnam par zlog /rga shi mthar byed sman pa lta bu ste/ /bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs brgya byin lha dbang 'dra/ /zla ba lta bu dkar po'i phyogs kyis rgyas/ /zhi ba'i phyogs ston nyi ma gsal ba 'dra/ /dgra dang 'grogs la ri bo 'dra ba ste/ /

rgya mtsho bzhin du mi 'khrug sems dang ldan/ /yongs su skyong dang mnyan pa 'dra ba zhes/ /de 'dra'i sems kyis nor 'dir 'ongs so/ /'jigs med skyob pas dpa' bo lta bu ste/ /ded dpon mgon dang skyabs su gyur pa yin/ /'di dag bdag la bde

stobs yin zhes/ /de 'dra'i sems kyis dge bshes bsnyen bkur byed/ /chos kyi phyogs rnams rtag tu ston pa ste/ /sangs rgyas yon tan ye shes ston pa yin/ /ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad sbyong bar byed/ dge bshes 'di dag

bdag la dge ba ston/ /'di dag rgyal ba'i mdzod kun stobs pa yin/ /'di dag rgyal ba kun gyi mdzod srung ste/ /'di dag rgyal ba kun gyi gsang 'dzin ces/ /de ltar mkhas pa 'di ni dge bshes bsnyen/ /ye shes phun ldan 'di las rnam par dag /

gzugs dang longs spyod cho rigs phun sum tshogs/ /'di las phun sum tshogs kun dkon pa min/ /bsam pa de 'dras 'di ni 'dir 'ongs so/ /bsam pa rlabs chen 'di la kun kyang ltos/ /mkhas pa'i dge bshes rnams la 'di sten cing / /mkhas

pa 'di blo ci 'dra skyed pa ltos/ /khyod kyis rtag tu de ltar bslab par bya/ /'di ni sngon gyi bsod nams dge ba'i rgyus/ /byang chub zhugs te 'jam dpal mthong gyur nas/ /de yi gdams ngag rjes su mthun spyod cing / /skyo ba med par rgyu ba 'di la ltos/ /

'di ni dga' bde thams cad kun spangs te/ /lha rdzas lta bu'i khyim yang yongs su spangs/ /pha ma ma ma skyid pa rgya chen kun/ /yongs su spangs shing bran ltar bshes gnyen sten/ /mkhas pa 'dis ni bsam pa rnam sbyangs te/ /bdag gis ma lus yongs su

spangs byas nas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi pho brang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de phyir 'bras bu de 'dra'ang thob par gyur/ /'dis ni rga dang nad kyis mnar ba yi/ /srog chags sdug bsngal brgya yis gtses pa rnams/ /skye shi mya ngan 'jigs pas gdung mthong

nas/ /de dag don du snying rje'i sems kyis spyod/ /'gro rgyud lnga yi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du/ /sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor btsir ba'i 'gro mthong nas/ /sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo 'joms pa yi/ /ye shes rdo rje sra ba 'di tshol lo/ /'dod chags zhe

sdang rtswa sdong tsher ma can/ /lta chags rtsa mang yongs su 'dzings pa yi/ /sems can zhing ni yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir/ /shes rab gzhol brtan bzang po 'di tshol lo/ /gti mug ma rig thibs po'i bsam pa can/ /'gro ba shes rab mig stor

med pa/ /de la phyogs bde ston pa'i mthu yod pa'i/ /'gro ba'i ded dpon bzang por 'di 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i go bgos rnam thar bzhon pa zhon/ /ye shes ral gris mya ngan dgra 'joms pas/ /mi 'jigs stobs pa'i dpa' bor gyur pa 'di/ /

'gro ba rnams kyi lam ston 'gyur ba yin/ /'di ni chos kyi gru rab sbyor ba ste/ /ye shes rgya mtsho'i lam la bslabs pa'o/ /zhi ba rin chen mchog gis gling skyel ba/ /'di ni khams gsum mtsho yi skye ba 'dzin/ /ye shes 'od zer smon lam dkyil 'khor

can/ /sems can kun gyi gnas su snang byed pa'i/ /chos dbyings mkha' la 'od chen rab ldan par/ /'di ni sangs rgyas nyi mar 'char bar 'gyur/ /byams pa'i dga' ldan ting 'dzin dang bsil ba'i/ /sems can kun la snyoms sems 'od bzang la/ /

dkar po'i chos kyis dkyil 'khor yongs rgyas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas zla ba 'di ni 'char bar 'gyur/ /bsam pa'i gzhi rten brtan la rab gnas pa/ /byang chub spyod pas rim gyis 'phags pa ste/ /chos kun rin chen 'byung gnas ldan pa yi/ /ye shes

rgya mtsho'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems kyi klu yi dbang gis phyung / /chos kyi dbyings kyi mkha' la mngon par 'phags/ /dkar po'i 'bras bu'i lo tog 'phel byed pa'i/ /'di ni 'gro bar chos sprin char 'bebs 'gyur/ /dag pa'i

snying po'i dri gsum mun sel ba/ /byams pa'i snum yod dran pa'i snod brtan la/ /dri med byang chub sems me 'od bzang po'i/ /chos kyi mar me 'di ni 'bar byed 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni mar mer snying rje sko/ /byams pa rdol pa mi g.yo bsam pa 'khregs/ /

byang chub yan lag mthar gyis byung ba yi/ /sangs rgyas sras su 'di ni yang dag skye/ /bsod nams snying po mngon par 'phel bar byed/ /ye shes snying po yongs su spyod par 'gyur/ /'di ni shes pa'i snying po 'char bar byed/ /smon lam ci bzhin snying

po yang dag byung / /snying rje byams pas sprul pa 'di 'dra ba/ /sems can dgrol blo phan pa'i bsam ldan pa/ /rnam dag yid can 'di ni ci 'dra ba/ /de 'dra'i 'gro ba lha dang mir bcas dkon/ /'di 'dra'i bsam pa rab tu rtsa brtan la/ /'di 'dra'i sbyor ba brtan

pas rnam 'phel cing / /srid gsum yog par byed pa 'di 'dra ba'i/ /ye shes shing chen 'bras bu 'byung ba dkon/ /'di ni yon tan kun sgrub don du gnyer/ /chos rnams thams cad yongs su dri bar mos/ /the tshom thams cad rnam par gsal

don du/ /le lo med par bshes gnyen thams cad sten/ /'di ni bdud kyi dkrugs ma nyon mongs 'joms/ /'di ni lta ba'i dri ma sred pa sel/ /'di ni 'gro ba thams cad dgrol la brtson/ /mkhas pa 'di ni rtag tu khyad par tshol/ /yon tan lam la

ma nor 'di gnas pas/ /'di ni ngan song thams cad sbyong bar 'gyur/ /mtho ris lam yang nye bar ston par 'gyur/ /thar pa'i lam du 'gro ba 'dzud par 'gyur/ /'di ni 'gro rgyud kun gyi sdug bsngal sel/ /'di ni 'gro rgyud kun gyi bde ba

stobs/ /'di ni srid pa kun gyi zhags pa 'thub/ /srid pa'i 'gro rgyud thams cad sel bar 'gyur/ /lta ba dogs pa rnam par 'byed par 'gyur/ /srid pa'i 'khri shing dra ba gcod par 'gyur/ /chags pa'i 'dod chags nye bar sbyong bar 'gyur/ /

srid gsum lam yang yongs su ston par 'gyur/ /'di ni 'jig rten mgon dang skyabs yin te/ /'di ni 'gro ba kun la 'od byed pa'o/ /rnam pa kun tu srid pa sel la mkhas/ /sa gsum kun gyi 'dren par 'di 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs gnyid log 'gro ba sad

par byed/ /'dod pa'i 'dam las mkhas pa 'di sgrol te/ /'du shes chags las yongs su 'di yang 'grel/ /bcings pa kun las thar bar byed par 'gyur/ /chos dbyings gzhi yi bye brag snang bar byed/ /'jig rten khams kyi bye brag sbyong bar 'gyur/ /

chos kun gzhi yi bye brag pha rol phyin/ /nor khyod ni dga' ba skyed par 'gyur/ /mkhas pa khyod kyi sbyor ba'i tshul dag dang / /dag cing khyod la smad pa med tshul dang / /khyod kyi bsam pa'i yon tan ldan tshul las/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs

su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /khyod kyi bdag nyid dge bar byas tshul gyis/ /ring por mi thogs sangs rgyas kun mthong 'gyur/ /ring por mi thogs zhing rnams kun 'gror 'gyur/ /chos kun ring por mi thogs shes par 'gyur/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho

rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur/ /sems can rgya mtsho rnam par 'grel bar 'gyur/ /spyod pa rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /khyod kyi yon tan rgya mtsho de 'dra'o/ /khyod kyi mos pa'i dkyil 'khor tshul las na/ /khyod ni yon tan rnams kyi snod

du 'gyur/ /khyod ni dge ba yang dag 'byung gnas 'gyur/ /khyod ni rgyal ba'i sras dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /khyod kyi smon lam dkyil 'khor tshul las na/ /khyod kyis bdud kyi dkyil 'khor pham par byas/ /khyod kyis las kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par

sbyangs/ /nyon mongs dkyil 'khor khyod kyis dag par byas/ /ye shes rgyud ni rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur/ /chos kyi rgyud ni rab tu brjod par 'gyur/ /las dang nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor rgyud/ /ring por mi thogs rnam par zlog par 'gyur/ /

'jig rten 'khor lo srid pa'i 'khor lo rten/ /shu ba'i lam rgyud lnga yi 'khor lor rmongs/ /'gro kun sdug bsngal 'khor lo gcod pa yi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rigs ni rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur/ /chos kyi rigs

ni yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur/ /dge 'dun rigs ni yongs su bsdud par 'gyur/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i 'byung gnas khyod 'gyur ro/ /sred pa'i dra ba rnam par zlog par 'gyur/ /lta ba'i dra ba thibs po de bzhin te/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal dra ba 'grel

par 'gyur/ /smon lam dra ba de 'dra khyod kyis sbyangs/ /sems can khams ni yongs su smin byed 'gyur/ /'jig rten khams ni yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur/ /ye shes khams ni shin tu dag byed 'gyur/ /khyod kyi bsam pa'i khams ni de 'dra'o/ /nor

dga' ba 'phel bar byed pa khyod/ /sems can kun la phan bde dga' byed 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rigs rgyud dga' byed cing / /sangs rgyas thams cad smon lam dga' byed 'gyur/ /sems can kun gyi 'gro ba'i gnas ston pa/ /zhing

rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan snang ston pa/ /chos rnams thams cad snang ba rab ston pa'i/ /lta na bzang ba'i rgyal bar khyod 'gyur ro/ /chos dbyings snang bar byed pa'i 'od ldan pa/ /sems can khams rnams bde byed 'od ldan pa/ /ngan song thams cad

zhi byed 'od ldan pa'i/ /srid gsum sdug bsngal zhi bar byed par 'gyur/ /mtho ris lam ni nye bar ston par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas lam ni 'gro la 'byed par 'gyur/ /thar ba'i lam du 'gro ba khrid par 'gyur/ /de 'dra'i lam ni khyod kyis rnam par

sbyangs/ /log pa'i lam ni rnam par zlog par 'gyur/ /skye bo 'phags pa'i lam la 'dul bar 'gyur/ /brtan pa'i blo gros le lo med pa khyod/ /yeng byang chub lam ni de ltar tshol/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshor gnas pa'i lus can rnams/ /

sdug bsngal mthar 'byin bya ba khyod brtson pas/ /'gro ba srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/ /khyod kyi yon tan mtsho chen de 'dra'o/ /ye shes nyi ma mchog gi 'od gzer mtshos/ /lus can nyon mongs rgya mtsho yongs skams shing / /de dag nan tan mtsho

la dgod byas nas/ /ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu dgod par 'gyur/ /blo gros rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ /spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam par sbyang bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi smon lam rgya mtsho la/ /ring por mi thogs yongs su 'jug par 'gyur/ /

mkhas pa khyod ni blo gros rgya mtsho'i mthus/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho mang por phyin par 'gyur/ /'khor rnams rgya mtsho mang po mthong bar 'gyur/ /tshes mang rgya mtsho yongs su 'thung bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas sprin mang khrag khrig mthong bar 'gyur/ /

mchod sprin shin tu rgya chen byed par 'gyur/ /chos kyi sprin mang khrag khrig thos par 'gyur/ /khyod ni smon lam de 'dra'i sprin kyang byed/ /sems can thams cad gnas mang rgyas 'gengs 'gyur/ /zhing rnams kun gyi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /

sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas su phyin par 'gyur/ /khyod ni de 'dra'i phyogs su zhugs pa yin/ /khyod ni ting 'dzin gnas su 'jug par 'gyur/ /khyod kyis rnam thar gnas rnams thob par 'gyur/ /khyod ni mngon shes gnas la spyod par 'gyur/ /chos kyi

dbyings kyi gnas la rab tu gnas/ /nyi zla'i gzugs rnams rab tu snang ba ltar/ /sems can kun gyi gnas su 'char bar 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi spyan sngar mngon 'byung 'gyur/ /khyod kyi 'byung ba'i lam chen de 'dra'o/ /'jig rten kun

la mi gnas spyod yul dang / /nam mkha'i spyod yul bzang por khyod spyod 'gyur/ /khyod kyi spyod yul rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /khyod kyi mngon shes spyod yul de 'dra 'o/ /mig 'phrul 'dra ba'i bye brag gzhi mkhas khyod/ /zhing gi dra ba'i bye brag ji snyed gzhi/ /ser

bu mkha' la chags pa med pa ltar/ /ring por mi thogs rgyas par 'gengs par 'gyur/ /chos dbyings 'byam klas khong du chud par 'gyur/ /'byam klas 'jig rten khams su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byam klas kun/ /

mthong bar 'gyur gyis nor dga' bar gyis/ /khyod kyis de 'dra'i rnam thar de lta bu/ /mthong la mthong zhing da dung mthong bar 'gyur/ /de bas mkhas pa skyo bar ma byed cig /dga' yangs zang zing med pa nyams su long / /nor khyod ni

yon tan snod bzang ste/ /khyod ni rgyal ba rnams kyi gdams ngag mthun/ /khyod kyis tshul 'di yongs su gzung bar nus/ /de bas rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag mthong / /sangs rgyas sras po gnas med spyod yul can/ /gang rnams mthong bar bskal pa khrag khrig du/ /

shin tu dga' na legs brjod mi smos pa/ /de dag spyod legs spyod tshe khyod kyis mthong / /de ltar 'jam dpal mngon du mthong gyur te/ /de 'dra'i yon tan snod du gyur byas pa/ /khyod kyis thob pa rgya cha bsam mi khyab/ /mi yi srid par khyod ni legs par

'ongs/ /ngan song lam rnams thams cad rnam par zlog /mi khom ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par sbyangs/ /sdug bsngal chos rnams khyod kyis thams cad bor/ /mi dga' thams cad yongs su spang bar gyis/ /byis pa'i sa ni khyod kyis rnam par zlog/ /

byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan sa la gnas/ /ye shes sa yi dam pa yongs bskang zhing / /sangs rgyas sar ba ring por mi thogs thob/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho steng / /sangs rgyas ye shes nam mkha'i mdzod dang mtshungs/ /de yi tshad kyi

smon lam gang chen mtsho/ /khyod kyis btsal zin shin tu dga' bar gyis/ /de ltar dbang po yongs su mi skyo la/ /bsam pa brtan zhing sbyor ba nges pa rnams/ /gang dag 'di 'dra'i bshes gnyen bsten byed pa/ /de dag ring bor mi thogs

mgon por 'gyur/ /khyod kyi byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs kyis/ /sems can mang po dul bar gyur mthong zhing / /chos kun sgo yi byang chub spyod pa la/ /nam yang yid gnyis byed par ma gyur cig /de ltar phun sum tshogs pa 'di 'dra 'di/ /sangs rgyas sras po

de ring 'dir mthong ba/ /don chos yon tan dang ba phun sum tshogs/ /khyod kyi bsod nams phun ldan bsam mi khyab/ /de ltar rgyal sras rnams kyi rgyun 'brel bar/ /rang rang so so'i smon lam bstan byas te/ /khyod kyi de dag ma lus mthun rtogs pa/ /khyod

mthong thob pa chen po ci 'dra ltos/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i snod gyur pa/ /de 'dra'i srid pa brgyar yang dkon pas na/ /de phyir rgyal sras de dag rgyun 'brel bar/ /khyod la rnam thar tshul rnams yongs su ston/ /bskal ba khrag khrig bye bar 'gro ba gang / /

bde gshegs sras dang lhan cig 'grogs gyur pa/ /de dag de rnams spyod yul mi shes te/ /de dag yon tan snod du bdag ma byas/ /khyod kyis 'di 'dra'i tshul 'di thos par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rnam 'phrul ba/ /'gro ba kun na

dkon pa khyod kyis mthong / /de ltar nor dga' ba'i yid du gyis/ /khyod la sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs pa mdzad/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyod gzung phyir yang gnas/ /khyod kyang de dag rjes su bstan la gnas/ /legs so nor khyod

kyi 'tsho ba dge /byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyi chos la gnas/ /khyod ni rgyal sras yon tan rnams la slob/ /bde bar gshegs rigs rnam par 'phel byed 'gyur/ /nor dga' ba rgya chen nyams su long / /sangs rgyas mnyam med thams cad

khyod kyi pha/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad khyod dang spun/ /byang chub yan lag thams cad khyod kyi gnyen/ /khyod ni bde gshegs thugs las skyes pa'i sras/ /chos kyi rgyal po rig pa'i rgyud 'dzin pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rigs rgyud 'phel bar

byed/ /ring por mi thogs chos rgyal thob 'gyur gyis/ /nor dbang po tshim zhing dga' bar gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur dam pa yang / /ring por mi thogs rmad byung thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i sras dang mtshungs shing mnyam par 'gyur/ /

khyod kyi spyod pa'i tshul mthun de 'dra'o/ /mi gang ci 'dra'i sa bon 'debs byed pa/ /de ni de 'dra'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /dga' ba rgya chen bsam yas nyams su long / /ngas ni de ring khyod kyi dbugs kyang dbyung / /tshe gcig khyod kyis gang rnams thob gyur pa/ /

byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig bsam yas pa/ /bskal ba khrag khrig byang chub spyad spyod pa/ /de dag gis kyang phun sum 'di ma rnyed/ /'di rnams thams cad mos pa'i 'bras bu ste/ /brtson 'grus bsam pa dag ni de bzhin no/ /gang zhig spyod pa 'di

'dra dka' ba yang / /nor spyod pa gang yin de la spyod/ /spyod pa thams cad smon lam byung ba yin/ /chos rnams thams cad mos las yongs su byung / /nor de ltar khyod kyis yongs su bsgrubs/ /rtag tu khyad par spyod pa btsal bar

gyis/ /klu yi bsam pa ji snyed byung gyur pa/ /de snyed char pa yongs su 'bab par 'gyur/ /smon lam ye shes spyod yul ji snyed pa/ /de snyed byang chub spyod pas rgyas par 'gyur/ /nor bzang po'i spyod ces bya ba 'di/ /tshul ni khyod la bstan pa

'di yin gyis/ /de shes gyis la dge bshes rang bzhin gyis/ /bsnyen bkur byed tshe 'jug par ma byed cig /lus rnams bye ba sngan cad khyod kyis kyang / /'dod pa'i don du don med zad byas soms/ /da ni byang chub yongs su tshol gyur na/ /brtul shugs

bzang po brtul bas zhig go 'dang / /khyod kyis bskal pa bye ba 'das byas te/ /'dus byas sdug bsngal thams cad nyams su myong / /gang gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas mnyes ma byas/ /'di 'dra'i tshul yang thos par ma gyur to/ /de las da ni khom

par mir yang skyes/ /sangs rgyas 'byung mthong dge bshes 'di 'dra ste/ /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa'ang thos par 'gyur/ /rnam dag sems su da go cir mi 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa yang du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dge bshes de bzhin chos mnyan thos par 'gyur/ /

gal te bsam pa yongs su ma sbyangs na/ /tshul 'di phyin chad thos par dka' ba yin/ /de bas dad dang mos dang bsam pa rnams/ /yongs su bskyed la bla ma phud dud gyis/ /the tsom lta ba yongs su skyo spangs la/ /yang dang yang du 'di 'dra tshul nyon cig /

gang gis spyod la 'jug pa 'di 'dra 'di/ /thos nas de 'dra'i smon lam mngon bsgrubs pa/ /de dag thob pa dam pa bsam mi khyab/ /de dag mi yi srid par legs par 'ongs/ /gang gis de 'dra'i mos ba sbyangs pa ni/ /de la bde gshegs thams cad mi

dkon no/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi sras dang spun/ /de la phyin chad byang chub the tsom med/ /gang zhig 'di 'dra'i tshul 'dir zhugs gyur pa/ /des ni log par ltung ba thams cad spangs/ /des ni sdug bsngal chos rnams thams cad bstsal/ /des ni yon tan

thams cad bsdu ba byas/ /lus ni bor nas ring por mi thogs su/ /yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gnas su 'jug par 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /nor khyod kyi

sngon gyi rgyu sdug pas/ /da ltar byung la mos pa nges pa yis/ /khyad par don gnyer dge bshes bsten byas pas/ /chu las uta pal bzhin de phyir 'phel/ /dge bshes thams cad phu dud bsam pa dang / /sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes bya'i bsam pa dang / /

chos kun yongs su dri ba'i bsam pa can/ /brtul zhugs bzang po ldan pa dal gyis longs/ /chos kyi nan tan kun la rab gnas pa/ /lam rnams rjes su kun tshol rab gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi smon lam rab gnas pa/ /yon tan chos rnams

kun gyi snod khyod longs/ /mos pa phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra bas/ /khyod kyis nga la phyag 'di byas pa ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'khor du mngon sum du/ /ring por mi thogs yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur/ /skyo ba'i yid med nor legs pa yin/ /

sangs rgyas kun gyi smon lam sems ldan pa/ /brtul zhugs brtan khyod ring por mi thogs par/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan mthar phyin 'gyur/ /ye shes spyod yul rnam par mthar phyin pa'i/ /'jam dpal gan du nor khyod song ste/ /bzang

po spyod pa dam pa mchog dris shig /de tshul khyod 'jug de nas byed par 'gyur/ /de ltar byams pa chags med spyod yul gyis/ /nor yang dag legs pas 'phags mthong nas/ /'khor rnams kun la mngon par bstan byas te/ /de yi

yon tan legs mdzod 'di brjod do/ /'di 'dra'i rjes su bstan pa dam pa dang / /gdams ngag de 'dra nor thos gyur nas/ /dga' ba'i shugs kyis dbang po mngon brlan pas/ /mchi ma'i rgyud mang rab tu des kyang blags/ /dga' ba'i

nyams chen nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ /dbang po tshim nas shugs kyis dbugs kyang phyung / /nor langs te thal mo rab sbyar nas/ /byams pa de la bskor ba rab tu byas/ /de yi lag tu 'jam dpal sems dbang gis/ /me tog phreng ba

rin chen mdzes pa dag /byang chub sems dpa'i smon pas mngon 'thon pa/ /yid du 'ong ba mang po byung bar gyur/ /nor de tshe rab tu dga' gyur nas/ /dga' bar de dag byams pa de la gtor/ /de tshe de yi mgo la kun nas byugs/ /

byams pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras/ /rgyal ba'i sras po nor legs so legs/ /de ltar khyod ni yongs su mi skyo bas/ /nga dang 'jam dpal ci 'dra ci bzhin du/ /yon tan snod du khyod ni myur de 'gyur/ /thos nas nor

dga' ba'i tshig brjod pa/ /'di 'dra'i dge bshes bdag dang phrad pa ni/ /srid pa brgya phrag 'grangs par shin tu dkon/ /bdag gis de ring 'dir phyin shin tu legs/ /yon tan kun gyi pha rol phyin gyur pa/ /'jam dpal khyod kyi byin rlabs bzang po yis/ /bdag gis

bshes gnyen 'di dag dkon pa rnyed/ /khyod dang bdag tu myur du 'grogs par ro// //sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu dgu pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po byams pa'i mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar

nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa byams pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sku tshe gcig gis thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ste/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sku tshe gcig gis thogs

pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'god pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa lags/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par rab tu zhugs pa lags/ de ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa lags/ de ni bzod pa'i sgo

thams cad du zhugs pa lags/ des ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rab tu brnyes pa lags/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba'i sgo thams cad la rnam par rol pa lags/ des ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su bsgrubs pa

lags/ /des ni byang chub sems dpa'i rgyud thams cad rtogs par thugs su chud pa lags/ des ni gzungs dang spobs pa snang ba'i tshul thams cad la rab tu brnyes pa lags/ /des ni byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad la mnga' thob pa lags/ des ni byang

chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad shin tu bstsags pa lags/ des ni shes rab dang thabs mkhas pa'i tshul la rnam par rol pa lags/ des ni mngon par shes pa chen po dang / rig pa dang ye shes snang ba'i tshul bskyed pa lags/ de ni bslab pa thams cad las

byung ba lags/ des ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyangs pa lags/ des ni smon lam gyis 'byung ba'i sgo thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa lags/ des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lung bstan pa rab tu blangs pa lags/ de ni theg pa

thams cad kyis 'byung ba'i sgo la mkhas pa lags/ des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par blangs pa lags/ des ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub yongs su bzung ba lags/ des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

chos kyi mdzod bzung ba lags/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin pa lags/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi spyi bor phyin pa lags/ de ni nyon mongs pa'i dpung thams cad

rnam par dkrugs pa la shin tu dpa' ba lags/ de ni 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par lus pa rnams kyi lam ston pa lags/ de ni nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis thebs pa rnams kyi sman par gyur pa lags/ de ni sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin pa lags/

de ni 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi dbang po lags/ de ni 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi thu bo lags/ de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gtso bo lags/ de ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho la rgyu ba rnams kyi skyabs 'dzin pa lags/ des ni sems

can gdul ba'i thabs kyi rgya mtsho chen po bshal ba lags/ des ni 'gro ba yongs su smin pa rnams kyi dbang po rnam par gzigs pa lags/ de ni sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba la brtson pa lags/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la

yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa lags/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba thams cad la yang dag par 'gro bar brtson pa lags/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na gnas pa lags/ de ni 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du mngon par 'phags

pa lags/ de ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas su gzugs brnyan snang ba lags/ de ni 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa lags/ de ni bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa lags/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad kyi rjes su bzhud pa

lags/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yul thams cad la sgrib pa med pa brnyes pa lags/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par brtson pa lags/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur ba lags/ de ni dbang bskur ba'i thabs thob

pa lags/ de ni chos kyi rgyal srid chen po la gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la dbang bskur ba lags/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu 'byung ba lags/ de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang bsgyur

ba'i mthar phyin pa lags na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas nan tan du bgyis na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par 'gyur

ba dang / sems can gyi khams ji ltar gnyer ba'i tshul bzhin du rim gror bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / yi dam ji ltar bcas pa'i tshul bzhin du mthar phyin par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chen po brtsams pa grub par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang bcas pa'i

'jig rten dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ba dang / bdag dang sems can dang sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun bslu bar mi 'gyur ba dang sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs stong bar mi 'byin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i

tshul yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad la bltas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor la nye bar bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu dag tshong

dpon gyi bu 'di 'di ltar nga la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang yon tan yongs su bsgrub pa 'dri ba la ltos/ bzod pa can dag tshong dpon gyi bu 'di ni brtson 'grus brtsams pa 'di lta bu dang don du gnyer ba 'di lta bu dang mos pa'i yi dam 'di lta bu dang lhag pa'i bsam pa

brtan pa 'di lta bu dang brtson 'grus mi zlog pa 'di lta bu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis mi ngoms par 'di lta bu dang / khyad par yongs su btsal ba 'di lta bu dang mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba lta bur spyod pa 'di lta bu dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong bar 'dod pa 'di lta bu dang /

dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur bas skyo ba med pa 'di lta bus dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad yongs su tshol zhing yongs su dri ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba byed cing 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas btang nas grong khyer dpal gyi 'byung gnas nye bar bzung ba nas

lho phyogs kyi rgyud thams cad du rgyus te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen brgya rtsa bcu la yongs su dri ba byed cing / tha ma nga'i drung 'di'i bar du skyo ba thams cad dang bral ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas phyin te/ rigs kyi bu dag rnam pa 'di lta bur theg pa chen po la yang dag par

zhugs pa yi dam chen po la yang dag par gnas pa dang / bsam pa chen po la rab tu rtul ba'i yid dang ldan pa/ snying rje chen po'i go bgos pa'i ngad dang ldan pa/ byams pa chen pos sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i blo gros can brtson 'grus chen po'i pha

rol tu phyin pa la rab tu brtson pa/ sems can gyi lam grogs mang po yongs su bskyang ba la mngon par brtson pa/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las sems can bsgral ba la zhugs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam chen po la zhugs pa/

chos kyi gru chen po yang dag par bsham pa la brtson pa/ chos chen po dang bsod nams rin po che yongs su bsdu ba la rab tu rtul ba/ chos kyi mchod sbyin chen po'i tshogs bstsags pa la/ brtson pa rnams kyi ming thos pa'am/ gzugs kyi lus mthong

ba'am spyod yul du 'grogs pa'am/ spyod pa dang skal ba mnyam pa ni shin tu dkon no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu skyes bu dam pa 'di ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i don du byung ba ste/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las yongs su

thar bar bya ba dang / ngan song thams cad yang dag par bstsal pa dang / mi khom pa'i lam thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / lam nyam nga ba thams cad yongs su spang ba dang / mi shes pa'i mun pa nag po thams cad rnam par bstsal ba dang / 'khor

ba'i 'brog dgon pa thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang / 'gro ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang / gnas kyi rten thams cad las gyen du bskyod pa dang / rten gyi gzhi

thams cad las bskul ba dang / 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du mi gnas par bya ba dang / 'dod pa'i 'dam nas yang dag par 'don pa dang / dga' ba'i 'dod chags spang ba dang / lta ba'i bcings pa gtub pa dang / 'jig tshogs la mngon par

zhen pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'du shes kyi zhags pa yang dag par gcad pa dang / phyin ci log gi lam nas rnam par bzlog pa dang / nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bsnyal ba dang / bag la nyal ba'i zug rngu yang dag par dbyung ba dang / sgrib pa'i sgo glegs

gzhom pa dang / sgrib pa'i ri rnam par gtor ba dang / sred pa'i dra ba nas gdon pa dang / ma rig pa'i kun tu sbyor ba las dbye ba dang / srid pa'i chu bo las bsgral ba dang / g.yo dang sgyu spang ba dang sems kyi rnyog pa gdang ba dang / the tshom dang yid gnyis dang nem nur

bstsal ba dang / mi shes pa'i chu bo chen po las bsgral ba dang / 'khor ba'i skyon thams cad rnam par smad pa'i phyir rab tu zhugs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu skyes bu dam pa 'di ni sems can rnams chu bo bzhi las yongs su bsgral ba'i phyir chos kyi gru chen po yang dag par

bsham par 'dod pa'o/ /lta ba'i 'dam du bying ba rnams chos kyi rkang stegs chen po dgod par 'dod pa'o/ /gti mug gi mun par 'thoms pa rnams la ye shes kyi snang ba dbyung bar 'dod pa'o/ /'khor ba'i mya ngam du 'khyams pa rnams la 'phags

pa'i lam bstan par 'dod pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i nad chen pos gzir ba rnams la chos kyi sman sbyin par 'dod pa'o/ /skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi bas gtses pa rnams la 'chi ba med pa'i dbyings sbyin par 'dod pa'o/ /me gsum rab tu 'bar ba rnams la zhi

gnas kyi chus rab tu zhi bar bya bar 'dod pa'o/ /mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pas gdungs pa rnams la dbugs phyin pa chen po sbyin par 'dod pa'o/ /srid pa'i btson ras 'khor ba rnams la ye shes kyi mtshon cha sbyin par 'dod pa'o/ /

lta ba'i bcings pas glags pa rnams la shes rab kyi mtshon chas bsdud par 'dod pa'o/ /khams gsum gyi grong khyer gyi 'khor ba rnams la thar ba'i sgo bstan par 'dod pa'o/ /phyogs mi bde bar mngon par gzhol ba rnams la bde ba'i phyogs bstan par 'dod

pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i chom pos gtses pa rnams la dbugs phyin pa chen po sbyin par 'dod pa'o/ /ngan song gi g.yang sas 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams la 'ju sa'i lag pa brkyang bar 'dod pa'o/ /phung po'i gshed mas gtses pa rnams la mya ngan las 'das

pa'i grong khyer bstan par 'dod pa'o/ /khams kyi sbrul gyis kun nas 'khor ba rnams la 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'byung ba bstan par 'dod pa'o/ /skye mched kyi grong stong pa na gnas pa rnams la shes rab kyi snang bas gdon

par 'dod pa'o/ /mu stegs ngan pa la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mu stegs su gzud par 'dod pa'o/ /bshes gnyen ma yin pa'i lag tu ltung ba rnams la yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bstan par 'dod pa'o/ /byis pa'i chos kyi spyod yul la

mngon par mos pa rnams 'phags pa'i chos la rab tu dgod par 'dod pa'o/ /'khor ba'i khyim la mngon par dga' ba rnams gyen du bskyod de thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du gzud par 'dod pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu dag de ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di ni sems can

yongs su bskyob pa'i blo gros de lta bus byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnam par dag par bya ba yongs su btsal ba la rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/ /theg pa chen po yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir yongs su skyo ba med pa'o/ /chos kyi sprin thams cad las 'thung bas mi ngoms pa'o/ /

tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rtag tu brtson pa'o/ /chos kyi sgo thams cad yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir mi gtong ba la brtson pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad spyad pa'i phyir brtson 'grus mi gtong ba'o/ /smon lam thams cad

mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad mthong bar bya bas mi ngoms pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bsnyen bkur bas lus la dub par 'gyur ba med pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen

thams cad gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa la mthun par 'dzin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu dag sems can gyi 'jig rten na sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa de lta bu'i sems can dkon no/ /de

bas kyang gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te/ brtson 'grus brtsam pa'i tshul 'di lta bus sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sdud pa dang / mos pa drag po 'di lta bus byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su tshol ba dang /

don du gnyer ba 'di lta bus byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa 'di lta bus dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba ltar spyod pa 'di lta bus dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi ngag dang

'gal bar mi byed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pas nan tan tu byed pa 'di lta bus dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byed pa dang mthun par len pa 'di lta bus byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su sgrub pa dang / khe dang bkur sti dang snyan

pa don du mi gnyer ba 'di lta bus byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i khams dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / khyim dang longs spyod dang 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba dang / pha ma dang gnyen gshes dang / dngos po thams cad la ltos pa med par yongs su

btang ba 'di lta bus byang chub sems dpa'i grogs yongs su tshol ba dang / lus dang srog la 'phangs par mi rtsi ba 'di lta bus thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par mos par byed pa de lta bu'i sems can ni ches dkon no/ /rigs kyi bu dag 'dis

ji ltar tsher skyes pa 'di gcig la ji snyed cig thob pa dang / khong du chud pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' de ma yin pa gzhan gyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par

bya ba thob pa dang / khong du chud pa'am/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur ba'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'am/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'am/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes la

'jug pa'am/ pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'am/ spyod pa'i dra ba rgya cher bya ba'am smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'am/ bdud kyi las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'am/ dge ba'i bshes

gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang yongs su dag par bya ba'am/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la

yang dag par 'byung ba med do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba zangs kyi yon tan dang legs pa yang dag par yongs su brjod pa byas nas/ de las brten te srog chags brgya phrag stong gis byang chub

kyi yan lag gi bsam pa brtan par byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i don du sangs

rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de ltar sems bskyed pa ni khyod

kyis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo/ /khyod kyis mi'i lus legs par thob bo/ /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten du khyod legs par 'tshos so/ /khyod kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba dgyes par byas so/ /khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'jam dpal

legs par mthong ngo / /khyod kyi bsam pa'i rgyud snod bzang por gyur to/ /khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par brlan to/ /khyod ni dkar po'i chos kyis legs par brten to/ /khyod kyis mos pa rlabs chen po dang dge ba'i bsam pa legs par shin tu

sbyangs so/ /khyod sangs rgyas thams cad kyis legs par dgongs so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis legs par bzung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon lta bu'o/ /'gro ba

thams cad kyi chos dkar po rnam par 'phel bar byed pas zhing lta bu'o/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu rten pas sa lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad dag par byed pas chu lta bu'o/ /'jig rten thams cad brtan pa med pas rlung lta bu'o/ /lta ba'i nye bar len

pa'i rtsa thams cad rab tu sreg pas me lta bu'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi gnas snang bar byed pas nyi ma lta bu'o/ /chos dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas par byed pas zla ba lta bu'o/ /chos kyi snang ba byed pas sgron ma lta bu'o/ /mnyam pa dang

mi mnyam pa yongs su mthong bar byed pas lta bu'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du phyin par byed pas lam lta bu'o/ /mu stegs ngan pa thams cad rnam par spong bas mu stegs lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon par gnas pas

bzhon pa lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi sgor 'jug par byed pas sgo lta bu'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi khang pa na gnas par byed pas gzhal med khang lta bu'o/ /chos kyi dga' ba dang mos pa nyams su myong bar byed pas bza' shing gi ra ba lta bu'o/ /

'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pas gnas lta bu'o/ /'jig rten thams cad la phan pa skyed pas rten lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad spyod par byed pas gzhi lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su srung bas pha lta bu'o/ /

byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi ma lta bu'o/ /thams cad las yongs su skyong bas ma ma lta bu'o/ /slob pa dang mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems zil gyis gnon pas rgyal po lta bu'o/ /smon lam thams cad kyis khyad par

du 'phags pas dbang po lta bu'o/ /yon tan thams cad yang dag par 'du bas rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'o/ /sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas rin po che lta bu'o/ /'jig rten thams cad rten pas khor yug lta bu'o/ /

ye shes kyi sman rnam par 'phel bar byed pas gangs kyi ri lta bu'o/ /yon tan gyi spos thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pas spos kyi ngad ldang ba lta bu'o/ /yon tan rgya che bas nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pas pad mo lta

bu'o/ /sems dul zhing cang shes pas glang po lta bu'o/ /rgod pa thams cad dang bral bas rta cang shes lta bu'o/ /theg pa chen po yongs su skyong ba'i sngon du 'gro bas kha lo sgyur ba lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i nad sos par byed pas sman lta bu'o/ /

mi dge ba'i chos thams cad zad par byed pas sa'i 'og lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad nges par khong du chud par byed pas rdo rje lta bu'o/ /yon tan gyi dri zhim par byed pas spos kyi snod lta bu'o/ /'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na mngon par dga' bas

me tog dam pa lta bu'o/ /'dod chags kyi gdung ba bsil bar byed pas kha ba'i tsan dan lta bu'o/ /chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pas a ga ru nag po lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad 'joms pas sman gyi rgyal po blta

na sdug pa lta bu'o/ /bag la nyal ba'i zug rngu thams cad yang dag par 'byin pas 'bral bar byed pa'i sman lta bu'o/ /dbang po thams cad la dbang sgyur bas dbang po lta bu'o/ /dbul ba thams cad yongs su sel bas ngal bso po lta bu'o/ /yon

tan thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byed pas dpal lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mdzes par byed pas lhab lhub lta bu'o/ /nyes byas thams cad sreg pas bskal pas tshig pa'i me lta bu'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par

'phel bar byed pas rtsa ba ma grub pa'i sman gyi rgyal po chen po lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i dug thams cad rnam par sel bas klu'i rin po che lta bu'o/ /rnyog pa thams cad sel bas nor bu rin po che chur dang lta bu'o/ /don thams cad yongs su sgrub pas yid bzhin

gyi rin po che'i rgyal po lta bu'o/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas bum pa bzang po lta bu'o/ /yon tan thams cad kyi rgyan gyi char mngon par 'bebs pas 'dod sbyin gyi shing lta bu'o/ /'khor ba'i skyon thams cad dang ma 'dres pas

gos dang ris can lta bu'o/ /rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas shing bal gyi rgyud lta bu'o/ /sems can gyi bsam pa'i zhing rnam par spyod pas gshol lta bu'o/ /'jig tshogs kyi go ca rtol bas mde'u thung lta bu'o/ /sdug bsngal gyi 'ben nges par 'bigs

pas mda' lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i dgra las rnam par rgyal bar byed pas mdung lta bu'o/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa 'gebs pas go ca lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i klad 'gems pas ral gri lta bu'o/ /nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang rlom pa'i go

ca 'dral bas ral gri'i so lta bu'o/ /bag la nyal gyi go cha gshog pas mda' ste'u ka lta bu'o/ /nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan snyol bas dpa' bo'i ru mtshon lta bu'o/ /mi shes pa'i shing sgyel bar byed pas lag cha lta bu'o/ /sdug bsngal gyi shing rab tu

gcod pas sta re lta bu'o/ /gnod pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pas mtshon cha lta bu'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i lus yongs su srung bas lag pa lta bu'o/ /yon tan thams cad la so sor 'god pas rkang pa lta bu'o/ /ma rig pa'i pri'i ling tog yongs

su sel bas mig mkhan lta bu'o/ /'jig tshogs kyi zug rngu yang dag par 'byin pas skam pa lta bu'o/ /bag la nyal gyi tsher ma 'byin pas tsher zung lta bu'o/ /'khor ba'i bcings pa las yongs su 'grel pas mdza' bo lta bu'o/ /gnod pa thams cad

sel bas nor bu lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis 'byung ba'i lam mngon par shes par byed pas gtsug lag lta bu'o/ /bsod nams mi zad pas gter lta bu'o/ /ye shes mi zad pas chu mig lta bu'o/ /chos

thams cad kyi gdong gi gzugs brnyan ston pas me long gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'o/ /'go ba med pas me tog pun da ri ka lta bu'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsdu ba'i dngos po rgyun tu 'bab pas chu klung chen po lta bu'o/ /chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'beb

pas klu'i rgyal po chen po lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje chen po yongs su 'dzin pas 'tsho ba'i dbang po lta bu'o/ /'chi ba med pa'i dbyings su phyin par byed pas bdud rtsi lta bu'o/ /'dul ba'i sems can thams cad

yongs su sdud cing 'dren pas kun nas 'khor ba'i snying lta bu'o/ /'khor ba'i chu la rgyu ba mngon par 'don pas mchil pa lta bu'o/ /yon tan thams cad kyi dri zhim po 'dzin pas spos kyi snod lta bu'o/ /shin tu nad med par byed pas dug sman lta bu'o/ /

'dod pas dga' ba'i dug med par byed pas dug gi gnyen po lta bu'o/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i dug thams cad 'byang bar byed pas sngags dang gzungs lta bu'o/ /sgrib pa dang bar chad kyi rtswa thams cad rnam par 'thor bas rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'o/ /

byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pas rin po che'i gling lta bu'o/ /chos dkar po thams cad 'byung bas rigs lta bu'o/ /yon tan gyi chos thams cad skye ba'i sgor gyur pas 'byung gnas lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems

dpa'i tshong pa thams cad kyis spyod pas tshong dus lta bu'o/ /las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang dri ma thams cad yongs su sbyong bas chu'i khams lta bu'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pas sbrang rtsi'i gnas lta bu'o/ /

byang chub sems dpa' thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du phyin par byed pas lam lta bu'o/ /chos dkar po thams cad yongs su 'dzin pas snod lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad mi ldang bar byed pas char pa lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i

rnam par dgod pa thams cad ston pas gnas lta bu'o/ /nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba dang mi 'dre bas rdo ba khab len lta bu'o/ /rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pas baiDUr+ya lta bu'o/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'jig rten shes pa thams cad zil du

rlag pa dang / zil gyis non par byed pas in+d+ra nI la lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can sad par byed pas tho ras kyi rnga lta bu'o/ /rnyog pa med pas chu dang ba lta bu'o/ /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i

tshogs zil du brlag par byed pas 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi rgyan lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gsum las mngon par 'phags pas ri'i rgyal po chen po lta bu'o/ /skyabs tshol ba yongs su mi gtong bas skyabs lta bu'o/ /don ma yin pa 'joms pas don lta bu'o/ /

snying dga' bar byed pas dbyig lta bu'o/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pas mchod sbyin gyi yo byad lta bu'o/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi gtso bo dang thu bor gyur pas na rgan pa lta bu'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'dzin pas gling gzhi

lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang smon lam thams cad sdud pas mdo lta bu'o/ /'jig rten thams cad skyong bas rdzi lta bu'o/ /sdig to thams cad las rnam par zlog pas srungs ma lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin 'dren pas dbang po'i

mig 'phrul lta bu'o/ /'dul ba 'dren pas chu'i zhags pa lta bu'o/ /bag chags dang bag la nyal ba dang nyon mongs pa thams cad gzhob du klog pas dbang po'i me lta bu'o/ /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams la mchod rten lta bu'o/ /

rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub kyi sems ni yon tan de dag dang yon tan gyi khyad par gzhan dag kyang tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ rigs kyi bu mdor na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ji snyed pa de snyed du byang chub kyi sems la

yon tan dang legs pa yod par blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'byung ste/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu

de bas na gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas shin tu bzung bas yon tan tshad med pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na 'jigs

pa med pa zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/ de 'chang na 'jigs pa lnga mi 'byung ste/ 'di ltar mes mi tshig go /dug gis mi tshugs so/ /mtshon gyis mi chod do/ /chus mi khyer ro/ /du bas mi 'chi'o/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi

rtsi 'chang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'dod chags kyi mes mi tshig go /yul gyi dug gis mi tshugs so/ /nyon mongs pa'i mtshon gyis mi chod do/ /srid pa'i chus mi khyer ro/ /yongs su rtog pa'i du bas mi 'chi'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta

ste dper na/ rnam par mi gtong ba zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/ de 'chang na gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems kyi ye shes kyi rtsi 'chang ba la'ang 'khor ba'i gnod pa'i 'jigs

pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mchu zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/ de 'chang na dri tshor ba tsam gyis sbrul thams cad 'byer ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsi 'chang ba'i yon tan gyi dri tsam gyis kyang nyon

mongs pa'i sbrul thams cad 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rtsi 'chang ba ni dgra yi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems

gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rtsi 'chang ba yang bdud dang phyir rgol ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis thub par dka'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/ de bcangs na zug rngu thams cad 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub

sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems rnam par sel ba 'chang ba ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi zug rngu thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rtsi'i rgyal po chen po blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de bcangs na nad thams cad sel

bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems rtsi'i rgyal po chen po blta na sdug pa 'chad pa yang nyon mongs pa dang mi shes pa'i nad thams cad rab tu sel bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rtsi'i shing chen po sbyor ba zhes

bya ba yod de/ de'i shun pas rma la reg ma thag tu thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ gang nas bshus pa de'i shun phrags kyang phyir skye'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems kyi sa bon las skyes pa'i shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor ba yang mthong ma thag tu

rigs kyi bu dad pa rnams kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i rma yongs su 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing de la yang 'jig rten thams cad kyis rmad byung ba'am nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rtsi chen po'i

rnam pa rtsa ba ma grub pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mthus 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing thams cad kyang yan lag thams cad du rnam par 'phel lo/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems rtsa ba ma grub pa'i rtsi chen po'i mthus kyang / slob pa dang mi slob pa dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems

dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos kyi shing rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /'di lta ste dper na/ dga' ba 'thob pa zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/ de su'i lus la thogs pa de'i lus dang sems nad med par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems

dga' ba 'thob par byed pa'i rtsi yang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus dang sems nad med pa yongs su skyed do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ dran pa 'thob pa zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/ de bcangs na sems kyi dran pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid du sems bskyed pa dran pa 'thob par byed pa'i rtsi yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i dran pa rnam par dag par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pad ma chen po zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/ de zos ba tsam gyis tshe'i tshad

bskal par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems kyi pad mo chen po'i rtsi zos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang bskal pa grangs med pa'i tshe la dbang gi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mi snang ba zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/ de bcangs na

mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsi mi snang bar 'gyur ba bcangs te 'dres pa rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang bdud kyi yul thams cad du mi snang ngo / /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na

nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chen po rin po che thams cad yongs su sdud pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du ma 'phos na rgya mtsho chen po la bskal pas tshig pa'i me thams cad kyis kyang tal tsam yang bskam par nus pa'i gnas med skabs do/ /de bzhin du

byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa nor bu rin po che thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chen po bsam pa dang / sems kyi rgyud la yod pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngos pa 'ga' zhig rnam par chud za

bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med skabs med de/ de ni mi srid de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa yongs su btang ba zhig tu gyur na ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang bskam par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po 'od thams cad yongs su

'dus pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de mgul du btags na nor bu rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyang zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems 'od thams cad yongs su 'dus pa'i rin po che chen po bsam pa'i rgyan du thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyan

thos dang rang sangs rgyas su sems bskyed pa'i rin po che'i rgyan thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po chu 'dang zhes bya ba yod de/ de chur bcug na 'dam dang rnyog pa thams cad rab tu dang bar byed do/ /de

bzhin du byang chub kyi sems chu 'dang gi nor bu rin po che yang nyon mongs pa'i 'dam dang / rnyog pa thams cad rab tu dang bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po chu dang 'grogs pa zhes bya ba thogs pa'i nya pa ni chur mi

'chi'o/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems chu dang 'grog pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du mi 'chi'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che klu'i nor bu'i go cha zhes

bya ba yod de/ de lag na 'dug na nya ba la pa/ chu las 'tsho ba rnams klu'i gnas thams cad du 'dong yang klu'i sbrul thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i ye shes klu'i nor bu'i go ca 'chang ba'i byang

chub sems dpa' yang 'dod pa'i gnas kyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba yang nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che brgya byin mngon par chags pa thogs pa'i lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ni/ lha'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /de bzhin du

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems brgya byin mngon par chags pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chen po smon lam gyi cod pan mgo la thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang khams gsum pa thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta

ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po yid bzhin gyi rgyal po thogs pa'i mi ni phongs pa thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i nor bu rin po che chen po thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'

yang yo byad dang 'tsho bas bag tsha ba thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che nyi mas mdzes pa ni nyi ma la bstan na mi 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa nyi mas mdzes pa'i nor bu

rin po che yang shes rab kyi 'od zer gyis phog na ye shes kyi me 'byin to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che zla bas mdzes pa zhes bya ba la zla ba'i 'od kyis phog na chu'i rgyun 'byin to/ /de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa zla bas mdzes pa'i rin po

che chen po yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos pa'i zla ba'i 'od kyis phog na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi smon lam gyi chu'i rgyun 'byin to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan thogs pa'i klu'i rgyal po chen po rnams la

gzhan gyi gnod par bya ba'i 'jigs pa med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems snying rje chen po'i nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la'ang ngan song dang ngan 'gros gnod par bya ba'i 'jigs pa med do/ /rigs kyi

bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po 'gro ba'i rgyan dam pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bas nam yang byang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi rgyan gyi dam pa'i nor bu rin

po che chen po yang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya bas nam yang byang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po ni mun pa thams cad yongs

su sel cing 'gro ste/ khyim gyi nang na gnas na yang rab tu snang bar byed do/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i nor bu rin po che yang ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel cing 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du 'gro ste/ 'dod pa'i

khams na gnas na yang ye shes kyi snang ba chen por rab tu 'gyed do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ gang ci yang rung ste nor bu rin po che chen po in dra nI la'i 'od kyis phog pa de dag thams cad ni nor bu rin po che chen po in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog tu 'gyur ro/ /de

bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po in dra nI la yang chos gang dang gang la rnam par spyad pa dang / yongs su btang ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci yang rung ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pas yongs su bsngos

pa de dag thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi nor bu rin po che chen po'i kha dog tu 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che baiDUr+ya ni lo brgya phrag stong du mi gtsang ba'i nad zhig na 'dug kyang dri mi zhim pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas

te/ de'i rang bzhin 'od gsal ba ni de bzhin du gsal zhing shin tu dri ma med do/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che baiDUr+ya yang bskal pa brgya phrag stong zhig tu 'dod pa'i khams thams cad du gnas kyang 'dod pa'i

khams kyi skyon thams cad kyis kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba ni de bzhin du shin tu dag par gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po dri ma med pas rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces

bya ba ni rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dri ma med pas rnam par dag pa'i 'od kyang so so'i skye bo dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa dang /

rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas zil gyis gnon to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rin po che chen po me 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni gcig pu gnas kyang mun pa thams cad rnam par sel to/ /de bzhin du thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che me 'byung ba lhag mthong dang ldan pa gcig pu yang tshul bzhin yid la bya bas mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po nas grus blangs

pa'i nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa tshong pa'i lag du 'ong ba ni grong khyer du phyin na nor bu 'ching bu brgya phrag stong yang kha dog dang rin thang gis zil gyis gnon to/ /de bzhin du 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po na gnas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du

sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po rin thang med pa smon lam gyi grur bcug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pas lhag pa'i bsam pa'i rgyud la 'dug ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer du ma phyin kyang rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer du phyin

na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas nor bu 'ching bu lta bu thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po dbang gi rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas kyang dpag tshad stong phrag bzhi bcu

na gnas pa'i gnyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyim gyi gzhal med khang gi gzugs brnyan gyi rgyan yongs su ston to/ /de bzhin du yon tan thams cad kyis yongs su sbyangs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dbang gi rgyal po yang

'khor ba'i gnas na 'dug bzhin du/ chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha'i spyod yul las rgyu ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i gnyi zla dang sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi rgyan yongs su ston to/ /rigs kyi bu

'di lta ste dper na/ ji srid du gnyi zla'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyis snang bar byed pa de srid du nor dang / 'bru dang / rin po che'i rnam pa dang / gser dang dngul dang / tog dang spos dang phreng ba dang / gos dang longs spyod gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis nor bu

rin po che chen po dbang gi rgyal po'i rin du mi chog go /de bzhin du ji srid du dus gsum la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings kyi yul snang bar mdzad pa de srid du lha dang mi dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba

zag pa yod pa 'am/ zag pa med pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dbang gi rgyal po'i rin du mi chog go /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po rgya mtsho'i rgyan kyi

dam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni rgya mtsho'i rgyan thams cad yongs su ston to/ /de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi dam pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul rgya mtsho'i rgyan thams cad yongs

su ston to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po yid bzhin gyi rgyal po ma gtogs par lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las lhag par 'phags pa gang yang med do/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes nor bu rin po che

chen po yid bzhin gyi rgyal po ma gtogs par byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las lhag par khyad par du 'phags pa gang yang med do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ klu'i tshogs grub par gyur pa'i sbrul 'dul ba ni klu dang

sbrul thams cad la dbang bsgyur ro/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nan tan gyi klu'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sbrul 'dul ba yang nyon mongs pa'i klu dang / sbrul thams cad la dbang bsgyur ro/ /

rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ dpa' bo lag cha dang ldan pa ni dgra'i 'khor gyis tshugs par dka'o/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i lag cha dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i dkyil 'khor thams cad

kyis thub par dka'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha rdzas kyi tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma srang gcig gis ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dri zhim pos rgyas par 'gengs te de zho gcig tsam la yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin

po ches yongs su gang ba rin du mi chog go /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa lha rdzas kyi tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos lhag pa'i bsam pa gcig la gnas pa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings thams cad yon tan gyi dri zhim por rgyas par

'gengs te slob pa dang mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems kyang zil gyis gnon to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ tsan dan rin po che chen po kha ba'i tsan dan zhes bya ba ni gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed de/ lus

thams cad kyang rab tu bsal bar byed do/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i kha ba'i tsan dan rin po che yang nyon mongs pa'i kun tu rtog pa dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gis gdung ba thams cad kyang rab tu

sel to/ /ye shes kyi lus kyang rab tu sim par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi drung du ji snyed cig nye bar 'dod pa de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du gang su yang

rung ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i drung du nye bar 'ongs pa de dag thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ shing sus

kyang mi tshugs pa dang / kun nas 'du ba'i shun phrags kyi dri zhim po 'byung ba de lta bu ni 'dzam bu gling gi me tog par shi ka dang / me tog dza ti dang / me tog su ma na la pa me tog gi rnam pa thams cad la yang med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems

dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i sa bon las byung ba'i smon lam gyi shing gi yon tan dang ye shes kyi shun phrags kyi dri zhim po'i ngad 'byung ba 'di lta bu ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dma' ba dang ldan pa thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas

kyi me tog par shi ka dang / me tog dza ti dang / me tog su ma na'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zag pa med pa dang ldan pa thams cad la yang med do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta

ste dper na/ shing sus kyang mi thub pa dang / kun nas 'du ba kha 'bus par gyur na/ me tog stong phrag mang po'i 'byung gnas su gyur par shes par bya'o/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i shing kun nas 'du ba dge ba'i rtsa bas kha

'brus par gyur na/ /lha dang grangs pa'i byang chub kyi me tog zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i skye gnas su 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ shing kun nas 'du ba'i me tog gis nyi ma gcig tu bsgos

ba'i gos sam/ til mar las dri zhim po'i ngad 'byung ba de lta bu yang me tog tsam pa ka dang / me tog su ma nas nyi ma brgya phrag stong du bsgos pa'i gos sam til mar las kyang mi 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi rgyud tshe

gcig tu yongs su bsgoms pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dang ye shes kyi dri zhim po'i ngad phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhabs kyi drung du ldang ba de lta bu ni bskal pa brgya phrag stong du bsgoms pa'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi sems las kyang zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / chos kyi ye shes kyi dri zhim po mi 'byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ shing gi rigs ni li ki ri zhes bya ba rgya mtsho gnod pa dang bral ba nas skye ba yod de/ de'i

rtsa ba yan chad me tog gi bar du yang dus thams cad du nam yang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ba med do/ /de bzhin du snying rje chen po dang smon lam gyi rtsa bas yang dag par skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang thog ma thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid du sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ba phyin chad dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i mthar thug gi bar du nam yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ dngul chu'i rigs gser du

snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni srang gcig gis kyang lcags srang stong gser du 'gyur ro/ /dngul chu srang gcig po de ni lcags srang stong po des zad par bya ba 'am lcags su bsgyur bar mi nus so/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed

pa'i ro'i khams dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i ye shes kyis bzung ba ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i lcags thams cad zad par byas te/ chos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi kha dog tu byed kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i

ro'i khams gcig po de ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i lcags thams cad kyis kyang kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba'am/ zad par mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ me ni ji tsam du chung du zin kyang rkyen ji tsam dang phrad pa de tsam gyi me

lce yongs su bskyed do/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i ci tsam du chung du zin kyang pa rgya chen po'i tshogs kyi rkyen ji tsam dang phrad pa de tsam du ye shes kyi 'od 'phro ba rab tu dgye bas rnam par 'phel bar byed do/ /

rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mar gcig las mar bye ba brgya phrag stong zhig bus kyang me mar de ni mar de snyed byung bas mi zad de mthar thug pa med do/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i me mar gcig las 'das pa

dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du thugs bskyed pa'i me mar mang po 'bar yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i me mar gcig po de ni de snyed kyi thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid du sems bskyed pa'i me mar 'byung bas mi zad de mthar thug pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ me mar gcig cig khyim 'am/ khang bu ji lta bur bcug kyang rung ste/ bcug ma thag tu lo stong du bsags bsags pa'i mun pa yang rnam

par sel cing snang bar byed do/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa gcig kyang sems can gyi bsam pa'i khyim thibs po ma rig pa'i mun pa dang ldan pa ji lta bu yang rung ste/ de'i rgyud du phyin na de phyin ma thag tu bskal pa brgya stong brjod

du med par bstsags pa'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / mun pa thams cad rnam par sel cing ye shes kyi snang ba yongs su bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ me mar ni snying po ji tsam pa de'i rkyen tsam du snang bar byed de/ mar gyi tshogs ji

srid du gnas pa de srid du 'bar ro/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i me mar yang byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi snying po'i khyad par ci 'dra ba de lta bur chos kyi dbyings yongs su snang bar byed de/ snying rje chen pos spyod pa'i mar

gyi tshogs ci srid du gnas pa de srid du sems can gdul ba dang / zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku don bsgrub pa la yongs su 'bar bar gnas so// //shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas

rmad gcad ces bya ba/ bam po nyi shu pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi rgyan lha'i rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi mgo la thogs pa ni 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs so/ /de bzhin du thams cad
