rigs de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bur yongs su shes pas 'jig rten gyi skye gnas thams cad du smad pa med pa yin te srid pa'i skye gnas thams cad sprul pa lta bur yongs su shes pas srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud

du skye zhing gnas pa thams cad kyis kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/ chos thams cad la bdag med par khong du chud pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bas yongs su mi skyo'o/ /byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i

lus dang ldan pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la phan gdags par ngal bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'khor ba thams cad rmi lam lta bur yongs su rtogs pas bskul pa thams cad du gnas pas sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro/ /phung po thams

cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pas skye ba dang shi 'pho ba dang 'chi ba yongs su bstan pa thams cad kyis dub par mi 'gyur ro/ /khams dang skye mched chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du rab tu rtogs pas yul thams cad kyi rma mi 'byung ngo / /

'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad smig rgyu lta bur shin tu bsgoms pas 'khor ba'i dga' ba thams cad kyis mos par mi 'gyur ro/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i chos thams cad la rnam par brtse bas bdud kyi yul thams cad kyis mi dogs so/ /chos kyi las

su byung bas nyon mongs pa thams cad du smos su med do/ /skye ba la dbang rab tu thob pas 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi skye gnas kyi khongs su chud pa'i lus

dang 'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs dang mnyam pa'i kha dog gi khyad par dang sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i nges pa'i tshig gi bye brag dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi mos pa dang

mnyam pa'i spyod lam dang 'gro ba rnam par gdul ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / sems can rnam par dag par bya ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshe dang / rigs su skye ba yongs su bstan pa dang / byis pa'i

spyod pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i bya ba la 'jug pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i yongs su shes par bya ba la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi sprul pa thams cad dang mnyam

pa'i lus yongs su bstan cing brjod pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ sngon skal ba mnyam par spyod spyod pa'i sems can byang chub kyi sems stor bar gyur pa rnams yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / 'dzam bu'i gling du skyes

pa'i tshe yongs su bstan pa dang / lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di'i yul phreng ba stobs kyi grong rdal khang khyim dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'di'i bram ze'i rigs su skyes pa rnams dang / pha ma dang gnyen bshes su 'ong ba rnams rnam par gdul ba dang /

bram ze'i rigs dang / rgyud kyi khyad par gyis rigs kyi nga rgyal can du gyur pa 'di dag nga rgyal can du gyur pa 'di dag nga rgyal par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bskyed pa'i don du 'dir skyes so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar nga lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di na

thabs rnam pa 'di lta bus sems can bsam pa'i tshul ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang / rnam pa ji lta bur 'dul ba rnams yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba byed cing khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi

rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po 'di na 'dug go /'di nas nga shi 'phos nas kyang bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / dga' ldan gyi rigs su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu skal ba mnyam par spyod spyod

pa rnams yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / 'dod pa'i khams nas yongs su 'das pa thams cad la 'ang byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dang ye shes dang / sprul pa'i rgyan yongs su bstan pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i sred pa las

rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'du byed thams cad rtag pa nyid du bstan pa dang / lhar skyes pa thams cad kyang mthar gud par gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / ye shes chen po'i chos kyi sgo 'chi 'pho'i rnam pa zhes ba ba tshe gcig gis

thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang yang dag par bgro bar bya ba dang / lhan cig yongs su smin par gyur pa rnams der skye bar yongs su bsdu bar bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bkye ba'i 'dul ba'i pad mo rnams kyang

kha dbye ba'i phyir dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba yongs su ston te/ dus la bab pa la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs nas ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par byed kyis/ ngas byang chub thob nas kyang rigs kyi bu khyod dang / 'jam

dpal gzhon nur gyur par bcas pas da dung yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /song rigs kyi bu da dung yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /

ji ltar kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug par bya ba dang / ji ltar mngon par bsgrub pa dang / ji ltar smon par bya ba dang / ji ltar rgyas par bya ba dang / ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / ji ltar yongs su sbyang bar bya ba dang / ji ltar

khong du chud par bya ba dang / ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dris shig dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen des khyod la ston par 'gyur ro/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa de lta bu'i smon lam

gyi khyad par ni byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong la yang med do/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa ni tshad med do/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yon

tan gyi khyad par thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa ni tshad med do/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi yum lta bu'o/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag

khrig brgya phrag stong la gdams ngag ston pa'o/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la rab tu brtson pa'o 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni phyogs bcu'i

'jig rten gyi khams su gi 'khor los rnam par rgyas par gyur pa'o/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gtam gyi skyes bur gyur pa'o/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur

pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags shing bstod pa'o/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba ste chos zab mo'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa'o/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur

pa ni rnam par thar ba thams cad kyi tshul thams cad la ring du song ba'i spyod yul dang ldan pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po la zhugs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen de ni khyod de bzhin

gshegs pa'i rigs su skyed pa'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su 'phel bar byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po rab tu sgrub pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ston pa'o/ /yon tan thams cad la yang dag

par skul ba'o/ /smon lam chen po'i dra ba thams cad du 'jug pa'o/ /smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad la rab tu gzhog pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang ba thos par byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bsam

gyis mi khyab pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa'o/ /sngon gyi tshe'i gnas su skal ba mthun par spyad pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu de bas na khyod da ltar yang 'jam dpal gyi rkang pa'i drung na 'dug gis yon tan gyi gdams ngag thams cad thob par bya ba la

yongs su skyo ba ma skyed cing yongs su sgyid lug par ma byed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nor khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen ji snyed cig mthong ba dang / spyod pa'i sgo ji snyed cig thos pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i tshul ji snyed cig la zhugs

pa dang / smon lam gyi khyad par ji snyed cig khong du chud pa de dag thams cad kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mthu dang byin gyi rlabs su blta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni thams cad la'ang pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa'o/ /de

nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ byang chub sems dpa' byams

pa'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor grong khyer brgya rtsa bcu kun tu rgyus te/ phyogs kyi gnas yid bde ba mngon du 'gyur ba zhes bya ba zhig na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sems shing rnam par lta bas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur

ba mthong bar mos shing / smon lam phrad par dga' bas sdod cing 'dug 'dug pa dang / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dpag tshad brgya rtsa bcu'i pha rol nas lag pa brkyang ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor grong khyer yid bde ba mngon du 'gyur

ba na 'dug pa'i spyi bor bzhag ste/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/ /dad pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa sems skyo ba can bsam pa zhum pa can sbyor ba bor ba brtson 'grus ldog pa/ yon tan cung zad kyis dga' bar rtsi ba/

dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig la zhen par gnas pa/ spyod pa dang smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma bzung ba/ sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa rnams kyis ni chos nyid 'di lta bu yongs su shes par bya ba dang

tshul 'di lta bu dang / spyod yul 'di lta bu dang / gnas 'di lta bu yongs su shes par bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes par bya ba 'am/ khong du chud par bya ba 'am/ 'jug par bya ba 'am/ yid ches par bya ba 'am/ brtag par bya ba'am/ rtogs

par bya ba'am/ thob par bya bar nus so/ /zhes te des de la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan pa dang / yang dag par bskul pa dang / gzengs bstod pa dang dga' bar byas te chos kyi sgo grangs pa dang / ldan par byas nas ye shes

mtha' yas pa'i snang ba chen po thob par byas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs dang / spobs pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ye shes mtha' yas pa'i byin gyis byin du brlabs par byas te/ kun tu bzang pa'i spyod pa'i

dkyil 'khor la bzhag nas bdag gi yul la'ang rab tu bzhag ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor drung nas song ngo / shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba las sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste/

bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// //sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor dge ba'i bshes gnyen stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi

rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bsnyen bkur ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du tshogs bsags pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa la mthun par 'dzin pas zhugs pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams

cad kyi drung du bsam pa mnyam par 'gro ba/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dga' bar bya bas yid mi 'byung ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i rjes su song ba snying rje chen po'i

bsam pa rgya mtsho las yang dag par byung ba'i snying po dang ldan pa/ byams pa chen po'i tshul gyi sprin gyis 'gro ba thams cad rnam par snang bar byas pa/ dga' ba chen po'i shugs rnam par 'phel ba'i lus dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par

thar pa rgya chen po la rab tu zhi bar rnam par dpyod pa sgo thams cad nas lhug par 'phro ba'i gtong ba'i dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i nan tan rab tu rdzogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mos pa'i lam du

zhugs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs la brtson 'grus kyi shugs rnam par 'phel ba byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pas shin tu sbyangs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig

nas gcig tu brgyud pa la zhugs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho khong du chud pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul rgya mtsho'i rjes su song ba/ 'jig rten gyi skye gnas thams cad du gzugs brnyan

yongs su ston pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi tshul rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yul snang ba

rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po thams cad rnam par 'phel ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam snang ba rab tu thob pa/ phyogs thams cad du sgrib pa med pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul la

rab tu zhugs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ zhing gi tshul thams cad la snang ba rab tu grub pa sems can 'byam klas pa thams cad kyi don bya ba la rgyud dang mi 'thun pa par rjes su song ngo / /sgrib pa'i g.yang sa'i ri thams cad rnam par 'thor ba/

sgrib pa med pa'i chos nyid kyi rjes su song ba byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sa'i gzhi kun tu gnas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po can la rab tu zhi bar rnam par dpyod pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul rjes su tshol ba/

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa de/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul la rnam par dpyod cing 'dug par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i thos pa dang /

byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos pa dang / smon lam gyi khyad par thos pa dang tshogs yongs su bsgrub pa la 'jug pa dang gnas pa'i khyad par thos pa dang / mngon par bsgrub pa dang 'byung ba'i lam gyi khyad par thos pa dang / kun tu

bzang po'i sa'i tshul gyi rgyud thos pa dang / sa'i tshogs thos pa dang sa thob par byed pa'i shugs thos pa dang sa yongs su gnon pa thos pa dang / sa la gnas pa thos pa dang / sa sngon du 'dor bas rnam par gnon pa

thos pa dang / sa'i spyod yul thos pa dang / sa'i byin gyi rlabs thos pa dang sa la yang dag par gnas pa thos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar dga' zhing skom ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings ltar shin tu yangs pa'i sems mngon par

zhen pa thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa dang / zhing gi 'du shes shin tu bsgoms pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i sems chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul can dang / thogs pa pa'i sems phyogs rgya mtsho thams

cad rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i sems thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yul yongs su gnon pa dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sems snying po byang chub kyi rgyan lhag mthong gis yongs su dag pa dang / shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sems sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi chos rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang / shin tu yangs pa'i sems sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba rgyas par 'gengs pa dang shin tu phye ba'i sems sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par byed pa dang /

tshad med pa'i sems sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas pas zad cing mthar thug pa med pa'i sems de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa dang / sangs

rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i mthar thug pas snying po byang chub rdo rje dam pa'i snying po can de la pad mo'i stan rin po che thams cad kyi lhun can zhig la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan seng ge'i khri la mngon par bltas te 'dug go /de ltar tshong dpon gyi bu nor de

lta bu'i bsam pa dang yid la bya ba la brtson par gnas pa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rlan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i skal ba mthun pas byang chub sems

dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur bar sngon gyi ltas bcu byung ngo / /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par dag pas rnam par dag par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi

zhing thams cad mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad rnam par bstsal bas rnam par dag par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad pad mo'i tshal gyi rgyan ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pas rnam par dag par gyur to sangs

rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sems can thams cad kyi lus dang sems dga' zhing sim par byed pas/ rnam par dag par gyur to sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin du kun tu gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi

zhing thams cad sems can gyi khams kun tu mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rab tu brgyan par kun nas gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyan dang lhab lhub kyi sprin gyis kun tu khebs par kun nas gnas pas rnam par

dag par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sems can gyi khams thams cad phan tshun byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan par kun nas gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snying po

byang chub kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par kun nas gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sems can thams cad sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la bya ba la brtson par kun nas gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur te/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur ba'i/ sngon gyi ltas bcu po de dag byung bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur ba'i sngon gyi

ltas snang ba chen po bcu byung bar gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba mang po rnam par snang bar gyur

to/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mang po 'thon te/ kha dog gcig pa dang kha dog sna tshogs dang kha dog brgya stong du mar chos kyi

dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang rin po che thams cad kyi sprin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs

par byed pa mang po 'thon te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba'i

'khor lo dang dkyil 'khor gyi sprin mang po 'thon te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang spos dang / me tog dang

phreng ba dang byug pa dang bdug pa'i sprin mang po 'thon te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i yon tan gyi chos rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad kyi 'brug sgra rab tu sgrog cing phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to/

'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang nyi ma dang zla ba dang skar ma'i sprin mang po 'thon te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 'od rab tu 'gyed cing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas

par 'gengs par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang lus thams cad kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa'i mar sprin mang po 'thon nas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od gzer ltar rab tu snang bar

byed cing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang nor bu rin po che'i gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur snang

ba'i sprin mang po 'thon nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang 'od gzer gyi gzugs de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dbyibs su snang ba'i sprin mang po 'thon te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang smon lam gyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs shing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to/ /'jig

rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gzugs brnyan gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi kha dog du snang ba'i sprin rgya mtsho sems can thams cad gdon pa'i

sbyor ba dang ldan pa sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par sgrub pa mang po 'thon te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur

ba'i sngon gyi ltas snang ba chen po bcu po de dag byung bar gyur to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor sngon gyi ltas su snang ba bcu po de dag mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar gyur pa'i skabs ni bye/ rang gi dge ba'i

rtsa bas ni brtan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis ni brlabs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi snang ba ni yang dag par skyes/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la ni mngon du gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi

byin gyis ni byin du brlabs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul la ni mngon par mos byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul rlabs po che la ni shin tu nges pa'i stobs dang shugs ni rab tu thob/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong na thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid thob pa dang 'dra bar ni sems/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar bya ba la dbang po ni mngon du gyur byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar bya ba la brtson 'grus kyi shugs chen po ni thob/ byang chub sems dpa'

kun tu bzang po yongs su btsal ba la brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang ni ldan phyogs thams cad du mngon du gyur pa'i dbang po'i 'khor lo dang kun tu lta bas yul yongs su gnon pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i zhabs

kyi drung na byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'dug pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sems de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dmigs par bya ba la yang dag par btang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i dmigs pa yongs su btsal

ba dang mi 'bral ba'i bsam pa dang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar bya ba'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i snying po dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lam la zhugs pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings ltar

yangs pa'i bsam pa dang / snying rje chen po'i rdo rje thogs pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rjes su 'brangs par smon pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / yongs su gnon pa'i rtsal

rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i sa la gnas pa'i ye shes la rnam par dpyod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la

yang dag par gnas pa dang mi ldan pa des byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid rjes su thob pa/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ mi 'phrogs

pa'i spyod yul can mu med pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rnam par lta ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi zil gyis gnon pa/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'khor thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba/ mngon par 'phags

pa'i yul dang ldan pa de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho na ni 'dug /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni yongs su bskor/ byang chub sems dpa'i

dge 'dun gyis ni mdun du byas shing / seng ge'i khri rin po che'i pad mo chen po'i snying po can zhig la 'dug pa mthong ste/ des de'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'od

zer gyi sprin mang po 'thon nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad rab tu snang bar byas nas/ sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa mthong ngo / /des de'i lus las 'od

kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sprin mang po kha dog sna tshogs can mang po 'thon te/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dga' ba dang / mos pa'i shugs rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed

pa mthong ngo / /spyi bo dang phrag pa'i lhun gnyis dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas kyang spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi char kha dog sna tshogs su 'dug pa mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bkang ste/ mngon par

'bab pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang me tog thams cad kyi sprin gyi char sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil

'khor rgyas par bkang ste/ mngon par 'bab pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang spos sna tshogs kyi shing gi sprin mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyings

nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang nas/ spos kyi shing gi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byas te/ spos dang phye ma dang bdug pa'i mdzod zad mi shes pa'i char rab tu 'gyed cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bkang ste/ mngon par 'bab par byed pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang gos sna tshogs kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon te/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas

klas pa thams cad kun nas yog par byas nas brgyan par mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang dar sna tshogs kyi lda ldi'i sprin dang phreng ba sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / mu tig sna tshogs kyi sprin dang nor bu rin po che yid

bzhin gyi sprin gyi char sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bkang ste/ mngon par 'bab pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas ba spu'i

sgo re re nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bsgrub pa'i phyir/ rin po che'i shing gi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon te/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mthas klas pa

thams cad rgyas par bkang nas/ rin po che'i shing las rin po che'i mdzod rnam par 'phro ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag tu rin po che'i char chen po mngon par 'bab par byed pa

mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang gzugs kyi khams kyi lha'i ris kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang dag par bsngags pa

byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang tshangs pa'i rgyud du gtogs pa'i lha'i ris thams cad du sprul pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon te/ mngon par sangs

rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba 'debs par mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'dod pa'i khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i lha'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin mang po

mngon par 'thon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mang po yang dag par 'dzin par mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sprin dus gsum

du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang 'dra ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mthas klas pa/ thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/

sems can gnas med pa dang skyabs pa dang rten pa rnams kyi gnas dang / skyabs dang rten du gyur par mthong ngo ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang / sems kyi skad cig re re las sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa/ sangs

rgyas 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mthas klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/

sems can mos pa rlabs po che rnams yongs su dag par sgrub pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul

shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems can rnams rnam par dag par sgrub pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu ga re re'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad

nas sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa thams cad rgyas

par bkang ste/ sems can gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams rnam par dag par sgrub pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba

snyed mngon par 'thon te/ sems can gyi khams nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang nas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang bar byed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems can thams

cad yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon nas/

chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa/ thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan mang po brjod par byed pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu ga

thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon te/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang nas sangs

rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa nye bar bsgrub pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re

nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir byang chub

sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par brjod pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i don du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i

spyod pa'i sprin thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par 'byung bas dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi char mngon par 'thon nas mngon par 'bab pa mthong

ngo / /des de'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ston pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du

yang dag par 'byung ba'i chos kyi sprin chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang

po'i rdzu 'phrul gyi yul de lta bu mthong nas/ dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ de bas kyang shas cher byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus la sems sems pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'

kun tu bzang po'i yan lag re re dang / yan lag rnam par phye ba re re dang / lus kyi cha re re dang / lus kyi cha rnam par phye ba re re dang / yan lag gi phyogs re re dang / yan lag gi phyogs rnam par phye ba re re dang / lus re re dang / lus rnam

par phye ba re re dang / ba spu'i bu ga re re dang ba spu'i bu ga rnam par phye ba re re nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rlung gi phung po dang bcas/ chu'i phung po dang bcas/ sa'i phung po dang bcas/ phung po dang bcas/ rgya mtsho dang bcas/

gling dang bcas/ chu klung dang bcas/ rin po che'i ri dang bcas/ ri rab dang bcas/ khor yug dang bcas/ grong dang grong khyer dang / ljongs dang yul dang khams dang rgyal po'i gnas dang bcas/ nags tshal dang bcas/ khang khyim dang bcas/
skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas/ sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten dang bcas/ byol song gi skye gnas dang bcas/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang bcas/ lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten dang bcas/ klu'i 'jig rten dang bcas/
nam mkha' lding gi 'jig rten dang bcas/ 'jig rten dang bcas/ lha'i 'jig rten dang bcas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang bcas/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi yul dang bcas gzugs kyi khams kyi yul dang bcas/ gzugs

med pa'i khams kyi yul dang bcas/ gzhi dang bcas rten dang bcas/ dbyibs dang bcas/ sprin dang bcas/ glog dang bcas/ skar ma dang bcas/ nyin zhag dang bcas/ zla ba phyed dang bcas/ zla ba gcig dang bcas/ dus

dang bcas/ lo dang bcas/ bskal ba bar ma dang bcas bskal pa dang bcas par gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du mthong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams 'di la ji lta ba de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang mthong

bar gyur to/ /shar phyogs la ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs

mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang sangs rgyas byung ba dang bcas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas par gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du mthong bar gyur to/ /

des mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa/ ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i chen po'i mtshan re re las
sangs rgyas byung ba dang bcas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas/ sems can dang bcas/ khang khyim dang bcas/ nyin zhag dang bcas bskal pa dang bcas par mthong bar

gyur to/ /de bzhin tu phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas

gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur pa de bzhin tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyang

byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus dang / chen po'i mtshan re re dang / ba spu'i bu ga re re nas shin tu rnam par phye ba dang / phan tshun ma 'dres par mthong bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po yang

ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan snga na seng ge'i khri rin po che'i pad mo chen po'i snying po can la 'dug cing rnam par rtse ba 'di lta bu yongs su ston par mthong ba de bzhin du shar phyogs na'ang

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i dpal gyis 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo'i dpal na rnam par rtse ba 'di nyid yongs su ston cing 'dug par mthong ngo / /shar phyogs na ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs dang phyogs mtshams

kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po seng ge'i khri rin po che'i pad mo chen po'i snying po can la 'dug cing rnam par rtse ba 'di nyid yongs su ston

pa mthong ngo / /ji ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na seng ge'i khri rin po che'i pad mo chen po'i snying po can la 'dug cing rnam par rtse ba 'di nyid yongs su ston par

mthong ba de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dag la rdul shin tu phra ba re re'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor chos kyi dbyings ltar rgya che ba dag ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu

bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na seng ge'i khri rin po che'i pad mo chen po'i snying po can la 'dug cing rnam par rtse ba 'di nyid yongs su ston pa mthong ngo / /de'i lus re re las kyang dus gsum du byung ba'i dmigs

pa thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du rnam par dmigs par mngon par bstan pa mthong ngo / /zhing thams cad dang sems can thams cad dang sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor

thams cad kyang gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du rnam par dmigs par mngon tu bstan pa mthong ngo / /sems can thams cad kyi sgra dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor

lo dang gdams ngag yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsdu ba thams cad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rol pa dag kyang thos par gyur to/ /des de ltar byang chub

sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rnam par rtse ba de lta bu dag mthong ste/ thos nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa bcu thob par gyur to/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas

kyi zhing thams cad lus kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'gro ba la tha mi dad pa'i ye shes

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad las de bzhin gshegs pa re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su zhus pa rab tu blang ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor

lo nges par rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ /

so so yang dag par rig pa zad mi shes pa'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs te/ chos kyi tshig gcig shin tu bstan pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ /chos

kyi rgya mtsho thams cad mngon sum du rab tu shes pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ /

sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa yongs su sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ /skad cig gcig la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mngon sum du rab tu shes pa'i ye shes

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ /de ltar ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa dang ldan pa'i tshong dpon gyi bu nor spyi bor byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste bzhag

par gyur to/ /de ltar tshong dpon gyi bu nor spyi bo la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos lag pa bzhag ma thag tu de'i mod la des ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la zhugs par gyur te/

ting nge 'dzin re re las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sngon chad ma mthong bdag la'ang zhugs par gyur to/ /de'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed

kyang tshogs su gyur to/ /de'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi tshogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu gnas par bya ba chen po sangs

rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par 'phags par gyur to/ /smon lam rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la'ang zhugs par gyur to/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung

ba'i lam sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kyang byung bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kyang rnam par 'phel bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kyang

rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /ji ltar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan snga na 'dug pas lag pa g.yas

pa brkyang te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor spyi bor bzhag pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos kyang lag pa g.yas pa brkyang

zhing tshong dpon gyi bu nor spyi bo la bzhag par gyur to/ /de bzhin du phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag gi de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos kyang lag pa g.yas pa brkyang zhing tshong dpon gyi bu nor spyi bo la bzhag par gyur to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par

snang mdzad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lag pas reg ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor chos kyi sgo mang po la zhugs par gyur pa de bzhin du kun tu bzang po'i lus thams

cad las 'phros pa'i lag pa'i sprin mang pos reg pa'i tshong dpon gyi bu nor kyang chos kyi sgo mang po la tshul sna tshogs kyis zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos

tshong dpon gyi bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nga'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong mod/ smras pa 'phags pa mthong ni mthong na de tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pa de ni de bzhin

gshegs pas mkhyen na mkhyen grang ngo / /des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ngas ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mngon par 'dod cing / bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu rnam

par spyad de/ bskal pa chen po de dag re re la yang byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyong bar byed cing / ngas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bsnyen bkur to/ /

bskal pa chen po de dag re re la yang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bsod nams yongs su sdud pa byed cing / mchod sbyin chen po gtang ba thams cad dang sbyar ba/ 'jig rten thams cad du rnam par grags pa/ sems can thams cad

la bstabs pa dag kyang mchod sbyin tu byas so/ /bskal pa chen po de dag re re la yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos la mngon par smon cing gtang ba dang / gtang ba chen po dang / shin tu gtang ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med

pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig byas so/ /bskal pa chen po de dag re re la yang lus dang srog phangs par bya ba par sangs rgyas kyi chos gces par bya bas lus brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa

zhig yongs su btang ngo rgyal po'i srid chen po yang yongs su btang ngo / /grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang yul dang khams dang rgyal po'i gnas dag kyang yongs su btang ngo / /sdug cing yid du 'ong la btang mi bra ba'i 'khor gyi tshogs dag kyang yongs su btang ngo / /

bu dang bu mo dang chung ma dag kyang yongs su btang ngo / /rang gi lus dang / sha dag kyang yongs su btang ngo / /bdag gi lus las khrag dag kyang slong ba rnams la yongs su btang ngo / /rus pa dang rkang dag kyang yongs su

btang ngo / /rkang pa dang lag pa dag kyang yongs su btang ngo / /yan lag dang nying lag dag kyang yongs su btang ngo / /sna dang rna ba dag kyang yongs su btang ngo / /dag kyang yongs su btang ngo / /

rang gi kha nas lce'i dbang po dag kyang yongs su btang ngo / /bskal pa chen po de dag re re la yang 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing bla na med par gyur pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dbu la mngon par smon cing / rang

gi mgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig yongs su btang ngo / /bskal pa chen po re re la ji lta ba de bzhin du bskal pa chen po rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i

rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las bskal pa rgya mtsho re re la yang de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig la dbang po dam par gyur te/ rim gro byas so/ /bkur sti byas so/ /phud dud byas so/

mchod pa byas so/ /na bza' dang / bshos dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dag kyang dbul ba byas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bstan pa la yang rab tu byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gdams ngag thams

cad la yang rab tu zhugs so/ /de dag gi bstan pa yang / yongs su gzung ste/ rigs kyi bu de snyed kyi bskal pa rgya mtshor yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam gyis kyang / mi mthun pa'i sems bskyed

du mi dran no/ /de snyed kyi bskal pa rgya mtshor sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam gyis kyang khong khro ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'am/ bdag tu 'dzin pa'i sems sam/ bdag yongs su bskyang zhing yongs su gzung ba'i sems sam/

bdag dang gzhan tu dbye ba'i sems sam/ byang chub kyi lam dang bral bar bya ba'i sems sam/ 'khor ba na gnas pas yongs su skyo ba'i sems sam/ zhum pa'i sems sam/ sgrib pas mgo rmongs pa'i sems bskyed du mi dran te/

gzhan du na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs bstsags pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems ye shes gzhan gyis mi thub cing brgal bar dka' ba'i snying po dang ldan pa bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ nga'i sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa/

sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas pa'i sbyor ba dag dang / des snying rje chen po'i sems rab tu thob ste/ sems can yongs su bskyabs pa dang / yongs su smin par bya ba dang / yongs su sbyang bar byas pa'i sbyor ba dag dang /

sangs rgyas mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba'i sbyor ba dag dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su btsal ba'i don du bla ma la rim gror byas pa'i sbyor ba dag dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i don du lus yongs su btang ba'i sbyor ba dag
dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba'i don du rang gi srog yongs su btang ba'i sbyor ba de dag ni bstan par bya na/ bskal pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang zad par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu ngas
ni/ chos rgya mtsho de snyed cig las kyang / tshig dang yi ge 'ga' tsam yang / sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la brtson pa dang / rang gi sems kyi rgyud nges par shes

par bya ba la brtson pa dang / pha rol gyis chos mngon du thos par bya ba la brtson pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i ye shes snang ba thams cad rab tu brjod pa la brtson pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes thams cad rab tu brjod
pa la brtson pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i bde ba yongs su bskyed pa la brtson pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan yang dag par bsngags pa la brtson pas

'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongs su btang bas ma nyos pa'am/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bas mos pa gang yang med de/ de ltar nga nyid kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa bstan par bya na/ bskal ba rgya mtsho

sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed zad par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas rnam pa de lta bu'i tshogs kyi stobs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu bstsags pa'i stobs dang / mos pa rgya

chen po'i stobs dang / yon tan la nan tan du bya ba'i stobs dang / chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba'i stobs dang / shes rab kyi mig gi stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi

rlabs kyi stobs dang / smon lam chen po'i stobs dang / snying rje chen po'i stobs dang / shin tu sbyangs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i stobs dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'i stobs kyis chos kyi

lus yongs su dag pa dus gsum du tha mi dad pa thob par gyur to/ /bla na med pa'i gzugs kyi lus 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa

thams cad du rjes su song ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab tu gzhol ba/ thams cad du rab tu gnas pa rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad rnam pa thams cad du/ ston pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ yid du 'ong ba yang yongs

su sbyangs so/ /rigs kyi bu ngas lus thob pa phun sum tshogs pa/ bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas pas yongs su grub pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos/ 'byung bar dka' ba mthong bar dka' ba

'di la ltos/ rigs kyi bu nga ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du yang mi 'ong na/ mthong bar lta ji zhig smos/ rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag nga'i ming thos pa tsam gyis/ bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yod do/ /mthong ba tsam dang / reg pa tsam dang / bskyal pa tsam dang / rjes su 'brang ba tsam dang / rmi lam du mthong ba tsam dang / rmi lam du ming thos

pa tsam gyis kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yod de/ sems can la las ni nga nyin zhag gcig tu dran par byas na yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ /la las ni zhag

bdun dang / la las ni zla ba phyed dang / la las ni zla ba gcig dang / la las ni lo gcig dang / la las ni lo brgya dang / la las ni bskal pa gcig dang / la las ni bskal pa brgya nas/ la las ni bskal ba sangs rgyas kyi

zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du nga rjes su dran par byas na/ yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ /la las ni tshe gcig tu rjes su dran par byas na/ yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ /la las

ni tshe'i rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ /sems can la las ni nga'i 'od mthong bas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ /la las ni 'od zer

bkye ba mthong bas la las ni zhing bskyod pas la las ni gzugs kyi lus bstan pas la las ni dga' bar byas pas yongs su smin par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar thabs kyi tshul sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin

tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu sems can gang gis nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thob pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs

su dag par skye'o/ /gang gis nga'i lus yongs su dag pa mthong bar gyur pa de dag ni nga'i lus lta bur skye bar 'gyur gyis rigs kyi bu nga'i lus rnam par dag pa 'di la ltos shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor byang chub sems dpa'

kun tu bzang po'i lus la bsam pa dang / ba spu'i bu ga re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas skye bas yongs su gang ba mthong ngo / /zhing rgya mtsho re re na yang de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i

'khor rgya mtshos kun nas bskor ba mang po bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /zhing rgya mtsho de dag thams cad kyang gzhi sna tshogs dang dbyibs sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang 'khor yug sna tshogs dang sprin sna tshogs dang nam mkha' sna tshogs

kyis kun nas khebs pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba sna tshogs dang chos kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs kyi dbyangs dang ldan par mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu ga re re la ji lta ba bzhin du ba spu'i bu ga ma lus pa thams cad dang / mtshan thams cad dang dpe

byad bzang po thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad la yang de bzhin te/ zhing rgya mtsho re re nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku sprul pa'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams

thams cad rgyas par bkang ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pas rjes su

bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhugs te/ sems can yongs su smin par byed par gyur to/ /de ltar tshong dpon gyi bu nor dge ba'i bshes

gnyen sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig gi drung du phyin te/ mthong ba dang bsnyen bkur bas ye shes kyi snang ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsags pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsags

par gyur ba de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang ma yin brgya stong gi char yang ma yin/ bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang ma yin te/ grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang dper bya ba dang / rgyur bya ba tsam du yang mi phod do/ /des dang po sems

bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong ba'i bar der sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ji snyed cig la zhugs par gyur pa de dag pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul

shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ba spu'i bu ga re rer sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mang po la sems kyi skad cig gcig gis zhugs par gyur te/ ba spu'i bu ga re rer ji lta ba de bzhin du ba spu'i bu ga ma lus

pa thams cad la yang sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par gnon pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal bar byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par 'gengs pas zhugs

kyang zhing rgya mtsho gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i mthar phyin par ma gyur te/ zhing rgya mtsho'i lhun dang zhing rgya mtsho'i bye brag dang / zhing rgya mtsho yongs su bsdu ba dang / zhing rgya mtsho yongs su 'grub pa dang / zhing rgya mtsho 'jig pa dang / zhing rgya

mtsho rnam par phye ba dang / sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mtsho gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mtsho'i sku dang / sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mtsho'i bye brag dang / sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mtsho yongs su bsdu ba dang / sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mtsho

yongs su 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mtsho yongs su 'jig pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / byang chub

sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i bye brag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yongs su bsdu ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i

'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yongs su 'jig pa dang / sems can gyi khams la 'jug pa dang / skad cig re res sems can gyi dbang po shes pa la 'jug pa dang /

sems can gyi dbang po shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya zhing gdul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul ba zab mo la rnam par gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnan pa'i

rnam par gnon pa rgya mtsho'i mthar yang phyin par ma gyur te/ de zhing la lar ni bskal par rnam par spyad par gyur to/ /zhing la lar ni bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du spyad par gyur te/ zhing de dag nas kyang

g.yos pa med do/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la yang zhing rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug cing sems can rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed par gyur te/ des de ltar mthar gyis

byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam rgya mtsho mnyam pa nyid kyi bar du 'ang thob par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid dang / zhing thams cad lus kyis rgyas par dgang ba mnyam pa nyid dang spyod

pa yongs su rdzogs par rgyas par dgang ba mnyam pa nyid dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba yongs su bstan pas rgyas par dgang ba mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mnyam pa nyid dang / so

so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / dbyangs brjod pa mnyam pa nyid dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sbyor ba mnyam pa nyid dang / stobs dang mi 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi

rnam par spyod pa mnyam pa nyid dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po mnyam pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su thob par gyur to/ /de nas byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos bskal ba dang / bskal pa 'byam klas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed

po de dag brnan te mngon par brjod pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smon lam btab pa/ /ji snyed su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ /dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi seng ge kun/ /bdag gis ma lus de dag thams cad la/

lus dang ngag yid dang bas phyag bgyi'o/ /bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam stobs dag gis/ /rgyal ba thams cad yid kyis mngon sum du/ /zhing gi rdul snyed lus rab btud pa yis/ /rgyal ba kun la rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdul

gcig steng na rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa dag/ /de ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus par/ /thams cad rgyal ba dag gis gang bar mos /de dag bsngags pa mi zad rgya mtsho rnams/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag

rgya mtsho'i sgra kun gyis/ /rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan rab brjod cing / /bde bar gshegs pa thams cad bdag gis bstod/ /me tog dam pa phreng ba dam pa dang / /sil snyan rnams dang byug pa'i gdugs mchog dang / /mar me mchog dang bdug

pa dam pa yis/ /rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyi/ /na bza' dam pa rnams dang dri mchog dang / /phye ma'i phur ma ri rab mnyam pa dang / /khyad par can gyi rgyan mchog thams cad kyis/ /rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyi/ /mchod

pa gang rnams bla med rgya che ba/ /de dag rgyal ba thams cad la yang mos/ /bzang po spyod la dad pa'i stobs dag gis/ /rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang gis na/ /lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang / /sdig

pa bdag gis bgyis pa ci mchis pa/ /de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun dang sangs rgyas sras/ /rang rgyal rnams dang slob dang mi slob dang / /'gro ba rnams kyi bsod nams gang la yang / /de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag yi

rang / /gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sgron ma dag /byang chub rim par sangs rgyas ma chags brnyes/ /mgon po de dag bdag gis thams cad la/ /'khor lo bla na med pa bskor bar bskul/ /mya ngan 'da' ston gang bzhed de dag la/ /'gro ba kun la

phan zhing bde ba'i phyir/ /bskal ba zhing gi rdul snyed bzhugs par yang / /bdag gis thal mo rab sbyar gsol bar bgyi/ /phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags pa dang / /rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba yi/ /dge ba cung zad bdag

gis ci bstsags pa/ /thams cad bdag gis byang chub phyir bsngo'o/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bcu yi/ /'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs mchod par gyur/ gang yang ma byon de dag rab myur bar/ /bsam rdzogs byang

chub rim par sangs rgyas spyon/ /phyogs bcu ga la'i zhing rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag rgya cher yongs su dag par gyur/ /byang chub shing dbang drung gshegs rgyal ba dang / /sangs rgyas sras kyis rab tu gang bar shog /phyogs bcu'i sems can

gang rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag rtag tu nad med bde bar gyur/ /'gro ba kun gyi chos kyi don rnams ni/ /'thun par gyur cing re ba'ang grub par shog /byang chub spyod pa dag ni bdag spyod cing / /'gro ba kun tu skye ba dran par gyur/ /tshe rabs kun tu 'chi

'pho skye ba na/ /rtag tu bdag ni rab tu 'byung bar shog /rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su slob gyur te/ /bzang po spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing / /tshul khrims spyod pa dri med yongs dag par/ /rtag tu ma nyams skyon med spyod par shog /lha yi skad

dang klu dang gnod sbyin skad/ /grul bum dag dang mi yi skad rnams dang / /'gro ba kun gyi sgra rnams ji tsam par/ /thams cad skad du bdag gis chos bstan to/ /nges shing pha rol phyin la rab brtson te/ /byang chub sems
ni nam yang brjed ma gyur/ /sdig pa gang rnams sgrib par 'gyur ba dag /de dag ma lus yongs su byang bar shog /las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi las rnams las/ /grol zhing 'jig rten 'gro ba rnams su yang /

ji ltar pad mo chus mi chags pa bzhin/ /nyi zla nam mkhar thogs pa med ltar spyad/ /zhing gi khyon dang phyogs rnams ji tsam par/ /ngan song sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed/ /bde ba dag la 'gro ba kun 'god cing / /'gro ba thams cad la

ni phan par spyad/ /byang chub spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing / /sems can dag gi spyod dang mthun par 'jug /bzang po spyod pa dag ni rab ston cing / /ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyod par 'gyur/ /bdag gi spyod dang mtshungs par gang spyod pa/ /

de dag dang ni rtag tu 'grogs par shog /lus dang ngag rnams dang ni sems kyis kyang / /spyod pa dag dang smon lam gcig tu spyad/ /bdag la phan par 'dod pa'i grogs po dag /bzang po spyod pa rab tu ston pa rnams/ /de dag dang yang rtag tu phrad par

shog /de dag bdag gis nam yang yid mi dbyung / /sangs rgyas sras kyis bskor ba'i mgon po rnams/ /mngon sum rtag tu bdag gis rgyal ba lta/ /ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar/ /de dag la yang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi/ /rgyal ba

rnams kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing / /byang chub spyod pa kun tu snang bar byed/ /bzang po spyod pa rnam par sbyangs pa yang / /ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyad par bgyi/ /srid pa thams cad du yang 'khor ba na/ /bsod nams ye shes dag ni

mi zad rnyed/ /thabs dang shes rab ting 'dzin rnam thar dang / /yon tan kun gyi mi zad mdzod du gyur/ /rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed zhing rnams te/ /zhing der bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas rnams/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs

pa la/ /byang chub spyod pa spyod cing blta bar bgyi/ /de dag ma lus thams cad phyogs su yang / /skra tsam khyon la dus gsum tshad snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang / /bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod cing rab tu 'jug /

gsung gcig yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra skad kyis/ /rgyal ba kun dbyangs yan lag rnam dag pa/ /'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin dbyangs/ /sangs rgyas gsung la rtag tu 'jug par bgyi/ /dus gsum gshegs pa rgyas ba thams cad dag /'khor

lo'i tshul rnams rab tu bskor ba yis/ /de dag gi yang gsung dbyangs zad la/ /blo yi stobs kyis bdag kyang rab tu 'jug /ma 'ongs bskal ba thams cad 'jug par yang / /skad cig gcig gis bdag kyang 'jug par bgyi/ /gang yang

bskal pa dus gsum tshad de dag /skad cig cha shas kyis ni zhugs par spyad/ /dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi seng ge dag /de dag skad cig gcig la bdag gis blta/ /rtag tu de dag gi ni spyod yul la/ /sgyu mar gyur pa'i rnam thar stobs kyis

'jug /gang yang dus gsum dag gi zhing bkod pa/ /de dag rdul gcig steng du mngon par bsgrub/ /de ltar ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug /gang yang ma byon 'jig rten sgron ma rnams/ /

de dag rim par 'tshang rgya 'khor lo bskor/ /mya ngan 'das pa rab tu zhi mtha' ston/ /mgon po kun gyi drung du bdag mchi'o/ /kun tu myur ba'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang / /kun nas sgo yi theg pa'i stobs dag dang / /kun tu yon tan spyod pa'i

stobs rnams dang / /kun tu khyab pa byams pa dag gi stobs/ /kun tu dge ba'i bsod nams stobs rnams dang / /chags pa med par gyur pa'i ye shes stobs/ /shes rab thabs dang ting 'dzin stobs dag gis/ /byang chub stobs rnams yang

dag sgrub par byed/ /las kyi stobs rnams yongs su dag byed cing / /nyon mongs stobs rnams kun tu 'joms par byed/ /bdud kyi stobs rnams stobs med rab byed cing / /bzang po spyod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs par bgyi/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing / /

sems can rgya mtsho dag ni rnam par sgrol/ /chos rnams rgya mtsho rab tu mthong byed cing / /ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu rtogs par byed/ /spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing / /smon lam rgya mtsho rab tu rdzogs par byed/ /sangs

rgyas rgya mtsho rab tu mchod byed cing / /bskal pa rgya mtshor mi skyo spyad par bgyi/ /gang yang dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba yi/ /byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam bye brag rnams/ /bzang po spyod pas byang chub sangs rgyas nas/ /de kun bdag

gis ma lus rdzogs par bgyi/ /rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi thu bo ba/ /gang gi ming ni kun tu bzang zhes bya/ /mkhas pa de dang mtshungs par spyad pa'i phyir/ /dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rnam dag cing / /

spyod pa rnam dag zhing rnams yongs dag dang / /bsngo ba bzang po mkhas pa ci 'dra bar/ /de 'drar bdag kyang de dang mtshungs par shog /kun nas dge ba bzang po spyod pa'i phyir/ /'jam dpal gyi ni smon lam spyad par bgyi/ /ma

'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar/ /de yi bya ba ma lus rdzogs par bgyi/ /spyod pa dag ni tshad yod ma gyur cig /yon tan rnams kyang tshad gzung med par shog /spyod pa tshad med pa la gnas nas kyang / /de dag 'phrul pa thams cad 'tshal bar bgyi/ /

nam mkha'i mthar thug gyur pa ji tsam par/ /sems can ma lus mtha' yang de bzhin te/ /ci tsam las dang nyon mongs mthar gyur pa/ /bdag gi smon lam mtha' yang de tsam mo/ /gang yang phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mtha' yas pa/ /rin chen

brgyan te rgyal ba rnams la phul/ /lha dang mi yi bde ba mchog rnams kyang / /zhing gi rdul snyed bskal bar phul ba bas/ /gang gis bsngo ba'i rgyal po 'di thos nas/ /byang chub mchog gi rjes su rab mos shing / /lan cig tsam yang dad pa bskyed pas

ni/ /bsod nams dam pa'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro/ /gang gis bzang spyod smon lam 'di btab pa/ /des ni ngan song thams cad spong bar 'gyur/ /des ni grogs po ngan pa spangs pa yin/ /snang ba mtha' yas de yang des myur mthong / /de

dag rnyed pa rab rnyed bde bar 'tsho/ /mi tshe 'dir yang de dag legs par 'ong / /kun tu bzang po de yang ji 'dra bar/ /de dag ring por mi thogs de bzhin 'gyur/ /mtshams med lnga po dag gi sdig pa rnams/ /gang gi mi shes dbang gis byas pa dag /

de yis bzang po spyod pa 'di brjod na/ /myur du ma lus yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ /ye shes dang ni gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang / /rigs dang kha dog rnams dang ldan par 'gyur/ /bdud dang mu stegs mang pos de thub/ /'jig rten gsum po

kun na'ang mchod par 'gyur/ /byang chub shing dbang drung du de myur 'gro/ /song nas sems can phan phyir der 'dug ste/ /byang chub sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa thams cad btul/ /gang yang bzang po spyod

pa'i smon lam 'di/ /'chang ba dang ni klog gam ston pa yi/ /de yi rnam par smin pa sangs rgyas mkhyen/ /byang chub mchog la som nyi ma byed cig /'jam dpal ji ltar mkhyen cing dpa' ba dang / /kun tu bzang po de yang de bzhin te/ /

de dag gi ni rjes su bdag slob cing / /dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo/ /dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad kyis/ /bsngo ba gang la mchog tu bsngags pa des/ /bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kun kyang / /bzang po spyod

phyir rab tu bsngo bar bgyi/ /bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur pa na/ /sgrib pa thams cad dag ni phyir bstsal te/ /mngon sum snang ba mtha' yas de mthong nas/ /bde ba can gyi zhing der rab tu 'gro/ /der song nas ni smon lam 'di dag kyang / /

thams cad ma lus mngon du gyur par shog /de dag ma lus bdag gis yongs su bskang / /'jig rten ji srid sems can phan par bgyi/ /rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor bzang zhing dga' ba der/ /pad mo dam pa shin tu mdzes

las skyes/ /snang ba mtha' yas rgyal bas mngon sum du/ /lung bstan pa yang bdag gis der thob shog /der ni bdag gis lung bstan rab thob nas/ /sprul pa mang po bye ba phrag brgya yis/ /blo'i stobs kyis phyogs bcu rnams su yang / /

sems can rnams la phan pa mang po bgyi/ /gang gis bzang po spyod pa ston pa yis/ /dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bstsags pa/ /des ni 'gro ba'i smon lam dge ba rnams/ /skad cig gcig gis thams cad 'byor bar shog /gang yang

bzang po spyod pa bsngos pa yis/ /bsod nams mtha' yas dam pa thob pa des/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal chu bor bying ba rnams/ /'od dpag med pa'i gnas rab 'gro bar shog /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba

las/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi nang / sdong pos brgyan pa zhes bya ba chos kyi rnam grangs chen po las/ nor dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i spyod pa phyogs gcig ste ci snyed pa rdzogs // //rgya gar gyi

mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde/ la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //de ltar bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' 'khor lo rim pa gsum las/ 'dir tha ma don dam rnam par

nges pa'i 'khor lo'i snying po phul du byung ba sangs rgyas phal po che mtshan gyi rnam grangs shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde snod/ snyan gyi gong rgyan/ pad+ma'i rgyan sogs du ma dang ldan pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa phal po che'i le'u/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi bsngo ba/ sa bcu bstan pa/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa bstan pa/ de bzhin

gshegs pa'i skye ba dang 'byung ba bstan pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u/ sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste bdun la so so'i nang gses kyi dbye bas le'u bzhi bcu rtsa lnga/ sh+lo ka sum khri/ dgu stong sum cu/ bam po brgya sum cu dang sh+lo ka sum cu yod par bu ston rin po che sogs bzhed cing / tshal pa bka'

'gyur gyi dkar chag tu bam po brgya dang bco lnga/ ldan dkar mar bam po brgya dang nyi shu rtsa bdun du mdzad/ deng sang gi dpe rnams la'ang bam grangs mang nyung ci rigs yod par snang / 'di thog mar 'phags pa klu sgrub la/ paN+Di ta byang chub bzang po dang paN+Di ta dga' ba gnyis kyis zhus/ de gnyis kas rgya nag tu

'gyur mdzad/ rgya nag gi 'gyur la/ su ren+t+ra bo d+hi dang / bai ro tsa na rak+Shi tas zhus chen mdzad par bshad cing / lung gi brgyud rim la'ang rgya nag nas 'gyur ba'i brgyud pa ni/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal/ mgon po klu sgrub/ gong gi paN+Di ta gnyis/ de nas hwa shang thu thu zhun sogs

rim par brgyud de/ hwa shang gying ju la dbus pa sangs rgyas 'bum gyis gsan/ de nas lo tsA ba mchog ldan nas deng sang gi bar du brgyud pa dang / rgya gar nas 'gyur ba'i brgyud pa ni/ klu sgrub nas/ aR+Ya de wa/ 'jam dpal grags pa sogs nas rim bzhin/ rdo rje gdan ba ri lo tsA bas gsan/ de

nas mchims brtson seng / rje btsun sa skya pa chen po sogs brgyud par bshad do/ /'on kyang gong gi 'gyur byang 'di las lo paN gzhan gyis bsgyur tshul lo rgyus dang / dpe rnams la ma mthong ngo / /'di nyid tshal ba bka' 'gyur gyi ma phyi byas nas 'jang sa tham rgyal pos bka' 'gyur ro cog par du

bsgrubs pa deng sang li thang mchal bar du grags pa khungs thub kyi tshad mar bzung nas ma phyi byas pa yin kyang / skabs 'dir chad lhag dang brda ma dag pa mang ba 'dug pas/ slar yig rnying dag pa mang du btsal nas zhu dag bgyis pa yin la/ de'ang rgya dpe mi gcig pa dang / 'gyur mi mthun

pa ni don gyi khog gcig kyang tshig la zhu dag mi btub na'ang / 'di'i dpe phal cher zhu dag pher ba kho na 'dug la 'on kyang rgyan la bkod pa dang / 'byam klas la rab 'byams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa la/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa dang / thugs la dgongs pa dang / nyin

mtshan dang zla ba yar kham mar kham dang zhes pa la/ nyin mtshan dang yud du yan man dang zhes dang / tha snyad la rnam par dpyod pa zhes pa rnams 'gyur khyad lta bur 'dug pa don la mi 'gal bas rang sor bzhag /rgya skad la rang bzhin rkyen/ rnam 'gyur gyi tshul du ma yod pa/ bod

la lo paN chos kyi spyan ldan rnams kyis don 'gyur mdzad pa 'ga' zhig /dus dang rnam dbye sogs shin tu rtogs dka' bas dpe mthun shas che ba gtso bor bzung / gzhan dogs gnas cung zad yod pa rnams/ bod kyi brda'i bstan bcos rnams dang go bstun/ dpe phal cher la brda rnying

shas che ba dang / 'gyur bcos mdzad pa'i gsal kha mi snang bas/ bod kyi brda rnying pa sha stag zhig byung na 'brel chags pa 'dra yang phyis su brda gsar rnying 'dres nyams che ba dang / shad bar gcod mtshams 'khrugs pa mang du snang yang cung zad skyon chung ba'i dbang du byas nas btang snyoms su

bzhag /de min mon pa'i rdo gcod zhu dag gi dpe zlar ma song bar nan tan chen pos shin tu dag khul du bgyis pa 'di/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rin po che dang ris med pa'i 'gro ba yongs kyi bsod nams kyi dpal du bskal ba ji srid gnas kyi bar du khor yug ri bo'i khongs 'dir/ nyi zla ltar

gsal bar gyur cig /ces bod chen po'i yul ljongs sde bzhi'i 'byung gnas dge bcu'i khrims lugs kyis mngon par mtho ba'i nor 'dzin yangs pa chos bzhin du skyong ba'i lha chos rgyal byang chub sems dpa'i mi'i dbang po bstan pa tshe zhal snga nas/ dge byed ces pa chu

stag lor gsung rab 'di nyid par du bsgrub par mdzad pa'i skabs zhu dag las 'phros te 'di nyid kyi do dam par bkas gnang ba'i zhabs 'bring ba dge slong bkra shis dbang phyug gis gleng ba dza yan+tu// //ye d+har+m+mA he tu brab+ha wA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya wad ta/ /he ShAny+tsa lo ni ro d+ha e waM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH//
